Poseidon's Guard.baseFlair_: The servants of the ocean king possess his power in their spears, free to manipulate the ocean as they please.
Poseidon's Guard.evoFlair_: For their beloved king, one day they shall become his very spears to bring down the birds of the sky.

Whitefrost Dragonewt Filene.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Whitefrost Whisper into your hand.
Whitefrost Dragonewt Filene.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Whitefrost Dragonewt Filene.baseFlair_: Anything too warm will betray you someday. It's bound to go cold in the end. That's why you don't need it, why there's no use for it. That's why you should freeze from head to toe.
Whitefrost Dragonewt Filene.evoFlair_: Anything too warm will break in the end. It's sure to vanish. That's why you should sleep this instant. Because once you're cold, you'll be eternal.

Masamune, Raging Dragon.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If you have 10 play point orbs, give all allied Dragoncraft followers Rush. Reduce damage to those followers to 0 until the end of the turn.
Masamune, Raging Dragon.baseFlair_: You have harmed my citizens and incurred my wrath. You should know better than to rouse a sleeping dragon! Hear my roar, fools, and tremble!
Masamune, Raging Dragon.evoFlair_: This rage sears my heart and wrenches open the lids of my lost eye... The dragon within me stirs! You who have awoken it, I trust you will slake its thirst for blood!

Byron, Fullmetal Dragoon.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it +1/+0.
Byron, Fullmetal Dragoon.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon an Assembly Droid.
Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it +1/+0.
Whenever another allied Machina follower comes into play, give it +0/+1.
Byron, Fullmetal Dragoon.baseFlair_: Our technological research has produced a being who surpasses even dragons. The steel dragoon unifies the seas, ravages the earth, and conquers the skies, reigning over all with his splendor. —Dragonewt Scholar's Record, Part 4
Byron, Fullmetal Dragoon.evoFlair_: I am clad in the culmination of technology obtained through grueling research. I shoulder the fate of an ultimate being who surpasses dragons. At the pinnacle of all creation, I stand, as fresh battles await me.

Garyu, Supreme Dragonkin.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Choose: Summon a Supreme Golden Dragon or Supreme Silver Dragon.
Enhance (9): Summon both instead.
Garyu, Supreme Dragonkin.baseFlair_: Listen and be amazed, be paralyzed with fear, by my heroic tale as it resounds throughout the land! I possess the might of a million great warriors! I have amassed a vast fortune and upheld the ideals of the masses! Hear the dragon's victory roar!
Garyu, Supreme Dragonkin.evoFlair_: Truth be told, I am quite weak, terribly vulnerable! But in the presence of great dragons, we need only become great dragons ourselves! Never fear—I am most skilled at such perilous feats! Hear the dragon's victory roar!

Rola, Inferno Dragoon.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there are at least 2 other Machina cards in your hand, gain Bane and Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+2 and Storm. If there are 2 enemy followers or less in play, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Rola, Inferno Dragoon.baseFlair_:
"Aww, yeah! I've got a great feeling about this one!"
"Entering battle zone in 3, 2, 1..."
"Haha! I'm gonna take out so many bots today!"
—Rola, Inferno Dragoon and Nova, Trusty Mech
Rola, Inferno Dragoon.evoFlair_: Balls of flame hurtle above, lighting the heavens in crimson. She rides her steel dragon, wreaking havoc. Waves of fury crash below. The plesiosaurus rise from the seas, ready to defend the land. The struggle between the dragons of flame and tide has begun.

Hellflame Dragon.baseFlair_: The red dragon soars in the sky.
Hellflame Dragon.evoFlair_: The red dragon unleashes a bellow of fury.

Otohime's Vanguard.baseFlair_: O, all-powerful Dragon Empress, your raging Highness! Your wish is our wish! Your will is our will! If you command it, we'll become the torrent that devours this world!
Otohime's Vanguard.evoFlair_: O, all-powerful Dragon Empress, your raging Highness! We are your claws, your scales! We exist to serve you! If it is your wish, we'll be the maelstrom that swallows the world!

Dragon Oracle.baseEffect_:
Gain an empty play point orb.
Draw a card if Overflow is active for you.
Dragon Oracle.baseFlair_: The wise dragon's words bring strength.

Dragon Wings.baseFlair_: Storms are born from the merest flap of its wings.

Wild Hunt.baseFlair_: It follows the scent of blood. And when it arrives, the slaughter begins.

Dragon's Foresight.baseEffect_:
Put a random follower from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (4): Then put a random follower with at least 5 defense from your deck into your hand.
Dragon's Foresight.baseFlair_: No one can defy the glaring eye.

Sneer of Disdain.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (4): Then deal 1 damage to all followers.
Sneer of Disdain.baseFlair_: Pitiful. You'll never survive in my world!

Orca Run.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If Overflow is active for you, put 2 Megalorcas into your hand.
Orca Run.baseFlair_: Once in their lives, megalorcas rush back against the violent currents. They control the water with their whole body, displaying their worth as creatures of the sea. But where do they go? To where the sea begins? —Sea Beasts and Their Tales, Chapter 2

Dragon Emissary.baseEffect_: Put a random card that costs at least 5 play points from your deck into your hand. Subtract 1 from its cost.
Dragon Emissary.baseFlair_: Its call echoes thousands of miles away.

Dragonewt Fist.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times.
Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand.

Waters of the Orca.baseEffect_:
Summon a Megalorca.
Enhance (4): Summon 1 more.
Enhance (6): Summon 1 more.
Enhance (8): Summon 1 more.
Enhance (10): Summon 1 more.
Waters of the Orca.baseFlair_: It is a drop springing from the ocean, or perhaps a current of the ocean itself.

White Breath.baseFlair_: A pure breath for the uncorrupted.

Breath of the Salamander.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (6): Then deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Breath of the Salamander.baseFlair_: You know how to magically change winter to summer? Just anger a salamander.

Powerforge.baseEffect_:
Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the strongest allied follower in play.
Enhance (7): Before dealing damage, summon a Dragon.
Powerforge.baseFlair_: Dragon scales are hard enough to bend steel. Were there an alloy strong enough to pierce those scales, it would make the rarest blade in existence: A dragonslayer's sword.

Draconic Call.baseEffect_:
Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Dragoncraft followers from your deck into your hand.
If Overflow is active for you, randomly put 2 of the highest-cost Dragoncraft followers into your hand instead.
Draconic Call.baseFlair_: Horses respond to a human's reins, but dragons answer only to his caliber.

Dragonlife Blade.baseEffect_: Gain an empty play point orb.
Dragonlife Blade.baseFlair_: Just killing doesn't make you talented. —Dragoncleaver Roy

Dragonstrife Blade.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If that follower is a Dragoncraft follower, deal 6 damage instead.
Dragonstrife Blade.baseFlair_: Some things you just have to kill. —Dragoncleaver Roy

Dragoon's Meditation.baseFlair_:
Here in this plane, his heart is filled.
The power he wields roars through the skies.

Whitefrost Whisper.baseEffect_: Select an enemy follower and destroy it if it is already damaged. If it has not been damaged, deal 1 damage instead.
Whitefrost Whisper.baseFlair_: Even burning flames will freeze. —Whitefrost Dragonewt Filene

Golden Dragon's Den.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and then draw a card.

Firstborn Dragon.baseEffect_: Gain Ward if Overflow is active for you.
Firstborn Dragon.evoEffect_: Gain Ward if Overflow is active for you.
Firstborn Dragon.baseFlair_: An ancient flying dragon sealed away for generations but recently released. Determined to make up for lost time, it soars directly towards the heavens.
Firstborn Dragon.evoFlair_: With each beat of its wings, the flying dragon calls up its ancient memories. Remembering its original duty, it rushes to defend the heavens.

Aiela, Dragon Knight.baseEffect_: Last Words: Gain an empty play point orb.
Aiela, Dragon Knight.evoEffect_: Last Words: Gain an empty play point orb.
Aiela, Dragon Knight.baseFlair_: Thanks for always looking after me, Mister Dragon. But I can't keep relying on you. I need to learn to use a sword for when you're not there.
Aiela, Dragon Knight.evoFlair_: I don't like it that you're always looking after me. I want to have a strong body and a strong soul. One day I want to look after you!

Twin-Headed Dragon.baseEffect_: Gain +3/+0 if Overflow is active for you.
Twin-Headed Dragon.evoEffect_: Gain +3/+0 if Overflow is active for you.
Twin-Headed Dragon.baseFlair_: A twin-headed dragon. Once the beast unleashes its power, the heavens will freeze and the earth will burn.
Twin-Headed Dragon.evoFlair_: A pillar of incandescent flame. A blast of freezing breath. No enemy can hope to withstand this dragon's double-headed attacks.

Roc.baseEffect_: Strike: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
Roc.evoEffect_: Strike: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
Roc.baseFlair_: Beware of the Roc's caw. It is a sign that the beast is about to start hunting.
Roc.evoFlair_: It's good luck to be eaten by the Roc. After all, it's a very neat way to go. Not a trace is left behind, not even the bones.

Trinity Dragon.baseFlair_: A dragon deity that dwells in an impenetrable sanctuary. It is said to be responsible for good harvests, social order, and the delivering of judgments.
Trinity Dragon.evoFlair_: The Trinity Dragon provides good harvests by encouraging plants to grow, ensures social order by maintaining the balance between good and evil, and delivers judgments upon those who have done wrong.

Ironscale Dragonfolk.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower if an evolved allied follower is in play.
Ironscale Dragonfolk.baseFlair_: The scales of the dragon are hard enough to deflect any sword and sharper than any blade.
Ironscale Dragonfolk.evoFlair_: The dragon's scales serve as both armor to protect the beast and blades to cut down foes.

Griffon Knight.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Then randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand.
Griffon Knight.baseFlair_: A flying knight who navigates the sea of clouds. He wields a fine bow bestowed upon him by the king and is known far and wide as a hero of the sky.
Griffon Knight.evoFlair_: The arrows fired by the youth pierce the clouds to seek out his foes. Beasts of darkness have no hope of escaping the gaze of his soaring mount as the hero's battle takes him to every corner of the azure sky.

Aqua Nereid.baseFlair_: Once gems and gold sink into the sea, they're all mine. Now go forth, my orca, and find me something that glitters.
Aqua Nereid.evoFlair_: Who cares how much stuff is worth? If it's pretty, it's good enough for me. Now, my lovely orca, won't you find something to make me even more beautiful?

Dragoon Scyther.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Gain Storm if Overflow is active for you.
Dragoon Scyther.baseFlair_: You're way too slow! And that means I'm going to kill you with my scythe!
Dragoon Scyther.evoFlair_: C'mon, is that your best? You're cowards and weaklings, all of you!

Estrella Beast.baseEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Estrella Beast.evoEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Estrella Beast.baseFlair_: A beast born in the heavens, its resplendent blue mane flows like the trail of a comet. It adds another colorful dimension to the already beautiful night skies. —Records of Starforged Beings, Chapter 8
Estrella Beast.evoFlair_: People wish upon stars. The beasts of the heavens bear these wishes and deliver them to where the gods reside. —Records of Starforged Beings, Chapter 12

Dragon Aficionado.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Fire Drake Whelp.
Dragon Aficionado.baseFlair_: One day we'll soar through the skies together. As long as I have you, nothing in the sky can scare me!
Dragon Aficionado.evoFlair_: I'll follow you to the ends of this world. We'll aim for the skies, just the two of us!

Dragonclad Blademaster.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Bane if Overflow is active for you.
Dragonclad Blademaster.baseFlair_: Men and dragons are the same. When they're hurt, they scream. When they're cut, they die. What's to be afraid of?
Dragonclad Blademaster.evoFlair_: I can't say I'm good with fancy little moves. Whether I'm up against men or dragons, I end them with one blow.

Venomtail Salamander.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Ward.
Can only attack if Overflow is active for you.
Venomtail Salamander.baseFlair_: The compassionate venomtail salamander—it teaches the value of life to those who know not its value.
Venomtail Salamander.evoFlair_: The altruistic venomtail salamander—it teaches a lesson in true wealth to those who seek riches.

Serpent Drake.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain +4/+4.
At the start of the opponent's turn, if this follower has been damaged, summon a Serpent Drake.
Serpent Drake.evoEffect_: At the start of the opponent's turn, if this follower has been damaged, summon a Serpent Drake.
Serpent Drake.baseFlair_:
A wingless type of serpent dragon that's known for its tendency to coil into a circle, said to be a distant relative to the Ouroboros. A large and long-lived species.
—Serpent Dragons, Dragon Basics: A Primer
Serpent Drake.evoFlair_:
Contrary to popular belief, most dragons don't possess wings. Prevailing theory states that competitively weaker breeds developed them to flee danger. Therefore, serpent dragons are just as dangerous as their winged peers.
—Serpent Dragons, Dragon Basics: A Primer

Righteous Dragoon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Dragon Wings or Dragon's Handspur into your hand.
Righteous Dragoon.baseFlair_: Ride on! For justice! The sword of justice strikes here and now, to fell evil! Careful now... justice can be a bitter pill to swallow.
Righteous Dragoon.evoFlair_: All units, charge! For justice! The hand of justice works here and now, to thwart evil! Now taste my ultimate technique! Super Ultra Dragon Strike!

Splendorous Roc.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Evolve this follower.
Strike: Gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Splendorous Roc.evoEffect_: Strike: Gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Splendorous Roc.baseFlair_: I was trekking through the mountains when a giant shadow covered me. Took it for a dragon at first, but I breathed easy when I saw it was a bird. —A mountaineer
Splendorous Roc.evoFlair_: A bird's just a bird, 'cept when it lives in the mountains of the dragons. If any of those birds ever finds me again, I'll just play dead. —A mountaineer's ghost

Dragon Chef.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to your leader. If an allied amulet is in play, restore 3 defense instead.
Dragon Chef.baseFlair_: "Just the right intensity flame to cook thick monster meat all the way through! Now, I've never seen the guy, but his meals are always a thrill! Wait... Do you think his food tastes so good because of his delicate touch?" —Alchemical Confectioner
Dragon Chef.evoFlair_: "An original blend of ingredients combined masterfully on a single plate! As an accomplished gourmet, I didn't realize the world still had such delightful surprises in store for me! This chef... might just be a genius!" —Giving Gourmet

Basilisk.baseFlair_: Hissss! (Hey there, pal... You enjoying that life?)
Basilisk.evoFlair_: Basilisks are known to be noisy and fussy, but be warned—those who are drawn to the noise will find themselves destined for a fate of stone.

Dragonewt Princess.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower if Overflow is active for you.
Dragonewt Princess.baseFlair_: Wretched humans! You have destroyed the habitat of my people! Prepare to incur a wrath greater than any dragon could muster!
Dragonewt Princess.evoFlair_: Ha-ha-ha! Pathetic weaklings! How did you ever think you could do battle with us? The time to avenge my brethren is here at last!

Sky Dragon Ethica.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain an empty play point orb.
Sky Dragon Ethica.baseFlair_: Walfrid must be getting desperate if he's turning to me. But I'd better let you know that I don't share my sky with the unworthy.
Sky Dragon Ethica.evoFlair_: Why does Walfrid keep forcing these small fry on me? Humph! It really winds me up. In fact, I think I'll go blast some fools out of the sky to make myself feel better.

Imprisoned Dragon.baseFlair_: Sealed away inside a cave, the dragon used a faint light to plead for help. But its pleas could not reach its friends in the sky.
Imprisoned Dragon.evoFlair_: Deep inside a gloomy cave, an eternity of solitude awaited. The dragon's once-mighty heart was eroded by endless days of silence and stillness. Eventually, after countless millennia, it lost all sense of itself.

Ace Dragoon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the attack of the strongest allied follower in play.
Ace Dragoon.baseFlair_: Humph, it seems our allies are doing rather well. But I am not to be outdone! Come! To battle!
Ace Dragoon.evoFlair_: Dragon and human, united as one! We are the ultimate war machine! We shall tear through enemy ranks with sword and claw alike!

Eyfa, Wyvern Rider.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+2 and Storm.
Eyfa, Wyvern Rider.baseFlair_: Snacks, check! Harness, check! Wyvern's mood... excellent! Just perfect!
Eyfa, Wyvern Rider.evoFlair_: We'll surpass the legendary Dark Dragoon and mighty Phoenix Rider! Well, maybe...

Master of Draconic Arts.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Gain +4/+0 until the end of the turn if Overflow is active for you.
Master of Draconic Arts.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Gain +4/+0 until the end of the turn if Overflow is active for you.
Master of Draconic Arts.baseFlair_: A dragon's always in motion, slithering and writhing on. The dragon is a state of mind, the state of mind I strive for.
Master of Draconic Arts.evoFlair_: To slay a dragon, one must shimmer like its scales. For the older the dragon, the stronger it becomes. One with the heart of the warrior understands.

Beowulf.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Destroy an enemy follower with at least 5 defense.
Beowulf.baseFlair_: Armor of a dragon's curse, sword of a dragon's madness. Clad in both, the man whispers to himself. To overcome the madness he requires more madness. —Accursed Hero, Chapter 2
Beowulf.evoFlair_: Even a dragon will fall to frenzied swordsmanship. He yells through the bloody and violent wind. His madness is his very power; his madness is his very way of life. —Accursed Hero, Chapter 5

Aliza, Pugilist Princess.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, gain Clash - Gain +1/+1.
Aliza, Pugilist Princess.baseFlair_: All right! Next up, I'll race you to that hill over there! Stan, you lazy butt, stand up! Training never ends!
Aliza, Pugilist Princess.evoFlair_: Stan and me? Hah! Don't make me laugh! Of course there's nothing between us. Stan is just my, uh... This is stupid! I'm going for a run!

Dragonsoul Princess.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Glacial Dragon into your hand.
Subtract 1 from damage taken by this follower.
Dragonsoul Princess.evoEffect_: Subtract 1 from damage taken by this follower.
Dragonsoul Princess.baseFlair_:
Retainer: It certainly is warm today, Your Majesty.
Princess: A touch too warm. Why don't we call my pet?
Retainer: That wild dragon?
Princess: She's a sweetheart!
Dragonsoul Princess.evoFlair_:
Retainer: Please don't stray too far, Your Majesty.
Princess: As long as you're here, I'll be fine!
Retainer: I won't be around forever...
Princess: That's what you said last millennium!

Steelclaw Wyrm Bruiser.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add an Assembly Droid to your hand.
Steelclaw Wyrm Bruiser.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are at least 2 Machina cards in your hand, deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Steelclaw Wyrm Bruiser.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. The greatest goal of the dragonewt is to become more dragonlike... But Wyrmcannon Dragonewt is not like the dragons they imitate. —Logbook of a Seaside Research Facility 2
Steelclaw Wyrm Bruiser.evoFlair_: Why do you imitate the dragons' flames? They're strong enough weapons, but it's important to find claws of your own. Sharpen 'em enough and you're sure to leave a mark on the enemy. —Steelclaw Wyrm Bruiser to Wyrmcannon Dragonewt

Whirlwind Pteranodon.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, randomly destroy 1 and gain an empty play point orb.
Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
Whirlwind Pteranodon.evoEffect_: Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
Whirlwind Pteranodon.baseFlair_:
The sight of that beast wielding those gale-force winds is overwhelming. It can ascend from the ground to the sky above in an instant. That strength is incredible to behold. Makes you wanna get a closer look.
—Rookie soldier visiting Dinosaur Island
Whirlwind Pteranodon.evoFlair_:
A pteranodon is like a living whirlwind. Even on a still day, it can create the gusts it needs to soar into the skies. Approach it unprepared, and you will be blown away, along with the very earth beneath your feet.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

Aquascale Stalwart.baseEffect_:
Clash: Gain +0/+1.
Once each turn, when another allied follower is destroyed, put a copy of that follower into your hand.
Aquascale Stalwart.baseFlair_:
They seek territory and dominion over the land. Together, they are a collection of talented individuals brought together by fate. Bitter enemies have become one. Their name is Suiheki, the nation of unification.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Sixth Scroll
Aquascale Stalwart.evoFlair_:
The three nations are irreconcilable, each considering the others to be mortal enemies. They see no option but to battle for supremacy. Who will take action to resolve this complicated problem?
—Legend of the Three Nations, Seventh Scroll

Heliodragon.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded by an effect, summon an Ivory Dragon. Then, if Overflow is active for you, draw a card.
----------
During your turn, whenever you discard cards, restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of cards discarded.
Heliodragon.evoEffect_: During your turn, whenever you discard cards, restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of cards discarded.
Heliodragon.baseFlair_: Bathe in The Sun, illuminator of achievement. The Sun's path will never stray. Its invigorating rays will brighten your day. May its light chase off shadows and breathe new life into idle creatures.
Heliodragon.evoFlair_: It summons nature's bounty, so that the living may grow. The grinning dragon flicks its tail, and the fortuitous sun rises high. And so the dragon showers warmth and joy upon those below.

Dramatic Dragonblader.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon an enemy Dragon.
Dramatic Dragonblader.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Banish an enemy Dragon.
Dramatic Dragonblader.baseFlair_: Why must you bare fangs against us, O dragon? —Dragonslayer Tales, Chapter 3, Hero's lines
Dramatic Dragonblader.evoFlair_: So be it! This royal blade and shield shall sound your death knell! —Dragonslayer Tales, Chapter 10, Hero's lines

Red Ragewyrm.evoEffect_:
(Can attack.)
Destroy this follower at the end of your turn.
Red Ragewyrm.baseFlair_: Look upon that star shimmering like a dragon's scales. It is a great revelation which foretells the fate of this land. —Merlin's Prophecy
Red Ragewyrm.evoFlair_: Transcend death to triumph. The star of the fire-breathing dragon will light the way to your future. —Merlin's Prophecy

Star Phoenix.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - The next time you play a spell, put a Star Phoenix into your hand.
Star Phoenix.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - The next time you play a spell, put a Star Phoenix into your hand.
Star Phoenix.baseFlair_: Undying phoenix, weave through the stars and soar into hollow space. Clad in your gleaming flames, you are the guardian of the stars. —Records of Starforged Beings, Chapter 2
Star Phoenix.evoFlair_: Blazing hotter than the sun, flying faster than a shooting star, and bursting with limitless heat, only you have born witness to the depths of the stars. —Records of Starforged Beings, Chapter 6

Dragoncleaver Roy.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Dragonlife Blade or Dragonstrife Blade into your hand.
Dragoncleaver Roy.baseFlair_: I'm a wandering swordsman here to rescue people. Please don't take this personally, but I have to cut you down.
Dragoncleaver Roy.evoFlair_: Everyone has their own ideas about what's right. I follow my own. That means rescuing people, lending a helping hand— doing the stuff that gives life meaning.

Annerose.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Annerose.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain an empty play point orb.
Annerose.baseFlair_: Ha ha ha... How fortunate you are to have this chance to witness my power! Come! I have a few things to show you!
Annerose.evoFlair_: Ha! What do you say to that? I'm as strong as ever, because duty knows no rest! Now show me what you can do. If you impress me, there may be something in it for you!

Wise Dragonewt Scholar.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand and then draw a card.
Can't be attacked.
Wise Dragonewt Scholar.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Discard a card from your hand and then draw a card.
Can't be attacked.
Wise Dragonewt Scholar.baseFlair_: Fighting when you're sure to win is just... barbaric and pointless. Weaving some spells would be much more worthwhile. Battles are dirty, but... the light of magic is beautiful.
Wise Dragonewt Scholar.evoFlair_: If you leave me alone, then that'll be that. If you help me out, I'll teach you a spell or two. And if you get in the way, then your body will learn the true meaning of fear.

Steelstorm Dragonewt.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Assembly Droid into your hand and change its cost to 0. If Overflow is active for you, put 3 into your hand instead.
Steelstorm Dragonewt.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve an allied Machina follower. Evolve effects will not activate for it.
Steelstorm Dragonewt.baseFlair_:
Thanks to previous developments, technology has begun taking smaller and smaller forms. Current piece can use air to produce localized explosions—like wielding a storm. Guess we dragonfolk have surpassed dragons, eh?
—Engineer's Notes, Part 3
Steelstorm Dragonewt.evoFlair_:
Improvement is for advancement's sake. The past falls to the present, and the present gives way to the future. Progress burns like a furious blaze and our ambition along with it. We will make the dragons ours.
—Tyranny Reins, Part 3

Slaughtering Dragonewt.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Banish all cards in your deck that originally cost 1, 3, 5, 7, or 9 play points.
Can only attack if Overflow is active for you.
Slaughtering Dragonewt.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Deal 4 damage to all followers.
Can only attack if Overflow is active for you.
Slaughtering Dragonewt.baseFlair_: I am The Tower, envoy of collapse. Yes... Walk toward your destruction. Let lightning split you in twain. The only way to be rid of disgrace is to be buried under the rubble of terror.
Slaughtering Dragonewt.evoFlair_: They call me a destroyer, thus I stretch my wings and gloat. Bolts of red course through my veins to discharge tragedy as I deem fit. For you see, dragonewts derive great pleasure from toying with their prey.

Darkprison Dragon.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, lose 1 play point orb. Then gain +1/+1 and Storm.
Darkprison Dragon.baseFlair_: It takes the form of an enveloping mist that covers the ground. Once engulfed, there is but darkness. You are the dragon's captive.
Darkprison Dragon.evoFlair_: Those confined by the dragon's mist are unable to see anything but the dragon. Reality fades far into the distance. You are within the dragon's prison.

Turncoat Dragon Summoner.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded by an effect, put a Crimson Dragon's Sorrow into your hand.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Discard a card. Put an Azure Dragon's Rage into your hand.
Turncoat Dragon Summoner.baseFlair_:
There once was a dragon keeper who worked to advance mankind. He used his affinity with dragons to bring peace. For the people, he vowed to calm the dragons endangering society.
—Summoner's Revolt, First Telling
Turncoat Dragon Summoner.evoFlair_:
Mankind must fall. The keeper uses his affinity with dragons to incite bloodshed. For the future of dragons, he will exterminate the humans endangering society.
—Summoner's Revolt, Sixth Telling

Dragon Cry.baseEffect_: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the strongest allied follower in play.
Dragon Cry.baseFlair_: Its howls of fury shake the earth to its very core.

Mesozoic Era.baseEffect_:
Give an allied Dragoncraft follower +2/+2 and the following effect: Last Words - Put a Dragon's Nest into your hand.
Enhance (10): Give +5/+5 instead.
Mesozoic Era.baseFlair_:
Before the gods were born, dragons roamed this world.
—Chapter 1, Ancient Dragon Research

Dragonfolk's Wail.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded, draw a card.
----------
Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
Dragonfolk's Wail.baseFlair_: Cast aside your flesh. Embrace the scales.

Dragon Spawning.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Dragon's Nests.
If you have 10 play point orbs, summon 5 instead.
Dragon Spawning.baseFlair_:
One night, all the kings in every kingdom had the same nightmare. Soon after, they convened and squabbled over what to do about the dragon.
—Legend of the Flying Dragon, Trouble on the Way

Avowed Strike.baseEffect_:
Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other Dragoncraft cards in your hand.
Enhance (7): Draw 2 cards and deal damage 2 times the number of other Dragoncraft cards in your hand instead.
Avowed Strike.baseFlair_: A sworn vow, a damnable curse. Lethal sin begets inevitable punishment, and at that moment wails become roars.

Force of the Dragonewt.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
Enhance (5): Deal 2 damage instead.
Force of the Dragonewt.baseFlair_: The man was silent, but I think I heard a dragon's roar. —Words of a young soldier

Cursed Furor.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Rowen's Roar or Valdain's Claw.
If Overflow is active for you, instead gain an empty play point orb and destroy a random enemy follower.
Cursed Furor.baseFlair_:
Some mothers beget life, while She lays claim to it. Whether protected or culled, the Great Mother must be dealt with.
"For all the living things of this world, I will do what must be done."

Dragon Sanctum.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 3 play points, and Overflow is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a Trample or Whirlwind.
----------
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Gain an empty play point orb.
Dragon Sanctum.baseFlair_: The human lifespan is merely the twinkling of an eye for a dragon. Thus, even when dragons lie dormant, offerings must be made to secure humanity's future.

Draconic Core.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, gain an empty play point orb, recover 2 play points, then banish this amulet.
Draconic Core.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated tyranny. Those who seek obedience find themselves drawn to its luster.

Trample.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
Trample.baseFlair_: Time shall sate the dragon's appetite someday. With everlasting gratitude, it takes a great stride—one step closer toward the future.

Whirlwind.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Whirlwind.baseFlair_: Time shall sate the dragon's appetite someday. With unshakable gratitude, it grants you a step toward the future—in fact, you'll get a flying start.

Dracomancer's Rites.baseEffect_: Whenever you discard cards from your hand, draw a card for each card discarded.
Dracomancer's Rites.baseFlair_: If you seek power, then worship the dragon.

Dragonsong Flute.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Transform each card in your hand that costs 3 play points or less into a Hellflame Dragon if Overflow is active for you.
Whenever a card that costs 3 play points or less is added to your hand, transform it into a Hellflame Dragon if Overflow is active for you.
Dragonsong Flute.baseFlair_: A melody to summon dragons from the ends of the world.

Death Dragon.baseFlair_: Deep inside a morass of corrosive venom, an undead dragon prowls. It lost its heart long ago, its claws and fangs are blunt, and the putrid stench of rot clings to its scales.
Death Dragon.evoFlair_: The undead dragon's toxic breath brings death in its wake, while the fire that blazes within its entrails reanimates corpses with an unnatural life.

Glint Dragon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Glint Dragon.baseFlair_: For the dragon it was but a show of strength, an attempt at intimidation. But for the humans it was an apocalypse on a nearly incomprehensible scale.
Glint Dragon.evoFlair_: The dragon's wrath carved through the land, warping iron as though it were clay. Humans have no choice but to flee in fear when encountering such a force.

Elder Tortoise.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Recover 1 evolution point if Overflow is active for you.
Elder Tortoise.baseFlair_: This sovereign of the sea can live for ten millennia. Its whiskers command the greatest price of any treasure.
Elder Tortoise.evoFlair_: This sovereign of the sea can swim for ten millennia. Tradition suggests that any who ingest its pulverized shell will live eternally.

Basilisk Rider.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Summon a Basilisk.
Basilisk Rider.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Summon a Basilisk.
Basilisk Rider.baseFlair_: Nothing gets past us. Turn 'em to stone, buddy! I'll finish 'em off!
Basilisk Rider.evoFlair_: We've got it under control, so just leave this battle to us! Another easy victory!

Draconic Sniper.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Whenever an enemy follower attacks your leader, deal 2 damage to that follower, then remove this effect.
Draconic Sniper.baseFlair_: Deep within the thickest clouds at the pinnacle of the vaulted sky, my companion and I make our home. From that vantage, untouchable by mortal hands, we take aim... and never miss our target.
Draconic Sniper.evoFlair_: Some call it cowardice that we pick off our enemies from on high. But ours is no easy life. And, in truth, none remain in these skies who could harm us, even if their arms could reach.

Geovore.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: If Overflow is active for you, gain +3/+0.
Geovore.baseFlair_: A lizard that feeds exclusively on rocks. The more it devours, the harder its hide becomes, until no blade on earth can pierce it.
Geovore.evoFlair_: The rock-fed lizard's hardened fangs can bite through bedrock, granting it access to a wealth of nutritious minerals beneath. The more it devours, the more powerful it grows, and the greater the scope of its consumption. No force can impede its bottomless appetite.

Mechafin Diver.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Megalorca and an Assembly Droid.
Mechafin Diver.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was an aquatic explorer. To cope with the dangers of the sea, she encased herself in metal. Called by ever darker depths, she still undoubtedly continues her descent into the blue. —Dragonewt Scholar's Record, Part 1
Mechafin Diver.evoFlair_: There once was a woman who explored the darkest depths of the sea by using metal implements. If those devices allowed her to survive such a deep place, surely they would have other usages too. —Voice Recording of an Environmental Researcher, Part 1

Dragoon Medic.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded, restore 3 defense to your leader.
----------
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Dragoon Medic.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Dragoon Medic.baseFlair_:
"Grind the medicine, add a bit of magic with dragon flame, and voila!"
"Don't you think the color's kinda off?"
"Well, all good medicine is bitter—sometimes even to the eyes! Hehe." —Dragoon Medic and a Warrior
Dragoon Medic.evoFlair_:
"See? That wasn't so bad. You should start to feel the effects soon."
"Yuck... The pain's gone, but have mercy—that was bitter!"
"Well, all good medicine is bitter! Hehe."
—Dragoon Medic and a Warrior

Dragon Warrior.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Dragon Warrior.baseFlair_: The sound of a dragon warrior drawing breath is enough to send humans scattering in terror, for they know that this is no ordinary respiration.
Dragon Warrior.evoFlair_: The dragon warrior exhales, and its breath emerges as a stream of blue flames. The conflagration ignites the pitiable humans from behind, turning them to ash.

Grim Reaper.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Ward if Overflow is active for you.
Grim Reaper.baseFlair_: The time is nigh. I am the gatekeeper of death and the oracle of annihilation. Your only choices are to accept your fate or struggle in vain against it.
Grim Reaper.evoFlair_: Not even the gods of this world can resist my scythe. Death is ultimately faced by all. The time is nigh. Prepare to become the ash doomed to float forever around the underworld.

Leviathan.baseEffect_: Can only attack if Overflow is active for you.
Leviathan.evoEffect_: Can only attack if Overflow is active for you.
Leviathan.baseFlair_: The mighty sea dragon sleeps quietly for now. But when its great eyes slide open, the entire ocean will contort into a swirl of hellish chaos.
Leviathan.evoFlair_: The mighty sea dragon sleeps quietly for now. But when its great eyes slide open, a giant whirlpool will swallow first the continents and then the world.

Siegfried.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy a damaged enemy follower.
Siegfried.baseFlair_: A certain poem describes him as a mighty warrior who could take on legions. Armed with the Nibelung holy sword Balmung, he faced a great dragon.
Siegfried.evoFlair_: A certain poem calls him a dragon slayer. After a desperate struggle, he vanquished the great serpent, and was soon famous for his exploits.

Noxious Dragon.baseEffect_: Whenever you discard cards from your hand, deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the number of cards discarded.
Noxious Dragon.evoEffect_: Whenever you discard cards from your hand, deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the number of cards discarded.
Noxious Dragon.baseFlair_: A vicious dragon that resides in sand-choked ruins. No flames or rays of light spew forth from the creature's maw. Instead, the beast attacks with only an ominous roar.
Noxious Dragon.evoFlair_: The dragon relentlessly advanced across the countryside, obliterating with a cruel roar the settlements it passed.

Pyroxene Dragon.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand. Do this 2 times.
Last Words: Draw 3 cards.
Pyroxene Dragon.baseFlair_: Don't tell me you ain't never heard of orichalcum! Aye, it's a legendary ore! But it ain't no normal haul. There's magic powers in that bloody rock! —Prospector
Pyroxene Dragon.evoFlair_: Turns out all the legendary orichalcum we heard about was actually the scales of the dragon slumbering in the mountain deep. No way we can bring it back, what with the claws and all! So much for gettin' rich! —Prospector

Wind Reader Zell.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give an allied follower Storm if Overflow is active for you.
Wind Reader Zell.baseFlair_: The skies are free, but they're merciless. They'll never stop trying to reject us, but they're our destination all the same.
Wind Reader Zell.evoFlair_: Though I have no wings to flap and can't soar through the clouds, I can read the wind. I can feel it! And so I aim for the distant skies.

Tower Warden Adelle.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If only 1 other allied follower is in play, gain Drain.
Tower Warden Adelle.baseFlair_: The fierce warden of the tower glimmers in shades of vermillion—scales likely fresh with blood, or perhaps simply in the shade of a maiden in love.
Tower Warden Adelle.evoFlair_: The ancient warden roars its mighty flames from its lofty tower—serving as a fatal warning to any would-be trespassers, or perhaps simply the sighs of a maiden in love.

Griffonback Guard.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +0/+3 if Overflow is active for you.
Griffonback Guard.baseFlair_: A single house is about all I can protect on my own. But with my griffin, I can defend the entire kingdom!
Griffonback Guard.evoFlair_: One or two people are about all I could keep safe on my own. That's why I fight with my partner here—so I can keep all the citizens safe!

Eyfa, Windrider.baseFlair_: Um, did you see a boy with glasses around here? His name's Zell, and he looks like a bit of a know-it-all. Huh, you just saw him on the ground? Th-thanks! I'd better hurry up after him!
Eyfa, Windrider.evoFlair_: Zell's a little stubborn and stiff and the opposite of polite... But he's a trusty partner who knows the wind better than anyone! Don't tell Zell I said this though—I'd be so self-conscious if he found out.

Draconitron.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. Give +2/+0 to another allied Machina follower.
Draconitron.baseFlair_:
Conducted an experiment on the captured dragon, improved its body with technology. Can be used to control other dragons. Should make for the ultimate specimen. Revolutionary stuff, really.
—Engineer's Notes, Part 2
Draconitron.evoFlair_:
Dragons are immutable and governed by instinct. But the dragons of old were experts in changing their form. To control them, we will need greater flames. The dragonfolk shall see the steel of their intention tempered yet.
—Tyranny Reins, Part 2

Deathmist Dragon.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
Deathmist Dragon.evoEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
Deathmist Dragon.baseFlair_: An enchanting yet poisonous princess emerges from the mists, accompanied by her dragon. The beast exhales a poisonous miasma that hides both the beast and its mistress.
Deathmist Dragon.evoFlair_: The dragon's cloud of noxious fumes is a sanctuary for the dragon and its mistress. Those who venture into it soon find their skin burnt to a crisp and their bones turned to dust.

Rahab.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0 for each of your remaining play points.
Rahab.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0 for each of your remaining play points.
Rahab.baseFlair_: A defender that dwells in the clear sea. It allies itself only with the pure of heart and crushes the souls of the impure.
Rahab.evoFlair_: A guardian that dwells in the ever-changing waters. Its power grows as great as its commander wishes, and it wields its power with abandon.

Pyrewyrm Commander.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Blazing Breath into your hand.
Pyrewyrm Commander.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Lightning Blast into your hand.
Pyrewyrm Commander.baseFlair_: Master always said that dragons and magic were of the same... What did he mean by those words? I decided to see for myself firsthand.
Pyrewyrm Commander.evoFlair_: Master always said magic and dragons were of the same kin... Now I finally understand. The depths of their powers are as infinite as the abysses of magic.

Apostle of Disdain.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, gain +2/+0.
Apostle of Disdain.baseFlair_: Bow your head, fool. Status and wisdom—pointless. Pretty faces, solid bodies—perfectly useless. You would do well to serve we who understand this.
Apostle of Disdain.evoFlair_:
The Third Rule: Control Impotence
Only you that have looked upon impotence may deign to control the powerless. Guide them. Rule them.
—Teachings of the Disdainful Corps

Pure-Voiced Dragoon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is active for you, Choose - Put a Dragoon's Command or Dragoon's Meditation into your hand.
Pure-Voiced Dragoon.baseFlair_: The dragoon hails from beyond the drifting clouds. His heart is as clear as the spreading sky, and his voice unfurls like mighty wings, broad enough to shelter the heavens.
Pure-Voiced Dragoon.evoFlair_: Weaving his way between the clouds, he descends. His lance rends the soil so his prayers may permeate the earth.

Ian, Dragon Buster.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Change this follower into an Ian & Adelle, Newlyweds or summon an enemy Adelle, Jealous Dragon.
Ian, Dragon Buster.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Ian, Dragon Buster.baseFlair_: The celebrated dragon slayer was ordered to strike down another wicked beast. To him this was just a job, but to his wife it was just plain infidelity: "A-Adelle? What are you doing here?"
Ian, Dragon Buster.evoFlair_: The dragon slayer's saga devolved into a senseless argument between husband and wife. The scorned love turned to jealousy a thousandfold. The swordsman faces off against his wife's rage: "I-I am not cheating on you! Adelle?"

Raremetal Dragon.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0 and give this follower -1/-1. (This effect activates even when attacked or damaged for 0. This follower is destroyed when its defense drops below 1.)
Raremetal Dragon.baseFlair_:
Our attacks hit its armored body like so many droplets of water. But even stone will wear away if you continue dripping water in one spot. Slow and steady kills the dragon... Let's show it just how stubborn people can be!
—Young anti-dragon battalion officer
Raremetal Dragon.evoFlair_:
The dragon's body becomes increasingly robust with every passing day. Upon hearing that report, the soldiers all fell to their knees. In the end, we people were not even as effective as raindrops.
—Veteran anti-dragon battalion officer

Ian & Adelle, Newlyweds.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Drain.
Evolve: Return all other allied followers to your hand.
Ian & Adelle, Newlyweds.baseFlair_:
"Roooar..." (Sorry for ever getting the wrong idea!)
"It's fine, Adelle. We're in love now after all."
"Grr! Groar!" (Stop, Ian! You're embarrassing me!)
—Ian and Adelle
Ian & Adelle, Newlyweds.evoFlair_:
"Hey, little baby girl. I'm ready for some time alone with you."
"Grroarr!" (Leave it to me. I'll knock this out.)
"D-don't get too carried away! Adelle?"
—Ian and Adelle

Adelle, Jealous Dragon.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to all allies.
Adelle, Jealous Dragon.baseFlair_:
"Grooar! Rrr!" (How could you betray my love, Ian!)
"Grrrrrah!" (Sneaking into another dragon's lair—you're cheating on me!)
Adelle, Jealous Dragon.evoFlair_:
"Groooar!" (I'm not listening to your excuses.)
"Roooar" (All the love I felt for you is turning to rage!)

Prime Dragon Keeper.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked if Overflow is active for you.
Whenever an allied Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 3 play points or less comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader if Overflow is active for you.
Prime Dragon Keeper.evoEffect_:
Can't be attacked if Overflow is active for you.
Whenever an allied Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 3 play points or less comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader if Overflow is active for you.
Prime Dragon Keeper.baseFlair_: The cowardly light the path; the wicked obstruct the future. The flames are like an omnipotent god. Those who wield them and dance among them surpass divinity. —Primal Flames, Chapter 1
Prime Dragon Keeper.evoFlair_: During the age of the gods, she burned away the darkness to bring everything into existence. Her flames gave way to our creation. She is our mother and our source. —Primal Flames, Chapter 1

Hastewing Dragonewt.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Invocation: Whenever you play a card that originally costs at least 7 play points for the fourth time or later, invoke this card.
Fanfare: If Overflow is not active for you, remove all effects on this follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Hastewing Dragonewt.baseFlair_: A mighty gust erupts, rending clouds of white in two. Heard beyond the wind, transcending both sound and light, "None can keep pace with my wings."
Hastewing Dragonewt.evoFlair_: With the force of a single flap, the earth below is fractured asunder. Heard beyond a flash of light and a thunderous clap, "None can escape the rending of my wings."

Tlaloc.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied follower attacks, if you have at least 3 play points, use 3 play points and deal 1 damage to all enemies. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Tlaloc.baseFlair_:
It dwells upon the land. It has fangs like a tiger's, a forked tongue. It brings the rains and the drought; the heavens' mercy and their wrath. Bow your heads in respect before the oldest of the gods.
—Chapter 2, Prosperity of the Water God
Tlaloc.evoFlair_:
It bequeaths blessing and blight without discrimination. Both fall to earth amidst the sonorous rumblings of the skies.
—Chapter 3, Prosperity of the Water God

Valdain, Cursed Shadow.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Shadow's Corrosion into your hand.
Valdain, Cursed Shadow.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Reduce the cost of all Shadow's Corrosions in your hand by 2.
Valdain, Cursed Shadow.baseFlair_:
"Viridia Magna will destroy Naterra. We must end her."
Forever stalking, forever analyzing...
"We are Mánagarmr. We seek to destroy the Vile Mother."
The Forest Shadow seeks to deliver the cursed world despite its cowardly king.
Valdain, Cursed Shadow.evoFlair_:
"Of course Sköll thinks our methods barbaric."
Unyielding eyes peer into the blinding light.
"Perhaps we should give up. But it's too late to turn back now, you see."
The Forest Shadow grins, his decision made.

Serpent Wrath.baseEffect_: Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
Serpent Wrath.baseFlair_: A searing ray of fire burns all near and far.

Serpent Force.baseEffect_:
Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
Give +3/+3 instead if Overflow is active for you.
Serpent Force.baseFlair_: Oh, you really asked for it now! You just made my baby angry!

Dragon Counsel.baseEffect_: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and then draw 3 cards.
Dragon Counsel.baseFlair_: Dragons have no use for the worthless.

Overwhelming Crush.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
If Overflow is active for you, put a random Dragoncraft follower from your deck into your hand.
Overwhelming Crush.baseFlair_: Elder dragons use human language to voice their discontent with mankind. Lower dragons use violence to express their discontent with mankind.

Dragon's Handspur.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Draw a card if Overflow is active for you.
Dragon's Handspur.baseFlair_: The man sharpened his sword to slay dragons. The dragon rended the man with its inborn blades.

Draconification.baseEffect_: Transform a follower into a Dragon.
Draconification.baseFlair_: Accept the dragon's soul into thy body, and thou shalt know power both great and atrocious. Now turn!

Dragon Impact.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+1 and Rush to a Dragoncraft follower in your hand.
Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
(Can be played only when a targetable card is in your hand.)
Dragon Impact.baseFlair_: A solitary whelp tends to be careless, so you could make a quick rupie hunting them. But they get craftier as the years go by, so be prepared for a fight.

Black Breath.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Black Breath.baseFlair_: A putrid breath for the corrupted.

Dragonslayer's Price.baseEffect_: Discard your hand. Then deal 5 damage to all followers.
Dragonslayer's Price.baseFlair_: The hunter carved out the heart of the sea dragon and held it aloft for all to see. That moment marked both the beginning and the end of everything. —Chapter 2, History of the Desert

Dragonrend Quake.baseEffect_:
Destroy all damaged followers.
Deal 1 damage to all undamaged followers.
Dragonrend Quake.baseFlair_: Their roars should never be heard as one—surely an omen of Armageddon.

Shadow's Corrosion.baseEffect_:
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Naterran Great Trees that have been destroyed during this match. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
If you've played other Shadow's Corrosions this match, destroy a random enemy follower.
Shadow's Corrosion.baseFlair_: Ignorance cradles death. Assumption bears negligence. Knowing this, you would still challenge me? Very well. Face my curse.

Dragon Sculpture.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, transform this amulet into a Dragon if the opponent has more cards in play than you.
Dragon Sculpture.baseFlair_: Looks like it could spring to life at any moment.

Disaster Dragon.baseEffect_: Strike: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
Disaster Dragon.evoEffect_: Strike: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
Disaster Dragon.baseFlair_: The great need no reasons for their actions. They simply move and eat as they wish.
Disaster Dragon.evoFlair_: The great need not reflect on their actions. They simply exist as they wish to, which is proof of their strength.

Seabrand Dragon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Overflow is active for you.
Seabrand Dragon.baseFlair_: A dragon glides through the deep, its blade ever ready to skewer evil intruders.
Seabrand Dragon.evoFlair_: The dragon's blade is a weapon wielded against enemies of the ocean. In return for its deeds, the dragon is loved and respected by the mermaids.

Queen Serpent.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Megalorca if Overflow is active for you.
Queen Serpent.baseFlair_: The fierce sea serpent and her kin emerged from the depths of the ocean, cutting through the turbulent waves and swirling currents.
Queen Serpent.evoFlair_: The sea serpent sways her vast body, kicking up waves that block the sun. To approach her watery domain means a one-way trip to the depths.

Cunning Wyvern.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Blazing Breath into your hand.
Cunning Wyvern.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Blazing Breath into your hand.
Cunning Wyvern.baseFlair_: You really think you can hunt the wyvern just because it seems quiet? Forget it. The creature's hoping you'll let your guard down. The second you go for it, you'll get a face full of fire breath.
Cunning Wyvern.evoFlair_: You really think you can hunt the wyvern just because it seems quiet? Forget it. The creature's hoping you'll let your guard down. The second you go for it, you'll be incinerated into ash.

Hippocampus.baseFlair_: A seahorse that defends dark, icy waters. As it races through the depths, it's more beautiful than even the finest horses on the surface could ever hope to be.
Hippocampus.evoFlair_: It has no forgiveness for those who invade its sanctuary and violate the sanctity of life. Once it begins to shake with rage, there is no time left for regrets or apologies.

Drakewing Assassin.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever you play a non-follower card, gain +1/+0.
Drakewing Assassin.baseFlair_: This is my brand of justice. I know it's tainted, but these claws and fangs are a way of life for me.
Drakewing Assassin.evoFlair_: This is my brand of justice. I know it's heretical, but I can't turn a blind eye to this much evil.

Zell, Wind Whisperer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
Zell, Wind Whisperer.evoEffect_: Evolve: If Overflow is active for you, give another allied follower Storm.
Zell, Wind Whisperer.baseFlair_: Um, did you see a girl on a wyvern? One named Eyfa who rides a little rough? Huh, you mean she flew by just a second ago! Thanks... I've got to hurry up and catch her!
Zell, Wind Whisperer.evoFlair_: Eyfa's a little careless at times, but she's a trusty partner and pilot. Keep that a secret though—it would be so embarrassing if she found out what I said.

Dragonewt Needler.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower and deal 3 damage if it is already damaged. If it has not been damaged, deal 1 damage instead.
Dragonewt Needler.baseFlair_: I'm so sick of hearing how I don't have wings, or that my tail is weird. Shut your face gash! Or maybe you'd like a few new orifices!
Dragonewt Needler.evoFlair_: No one asked for your opinion. I'm me, and I'll do things my own way. Dig the wax outta your ears and listen good. Or I'll drill you a couple new ones and see if you hear any better through those.

Poisonous Dilophosaurus.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, randomly destroy 1 and gain Bane.
Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
Poisonous Dilophosaurus.evoEffect_: Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
Poisonous Dilophosaurus.baseFlair_:
The sight of its vicious poison drifting through the air is truly breathtaking. And the sweet scent is incredibly soothing, don't you think? Oh how I wish I could stay by its side and enjoy this fragrance forever.
—Young assistant visiting Dinosaur Island
Poisonous Dilophosaurus.evoFlair_:
The dilophosaurus possesses a fierce, deadly poison. By consuming toxic plants, its body secretes a combination of antibodies and poison. The poison exudes a relaxing fragrance, serving to lure in the beast's prey.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

Dragon.baseFlair_: A beast that boasts claws, fangs, and wings—but not an ounce of compassion.
Dragon.evoFlair_: Trampling, crushing, rampaging—dragon is just another word for destruction.

Lightning Behemoth.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to all allies.
Lightning Behemoth.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to all allies.
Lightning Behemoth.baseFlair_: This is the dragon to which you should turn if you wish to channel the power of lightning. Do not forget, however, that lightning can also strike those who seek to control it.
Lightning Behemoth.evoFlair_: This is the dragon to which you should turn if you wish to channel the power of lightning. Do not forget, however, that lightning does not discriminate between its victims. It strikes gods, demons, and humans alike.

Transmogrified Wyrm.evoEffect_: Evolve: Transform an allied follower into a Dragon if Overflow is active for you.
Transmogrified Wyrm.baseFlair_: Awaken the savagery hidden within you, and sharpen the fangs that sleep there.
Transmogrified Wyrm.evoFlair_: Howl with the ferocity you once suppressed, and feast on all that you crave!

Venomous Pucewyrm.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and gain +2/+2.
Venomous Pucewyrm.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and gain +2/+2.
Venomous Pucewyrm.baseFlair_: The past gave way to the future, the future gave way to the past, and the world fell into disorder after countless ages. And when the liquid in the chalice of the gods was poisoned, I was tainted along with it. Now everything hurts, and only your life can provide relief.
Venomous Pucewyrm.evoFlair_: There is no longer a dragon to protect the chalice of the gods. There is only me, a hideous Pucewyrm. So come to me and offer up your lives. Nothing else can soothe my pain now.

Wrath Drake.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all other followers.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Deal 3 damage instead.
Wrath Drake.baseFlair_: The flame dragon is much like a capricious cook. On some days it wants to char its food black; on other days a light searing is enough to satisfy it.
Wrath Drake.evoFlair_: If the flame dragon is in a good mood, you might get away with nothing but a minor burn. But if it's in a bad mood, odds are your ashes will be scattered by the wind.

Beast Rider.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Double this follower's attack after damage is dealt.
Beast Rider.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Double this follower's attack after damage is dealt.
Beast Rider.baseFlair_: Yahoo! Me 'n' this big lug, we're unstoppable! We're gonna steal all the treasure the world's got!
Beast Rider.evoFlair_: Whoa-ho-ho! How's our speed for you? Faster and faster, we're off like the wind!

Galua of Two Breaths.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a White Breath or Black Breath into your hand.
Galua of Two Breaths.baseFlair_: Some say it's white. Some say it's black. But it's only natural that there's some disagreement. That dragon is a mirror of the heart. —Words of a dragon knower
Galua of Two Breaths.evoFlair_: Some say it's the light. Others say it's the dark. But it's both, and it's neither. Dragons can't be measured by human standards. —Words of a dragon knower

Vile Violet Dragon.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, draw 2 cards.
Vile Violet Dragon.baseFlair_:
Once tasted, the pleasure of tormenting the weak would not relinquish its hold; the light of the righteous path could not compare. What remained in the noble beast's place was but the wrack of a dragon.
—Appendix A, Dragons: An Illustrated Guide
Vile Violet Dragon.evoFlair_:
It devours not out of need but out of greed. Of the proud creature it once was, no trace remains. It is an abomination. Blasphemy against the natural order.
—Appendix A, Dragons: An Illustrated Guide

Petalspine Stegosaurus.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Discard a card. If it was a Natura card, gain Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Petalspine Stegosaurus.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Petalspine Stegosaurus.baseFlair_:
Seeing how fiercely it chews that grass, what a fascinating fellow. From its big dewy eyes, to its flowery back—you ever see anything else like it? Wonder how it tastes though. Y'all got any of 'em for sale?
—Hungry Cook, on His Visit to Dinosaur Island
Petalspine Stegosaurus.evoFlair_:
As the dinosaurs adapted to machinery, their physiology began to evolve. Some grew scales as hard as iron, while some blossomed with carapace anew. Just as rapids cut through stone, the changes would not be stopped.
—Jurassic Resistance, Part 2

Draconic Singer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the cost of a Dragoncraft card in your hand.
Draconic Singer.baseFlair_: Her song rings clearly throughout the skies. Lured by the tune, a dragon lands beside her and folds its wings closed.
Draconic Singer.evoFlair_: As if accompanying her song, the dragon roars and begins to sound its wings. When human and dragon voices merge in symphony, both the heavens and earth tremble.

True Dragon Scathacha.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Overflow is not active for you, deal 2 damage to this follower, and gain an empty play point orb. If Overflow is active for you, give your leader the following effect - Subtract 2 from the next source of damage your leader takes.
True Dragon Scathacha.baseFlair_: Scathacha was a fake name to cover my real identity—True Dragon Deirdre, but I've grown accustomed to it now. You, too, would do well to refer to me by this preferred nomenclature.
True Dragon Scathacha.evoFlair_: Honestly, the business of men is endlessly quaint. Ah, you there. Show me more of your people's ways. My eyes haven't yet had their fill of your customs. Hehe.

Ruinous Dragon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Lightning Blast into your hand. If Overflow is active for you, subtract 1 from the cost of that card.
Ruinous Dragon.baseFlair_: Its storm-bearing wings transform into honed blades. With a single wing it rends the heavens; with both wings it shatters the earth as well.
Ruinous Dragon.evoFlair_: A single strike surpasses the power of both dragons and natural disasters alike. Splendid. —Aldos, Imperial Dragoon

Phoenix Empress.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give another allied follower Ambush.
Phoenix Empress.baseFlair_:
If one were to invade their neighbor, naught but absolute defeat awaits. Balance is tenuous; conflict is inevitable. War blossoms like weeds in a flower bed.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Eighth Scroll
Phoenix Empress.evoFlair_:
No one knows who stands to benefit from the increasing ruin. Even so, there is no reason to stop fighting. What lies at the end of this conflict? The fate of the world is yet to be decided.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Ninth Scroll

Sibyl of the Waterwyrm.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain an empty play point orb if this card is played on your fifth turn or later.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader if Overflow is active for you.
Sibyl of the Waterwyrm.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader if Overflow is active for you.
Sibyl of the Waterwyrm.baseFlair_: The beautiful priestess of the Waterwyrm danced for her god at the sacred spring. And the Waterwyrm responded to her wishes by creating a lake to soothe the once dry land.
Sibyl of the Waterwyrm.evoFlair_: As the priestess dances, so too does the Waterwyrm. And as long as the priestess continues to dance for the world, the Waterwyrm will continue to bestow its blue blessing.

Galmieux, Omen of Disdain.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal 1 damage to all followers.
When this follower takes damage during your turn, if it's not destroyed, evolve it.
Galmieux, Omen of Disdain.evoEffect_: Once each turn, when this follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Galmieux, Omen of Disdain.baseFlair_: The world is beneath me—everything turns to ash and dust with a slash of my claw. I guess if you wanted to be more than a dumb beast, you could swear fealty to me... Oh! Why don't we put the world through the same trial!
Galmieux, Omen of Disdain.evoFlair_: Ugh, how wretched—how stupid—can this tiny, dumb, deplorable world get? You'd better rebel against it! Or maybe you're useless after all... Oh! Why don't we put the world through the same trial!

Supreme Golden Dragon.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, if an allied Garyu, Supreme Dragonkin is in play, restore 2 defense to your leader. If an allied Supreme Silver Dragon is in play, gain +2/+2.
Supreme Golden Dragon.baseFlair_:
Dazzling gold and silver—two sets of eyes gaze down from the heavens. Drifting along with the current of the world is what makes a dragon a dragon.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Side Story, First Scroll
Supreme Golden Dragon.evoFlair_:
A lone man arrives at the peak of swirling gold and silver in search of a bond. He is a visitor from Suiheki. What will he do with this chance meeting?
—Legend of the Three Nations, Side Story, Second Scroll

Supreme Silver Dragon.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: If an allied Garyu, Supreme Dragonkin is in play, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Follower Strike: If an allied Supreme Golden Dragon is in play, deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Supreme Silver Dragon.baseFlair_:
The man speaks of captivating people with valor and wisdom, of his utopia. The people laugh at his ridiculous ideas. But the dragons do not.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Side Story, Third Scroll
Supreme Silver Dragon.evoFlair_:
Though their origins may be different, a bond is formed between them by the swearing of an oath. They wish to face their death together, on the same day, at the same time.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Side Story, Fourth Scroll

Crimson Dragon's Sorrow.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever you discard cards, subtract X from the cost of this card. X equals the number of cards discarded.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Discard a card. Draw 2 cards.
Crimson Dragon's Sorrow.baseFlair_:
The keeper visited a crimson dragon high in its roost. But the furious dragon bared its fangs at him. Nevertheless, the man tried to calm the dragon down.
—Summoner's Revolt, Fourth Telling
Crimson Dragon's Sorrow.evoFlair_:
The crimson dragon's lament broke the man's heart. It had served mankind for centuries, only to be abandoned in isolation. The keeper wondered to himself: is mankind really worth protecting?
—Summoner's Revolt, Fifth Telling

Tail Swing.baseEffect_:
Randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
Subtract 1 from the cost of a Dragoncraft card in your hand.
Tail Swing.baseFlair_: We succeeded in our initial ambush and took the dragon from behind. However, it was immediately clear that our efforts were in vain. —Excursion Leader

Draconic Fervor.baseEffect_: Gain an empty play point orb, draw 2 cards, and restore 3 defense to your leader.
Draconic Fervor.baseFlair_: Only then will you realize that the slashing of claws and fire breathing were nothing more than a simple greeting.

Phoenix Howl.baseEffect_:
Summon a Star Phoenix.
Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Phoenix Howl.baseFlair_:
The light and power of a dying star's final, cataclysmic breath are the nourishment which frees the phoenix from its fiery shell. Its victorious birth cry resounds throughout the cosmos.
—Records of Starforged Beings, Chapter 1

Dragonclaw Pendant.baseEffect_: Until this amulet leaves play, your leader has the following effect: Allied followers, spells, and effects deal +1 damage.
Dragonclaw Pendant.baseFlair_: Way too fine for any ordinary person. —A merchant

Phoenix Roost.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Cards in both players' hands cost half, rounded up.
Whenever a card is added to a player's hand, its cost drops by half, rounded up.
Phoenix Roost.baseFlair_: It is a second sun in the sky, a second guiding truth.

Dragonguard.baseEffect_: Gain Ward if Overflow is active for you.
Dragonguard.evoEffect_: Gain Ward if Overflow is active for you.
Dragonguard.baseFlair_: I am the guardian of the skies. Those who come to despoil them shall not have their way.
Dragonguard.evoFlair_: I am the guardian of the skies. It is my duty to cast potential intruders back down to the world below.

Island Whale.baseFlair_: A tireless whale with a deserted island on its back. The island, once inhabited by a sea god, is now visited only by the ocean breeze.
Island Whale.evoFlair_: The whale, now carrying an island without a master, occasionally leaps from the sea, shaking the distant waves with its cries for its fallen friend.

Scaled Berserker.baseFlair_: On the battlefield I was born. The clang of iron was my lullaby; I was raised amid the scent of death. I know nothing else.
Scaled Berserker.evoFlair_: Love makes some other people feel alive. But not me. For me only killing will do. I can't say this is any way to live, but all these hands know how to do is destroy.

Twilight Dragoon Coda.baseFlair_: Pfft! You just headbutted a cloud, didn't you? We're never going to be like her at this rate. Hey! No, no, don't look so sad!
Twilight Dragoon Coda.evoFlair_: Forte, my favoritest dark dragoon! The person I wanna be like! Someday we're gonna ride together, so I won't give up. Never!

Tonfa Dragonewt.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, put an Assembly Droid into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 3 Assembly Droids.
Tonfa Dragonewt.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was discovered during a battle with the dragonfolk. He was wielding a weapon composited for increased maneuverability and power, almost like a dragon fang. Guess we've reached that kind of tech. —Engineer's Notes, Part 1
Tonfa Dragonewt.evoFlair_:
Through the power of tech, we've made tremendous leaps toward dragonkind. It may only be a matter of time, now, before we make them our subordinates. The dragonfolk shall see the flames of our ambition stoked yet.
—Tyranny Reins, Part 1

Windblast Dragon.baseFlair_: The malicious dragon wakes, and the world is rent asunder. The beast's insatiable hunger makes it view every living creature as prey.
Windblast Dragon.evoFlair_: The dragon opens its jaws, and a flash of lightning forks through the sky. It is a fateful warning to those who would dare to cross the beast.

Dragonrider Devil.baseFlair_: This guy's all sorts of greedy, let me tell you. I mean, he could eat all of you and still be hungry. In fact, I think he's going to have to gobble down the very land you stand on.
Dragonrider Devil.evoFlair_: How was that, boy? Tasty? Heh-heh, that's okay. I know you enjoyed it. What, you're still hungry? Well, I guess you've got to keep eating then. Eat until there's no one left!

Mist Dragon.baseFlair_: A dragon who manipulates mists from its forest dwelling. While there are those who have seen this creature, no one has ever touched it, and many believe it to be nothing but an illusion caused by the fog.
Mist Dragon.evoFlair_: A dragon who hides in the forest, producing dense mists to shroud its woodland home. Rumor has it that these mists are intended to protect its former lover's remains.

Owl Guardian.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower. Then randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand.
Owl Guardian.baseFlair_: A wise owl that picked up a sword and headed to the battlefield to protect those it loves. Clad in sacred armor, the owl stands against all threats.
Owl Guardian.evoFlair_: The owl's eyes look beyond the present into the distant future. Seeking the promised land beyond the trials of war, the owl brandishes its greatsword.

Hippogryph Rider.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, gain +1/+0.
Hippogryph Rider.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, gain +1/+0.
Hippogryph Rider.baseFlair_: Blue and clear! Let's soar! Griffy, fly out!
Hippogryph Rider.evoFlair_: Headwinds or crosswinds, we'll still win! Blaze out, Griffy!

Jadelong Tactician.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Leader Strike: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
Jadelong Tactician.baseFlair_:
They seek war and armed subjugation. They boast of their power, their words like a raging blaze. Together, they are a force of mighty warriors. Their name is Shuren, the nation of militarism.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Fourth Scroll
Jadelong Tactician.evoFlair_:
They seek prestige and personal glory. While others fight, they await their opportunity to profit. In doing so, they hone their perseverance. Their name is Konru, the nation of prosperity.
—Legend of the Three Nations, Fifth Scroll

Wyvern Cavalier.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 2 from the cost of a card in your hand.
Wyvern Cavalier.baseFlair_: Glorious flames decorate the battlefield as armies march forward in the wake of the wyvern cavalier. She constantly pushes ahead, never looking back, her flame a beacon for her allies.
Wyvern Cavalier.evoFlair_: Not the sturdiest wall or the most brutal assault can stop her. Her scarlet flames scorch across the battlefield, guiding her allies to victory.

Phoenix Rider Aina.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 for each other follower in play.
Phoenix Rider Aina.baseFlair_: I have no fear of the number of adversaries. The more there are, the more excited I get! None will outpace me!
Phoenix Rider Aina.evoFlair_: The only thing that will be left in this sky is my flames! Now show me how furiously you can burn, my phoenix! Blaze a path for me and only me through the heavens!

Hoarfrost Triceratops.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, randomly destroy 1 and destroy an enemy follower.
Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
Hoarfrost Triceratops.evoEffect_: Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
Hoarfrost Triceratops.baseFlair_:
It looks so beautiful, wrapped in glittering ice. And that strength, unshakable by the bitterest cold, is worthy of admiration. It's enthralling to watch. I could stare at this majestic beast forever...
—Fledgling explorer visiting Dinosaur Island
Hoarfrost Triceratops.evoFlair_:
The triceratops's hoarfrost lowers its victim's body temperature, encasing the creature in ice. The triceratops reacts badly to scrutiny. Any who stare too long will become a frozen snack for this beast.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

Dark Dragoon Forte.baseEffect_:
Storm.
This follower can't be attacked if Overflow is active for you.
Dark Dragoon Forte.evoEffect_:
Storm.
This follower can't be attacked if Overflow is active for you.
Dark Dragoon Forte.baseFlair_: Insolent white dragons! Prepare to be taught once and for all that these skies belong to the black dragons and demonkind!
Dark Dragoon Forte.evoFlair_: How dare you call yourself the ruler of the skies before me! If you want to rule, I'll give you the chance to do so in purgatory!

Warbreaker Dragoon.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Subtract 1 from the cost of 2 random Dragoncraft followers in your hand, and give them +1/+0.
Warbreaker Dragoon.baseFlair_: Try and fight and defend as many times as you will, the ceaseless bloodshed only continues. Do you fall into despair, or choose to retreat? The answer is clear. "I shall end our battle here!"
Warbreaker Dragoon.evoFlair_: Swing your blade as many times as you will, fate cannot be persuaded. Do you abandon hope, or abandon tomorrow? The answer is clear. "Let us finish this fight, for a world without conflict!"

Aiela, Devoted Knight.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain an empty play point orb, and recover 3 play points.
Aiela, Devoted Knight.evoEffect_:
Evolve: If you have at least 6 play points, use 6 play points and summon a Devoted Dragon.
Reduce damage to this follower to 0 while an allied Devoted Dragon is in play.
Aiela, Devoted Knight.baseFlair_:
"It's okay, Mister Dragon. I'll help you guys make up."
Because she cares, because she doesn't want him to be alone—she helps bring the hearts of the two together with her gentle touch.
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 5
Aiela, Devoted Knight.evoFlair_:
The two run to the dragon. Their adventure begins here. The two are reunited and both call out at once, "Sorry!"
—The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 6

Shipsbane Plesiosaurus.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you discard cards from your hand, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Fanfare: If you have 10 play point orbs, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Shipsbane Plesiosaurus.evoEffect_: Evolve: Discard a card and then draw 2 cards. If a Natura card was discarded, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Shipsbane Plesiosaurus.baseFlair_: Among all the creatures of the sea, this wise dragon reigns supreme. It summons storms, manipulates the currents, and calls forth massive tidal bores. Austere in its workings, it is the manifestation of both the bounty and the wrath of the ocean.
Shipsbane Plesiosaurus.evoFlair_:
"There, there! We've got 'im now!"
"Target acquired. Loading inferno missiles."
"Woohoo! Evaporate everything!"
—Rola, Inferno Dragoon and Nova, Trusty Mech

Jerva, Wyrm Transcendent.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if there are no allied cards in play (excluding Jerva, Wyrm Transcendents), deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader instead. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Jerva, Wyrm Transcendent.evoEffect_:
Ward.
