Evolve: Deal 2 damage to all other followers.
Jerva, Wyrm Transcendent.baseFlair_: Do not reason; do not justify. These are useless fetters. Smash your ideas, and you will surpass your meager origin. Thirst for a new form, and the dragon's claw shall twist your wish into being.
Jerva, Wyrm Transcendent.evoFlair_: The body burns and the claws burst forth. This is the form of a dragon. I am unopposable, a seething power that will crush all!

Devoted Dragon.baseEffect_: Gain Bane and Ward while an allied Aiela, Devoted Knight is in play.
Devoted Dragon.baseFlair_: Wielding swords, overcoming storms, saving others, vanquishing monsters, and training diligently. The dragon finally trusts the girl as his partner. The two have bonded through friendship... Their journey begins here. —The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 7
Devoted Dragon.evoFlair_:
"We're going off on an adventure!"
"Wow, the wind feels so great... I'm getting so excited!"
"Let's go, Mister Dragon! You and me and everyone together!"
—May, Moriana, and Aiela

Lightning Blast.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
Lightning Blast.baseFlair_: An honorable demise granted only to those chosen by the dragons.

Draconic Lance.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a follower that originally costs at least 5 play points, change the cost of this card to 4.
----------
Destroy an enemy follower.
Draconic Lance.baseFlair_: The beat of thy wings powers this lance. Onward, my friend!

Wyrm Spire.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, transform a random allied follower that costs 3 play points or less into a Dragon.
Wyrm Spire.baseFlair_: This spire was built on a foundation of ancient dragons' bones and scales. It's said those who pray to it will be granted fangs, claws, and wings.

Skull Dragon.baseEffect_: Strike: Gain +4/+0 until the end of the turn.
Skull Dragon.evoEffect_: Strike: Gain +4/+0 until the end of the turn.
Skull Dragon.baseFlair_: That isn't carrion, you know. Don't go near it. Don't touch it. If it wakes up, it'll eat you alive.
Skull Dragon.evoFlair_: A dragon that has used the power of darkness to overcome death. Its claws secrete a venom, and it breathes a cloud of noxious smoke that inflames all living flesh.

Glacial Dragon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all other followers.
Glacial Dragon.baseFlair_: The dragon howls, and the sky freezes over. The dragon takes to the land, and the earth freezes over.
Glacial Dragon.evoFlair_: The chill breath of the ice dragon is capable of freezing human souls, sealing them away for eternity in a frosty prison.

Ebon Beast Warrior.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost Dragoncraft cards in your hand.
Ebon Beast Warrior.baseFlair_: Contemptible dragons, gazing down on the surface dwellers! When we slice your wings off, you'll have no path left!
Ebon Beast Warrior.evoFlair_: Contemptible dragons, scoffing at the surface dwellers! Our leonine attacks will slice off your head and your pride.

Albacore.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Albacore.baseFlair_: You never know when disaster could strike and vanish.
Albacore.evoFlair_: The giant fish cruises the waves of blue like a shooting star, leaving behind midsummer memories and delectable flavor.

Trident Merman.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Megalorca.
Whenever an allied Megalorca comes into play, give it +1/+1 and Ward.
Trident Merman.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Megalorca comes into play, give it +1/+1 and Ward.
Trident Merman.baseFlair_: The sea is vast. Therefore, on occasion, it is visited by wicked beings. In order to mitigate that risk, mermen cooperate with marine animals to patrol their domain.
Trident Merman.evoFlair_: The sea is too kind. At times so much so that it even finds itself under threat. In order to protect the sea, the mermen and marine animals take it upon themselves to bear the burden of intolerance.

Dread Dragon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Dread Dragon.baseFlair_: Claws of flame that tear through the skies. Black wings which spread despair. Those who dare defy this dragon are eliminated with minimum ceremony.
Dread Dragon.evoFlair_: A casual swipe of these mighty claws can result in countless casualties. The skies turn red, and blood rains down on the world below. The dragon's wrath can never be contained.

Shenlong.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly discard 1 of the lowest-cost cards in your hand and then draw 2 cards.
Shenlong.baseFlair_: A mysterious dragon that has lived for eternity and ascended to the sacred realm. Even the gods themselves are dazzled by Shenlong's wisdom.
Shenlong.evoFlair_: A mysterious dragon that has, over the course of countless millennia, ascended to the sacred realm. Its wisdom is said to be infinite, and it guides humanity from the faraway heavens.

Wyrmcannon Dragonewt.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of allied Machina followers in play.
Wyrmcannon Dragonewt.baseFlair_: Equipment forged from diving gear that flings dragon flame. Due to the durability of its raw materials, it can put out impressive firepower—perhaps rivaling that of a true dragon. —Dragonewt Scholar's Record, Part 2
Wyrmcannon Dragonewt.evoFlair_: The flames are terrifying, burning a whole mountainside down with one shot. It really is like a dragon. If you put wings on it, I bet you couldn't even tell much of a difference. —Voice Recording of an Environmental Researcher, Part 2

Helix Mushussu.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (4): Summon 2 Basilisks.
----------
Last Words: Summon 2 Basilisks.
Helix Mushussu.baseFlair_: The wicked dragon's tail traces the form of a burning chain of rage. The howl of its brethren set its tail aflame.
Helix Mushussu.evoFlair_: The wicked dragon's body runs brutally along a groove of destruction. As if in response to the howl, the beast's flames become its maw.

Whitescale Dragon.baseFlair_: Having only known how to love, the young dragon spreads its wings. A roar of purity, an aegis for ivory-white scales.
Whitescale Dragon.evoFlair_: Its eyes take in all that is right. With unblighted warmth, it shall deliver order to the world of mankind.

Blackscale Dragon.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
Blackscale Dragon.baseFlair_: Having only known suffering, the young dragon spreads its wings. A roar of malice, annihilating all before its obsidian-black scales.
Blackscale Dragon.evoFlair_: Its eyes take in all that is dark. With depraved malice, it shall spread chaos to the world of mankind.

Hydra.baseFlair_: A violent, writhing mass. Countless heads eating away at the world, spewing forth noxious gases which contaminate the atmosphere.
Hydra.evoFlair_: Huge heads thrust into the land. Poisonous gases spew out into the air. The mighty serpent dragon consumes all before it: gods and monsters, heaven and earth.

Neptune.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Evolve all allied Megalorcas.
Neptune.baseFlair_: A beautiful goddess who watches over the paradise of the deep. She guides the noble sea beasts and their progeny through the depths.
Neptune.evoFlair_: A lovely goddess who rules the paradise of the deep. The sea creatures great and small sing of her as their queen, and love her as their mother.

Zirnitra, Dragon's Flame.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Hellflame Dragon.
Whenever an allied Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 3 play points or less comes into play, give it +0/+1.
Zirnitra, Dragon's Flame.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon a Hellflame Dragon.
Whenever an allied Dragoncraft follower that originally costs 3 play points or less comes into play, give it +0/+1.
Zirnitra, Dragon's Flame.baseFlair_: This battlefield is now ours—spread your wings and raise your claws! Now you'll all see what a real dragon looks like!
Zirnitra, Dragon's Flame.evoFlair_: Even if these wings are torn—even if these claws are crushed, we'll never admit defeat! Until this very last scale is taken, we'll roam the skies and roar! This dragon will reign supreme!

Adramelech.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Draw 2 cards.
----------
Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of non-follower cards you've played this match.
Adramelech.baseFlair_: It is the embodiment of deception detested by the gods. In this realm it takes the form of a dragon, only much more savage and truculent—a wry smile, corrupted with depravity. Avoid its treachery at all costs.
Adramelech.evoFlair_: It feeds on the sons of man, drinking their blood and devouring their bones. There is no end to the atrocities of the majestic king—a twisted roar, cruel and nefarious. Avoid approaching it at all costs.

Jabberwock, Nightmare Spawn.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
Fanfare: Randomly banish 1 of the lowest-cost followers in your deck and then gain +X/+X. X equals the cost of the banished card.
At the end of your turn, randomly banish 1 of the lowest-cost followers in your deck and then gain +X/+X. X equals the cost of the banished card.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if this follower has at least 10 attack, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader instead.
Jabberwock, Nightmare Spawn.evoEffect_:
Can't attack.
At the end of your turn, randomly banish 1 of the lowest-cost followers in your deck and then gain +X/+X. X equals the cost of the banished card.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if this follower has at least 12 attack, deal 7 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 7 damage to the enemy leader instead.
Jabberwock, Nightmare Spawn.baseFlair_:
The manxome 'wock bereaves of speech
The most loquacious foe.
And in its burbling wake it leaves
Naught but bloodstains and woe.
—Song of the Unknowable
Jabberwock, Nightmare Spawn.evoFlair_:
The figure of this fearsome beast
Would cause sane folk to tremble.
On dream and nightmare does it feast
Where toves do gyre and gimble.
—Song of the Unknowable

Dragon Empress Otohime.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon an Otohime's Vanguard.
----------
Fanfare: Summon Otohime's Vanguards until your area is full. (An area can hold 5 cards.)
Dragon Empress Otohime.baseFlair_: This tedious world has earned my fury. Foolish, rebellious peons... You will know the full extent of my wrath. Prepare to be fish food!
Dragon Empress Otohime.evoFlair_: The whirlpool of my fury will swallow the world. It's too late for apologies! You brought this war upon yourselves! Prepare to be blown away like sea foam!

Forte, Ruler of the Skies.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, give +3/+1 to a random Dragoncraft follower in your hand.
Forte, Ruler of the Skies.baseFlair_: I am Forte, ruler of the skies! If you wish to join my ranks, show me your power and prove that you are worthy, and I will become your wings!
Forte, Ruler of the Skies.evoFlair_: You remain steadfast, refusing to falter before me... Heh. I like that look in your eyes! Now soar—faster and higher! My wings will guide you along the path of victory!

Kaya, Draconine Brawler.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Gain Storm and the following effect: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Follower Strike: Gain +2/+2 and the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
Kaya, Draconine Brawler.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: Gain +2/+2 and the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
Kaya, Draconine Brawler.baseFlair_: Hey, you. Have you seen Inori around here? We got separated while on a... certain mission.
Kaya, Draconine Brawler.evoFlair_: Looks like we've got monsters on our hands. Leave this to me. I'll send 'em all flying!

Azure Dragon's Rage.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever you discard cards, subtract X from the cost of this card. X equals the number of cards discarded.
----------
Storm.
Azure Dragon's Rage.baseFlair_:
The keeper visited an azure dragon high in its roost. But the furious dragon would not listen to him. Nevertheless, the man tried to calm the dragon down.
—Summoner's Revolt, Second Telling
Azure Dragon's Rage.evoFlair_:
The azure dragon's lament left the man shaking with rage. Driven from its home, the creature had suffered unspeakable torment. The keeper wondered to himself: will mankind get away with anything?
—Summoner's Revolt, Third Telling

Conflagration.baseFlair_: The very world burns in its rays of flame.

Canyon of the Dragons.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, summon a Dragon.
Canyon of the Dragons.baseFlair_: The thousand-year war came to an end on that day. The earth trembled, the winds raged, and a cruel roar sounded—both enemy and ally were gone. Peace was achieved, but it was born of great terror.

Tilting at Windmills.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a Neutral follower, give it Storm and destroy it at the end of your turn.

Inferno Dragon.baseFlair_: A fire dragon that has dwelt inside a volcano since time immemorial. Some call it Hero's End for eating so many would-be vanquishers.
Inferno Dragon.evoFlair_: When the fire dragon becomes angry, the flames surrounding its body glow an incandescent blue and turn anything they touch into ash.

Frostfire Dragon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. A random enemy follower can't attack next turn.
Frostfire Dragon.baseFlair_: Bwahaha! Nature's saute, nature's sorbet! Still... there's something missing! Coctura Integro! —Gourmet Emperor Khaiza
Frostfire Dragon.evoFlair_:
As expected from the Gourmet Emperor himself. The firedragon is impeccably chilled as an appetizing side dish, and the frostdragon is grilled to perfection. This deserves nothing less than a perfect score.
—Lyriola, Supreme Critic

Dragonblader.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (5): Countdown (3)
Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Dragon.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Dragon.
Dragonblader.baseFlair_:
"Grroooar!"
"A challenge! Let's see who can take that beast down first!"
—Dragonblader and his rival
Dragonblader.evoFlair_:
"Graaahhhr!"
"Our rivalry keeps us sharp, doesn't it! You know I'm the only one who could match a blade to your fangs!"
—Dragonblader and his rival

Elios, Loyal Dragoon.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the start of the opponent's turn, if this follower has been damaged, restore 2 defense to this follower and gain Ward.
Elios, Loyal Dragoon.baseFlair_: I've abandoned my humanity. I gave everything to gain power, to better my country. The dragon's blood coursing through my veins is proof of my resolve. Come, Oswald. Let us fly, my friend.
Elios, Loyal Dragoon.evoFlair_: I will never forget the people who laid down their lives for change. For my part, I laid down my humanity... and gained conviction in exchange. The road to dominion is drenched in blood, but the only way is forward.

Grea the Dragonborn.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an Anne, Belle of Mysteria and evolve it.
Grea the Dragonborn.baseFlair_: Anne, quit dragging me over to the— Oh, hello there! So you're the new student. Good to meet you!
Grea the Dragonborn.evoFlair_: I like this school. Everyone's just so nice. I'm sure you'll love it too!

Dragonplate Warrior.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a non-follower card, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
Dragonplate Warrior.baseFlair_: Hey, you heard what they're saying? It's about the warrior with the horned helmet. They say that underneath the armor, he's really a dragon! —Battlefield rumors
Dragonplate Warrior.evoFlair_: He doesn't speak a word to anyone, and nobody's seen his face. But when he meets an enemy that seems worth his trouble, he opens his visor and spits flames! —Battlefield rumors

Poseidon.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a Poseidon's Guard.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 2 Poseidon's Guards.
Poseidon.baseFlair_: In a palace of deepest depths he resides. The god of the seas, the king of a nation, the commander of his army.
Poseidon.evoFlair_: The ocean blue fosters life, but do not be deceived by its gentle facade. With a swing of his trident, a mighty tempest can brew at any given instant.

Wildflame Dragon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy all damaged enemy followers.
Wildflame Dragon.baseFlair_:
Dragons reign over the skies. It is a source of great pride to them. Therefore when they descend to earth you may be sure, their goal is nothing less than absolute destruction.
—Veteran Dragonslayer
Wildflame Dragon.evoFlair_:
Their tread is heavy enough to shatter rock. The lash of their tails can cleave mountains. They rule the sky because they love it. If they should come to despise the land... well. It would be the end of all things.
—Veteran Dragonslayer

Zirnitra.baseFlair_: Assemble before me, beloved dragons! I am about to set you free! The time has come for you to return to your rightful place and regain dominion over all living things!
Zirnitra.evoFlair_: Fly, my beautiful dragons, fly! Be proud of your fangs! Your claws! Your wings! No one can stand in your way! It is time to unleash your power upon the world!

Ouroboros.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader. Then put an Ouroboros into your hand.
Ouroboros.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader. Then put an Ouroboros into your hand.
Ouroboros.baseFlair_: Life and death. Endings and beginnings. An absolute force that governs the ever-spinning, ever-repeating cycle of destiny.
Ouroboros.evoFlair_: This serpent depicts an endless cycle, and it represents both everything and nothing. All fated to be repeated as the world spins into eternity is within the belly of this limitless serpent.

Jabberwock.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy all other allied followers. For each follower, put a random follower that costs more than it from your deck into play.
Jabberwock.baseFlair_: Such vociferous jaws and grasping claws! Thy brillig name upon the lips lingereth, and never shall it vade! —Poems of Unbeing
Jabberwock.evoFlair_: Thine eyes of flame so blaze! Let thy name resound, unbeing Jabberwock. And the chaos shall as order seem. —Poems of Unbeing

Hulking Dragonewt.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
Hulking Dragonewt.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Hulking Dragonewt.baseFlair_:
"A sword to pierce any shield," shouted the bladesmith.
"A shield to stop all swords," argued the shieldsmith.
Both were squashed by a dragon, so the truth was never known. —Fighting at the Feet of Dragons, "The How and Why"
Hulking Dragonewt.evoFlair_:
"The sky is crumbling and falling," wept the worrier.
"What's the sense in fretting," laughed his wife.
Since all were helpless before the dragon, I could tell the wife was correct. —Trembling at the Might of Dragons, "The How and Why"

Neptune, Tidemistress.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Summon a Megalorca. Give it Storm.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon 2 Megalorcas.
Whenever an allied Megalorca comes into play, give it Storm.
Neptune, Tidemistress.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever an allied Megalorca comes into play, give it Storm.
Neptune, Tidemistress.baseFlair_: Not many are there who can part the roiling waves and follow the whirlpool's path to the very depths of the ocean. You, wise one who knows the ways of the sea, you shall have the deadly currents, the sea's rage, as your blade.
Neptune, Tidemistress.evoFlair_: The sea's servants have surpassed its stillness and can command the storm. You who are versed in the ocean's blue, the storm-tossed sea and the water's deadly calm shall be your shield.

Dragon Ranch.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Randomly summon 1 of the following - Hellflame Dragon, Dragon, or Windblast Dragon.
At the start of your turn, randomly summon 1 of the remaining cards.
Dragon Ranch.baseFlair_: It's always sad when a child leaves the nest, but I'm just delighted that you all grew up big and strong. Please take care of yourselves, my dear little ones. —Dragonrearer Matilda

Fortress Crab.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put a Fortress Crab into your hand.
Fortress Crab.baseFlair_: Provisions are gone, our forces have disbanded, and there's no money left to hire mercenaries. Now what happens to the state? If only there were someone to help. —Diary of the Have-Not King
Fortress Crab.evoFlair_: At the suggestion of the palace mage, we've established a base atop the monster. At this point we'll take a helping hand from anyone—even a crab. —Diary of the Have-Not King

Cetus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly destroy 1 of the lowest-cost enemy followers.
Cetus.baseFlair_: Strong wind blowin' in? Omen for rough seas. Winds calm but the seas are rough? Omen for it. —Young fisherman
Cetus.evoFlair_: So big you'll hurt your neck tryin' to look up at it. And it makes these huge waves just by diving. Ain't no way we can get close to it. —Young fisherman

Orb Dragon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Orb Dragon.baseFlair_: The light of the orbs can cleanse any impurity and eradicate any evil. Human lives, human lands—all seem like trifles before its tremendous power.
Orb Dragon.evoFlair_: The incandescent light of the dragon's orbs can raze the land to the ground. If you value your life, pray that you are never exposed to their glow.

Frenzied Drake.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the number of Dragoncraft cards in your hand.
Frenzied Drake.baseFlair_: "Just 'cause you touch a dragon's scales don't make it angry. They're furious all the time!" —Anonymous Journeyman
Frenzied Drake.evoFlair_: "Some say that touching a certain scale on a dragon will make 'em real mad. I say just don't touch any of 'em!" —Anonymous Journeyman

Fafnir.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all other followers.
Fafnir.baseFlair_: An evil serpent that lusts for gold. A brutal creature, it has been known to use its steely jaws to mash into tiny pieces those who come in search of its treasures.
Fafnir.evoFlair_: Its body is shrouded in a golden gleam; its eyes shine with an evil greed. Those who dare intrude upon its sanctuary are sliced open with sharp claws and drowned in their own blood.

Imperial Dragoon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand and deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of cards discarded.
Imperial Dragoon.baseFlair_: The knight freed a nameless dragon of terrible power from ruins where few dared to tread. To exact revenge on those who took his country from him, the knight signed a blood pact with the beast.
Imperial Dragoon.evoFlair_: The dragoon took his revenge, completing the last mission of the royal family. With that, the dragoon vanished along with the dragon to atone for crimes that could never be forgotten.

Aldos, Imperial Dragoon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand and deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of cards discarded.
Aldos, Imperial Dragoon.evoEffect_: (This card will be treated as Imperial Dragoon.)
Aldos, Imperial Dragoon.baseFlair_: The knight freed a nameless dragon of terrible power from ruins where few dared to tread. To exact revenge on those who took his country from him, the knight signed a blood pact with the beast.
Aldos, Imperial Dragoon.evoFlair_: The dragoon took his revenge, completing the last mission of the royal family. With that, the dragoon vanished along with the dragon to atone for crimes that could never be forgotten.

Wyrm God of the Skies.baseEffect_: Last Words: During your next turn, double the attack and defense of each allied Dragoncraft follower that comes into play.
Wyrm God of the Skies.evoEffect_: Last Words: During your next turn, double the attack and defense of each allied Dragoncraft follower that comes into play.
Wyrm God of the Skies.baseFlair_: A land's prosperity and fortune are not perforce coupled to the deeds of men. Of equal import are heaven's works, which guide the leaders and move the subjects.
Wyrm God of the Skies.evoFlair_: She is there in conquest's shadow—at prosperity's side. She who counsels with her beating wings and illuminates the future with shimmering fires.

Jerva of Draconic Mail.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change your leader's maximum defense to 10. Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader instead. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Jerva of Draconic Mail.baseFlair_: Stunted weaklings, what have you done? What can you even do? Discard it all—each and every thing that binds you. Thirst for them—these wings, these scales, this roar.
Jerva of Draconic Mail.evoFlair_: You are weak, and so you fear the world. But the time for such feelings is through. Once the dragon's power marks you, the world will fear!

Wildfire Tyrannosaur.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Discard all Natura cards in your hand and deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of Natura cards discarded.
Wildfire Tyrannosaur.baseFlair_:
That beast's command of the raging flames is so... exciting. I could fall in love with those flames. I wish I could be like that. Maybe I should go say hello. I'd hate to waste the opportunity.
—Young Dragonfolk visitor to Dinosaur Island
Wildfire Tyrannosaur.evoFlair_:
Tyrannosaurus Rex, king of the roaring blaze. Bathing in magma has given it a body which births flame at the merest touch. Any who impede its progress when it sights its prey will be reduced to ash.
—Dinosaur Island Guidebook

Polyphonic Roar.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, summon a Windblast Dragon.
Polyphonic Roar.baseFlair_: The cacophony of roars shakes the heavens and the earth.

Genesis Dragon.baseFlair_: Where others take days to create a world, this dragon takes just an instant.
Genesis Dragon.evoFlair_: In order to create, one need only entrust their soul to the sea. In order to destroy, one need only summon a whirlpool to swallow the land. Everything comes from water, and one day everything will return there.

Python.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all cards that cost 7 play points or less from your deck.
Python.baseFlair_: The divine floods washed away every destiny, but from the mud rose a call. In that moment all incidence became inevitability. —Cyclical Histories, Chapter 2
Python.evoFlair_: The oracle that emerged from the mud will carry in its body everything from this world's beginning and end. Radiant, it will spin the fate of the world—creating all, destroying all. —Cyclical Histories, Chapter 5

Azi Dahaka.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Storm.
Azi Dahaka.baseFlair_: A depraved creature of evil, wickedness incarnate—from its mouths it expels one thousand curses and one million poisons. —Terrors of the World, Chapter 4
Azi Dahaka.evoFlair_: It is not blood, but venom that flows in its veins—not life, but malice inside its body. The three necked dark dragon is truly a terrible force not to be trifled with. —Terrors of the World, Chapter 4

Lindworm.baseEffect_: If you've played at least 10 other non-follower cards this match, and you have 10 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Virtuous Lindworm or Iniquitous Lindworm.
Lindworm.baseFlair_: A blaze of light and the heavens are torn asunder. What will rain down from them: a merciful verdict of light or a merciless tyranny of dark?
Lindworm.evoFlair_: A blaze of light and the heavens are covered. Will the creature bring forth the beginning of salvation or the end of sin?

Zooey, Arbiter of the Skies.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Draw a card. Put a 10-play point, 6/5 Zooey, Arbiter of the Skies (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal damage to your leader until their defense drops to 1. Give your leader the following effect until the start of your next turn - Reduce damage to your leader to 0.
Zooey, Arbiter of the Skies.baseFlair_: I appear when the balance of the world comes under threat. Come. Join me in the fight.
Zooey, Arbiter of the Skies.evoFlair_: You've shown me just what wonders your world has to offer. However... I need not mention what I will do to you should you ever threaten it.

Dagon, Lord of the Seas.baseEffect_:
Can't take more than 4 damage at a time.
Can attack 3 times per turn.
Dagon, Lord of the Seas.baseFlair_: Its eyes are the color of madness, an angry shade filled with hatred for the skies above. Once a god itself, it has been twisted and deformed by its despair. Lo, the tears of this world exist because of the tears you shed. —Lost Legends
Dagon, Lord of the Seas.evoFlair_: Its hatred of the gods becomes a raging sea, waves crashing into the skies above. Those hands that once loved the world transform into the jaws of a fearsome beast. Lo, the seas are violent because they know your anger. —Lost Legends

Genesis Dragon of Disaster.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (4): Gain an empty play point orb. If you have at least 1 evolution point, use 1 evolution point and deal 3 damage to all followers. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
----------
Storm.
Genesis Dragon of Disaster.baseFlair_: The world's beginning can be traced to the maternal sea. The world's end will be no different. —Calamity's Return, Foreword
Genesis Dragon of Disaster.evoFlair_: When the world began, there was simply nothing. When the world ends, all will simply return to nothing. —Calamity's Return, Epilogue

XI. Erntz, Justice.baseEffect_:
Ward.
When this follower comes into play, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Draw 3 cards.
-Evolve this follower.
When this follower leaves play, restore 8 defense to your leader. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
XI. Erntz, Justice.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Ignore Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
XI. Erntz, Justice.baseFlair_: Listen to their grievances, dear ally. I am Justice, true warden of equality. From squalid prisons, I shall release. Be bound no longer; rise! Take flight!
XI. Erntz, Justice.evoFlair_: Let us deliver a verdict, dear ally. I am Justice, executioner of prejudice. This sword adjudicates by integrity. The guilty will pay for their crimes.

Virtuous Lindworm.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 5 defense to your leader. Then draw 5 cards.
Virtuous Lindworm.baseFlair_: As the heavens are torn asunder, the dark clouds dissipate. The light of judgment reigns, and a merciful verdict is set forth.
Virtuous Lindworm.evoFlair_: White lightning tears across the sky, raining salvation onto all in existence. Ah, but do not fear. Bow your head and accept it.

Iniquitous Lindworm.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Can only attack the enemy leader.
Ignore Ward.
Iniquitous Lindworm.baseFlair_: From beneath the heavens, dark clouds gather. The tyrannies of darkness reign, and a merciless verdict is set forth.
Iniquitous Lindworm.evoFlair_: Black lightning tears across the sky, raining finality onto all in existence. Ah, but do not fear. Bow your head and accept it.

Dragon Sphere.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, transform all allied followers without Ward into Inferno Dragons.
Dragon Sphere.baseFlair_: If you rub a dragon the wrong way, it'll rage and slay you. But if you make away with its hoard, it'll accept you as its master. —Pyrewyrm Commander

Eris's Prayer.baseFlair_: Allow me to fight at your side. Right now, I am cloaked in sin. But if ever there was a light to lift the darkness and cleanse my soul... it would be the light of atonement. I have only one wish: to save as many as I have forsaken.

Meowskers's Raid.baseFlair_: Your major's here, reportin' for duty—even if this battle does make me feel like a tenderclaw. Would be a lie if I said I'm the strongest in the forest, but you'll find no greater ally than me, milord! Mreow!

Salvation Ex Limonia.baseEffect_:
Subtract 1 from the cost of a Havencraft or Machina follower in your hand.
If you have played 4 other Salvation Ex Limonias in this match, put a Heavenly Aegis into your hand.
Salvation Ex Limonia.baseFlair_:
Critical damage detected.
I'll deliver you. With this power.
Initiating proselytization protocol. —Limonia, Flawed Saint

Temple Windbear.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Sacred Plea or Beastly Vow into your hand.
Temple Windbear.baseFlair_: Ah, yes... My loyal brethren, fellow masters of destructive cyclones, the chosen ones acquainted with the pact of flames, allow me to share my eternal gratitude... —Grimnir
Temple Windbear.evoFlair_: It appears you have mastered the winds as well, haven't you? Let's be friends! What's that? You'll introduce me to the beast of flames? Sweet! —Grimnir

Tender Rabbit Healer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to all allies.
Enhance (7): Gain +4/+4 and restore 4 defense instead.
Tender Rabbit Healer.baseFlair_: Get injured on the battlefield and this ungraceful young woman will visit you. She has a firm voice, a harried step, and a bad attitude. "You there! You're hurt again!" ―Diary of a Warrior
Tender Rabbit Healer.evoFlair_: Although she complains, she'll heal you gracefully. Say thanks and the bunny will cheerfully whisper, "You're helpless without me!" ―Diary of a Warrior

Father Punishment.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Father Punishment.baseFlair_: Lost lamb of god, steeped in sin—repent to your heart's content. It appears you have much blood on your hands...
Father Punishment.evoFlair_: You have been absolved... NOT! Not even close! Not repentant enough! You must repent harder! Haaarder, I say!

Pyne, Holy Police.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower Rush and deal 1 damage to that follower.
Pyne, Holy Police.baseFlair_: Here goes: a shot of medicine that'll make you want to confess your sins and apologize! Huh? Where are you going? Whoops... I gave you the medicine that makes you want to work up a sweat and burn some calories!
Pyne, Holy Police.evoFlair_: Hey, you're the guy who helped me with my investigation that one time! If you hadn't accidentally knocked over the real culprit, I never would've caught him! That's the kind of luck I'll need as a future holy commissioner!

Petra, Ether of the Wind.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied follower. It can't be attacked until the end of your opponent's turn.
Petra, Ether of the Wind.baseFlair_: A wind shaman's duty is to ride aboard airships and do wind readings, or in other words, predict weather mid-flight. However, there are fewer wind shamans these days, and those who remain are reduced to offering only simple prayers from the ground.
Petra, Ether of the Wind.evoFlair_: What! You want me to join your crew? Thank you! I've always wanted to fly aboard an airship like the wind shamans of old!

Elysian Saint-Hares.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Put 2 random followers that cost 1 play point or less from your deck into play.
At the end of your turn, put an Elysian Saint-Hares into your deck.
Elysian Saint-Hares.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to all allied followers that cost 1 play point or less. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
At the end of your turn, put an Elysian Saint-Hares into your deck.
Elysian Saint-Hares.baseFlair_: The chaste and the true know not of corruption. Thus, the defilement of death has no place among the eternally pure.
Elysian Saint-Hares.evoFlair_: The chaste and the true need not speak for concord, as long as intentions remain pure among them.

Destiny Wing Knight.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if there are at least 2 allied amulets in play, gain +1/+1.
At the start of your turn, if this follower's attack or defense has not been increased by a spell or effect, destroy this follower.
Destiny Wing Knight.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, if there are at least 2 allied amulets in play, gain +1/+1.
Destiny Wing Knight.baseFlair_:
The warrior entreated heaven for the power to save the weak. Receiving it, he spoke as a holy messenger:
"Human, do not forget the extravagance of this power."
When the warrior forgets God, the wings on his back will carry him to heaven.
Destiny Wing Knight.evoFlair_:
The warrior saved an uncountable number of the wretched. And they worshipped―not him, but the name of the lord God.
"Human, do not throw thyself into empty deeds."
The warrior continues to battle so long as he believes.

Meus Knight.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Ward.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree comes into play, gain +1/+1.
Meus Knight.baseFlair_: Heed the call of your princess, for you are no longer the cornered rat you once were. Rise to the occasion, and let your swift feet carry you to greatness. —Book of Eulogies on Nature
Meus Knight.evoFlair_: Your voice gives us strength, Princess Daffodil! We swear never to scurry away again! It won't matter if the fiercest of fearsome cats stands in the way; we mighty Meus will fight by your side!

Passing of Lore.baseEffect_: Choose: Put a Sacred Teachings, Healing Prayer, or Acolyte's Light into your hand.
Passing of Lore.baseFlair_: It's true that faith takes many forms. But keep none other than the one God before you.

Virtuous Aether.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, restore 5 defense to all allies.
Virtuous Aether.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the purehearted man discovered her kindness in his manor, he saw a righteous, just aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those who pursue what is right.

Jeweled Brilliance.baseEffect_: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
Jeweled Brilliance.baseFlair_: Refined beauty is like a polished jewel—it pierces the heart of anyone who looks upon it.

Lorena's Holy Water.baseEffect_:
Restore 2 defense to an ally.
Draw a card.
Lorena's Holy Water.baseFlair_: Wounded lamb, won't you let me tend to you? —Holy Priest Lorena

Mark of Balance.baseEffect_: Draw a card. Restore 1 defense to the enemy leader.

Summon Pegasus.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
Last Words: Summon a Pegasus.
Summon Pegasus.baseFlair_: Bow down to the sky, or my pegasus will swoop down upon you.

Pinion Prayer.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: Summon a Holy Falcon.
Pinion Prayer.baseFlair_: Wings of pure white gather at the sound of prayer.

Sacred Plea.baseFlair_: A wish of such purity that it receives the blessings of heaven.

Featherfall Hourglass.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Enhance (3) - Subtract 3 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Time Owl.
Featherfall Hourglass.baseFlair_: Time is always in motion, like the falling sands of an hourglass. Or perhaps, like a feather soaring through the skies. —Teachings of the Winged Oracle

Sealed Tome.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 2 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Sacred Teachings or Forbidden Teachings.
----------
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Draw a card.
Sealed Tome.baseFlair_: Faith asks for your unwavering conviction, your patience. For no matter how the truth may burn and wherever it takes you, you must accept it.

Snnneak Attack!.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Meowskers, Ruff-Tuff Major.
Snnneak Attack!.baseFlair_: That's our major for you—always commanding and demanding. But he's got a softer side too, hear. He even gives us fresh fruit from time to time. —Mánagarmr recruit

Hare of Illusions.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Last Words: Summon a Dream Rabbit.
Hare of Illusions.baseFlair_: Welcome! Please, please do come in. Welcome to the world of dreams.

Globe of the Starways.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Put a random Countdown amulet from your deck into your hand.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Globe of the Starways.baseFlair_: It is the celestial sphere that covers both sky and land. When it leans toward a certain fate, the legend of the chosen one will begin.

Summit Temple.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If another allied Summit Temple is in play, draw a card and destroy this amulet.
Whenever an allied Havencraft follower attacks, that follower deals damage equal to its defense until the end of the turn.
Summit Temple.baseFlair_: "Let the world bloom like a harmonious flower." —Arch Priestess Laelia

Golden Bell.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Last Words: Draw 2 cards.
Golden Bell.baseFlair_: You mean I get to ring this one too? Ding-dong, ding-dong! —Bellringer Angel

White Diamond.baseFlair_: This one's so adorable. Don't you love it? —Jeweled Priestess

Black Diamond.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Black Diamond.baseFlair_: This one's so lovely. It would look adorable on you! —Jeweled Priestess

Snake Priestess.baseFlair_: No one is allowed to approach the King of Serpents. No humans, no snakes! Hee-hee!
Snake Priestess.evoFlair_: When I dance I become one with the King of Serpents. It is the greatest honor of all. And no one can disrupt this ritual!

Rabbit Healer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to an ally.
Rabbit Healer.baseFlair_: Weren't you just here getting patched up? What's the big idea getting yourself hurt again so soon! I'm not made of bandages, you know!
Rabbit Healer.evoFlair_: It's almost as if they get hurt on purpose just so they can come see me! What? That's exactly what's happening? Pfft. Nonsense. Now be gone with you. I've patients to attend to!

Ardent Nun.baseFlair_: They may not recognize the Lord's authority yet, but by the light of my sword I'll make them. Foul demons, penance must be paid!
Ardent Nun.evoFlair_: Come one, come all. As long as I serve the Lord and the wretched stalk His flock, I will hunt them down and see His righteous will be done!

Mainyu.baseEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Mainyu.evoEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Mainyu.baseFlair_: I am a formless being. Pure malice is within me. I dwell within you.
Mainyu.evoFlair_: Think upon it. Do you see? Yes, I am you. I dwell within you. The icy malice that you feel... That is me.

Heavenly Hound.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +0/+2 and Ward if an evolved allied follower is in play.
Heavenly Hound.baseFlair_: The hound is a temple guardian. He's generally harmless, but watch out for the mirror shards floating around him. They'll come right at you!
Heavenly Hound.evoFlair_: The hound has no mercy for temple robbers. If he turns his eyes on you, his mirror shards will chase you to the ends of the earth.

Frog Cleric.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Restore 3 defense to an ally.
Frog Cleric.baseFlair_: Pain, pain, go away, hop on in another day! That's the first time I've ever tried this spell, but did your pain hop away?
Frog Cleric.evoFlair_: Pain, pain, go away, hop on in another day! That's the first time I've ever tried this spell, so I hope it doesn't bring more pain hopping in!

Mist Shaman.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
Mist Shaman.baseFlair_: Everything will be okay. My mist will conceal you from the world.
Mist Shaman.evoFlair_: There's no need to tremble. Just stay in this curtain of mist, and no one in this world will ever find you.

Star Bishop.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to another follower.
Star Bishop.baseFlair_: Visible or not, the stars always shine! Men's hearts are the same! Show me the shimmer in your heart!
Star Bishop.evoFlair_: Stars drive off dark worries! Men's hearts are the same! The shimmer of your heart is going to make the future so bright!

Sister of the Sword.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower Ward.
Sister of the Sword.baseFlair_: Your prayer alone will not save thee. Place thy faith in the sword, and blessed be thy blade.
Sister of the Sword.evoFlair_: In the name of a harmonious world... Holy blade, I beseech thee! Deliver justice from the heavens to the wicked, and arm those who are virtuous.

Deathscythe Nun.baseEffect_: Gain Bane during the opponent's turn.
Deathscythe Nun.baseFlair_: If you repent, I will save you. Your sins will be excised from you here and now.
Deathscythe Nun.evoFlair_: What is joy? What is salvation? For me they're this: your fearful face.

Hazen, Priest of the Wind.baseFlair_: I am Hazen, a priest of the wind. I travel the world to save the distressed. Maybe it's just because I was in the military, but I prefer boots on the ground over stuffy talks in a temple.
Hazen, Priest of the Wind.evoFlair_: You damn sinner! If words won't get through to you, then I'll make you see the light with fistfuls of love!

Sister Falconer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Summon a Divine Birdsong.
Sister Falconer.baseFlair_: May I have a word with you? I wish to offer some counsel in your hour of doubt. Live as freely as a bird in flight... It will keep that ugly, conflicted expression off your face.
Sister Falconer.evoFlair_:
Skree!
(She's a good person, but that was harsh...)
—Regal Falcon

Malevolent Al-mi'raj.baseFlair_: The moonlight, it's delectable. One time, when it was as white as can be, I took a teensy bite of it. Mmm, delicious, I thought. But recently I found a way to make it taste even better. You wanna know how?
Malevolent Al-mi'raj.evoFlair_: Humans. They talk a lot and capture my sisters, so I'm not fond of them. But, mmm, humans. They complement moonlight so well. The combination of flavors, it's exquisite.

White Hart.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4. The next time damage is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, reduce damage to that follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
White Hart.evoEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, reduce damage to that follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
White Hart.baseFlair_: If faith becometh thy heart, then upon facing the trial, the judge of such devotion shall appear, white and magnanimous. Should it deem thee worthy, thou shalt enjoy the protection of the gods' mercy. —Oracle of a Distant Land
White Hart.evoFlair_: The battle was gruesome; I was flinging prayers as much as I was swinging my sword. But that's when I saw the divine beast. Suddenly my body felt light, and I was impervious to my enemies' attacks. —Holy Knight of a Distant Land

Fervid Heavenly Hound.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If an evolved allied follower is in play, gain +2/+0.
Fervid Heavenly Hound.baseFlair_:
"That scar? Got it way back... was on the wrong side of a divine beast." The wounded bandit curled up his lips.
"He had claws like razors and fangs like nails—a monster in every sense of the word."
The listeners imagined a most terrifying creature.
Fervid Heavenly Hound.evoFlair_:
"Once it readies its weapons, everything's over."
The bandit proudly pointed to his old wound.
"They're ancient armaments... If they lock onto you, there's no hope of escape."
The listeners shuddered at the thought of such terror.

Saintly Squeaks.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If at least 2 allied amulets are in play, gain Storm.
Saintly Squeaks.baseFlair_:
Carry the heaviest object you can find. Do not fear—rather, take delight in the act. Your glorious wings will surely guide you down a righteous path.
—Book of Eulogies on Nature
Saintly Squeaks.evoFlair_: Those most blessed by nature must bear the brunt of the responsibility. Winged rats are no exception, and so it is their daily routine to transport a spiked ball. With a full twenty days until the next recess, fulfillment of this duty requires true resolve.

Winged Staff Priestess.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, summon a Holy Cavalier, then remove this effect.
Winged Staff Priestess.baseFlair_:
When the world was abandoned by its god, an evil god usurped power. Evil armies appeared all over the world.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 2
Winged Staff Priestess.evoFlair_:
The minions of evil appeared before us. They closed the doors of heaven, burned the lands to ash, and dried up the seas.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 3

Sol Sister.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Pious Fox.
Sol Sister.baseFlair_: There once was a kingdom shrouded in darkness. One day a nun arrived and sent prayers into the sky. The shadows parted, and miracles rained upon the land. The nun told the rejoicing people, "If you need something from the gods, ask. They aren't as far off as you think."
Sol Sister.evoFlair_:
"But I think you seem so near! Why, you're practically hovering over me!"
"That's easy for you to say. You can see us."
—Conversation between Sol Sister and the Guardians of All

Stalwart Featherfolk.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If any allied amulets are in play, restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of allied amulets in play.
Stalwart Featherfolk.baseFlair_: You're sayin' I get yum-yums for every sanctum I find? That means if I fly up high, I'll find lotsa sanctyums—uhh, I mean sanctums!
Stalwart Featherfolk.evoFlair_:
He mastered wind magic so he could eat to his heart's content? If such powerful determination isn't faith, then what is?
—Calm Featherfolk

Prismaplume Bird.baseEffect_: Last Words: Randomly summon a Summon Pegasus or Pinion Prayer.
Prismaplume Bird.baseFlair_:
According to observers, this bird is best viewed from above—its prismatic plumage stands out against the snowfields, allowing friendly flocks to pinpoint its location.
—Guide to Rare Frontier Birds, Hues on Snowy Canvases
Prismaplume Bird.evoFlair_:
Its feathers are a gift to all who fly the skies. The fallen plumes refract light in different ways, each attracting its own genus of downy admirers.
—Guide to Rare Frontier Birds, Hues on Snowy Canvases

Holy Shield Lion.baseFlair_:
Prayers and wishes manifest into a dim shield. Though the light be faint, thou must advance though the darkness.
—Chapter 4, Path to Salvation
Holy Shield Lion.evoFlair_: The shield is only a single sign, and your path is at last beginning. Pray more, wish again and grant thy wishes to god. The path to salvation is before thee. —Chapter 5, Path to Salvation

Protectoress.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +0/+2 to an allied follower.
Protectoress.baseFlair_: Oh dear, you seem kinda down. There's no need to worry though—I'm here now!
Protectoress.evoFlair_: Hee-hee! Looks like I managed to cheer you up! High spirits are the best spirits, you know. It must be true, 'cause my master says it, too!

Luxwing Reno.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Luxwing Reno.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Luxwing Reno.baseFlair_: Nothing can get me down! I have to keep going to save the world!
Luxwing Reno.evoFlair_: So many people have helped me! So now it's my turn to help them! I'll show them that the dark's just a joke.

Holy Bowman Kel.baseEffect_: Whenever your leader's defense is restored, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Holy Bowman Kel.evoEffect_: Whenever your leader's defense is restored, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Holy Bowman Kel.baseFlair_: Grant me power, holy bow! Unsullied power to dispel the dark!
Holy Bowman Kel.evoFlair_: Ever since the day I was chosen by this holy bow, I've been ready to put my life on the line for the world!

Unicorn Knight.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Unicorn or Unicorn Spear into your hand.
Unicorn Knight.baseFlair_:
"Why is there no end to war?" the maiden asked.
To her innocent question, the holy beast replied, "Those who enter into a contract with me will gain the power to end conflict."
"Then... I'd like to become your knight."
Unicorn Knight.evoFlair_:
"Your power is limitless."
The beast shook its head, refusing the compliment. "The world," it said, "is still plagued by conflict."
"Then we have more work to do."

Disciple of Repose.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Disciple of Repose.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. There is no salvation for the world, but there is relief in the minds of the sleepers. If you too would believe, then close your eyes.
Disciple of Repose.evoFlair_:
The Second Doctrine: Immerse Yourself Within
Seeking salvation from without is the origin of fault. Find the repose hidden inside and cherish it.
—Teachings of the Sleepers

Colette, Holy Gunner.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Put a Monastic Holy Water into your hand.
-Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Colette, Holy Gunner.baseFlair_: Oh, god dang it! The apostles of the holy court won't stand for you dark dwellers runnin' amok! If y'all don't settle down, I'll have to shoot you with my holy water bullets—and I'm outta practice, so don't make me do it!
Colette, Holy Gunner.evoFlair_: No, Mr. Zombie, stop it! People ain't for eatin'! Can you believe zombies go around doin' such bad stuff when they're such cute little varmints? What? Yer sayin' zombies ain't cute? The heck?!

Marcotte, Heretical Sister.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Neutral follower from your deck into your hand.
Marcotte, Heretical Sister.baseFlair_: Welcome to the temple of tales most tall! Any structure designed to celebrate gods is really just venerating fairy tales. Anyway, hurry and come on in, and I'll give you my expert tour of the complex!
Marcotte, Heretical Sister.evoFlair_: You know that true fairy tales are born from deep-seated hopelessness, right? Take this temple: even though it's a house of god, there are no gods here. But that's all right. I'll summon a new ruler from the depths of Cocytus to reign over this cruel land.

Robofalcon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied Machina follower +1/+1 and Rush.
Robofalcon.baseFlair_: Salvation arrived in a form not unlike a machine. There it was, flying above the congregation, a falcon made of steel. It was battle ready and gave the people hope that they could fight back against the demons. —Church Records, Part 2
Robofalcon.evoFlair_: Some strange robots appeared and left behind this mechanical falcon. Could it be one of God's messengers, sent to guide and warn us? In any case, everyone at the church can now worship in peace knowing a guardian on high flies above. —Layperson's Account, Part 2

Robowing Precant.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
When you play another Machina card, gain Bane.
Robowing Precant.evoEffect_: When you play another Machina card, gain Bane.
Robowing Precant.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. Robofalcon attempts to save others on its own; she, meanwhile, hopes to evoke ever more salvation from God. ―Notes from a Priory, Vol. 2
Robowing Precant.evoFlair_: Salvation from the sky is nice enough, but a precant like me can save everyone from the ground! H-how do you use this thingamajig anyhow? ―Robowing Precant to Robofalcon

Featherfolk Punisher.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied amulet comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree comes into play, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Featherfolk Punisher.baseFlair_:
If injustice ever crosses your path, take a moment to act. Remember the gifts you have been given. The resolution you hold in your heart is what will allow you to carry out your mission.
—Book of Eulogies on Nature
Featherfolk Punisher.evoFlair_: When our souls burn bright with justice, power surges within us. It serves as a reminder of the role bestowed upon us by the heavens above. Let us carry out our duty and make our presence known far and wide!

Naoise, Red Branch Knight.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Until the start of your next turn, your leader can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Naoise, Red Branch Knight.baseFlair_: Terrifying storms will soon assail this kingdom. We knights of the Red Branch shall oppose them, standing tall forever more.
Naoise, Red Branch Knight.evoFlair_: Let us pray for our kingdom's future: May the king be just. May his subjects be industrious. And may we Knights of the Red Branch remain ever diligent.

Andromeda.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give all other allied followers the following effect until the end of the turn - Reduce damage to 0.
Andromeda.baseFlair_: A god was jealous of her beauty and sought to hide it. The cloud of death shrouded her, stealing away her light. —A Beautiful Star Shining, Chapter 3
Andromeda.evoFlair_: Despite being enveloped in the cloud of death, she never gives up hope. Her saintly heart turns to light, chasing away the cloud of death. Then her rays spread across the land. —A Beautiful Star Shining, final chapter

Jeweled Priestess.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a White Diamond or Black Diamond into your hand.
Jeweled Priestess.baseFlair_: What's your favorite piece of jewelry? I've got everything from the cute stuff to the sexy stuff. Pick one, any one but only one!
Jeweled Priestess.evoFlair_: Sometimes it seems delicate, and sometimes it seems radiant. Jewelry makes people so lovely! Go on now, and take your pick!

Holy Priest Lorena.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Lorena's Holy Water or Lorena's Iron Fist into your hand.
Holy Priest Lorena.baseFlair_: God has blessed me with another day of bliss. So I pray on the daily, and I train on the daily! So let's get another day of punchy prayers and prayerful punches started!
Holy Priest Lorena.evoFlair_: God is kind. However, a perfect world cannot exist with only kindness. If you're hurt, God will tend to you. If you do bad things, you've got another thing coming!

Laelia, Saint of Peace.baseEffect_: At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy all followers.
Laelia, Saint of Peace.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy all followers.
Laelia, Saint of Peace.baseFlair_: This body is a pair of heavenly scales, the cornerstone of peace. You can leave your judgments to me. Put your flesh and mind on the balance of righteousness.
Laelia, Saint of Peace.evoFlair_: Imbalance is the source of errors—a strong flesh and weak mind or the opposite are naturally the same. Learn your own weakness, disturber of the scales.

Sweetwing Seraph.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied amulet and put a copy of it into your hand. If it's a Naterran Great Tree, change its cost to 0.
Sweetwing Seraph.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 1 from the cost of an amulet in your hand.
Sweetwing Seraph.baseFlair_:
Spread kindness. Alight among the suffering. Remind the people of largesse. And, above all, keep always a tender heart, for that will draw in followers on your sacred quest.
—On the Glory of Nature
Sweetwing Seraph.evoFlair_:
The road to hell is paved with sloth and machinery. But now, my enlightened, it is time to rise. Become guides. Point the lost in the right direction. Light will banish darkness, and virtue will never fade from this world.
—Illustrious Calling, Part 3

Robowhip Reverend.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever a spell or effect restores defense to an ally, give +0/+1 to all allied non-Machina followers and +1/+1 to all other allied Machina followers.
Robowhip Reverend.baseFlair_: With the advent of machinery, our creed has been given new life. Ye faithful, give in to impulse; affirm your convictions by cracking the steel whip. Deny yourself nothing, and deny nothing of yourself—that is how prayers gain power. —Annals of the Grand Church
Robowhip Reverend.evoFlair_:
There are some that would call our dependence on the conveniences of technology "depravity." But if this is depravity, so be it, for it is a necessary evil. Darkness will banish light, and vice will never fade from this world.
—The Cult of Salvation

Princess Snow White.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Princess Snow White and evolve it. Then remove all effects on this follower.
Princess Snow White.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an unevolved Princess Snow White and evolve it. Then remove all effects on this follower.
Princess Snow White.baseFlair_: Some resent the beauty of this snow crystal. One such mean and lowly soul put the girl to sleep. Only the kiss of a prince could open her eyelids. —Snow White, Chapter 5
Princess Snow White.evoFlair_: Your skin is as fair as the pure, driven snow. But your breath is as chilly as the crystals. My delicate princess, may this kiss open your eyes again! —Snow White, Chapter 7

Holy Cavalier.baseFlair_: After his own miraculous resurrection, his lost troops rose up around him. It was in that moment the tide of the battle changed, when naught but the dying screams of fiends echoed across the blood-spattered fields. —Chapter 15, Notes from the Battlefield
Holy Cavalier.evoFlair_: Although their new form was fleeting, their conviction was not. They were brave guardians through and through, sworn to protect the righteous, even in death. —Chapter 16, Notes from the Battlefield

Hallowed Dogma.baseEffect_:
Subtract 2 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
Draw a card.
Hallowed Dogma.baseFlair_: Hear his grand teachings, and cleanse yourself of doubts. Surely your path of prayer will open.

Blackened Scripture.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
Blackened Scripture.baseFlair_: Just open the book, and out come the demons of disease.

Monastic Holy Water.baseEffect_:
Restore 2 defense to an ally.
Draw a card.

Holy Lion Crystal.baseEffect_:
Summon a Holy Shield Lion.
If you've played 3 to 5 other Holy Lion Crystals this match, summon a Holy Plate Lion instead. If you've played at least 6 other Holy Lion Crystals, Summon a Holy King Lion instead.
Enhance (5): Put a Holy Lion Crystal into your hand.
Holy Lion Crystal.baseFlair_: A tiny fragment of thought can in the end become a great salvation. Pray, dear human. Make your entreaty. —Chapter 1, Path to Salvation

Holy Counterattack.baseEffect_:
Select an allied follower and an enemy follower. If the allied follower has Ward, give it +1/+1. Then, deal X damage to the enemy follower. X equals the attack of the allied follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
Holy Counterattack.baseFlair_:
This world was abandoned by God and lost all hope. So if God won't save everyone... then I'll have to do it!
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 1

Blind Justice.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower.
Restore 5 defense to the enemy leader.
Blind Justice.baseFlair_: We do not judge the guilty. The guilty are those we judge.

Love's Gospel.baseFlair_: A supreme love illuminated the battlefield, and wounds all over began to heal.

Lorena's Iron Fist.baseEffect_: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the strongest allied follower in play.
Lorena's Iron Fist.baseFlair_: Lost lamb, I will be the one to save you! —Holy Priest Lorena

Beastly Vow.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: Summon a Holyflame Tiger.
Beastly Vow.baseFlair_: The sacred beast will grant its power only to those who devote the whole of their body and soul to the divine.

Heretical Inquiry.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
Heretical Inquiry.baseFlair_: I'll know if you were a heretic once I kill you.

Godsteel Wings.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
Whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon an Adamantium Bird.
Godsteel Wings.baseFlair_: Each feather that falls from the great bird pierces the earth.

Temple of the Inquisition.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Draw 3 cards.
Temple of the Inquisition.baseFlair_: When the cable was released, Salvation plunged down on the Chosen One, and his Immorality was cut clean off. —Excerpted from Den of Virtue, expurgated edition

Red-Hot Boots.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Red-Hot Boots.baseFlair_: Colored red by God's Love, these iron boots scorch off the sinner's Sins and a leave a profound Forgiveness. —Excerpted from Den of Virtue, expurgated edition

Gemstone Carapace.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Bejeweled Tortoise.
Gemstone Carapace.baseFlair_: It looks so fragile, as if it may crumble from the gentlest touch—but know that this is but a fragment of something much greater. —Teachings of the Bejeweled Oracle

Moriae Encomium.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
Moriae Encomium.baseFlair_: Let just men pray to just gods. We will pray to ours.

Realm of Repose.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, if no allied followers in play have attacked this turn, your leader can't take more than 3 damage at a time and all allied Havencraft followers can't be attacked. These effects last until the start of your next turn.
Realm of Repose.baseFlair_: Confront the mind in the depths of repose.

Pinion Lake.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: If you have more cards in hand than your opponent, subtract 1 from the Countdown of this amulet.
Last Words: Summon an Adamantium Bird.
Pinion Lake.baseFlair_: A bird in flight doesn't leave a trace. A messenger of the gods doesn't give a warning or leave a trace.

Sacred Teachings.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon a Holy Falcon.
Sacred Teachings.baseFlair_: Take in the light. Liberate your body and rise to the heavens.

Forbidden Teachings.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Draw 2 cards. Give your leader the following effect - Followers can't be played. This effect lasts until the start of your opponent's turn.
Forbidden Teachings.baseFlair_: Let the darkness consume you. Rid your body of freedom and return to the heavens.

Guardian Sun.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied follower with at least 4 defense comes into play, give it Ward.
Guardian Sun.baseFlair_: May the light of heaven protect thee.

Noble Fangs.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
Last Words: Summon a Barong.
Noble Fangs.baseFlair_: The holy lion gives fangs to the fangless.

Beastcall Aria.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Last Words: Summon a Holy Falcon and a Holyflame Tiger.
Beastcall Aria.baseFlair_: The call of the proud beast princess awakens magnificent talons and fangs.

Godscale's Banquet.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Subtract 3 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon 2 White Snakes.
Godscale's Banquet.baseFlair_: O lustrous divine scales, imbued in faith. —Teachings of the Serpent Oracle

Temple of the Holy Lion.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Holy Lion Crystal into your hand.
Whenever a Holy Lion Crystal is played, recover 1 play point.
Temple of the Holy Lion.baseFlair_: Do not fear fear. Do not dread dread. Salvation begins with a revelation. —Chapter 3, Path to Salvation

Pilgrims' Path.baseEffect_:
Countdown (10)
Fanfare: If this is your fifth turn or later, put a Hallowed Dogma into your hand. If this is your tenth turn or later, put 2 into your hand instead.
Whenever this card's Countdown is reduced by an allied spell or effect, summon a Holy Falcon.
Pilgrims' Path.baseFlair_: A pilgrimage of a thousand leagues, blessed by two thousand wings.

Holy Sentinel.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
Fanfare: Subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown for each enemy follower and amulet in play.
Last Words: Summon a Guardian Fox.
Holy Sentinel.baseFlair_: Those who would set foot in our sanctuary must face the test of our guardian beast.

Devourer of Heavens.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
Last Words: Summon a Holywing Dragon. Then deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Devourer of Heavens.baseFlair_: His howl bears not a trace of compassion.

Alice's Adventure.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Neutral follower comes into play, subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Alice's Adventure.baseFlair_: I've never seen a hare in a waistcoat before! How very amusing! —Alice, Wonderland Explorer

Somnolent Strength.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, give +0/+2 to a random allied follower.
Last Words: Give -2/-0 to a random enemy follower.

Sister Initiate.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
Sister Initiate.baseFlair_: Calm thy fears, O lost ones. Take my hand, and kneel. Confess thy sins to Him, for He is ready to hear thee, if thou wouldst only speak.
Sister Initiate.evoFlair_: To live is to suffer, yet punish thyself thou shouldst not. Embrace humility and repent. Only then will Heaven welcome thee with open arms.

Dark Priest.baseEffect_: Gain Bane during the opponent's turn.
Dark Priest.evoEffect_: Gain Bane during the opponent's turn.
Dark Priest.baseFlair_: People are weak and need something to believe in. What could be the problem in believing in an evil god?
Dark Priest.evoFlair_: Some claim that there is only one path toward salvation, but that is nothing but hubris. There are many types of people and many paths to follow. You agree with this, do you not?

Sky Sprite.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower Rush.
Sky Sprite.baseFlair_: A wind sprite who lives above the clouds. She pushes the pure of heart onward with gentle winds.
Sky Sprite.evoFlair_: A wind sprite who resides above the lofty clouds. She blasts the wicked with brutal winds.

Master Sage.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Master Sage.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Master Sage.baseFlair_: Open a book and the whole of knowledge will present itself. But as one peruses the constituent words, the sun rises and sets, and time slips away...
Master Sage.evoFlair_: Never will I leave this study. These books are my chains, and this study my prison. I'm trapped in a prison of knowledge, which makes me a pitiable prisoner indeed.

White Tiger.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
White Tiger.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
White Tiger.baseFlair_: From a land far to the west comes one of the four holy beasts. On mountaintops it listens carefully; when it comes down to the land, it sniffs out disaster.
White Tiger.evoFlair_: From a land far to the west comes one of the four holy beasts. It stops enemies from entering the sacred ground and promises eternal prosperity.

Sister of Punishment.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower whose attack or defense has been raised.
Sister of Punishment.baseFlair_: You're a heretic. How naughty—heresy is intolerable. You will convert. Or you will keel.
Sister of Punishment.evoFlair_: O, you of little faith. How naughty, how naughty. You will pray. Or you will perish.

Bashful Al-mi'raj.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +2/+0. Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to this follower.
Bashful Al-mi'raj.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to this follower.
Bashful Al-mi'raj.baseFlair_: This form is just the worst... I need to take in the moon's light, but my ears just grow longer every time! Honestly, it's so embarrassing I could die!
Bashful Al-mi'raj.evoFlair_: Long ears are the picture of good health. At least, that's what my family says. They're so fluffy and embarrassing, though... N-no one's looking, right?

Servant of Repose.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3 and Ward.
At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, restore 1 defense to all allies.
Servant of Repose.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, restore 1 defense to all allies.
Servant of Repose.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. To sleep in peace during calm hours is both a blessing and a comfort.
Servant of Repose.evoFlair_:
The First Doctrine: Spread Peaceful Slumber
Do not contribute to the spite and agony which govern the world. Sleep is your escape. Dreams are your peace.
—Teachings of the Sleepers

Ironknuckle Nun.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
Ironknuckle Nun.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was the prayers of a young acolyte. Though she followed the correct precepts, it was the machine that answered her call and blessed her with fists of iron. —Church Records, Part 1
Ironknuckle Nun.evoFlair_: That nun, she's become our savior. She uses those arms of hers to help as many people as she can. I hear she even prays for their continued safety after her deeds are done. —Layperson's Account, Part 1

Saintly Griffon.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random amulet that costs 1 play point or less from your deck into play.
Enhance (7): Gain +4/+4 and Ward.
Saintly Griffon.baseFlair_: Not only humans offer up their devotion to God. All who live have their own forms of prayer. Take, for instance, the saintly griffon, whose shrieks ring out in adoration.
Saintly Griffon.evoFlair_: Prayer blends into our daily lives like balm sinking into the skin. In the same fashion, the animals' way of life is in itself an expression of devotion. The saintly griffon's shriek is its way of conveying both prayer and blessing.

Fortune Fowl.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Beastcall Aria.
Enhance (6): Subtract 3 from its Countdown.
Fortune Fowl.baseFlair_: This holy fowl loves to strut down garden walkways. It's beloved by the townspeople, who have adopted it as a mascot. If you ever run across one, wait for it to cock its head—simply adorable.
Fortune Fowl.evoFlair_:
So you are having existential doubts? Then I urge you, take to the air. Find yourself. That is what our wings are for.
—Garuda, Wings of Paradise

Holy Falcon.baseFlair_: A white bird descends from heaven to answer the prayers of the pious. Its glow lights the darkness; its beak pecks away at the forces of evil.
Holy Falcon.evoFlair_: A white bird descends from heaven to answer the prayers of the pure-hearted. Its screech rings out through the darkness, scattering the forces of evil.

White Snake.baseFlair_: When the scales imbued in faith are bountiful from prayer, a divine serpent will be awakened to consume the venom of animosity.
White Snake.evoFlair_: The luster of its scales glows a ghastly white—those caught before its fiery red gaze will be exorcised from within.

Time Owl.baseFlair_: When the final grain of sand has fallen, the cerulean keeper will be awakened, wings aflutter like the winds of time.
Time Owl.evoFlair_: The flapping of its cerulean wings reveal the flow of time—its flutters exorcising beyond time and space.

Meowskers, Ruff-Tuff Major.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Meowskers, Ruff-Tuff Major.baseFlair_:
"We have to take care of that root-brute Vile Mother!"
Forever loyal, forever determined.
"Lord Valdain's plan depends on it!"
He faithfully carries out his orders, confidence guiding his path.
Meowskers, Ruff-Tuff Major.evoFlair_:
"I'm a major, you hear! Nothing scares me!"
His chest puffs out in a display of bravado.
"I'll make Lord Valdain hop-poppin' proud if it's the last thing I do!"
The major rushes off, keen to attend to his duties.

Temple Defender.baseEffect_:
Ward.
During the opponent's turn, subtract 1 from damage taken by this follower.
Temple Defender.evoEffect_:
Ward.
During the opponent's turn, subtract 1 from damage taken by this follower.
Temple Defender.baseFlair_: Prayer! That is what protects me! My pleading is turned into a light which envelops my body!
Temple Defender.evoFlair_: My prayers form a shield that protects my master. There is nothing the forces of evil can do to penetrate it!

Prism Priestess.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Countdown amulet from your deck into your hand.
Prism Priestess.baseFlair_: Wow! Those monsters attacked a church? They must be really bad! Come here, monsters! Let me give you a spanking!
Prism Priestess.evoFlair_: I prayed and prayed and got this club! It changes into whatever shape I'm thinking of! Just goes to show I've got justice on my side. Come here, monsters! Let me give you a pummeling!

Radiant Shaman.evoEffect_: Evolve: Restore 4 defense to an ally.
Radiant Shaman.baseFlair_: Anyone can connect to the spirits which sleep within the earth. They must only close their eyes and use their hearts to see. Come on and try it!
Radiant Shaman.evoFlair_: The mighty spirits provide both protection and affection. That is why we shamans offer them our gratitude each and every day.

Holy Mage.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Whenever an allied amulet comes into play, gain +1/+1.
Holy Mage.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Whenever an allied amulet comes into play, gain +1/+1.
Holy Mage.baseFlair_: Prayer is the source of my strength and courage.
Holy Mage.evoFlair_: I have grown strong as a result of people's prayers. Now the time has come for me to repay this debt.

Sledgehammer Exorcist.baseFlair_: You're on sacred ground! And it's certainly no place for the likes of you! My hammer of purity will crush you right down to your soul!
Sledgehammer Exorcist.evoFlair_: Looks like I've overdone it! I can't believe I destroyed the ceiling! It's all your fault for being so weak!

Damus, Oracle of Iniquity.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, destroy that follower at the end of the opponent's turn.
Damus, Oracle of Iniquity.evoEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, destroy that follower at the end of the opponent's turn.
Damus, Oracle of Iniquity.baseFlair_: Ooh! You obviously have fortune on your side! (Not really. I can tell your time's just about up!)
Damus, Oracle of Iniquity.evoFlair_: Ooh! You're incredibly lucky! (You're unlucky to run into the likes of me!)

Aegina.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Subtract 3 from damage your leader takes. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
Aegina.baseFlair_: You who have crossed high waves, withstood terrible storms, and made it to my island, this place is cherished by God. Nothing can threaten you here.
Aegina.evoFlair_: You who have crossed tribulation, withstood terrible suffering, and made it to my island, this place is your sanctuary. You too are bathed in the love of the gods.

Peaceweaver.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Holy Lion Crystal into your hand.
Peaceweaver.baseFlair_: Prayer gives form to the gods' streaming light. Allow me to hand you one fragment of salvation.
Peaceweaver.evoFlair_: This fragment underlies the coming peace. May placidness soon be yours.

Sophia, Pious Pilgrim.evoEffect_: Evolve: Randomly summon a copy of an allied follower that has been destroyed during this turn.
Sophia, Pious Pilgrim.baseFlair_: Um, excuse me. Where is this place? I wandered off of the main road because I saw some people in need, but then I dropped my map of sacred places. Ahh... What am I going to do?
Sophia, Pious Pilgrim.evoFlair_: You'll show me the way? That's so nice of you! To thank you for your kindness, would you like to hear about our ward and provider, Zeyen?

Radiant Meus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied Natura amulets are in play, gain +1/+1. Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Radiant Meus.baseFlair_:
Do not fear. Step forth into the world. Shine light on that which is indispensable. Listen well to cries for help, for they will spur you on your sacred quest.
—On the Glory of Nature
Radiant Meus.evoFlair_:
