Many people want immediate results. So they give up on prayer and turn to machines. But when they do, they forget something important: prayers are neither a thing nor a motion. Prayers are thoughts and beliefs.
—Illustrious Calling, Part 2

Four-Pillar Tortoise.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly put a 4-play point Havencraft follower or amulet from your deck into your hand.
Four-Pillar Tortoise.baseFlair_: The Four of Wands is a pillar of respite. Its four great legs advance steadily, marking the places it has trod, while the sanctuary on its back shines with a holy light, a silent beacon of peace.
Four-Pillar Tortoise.evoFlair_: The auspicious tortoise crosses the blessed lands. Its pace is plodding. Its stride is limited. But each step is measured. The tracks it leaves are themselves blessed markers of pilgrimage. A chorus of joyous voices follows it wheresoever it goes.

Zoe, Queen of Goldenia.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to a random allied follower. If no other allied followers are in play, deal 2 damage to your leader instead.
Zoe, Queen of Goldenia.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to a random allied follower. If no other allied followers are in play, deal 2 damage to your leader instead.
Zoe, Queen of Goldenia.baseFlair_: I'm the queen of bad luck, so stay away from me. You'll end up as unlucky as me if you get too close.
Zoe, Queen of Goldenia.evoFlair_: There's always some sort of disaster happening to me. My city was turned to gold, but I'll never give up—never.

Marlone, Light of Balance.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Mark of Balance into both players' hands.
Marlone, Light of Balance.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Mark of Balance into both players' hands.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
Marlone, Light of Balance.baseFlair_: To abide is to sin, and this world is full of sinners. What is wrong with that? Sin is sin, and that's all. You need only to pay penance. To atone.
Marlone, Light of Balance.evoFlair_: We control the balance, even if that's a bit of an outlandish thing to suggest. It's about preservation, at least until it all comes to an end. And I suspect that's where things are heading. But who's to say? This world can be kind to its people.

Sekhmet.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other followers.
At the end of your opponent's turn, give +0/+1 to all other followers.
Sekhmet.evoEffect_:
At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all other followers.
At the end of your opponent's turn, give +0/+2 to all other followers.
Sekhmet.baseFlair_:
She is a goddess of malice, who holds dominion over plagues. The helmet she wears, a crown fashioned from the corpse of a noble beast, is proof of her cruelty.
"No, wait! I bought this hat from a regular merchant! I just thought it looked nice..."
Sekhmet.evoFlair_:
She is a goddess of malice, who holds dominion over plagues. It is said she can summon storms with a mere flick of her fan, laying waste to whatever displeases her.
"I can't help it... Sometimes it gets muggy, and you just need to fan yourself, right?"

Saintly Leader.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of allied followers with Ward that have been destroyed this match.
Enhance (5): Deal X damage to an enemy follower.
Saintly Leader.baseFlair_:
With the false god slain, we conducted reconnaissance. The dire circumstances of the world remained unchanged. The forces of evil were still abroad, and increasing in number.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 8
Saintly Leader.evoFlair_:
My name is Wilbert, Captain of the Eclair Holy Knights. My conclusion is as follows: This world was doomed the moment God abandoned it.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 9

Yukari, Holy Guardian.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Union Burst (10): Until the end of your opponent's turn, give all allies the following effect - Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
Yukari, Holy Guardian.baseFlair_: If you're ever in trouble, you can count on me. I'll have you know, I take my work seriously—and I'm good at what I do!
Yukari, Holy Guardian.evoFlair_: I think I deserve a pint for all my hard work... Meep! No, Yukari, no! You can't ruin your hardworking image that way!

Lorena, Iron-Willed Priest.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Lorena's Holy Water into your hand.
During your turn, when defense is restored to your leader, if it's the second time this turn, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Lorena, Iron-Willed Priest.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the allied follower with the highest attack in play.
Lorena, Iron-Willed Priest.baseFlair_: God mourns whenever one of his lambs is wounded. But there's no need to worry—we just have to fortify our bodies and souls! Okay, everyone! Into position! We'll start with one hundred prayers and one hundred crunches!
Lorena, Iron-Willed Priest.evoFlair_: God watches over our efforts—all the more reason to continue our good work! Now then, everyone! Pick up your scripture! We're going to do some heavy lifting today!

Jeanne, Beacon of Salvation.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. Restore 3 defense to all other allied followers.
Jeanne, Beacon of Salvation.baseFlair_: For the wretched, confined in despair and desolation—I have heard the gods' decree! I shall guide you to glory, and together we shall obliterate the dark!
Jeanne, Beacon of Salvation.evoFlair_: Swear on the gods' banner, and let despair consume you no longer! A new promised land awaits us—embrace the light of tomorrow!

Zoe, Queen of Hope.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect restores defense to an ally, draw a card.
Zoe, Queen of Hope.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Restore 2 defense to all allies.
Whenever an effect restores defense to an ally, draw a card.
Zoe, Queen of Hope.baseFlair_: No matter the struggles you face, I promise that I'll bring you that much happiness in turn. Even though I'm a bit of a disaster-prone ruler, I'll face everything head-on and march toward a brighter future! Now, watch as I take my first step... Huh? Where'd this hole—
Zoe, Queen of Hope.evoFlair_: Be it storms or monsters... or mysterious holes that pop out of nowhere, we'll overcome all obstacles and bring about a happy future! I'll never stop my efforts to return our city to its former glory! Even if... Even if meteors rain down upon us! Huh? Look up? Why?

Sarissa, Luxflash Spear.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Enhance (6): Randomly summon a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied followers that had Ward when they were destroyed this match.
Whenever an allied follower with Ward is destroyed, gain +2/+2.
Sarissa, Luxflash Spear.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied follower with Ward is destroyed, gain +2/+2.
Sarissa, Luxflash Spear.baseFlair_: Allies are like baggage—they'll only slow you down. That's what I used to think, and to tell the truth, I probably have gotten soft. Somehow, though, I feel invincible. We're all going to come out of this alive! So fly true, my spear!
Sarissa, Luxflash Spear.evoFlair_: I don't need anyone else. I can fight and win my own battles. Losing's the worst. That's what the old me would have said. But now I know there's something a lot worse, and that's losing my comrades!

Power of Protection.baseEffect_: Give +1/+2 and Ward to an allied follower.
Power of Protection.baseFlair_: Those who carry out the Divine Will shall be graced with divine protection.

Healing Prayer.baseEffect_:
Restore 3 defense to an ally.
Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Healing Prayer.baseFlair_: Blessed are thy deeds, O ye of faith.

Star Torrent.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Star Torrent.baseFlair_: Desirable enough to drive one to prayer; terrifying enough to drive one to prayer. Is the rain that flows from this upturned ewer a blessing or a calamity? —Ewer Above the Sky, Chapter 3

Prism Swing.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Holy Lion Crystal into your hand.

Feather Rush.baseEffect_: Give Storm to an allied follower.

Unicorn Spear.baseEffect_: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower. Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Unicorn Spear.baseFlair_:
"If you take up arms, then we will stand against you."
—Unicorn Knight

Major Prayers.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as an Eris's Prayer or Meowskers's Raid.
If at least 2 allied amulets are in play, instead draw 2 cards and summon a Meowskers, Ruff-Tuff Major.
Major Prayers.baseFlair_: The truth slumbers, lost in the din of war. If only someone would rouse it, then surely the world would be saved. "Please, reconcile your differences. If we are to have any hope of victory, you must join forces!"

Featherwyrm's Descent.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Last Words: Summon a Holywing Dragon.
Featherwyrm's Descent.baseFlair_: It's an honor to be chosen as an offering—if only to come in contact with such a sublime being.

Divine Birdsong.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: Summon a Regal Falcon.
Divine Birdsong.baseFlair_: Following the echoes of the flute, the gleaming bird goddess alights.

Candelabra of Prayers.baseEffect_: Whenever you play an amulet, subtract 1 from its Countdown.

Forbidden Ritual.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Banish all enemy followers with 2 defense or less.
Forbidden Ritual.baseFlair_: The dark gods demand death, so let us give it to them.

Pegasus Sculpture.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to all allies.
Pegasus Sculpture.baseFlair_: Sculptures like mine are downright divine. —Crystal artisan

Saintly Core.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, randomly banish an enemy follower with the highest attack in play, then banish this amulet.
Saintly Core.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated belief. Those who seek salvation find themselves drawn to its luster.

Feather Sanctuary.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: Summon a Regal Falcon. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Feather Sanctuary.baseFlair_: Respect those without a voice. Expand your daily prayers. The faith nurtured by those lands will summon allies to your cause. —Book of Eulogies on Nature

Elana's Prayer.baseEffect_: Whenever your leader's defense is restored, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Elana's Prayer.baseFlair_: I'll give everyone the s-strength to carry on!

Whitefang Temple.baseEffect_:
Countdown (8)
At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Whenever an effect restores defense to an ally, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Holywing Dragon.
Whitefang Temple.baseFlair_: The silent temple solemnly bares its fangs.

City of Gold.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 4 play points and an allied City of Gold is not in play, invoke this card.
Whenever you play an amulet, subtract 1 from that amulet's Countdown.
City of Gold.baseFlair_: The legendary golden city where everything is fashioned from that brilliant metal—not merely ornaments, but buildings, pavement... even the citizens themselves.

Hallowed Cave Shrine.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the start of your turn, summon a Holy Cavalier.
Fanfare: Summon a Holy Cavalier. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, recover 1 play point. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Hallowed Cave Shrine.baseFlair_: Brilliant white rays beam in from the ends of the heavens, giving joy to the livestock in the cave.

Guardian Nun.baseFlair_: The depravity! How dare they enter church grounds! Hell spawn, prepare to receive the full force of His divine blessing!
Guardian Nun.evoFlair_: I lost everything to war, but the church rescued me from destitution. It stands as a beacon of hope for all mankind, and that is why I must not let one demon hoof sully its steps!

Canoness.baseFlair_: With heavenly miracles on one's side, there is nothing that cannot be overcome!
Canoness.evoFlair_: Those who believe in heavenly miracles shall be spared. Those who pray with all their hearts shall surely drive back the darkness!

Holy Fox Grimaud.baseEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Holy Fox Grimaud.evoEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Holy Fox Grimaud.baseFlair_: A shining fox that banishes the darkness. Each strand of its fur is infused with holy power.
Holy Fox Grimaud.evoFlair_: A radiant fox that illuminates the darkest nights. Beneath its beautiful fur lies bestial ferocity.

Veteran Tamer.baseFlair_: I have a bit of a unique talent. All I have to do is stand around, and animals come right up to me. Pretty cool, right?
Veteran Tamer.evoFlair_: Don't you think it's wonderful to be loved by animals? I mean, all my animal friends are so adorable!

Pure Healer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to an ally.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Restore 2 defense to all allies instead.
Pure Healer.baseFlair_: I will heal your wounds. And if that's not enough, I will save your very being. Let me care for your body with magic.
Pure Healer.evoFlair_: Healing and salvation are yours as long as I'm at your side. There's nothing to fear, so let me care for your heart.

Octobishop.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to this follower.
Octobishop.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to this follower.
Octobishop.baseFlair_: Guess how many arms I have!
Octobishop.evoFlair_: I have two arms! These things on my face are actually a beard!

Birdkeeping Disciple.baseFlair_: I'm still not much of a bird person. Birds move so fast and always try to fly away. I'll do my job, but, well, you know.
Birdkeeping Disciple.evoFlair_: Eeek, it's flying this way! Or at least I thought it was. Maybe it saw my wings and thought I was another bird. I wish they'd just stay nice and calm.

Starchaser Sprite.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied amulets in play.
Starchaser Sprite.baseFlair_: For every prayer, the stars twinkle. I offer my own prayers so that the night sky will twinkle more.
Starchaser Sprite.evoFlair_: For every wish, the stars shine. I weave my own wishes so that the world will shine more.

Oathplume Warrior.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
Oathplume Warrior.baseFlair_: Sworn to these mighty wings, I shall never fall or falter! Blessed be the winged ones I dedicate my life to.
Oathplume Warrior.evoFlair_: My mighty wings shall take to the earth. The wretched, wingless mortals shall find no refuge in this heavenly paradise.

Zealot of Repose.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, destroy all enemy followers with 2 defense or less.
Zealot of Repose.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. Yet the world remains replete with the unlearned who reject holy repose. Very well... They shall lie with the others one way or another.
Zealot of Repose.evoFlair_: Under the shadow of doctrine, sink into the deepest of slumbers. Where repose is supreme, branded are the deranged who reject it. And it is the deranged who shall be disposed of, for sempiternity.

Graywing Featherfolk.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (3)
Fanfare: If you have more cards in hand than your opponent, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Graywing Featherfolk.
----------
Storm.
Graywing Featherfolk.baseFlair_:
Guide the lost. Spread your wings. Let your pride soar high upon the wind. Look often on the banner you carry, for it will direct you on your sacred quest.
—On the Glory of Nature
Graywing Featherfolk.evoFlair_:
People are inherently good. By nature, we are virtuous. Corruption is wrought by the hands of others. Actors have arrived, seeking to warp our innate characters. If you wish for peace, pray to be returned unto your natural state.
—Illustrious Calling, Part 1

Priestess of Foresight.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower with Ward is in play, destroy an enemy follower. Otherwise, gain Ward.
Priestess of Foresight.baseFlair_: She is the High Priestess, font of wisdom. Though the world of man is ever-changing, she remains constant. Taking the measure of each circumstance, her decisions are wrought with careful deliberation.
Priestess of Foresight.evoFlair_: As a servant of the gods, she is called on to impart their wisdom unto mankind. The edicts are observed; the lost are guided onto the path of faith. And thus, holy salvation is delivered, efficiently and righteously.

Holyflame Tiger.baseFlair_: A fiery tiger guided by a holy light. Its incandescent flames consume their victims, leaving not a scrap of flesh on the bone.
Holyflame Tiger.evoFlair_: A tiger ablaze with pure, incandescent flames that illuminate and purify even the deepest darkness. It is said that the tiger's flames burn to guide the departed to heaven.

Dream Rabbit.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Hare of Illusions.
Dream Rabbit.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Hare of Illusions.
Dream Rabbit.baseFlair_: I am a phantom, an illusion. I shall come to your aid no matter how many times you call.
Dream Rabbit.evoFlair_: I am a phantom, an illusion. I can become more than that if you so wish, however.

Bejeweled Tortoise.baseFlair_: When the bejeweled stone gleams in seven hues, an ancient guardian will be awakened to wreak havoc upon the wicked.
Bejeweled Tortoise.evoFlair_: The bejeweled stone leads the way to purity—allies of darkness and the wicked placed before the stone will be exorcised from within.

Priest of the Cudgel.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
Priest of the Cudgel.baseFlair_: Your evil deeds end here. You have defied God himself and there is no place to hide! I see your true form!
Priest of the Cudgel.evoFlair_: There it is! I see your weakness! My mace shall pummel it into a pulp!

Cruel Priestess.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 2 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
Cruel Priestess.baseFlair_: Welcome to the Devil's flock. Now it's time to prove your loyalty and offer your eternal soul to the master!
Cruel Priestess.evoFlair_: Heh-heh, I acknowledge your prayers of desperation. Now do as the Devil asks of you, and unleash the greed within your hearts. Soak this world in blood!

Golden Eagle.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied follower with Ward is in play, gain Storm.
Golden Eagle.baseFlair_:
We slew the villain controlling the earth and took back our bountiful lands. I only wish our scattered countrymen had been there to see it.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 6
Golden Eagle.evoFlair_: We managed to slay the villain controlling the heavens. We took back the skies. Some "heroes of hope." So many of us died. So many sacrifices. —Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 7

Holylight Convert.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Summon a Holylight Convert.
At the start of your opponent's turn, gain +2/+0 for each allied follower with Ward in play.
Holylight Convert.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the start of your opponent's turn, gain +2/+0 for each allied follower with Ward in play.
Holylight Convert.baseFlair_: Which is stronger, a prayer or a sword? Pray when someone's got cold steel pressed to your throat, and you'll find the answer real quick. But, when you keep praying—every day—something happens... You embrace this thing called faith, and that can conquer any blade.
Holylight Convert.evoFlair_: With faith comes light—and mettle. You know, you remind me of myself, back when I believed only in the kind of strength you can see. But let me show you something. Faith can shatter even the tempered blade, and it is dazzling.

Holy Fowl of Ivory.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to this follower.
Holy Fowl of Ivory.baseFlair_: The white wings flutter up. Hearing a voice pray for salvation, the beast lends its power of defense.
Holy Fowl of Ivory.evoFlair_: What do they pray for; what do they wish for? Before the opposing statues, the people reveal the content of their hearts, whether pure or impure. Responding to their prayers, the sacred bird swoops upward.

Hexed Fowl of Ebon.baseFlair_: The black wings fall down. Hearing a voice of judgment, the beast lends its power to the invasion.
Hexed Fowl of Ebon.evoFlair_: What do they pray for; what do they wish for? Before the opposing statues, the people reveal the content of their hearts, whether pure or impure. Responding to their prayers, the demonic bird swoops downward.

Holy Plate Lion.baseFlair_: Surrounded by prayers and wishes, the shield transforms to armor. Verily, thy faith is strong as iron. But is it strong as adamant, and can it pierce walls? —Chapter 6, Path to Salvation
Holy Plate Lion.evoFlair_: Every sorrow shall be expelled and vanquished. The armor is but one sign of many. The way to salvation continues on, and thou must walk along it. —Chapter 7, Path to Salvation

Pegasus Dullahan.baseEffect_:
When this follower comes into play, restore 2 defense to all other allied followers.
Last Words: Give a random allied Countdown amulet Last Words: Summon a Pegasus Dullahan.
Pegasus Dullahan.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give a random allied Countdown amulet Last Words: Summon a Pegasus Dullahan.
Pegasus Dullahan.baseFlair_: To be revered and honored didn't suit him, so he threw it away—just to remain the way he was.
Pegasus Dullahan.evoFlair_: Even lauded as a hero he found himself lost, so he threw it away and found it again—a way to protect the world in the way he was.

Apostle of Repose.evoEffect_:
Bane.
At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
Apostle of Repose.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. Awaken to the blazing light of morning, and you will find only suffering. We yearn for the sleep that will continue long into the future.
Apostle of Repose.evoFlair_:
The Third Doctrine: Awaken Not
Do not teach your brethren to awaken, for unbroken sleep is in itself salvation.
—Teachings of the Sleepers

Sonia, Protector of Hope.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and the following effect: Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Sonia, Protector of Hope.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Sonia, Protector of Hope.baseFlair_: Hallways: clear. Perimeter: clear. Ummm... Underfoot: clear. As Queen Zoe's attendant, it's my job to protect her from misfortune. I'm pleased to say it's going to be another perfect day of beating back any menace that... What? You fell into a hole? I'm on my way!
Sonia, Protector of Hope.evoFlair_: Weather: perfect. Monsters: slain. Now, Your Majesty, if you'll give me your hand. I'll make sure no evil befalls you. So long as I'm by your side... A-are those meteors falling from the sky?!

Kel, Holy Marksman.baseEffect_: Whenever your leader's defense is restored, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Kel, Holy Marksman.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Whenever your leader's defense is restored, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Kel, Holy Marksman.baseFlair_:
"Kel, are you hurt?"
"Sure am! But I've blown them away with double the pain!" ―Conversation between Elana and Kel
Kel, Holy Marksman.evoFlair_:
"Something tells me why there's always a conflict."
"Don't sweat it! I'll buff up and wipe this fight out!"
"That's not what I meant, but... Oh, dear God..." ―Conversation between Elana and Kel

Heaven's Golem.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Banish an amulet.
(Can attack.)
Heaven's Golem.baseFlair_: When the ancient seal has broken, a titan will be awakened to serve as a sentinel for the virtuous, and a pursuer of the wicked.
Heaven's Golem.evoFlair_: To this day, an ancient power flows through the golem—through prayer to an ancient generation, a new era can prosper.

Marwynn, Omen of Repose.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your opponent a play point orb. Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all enemy amulets. Restore 1 defense to the enemy leader. Your opponent draws a card. Gain an empty play point orb. Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets. Restore 1 defense to your leader. Draw a card.
Marwynn, Omen of Repose.evoEffect_: This follower can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Marwynn, Omen of Repose.baseFlair_: The truest evil is the self, where fear, negligence, exploitation, and weakness take root. Confront them. Refuse to awaken; let your mind venture into the deepest slumber. For this is the trial that I now present the world.
Marwynn, Omen of Repose.evoFlair_: Only the ignorant seek that which is outside the self. Are you prepared to unravel the secrets of repose, to fade into the deepest slumber, and trample on what you may find? For this is the trial that I now present the world.

Holy Lion of Salvation.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a Holy Lion Crystal into your hand.
----------
Ward.
Holy Lion of Salvation.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Put a Holy Lion Crystal into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Holy Lion of Salvation.baseFlair_: Only the purest prayers and most earnest pleas reveal the resplendent path. At its end sits the avatar of salvation, the embodiment of heavenly appeal. —Chapter 10, Path to Salvation
Holy Lion of Salvation.evoFlair_: Salvation comes to those who save themselves. This is but one answer, for the path to salvation is ever-stretching. Start your journey from this understanding, and work toward realizing your own salvation. —Chapter 11, Path to Salvation

Limonia, Flawed Saint.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Limonia, Flawed Saint.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied Machina follower is destroyed, put a Salvation Ex Limonia into your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Limonia, Flawed Saint.baseFlair_: The gods have stopped responding. Now the congregation relies on her, for she guides her flock to sure salvation using those blessed metal scales. She is a saint, no doubt, but the worshippers have come to believe in her more than the gods. —Church Records, Part 4
Limonia, Flawed Saint.evoFlair_:
Abnormalities detected in proselytization protocol. Continue?
There are gods in machines. In people too. But that doesn't mean much. I will take the place of your gods and shower you with true deliverance.

Imina, Mad Eidolon.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there isn't an enemy Totem of Madness in play, transform an enemy follower (excluding Imina, Mad Eidolon) into a Totem of Madness.
Clash: If an enemy Totem of Madness is in play, give the enemy follower -4/-0 until the end of the opponent's turn.
Imina, Mad Eidolon.evoEffect_:
Clash: If an enemy Totem of Madness is in play, give the enemy follower -4/-0 until the end of the opponent's turn.
Once on each of your turns, when you play a Countdown amulet, subtract 4 from its Countdown.
Imina, Mad Eidolon.baseFlair_: When a believer offers a Prayer, the divine shows his form. Having propagated the faith through mantras—now branded as heresy—he now announces the Good News. The mantra praising the divine is now a part of History. —Den of Madness, Expurgated Edition
Imina, Mad Eidolon.evoFlair_: When a believer offers sacrifices, the divine shows his form. Having propagated the faith through mantras—still branded on the heretic's mind—he announces the world's end.  —Den of Madness, Unexpurgated edition

Elana, Purest Prayer.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon an Elana's Prayer.
Elana, Purest Prayer.baseFlair_:
"Elana, are you still praying?"
"Yes. Because I might be tiny, but if my prayers reach God..."
―Conversation between Elana and Kel
Elana, Purest Prayer.evoFlair_:
"You oughta pray we kick the bad guys' butts!"
"Um, I think that it's better if no one gets hurt."
"You've sure got a good head on your shoulders."
―Conversation between Elana and Kel

Daffodil, Meus Princess.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Enhance (7): Put 3 Naterran Great Trees into your hand instead and recover 3 play points.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree comes into play, if there isn't an allied Meus Knight in play, summon a Meus Knight.
Daffodil, Meus Princess.evoEffect_:
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree comes into play, if there isn't an allied Meus Knight in play, summon a Meus Knight.
Daffodil, Meus Princess.baseFlair_:
Rely on others during difficult times. Know that you are not alone. As long as your heart is pure, your path will be made clear.
—Book of Eulogies on Nature
Daffodil, Meus Princess.evoFlair_: "Heed my call, valorous Meus! I implore you to come at once!" The Meus military rushes to the aid of Princess Daffodil. "It is time to fulfill your calling and help reclaim our glorious kingdom! To arms!"

Manifestation of Repose.baseEffect_: Randomly put 3 different cards that cost 2 play points or less from your deck into your hand.
Manifestation of Repose.baseFlair_: Naught exists beyond here, for herein repose awaits you.

Dark Offering.baseEffect_: Destroy an allied follower. Restore X defense to your leader and draw X cards. X equals that follower's defense.
Dark Offering.baseFlair_: My body, my soul—all belong to you.

Vengeful Radiance.baseEffect_:
Fully restore all damaged allied followers' defense.
Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the total amount of defense restored.
Vengeful Radiance.baseFlair_: Our god has given us a limited time on this earth. There are no exceptions amongst you.

Pious Fox.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon a Guardian Fox.
Pious Fox.baseFlair_: The moonlight coalesces, taking shape as a holy fox that brims with innocence.

Fiery Paean.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Summon a Holyflame Tiger.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Fiery Paean.baseFlair_:
Salvation will come twice.
The first time, through prayer.
The second, after prayers have been forgotten.

Holybright Altar.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: If an allied follower with Ward is in play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Holywing Dragon.
Holybright Altar.baseFlair_:
There's no such thing as a pointless prayer. Though you might think they're not listening, the gods hear each and every one.
—Holy Mage

Death Sentence.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Destroy 2 random enemy followers.
Death Sentence.baseFlair_: You who renounce your god's name will be granted only death in return.

Iron Maiden.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
Iron Maiden.baseFlair_: Those who were purged of "sin" within her became "saints" who cannot help but uphold their vows of silence. —An excerpt from The Nature of Virtue

Opposing Statues.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Choose - Summon a Holy Fowl of Ivory or Hexed Fowl of Ebon.
Last Words: Put an Opposing Statues into your hand if you have 3 cards or less in your hand.
Opposing Statues.baseFlair_: Choose, you of many sins. Will conviction be your salvation, or will salvation be your conviction?

Tribunal of Good and Evil.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare and Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.

Ancient Protector.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Summon a Heaven's Golem.
Last Words: Destroy all allied Heaven's Golems.
Ancient Protector.baseFlair_: The protector was created in the days of yore, an age long forgotten. —Teachings of the Priestess of the Column

Totem of Madness.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: If there isn't an enemy Totem of Madness in play, transform a random enemy follower (excluding Imina, Mad Eidolon) into a Totem of Madness.
Totem of Madness.baseFlair_: Speak your praise, mortal. For there is no god but me. —Inscription on a statue

Healing Priestess.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to all allies.
Healing Priestess.baseFlair_: I can see that you're wounded. Please rest here for a while. I would never forgive myself if you returned to battle in such condition.
Healing Priestess.evoFlair_: We, the servants of the Heavenly Father, are the only ones who remain to help those who need us. And so we will not rest—not until this war finally ends.

Pinion Prince.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
Pinion Prince.baseFlair_: My wings beat for you, O pure of heart! May the wind carry my prayers aloft!
Pinion Prince.evoFlair_: I take to the skies for the pure of heart! O mighty wind, rend my foes asunder!

Lycaon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy if there are at least 2 amulets in your hand.
Lycaon.baseFlair_: His hands became paws, and his form became monstrous. But he did not abandon god, and neither did he stop praying.
Lycaon.evoFlair_: To theists, he was the perfect believer. To atheists, he was the perfect maniac.

Angelic Idol.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't attack.
When an allied amulet is destroyed during your turn, evolve this follower.
Angelic Idol.baseFlair_: It presents itself to those devoted to prayer, and remains unseen to the faithless. Whether it is real or an illusion does not matter. Who is to know what is actually true? —Regarding Faith, Chapter 2
Angelic Idol.evoFlair_: Devout adherent, you believe the truth you know to be right—but can anyone prove the world you perceive to be true? Not all truths are absolute, some may even be false. —Regarding Faith, Chapter 5

Featherfolk Gardener.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
During your turn, if an allied amulet is destroyed, evolve this follower.
Featherfolk Gardener.baseFlair_: Do it, slack off, do it, slack off... You can decide a lot of things by picking the petals off of flowers. For example, I don't have to work very hard today.
Featherfolk Gardener.evoFlair_: Slack off, do it, slack off, do it... Ah, what do we have here? A trespasser? Well, unfortunately for you, the flowers have decided I have to be a dedicated guardian today.

Steelwing.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Summon an Assembly Droid.
Steelwing.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Prayers to God will serve as further salvation for both people and birdfolk. Ironknuckle Nun received new arms, and he received new wings. ―Notes from a Priory, Vol. 1
Steelwing.evoFlair_: What's important is to save everyone you can reach. But there's nothing wrong with flying. You go quick, and the view's great! I don't know why I fly! I've just got the spirit! ―Steelwing to Ironknuckle Nun

Greatsword Sister.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
Greatsword Sister.baseFlair_: "My sword serves as a powerful talisman." Her soft smile is enough to convince any traveler that her impossibly large sword is nothing more than a protective charm.
Greatsword Sister.evoFlair_: "My sword serves as a powerful talisman." Her delighted smile is enough to alert any demon that her impossibly large sword is meant for purging evil.

Calm Featherfolk.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (4)
Last Words: Summon a Calm Featherfolk.
----------
When this follower comes into play, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Calm Featherfolk.baseFlair_: One day, our prayers will bear fruit. Only God knows what fruit that will be, or how it will taste. Prayer is the act of enduring while keeping faith in God's justice.
Calm Featherfolk.evoFlair_: Even should our prayers be granted in a different form than we expect, there is no cause to grieve. The time you spent in prayer has made you more just. Allow me to show you the strength which prayer and perseverance nurtures.

Pegasus.baseFlair_: A winged white horse that comes to the aid of those who worship blue skies.
Pegasus.evoFlair_: A pure white horse that comes to the aid of heroes chosen by heaven. It soars through the skies, propelled by the beats of its mighty wings.

Guardian Fox.baseFlair_: On the night when the moon is closest to our world, the goddess' guardian fox descends to the mortal realm.
Guardian Fox.evoFlair_: The tail of the elegant fox flutters in the breeze, serving as a warning to all those who seek to wrong the goddess. Those foolish enough to ignore its warning are torn to shreds in no time at all.

Regal Falcon.baseFlair_: The sound of a flute rings out across the sky, parting the clouds. From the gap this winged servant of heaven descends to the mortal realm.
Regal Falcon.evoFlair_: The regal falcon's feathers turn the soil white whenever they make contact with land, eradicating evil and hatred.

Adamantium Bird.baseFlair_: The gods blessed the great bird with feathers of metal so that it would never be hunted or perish again.
Adamantium Bird.evoFlair_: The gods blessed the great bird with intelligence so that it could outwit both hunters and death itself.

Greater Priestess.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Greater Priestess.baseFlair_: Those who dwell in the human realm, heed my words: love thy neighbor, and have faith. Faith is the path that leads to all answers.
Greater Priestess.evoFlair_: A world without love is a world without light. A world filled with love is a world without darkness. To battle against the encroaching shadows, we must all love our neighbors.

Cleric Lancer.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Gain +4/+0 during the opponent's turn.
Cleric Lancer.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Gain +4/+0 during the opponent's turn.
Cleric Lancer.baseFlair_: I am a proud warrior entrusted to protect this church from harm. My duty is to eradicate evil and defend all that is holy!
Cleric Lancer.evoFlair_: Enemies may amass in mighty armies, but this lance shall pierce them all! I have nothing to fear. All evil will be eradicated!

Shrine Knight Maiden.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied followers resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
Shrine Knight Maiden.baseFlair_: Prostrate yourself. Knights such as I should not have to taint ourselves by association with the likes of you.
Shrine Knight Maiden.evoFlair_: I do not wish to look at you any longer. But I'll at least cut you down in one stroke so you don't have to suffer.

Radiance Angel.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Draw a card.
Radiance Angel.baseFlair_: Today the world is full of people who have lost their way. Ignored, they will be swallowed by the dark. I must offer them guidance.
Radiance Angel.evoFlair_: My guidance is not an answer, but perhaps it can help people to find their own way. Assisting in this way is my duty.

Ancient Lion Spirit.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Ancient Lion Spirit.baseFlair_: The lion god descended to the corrupted earth to roar out its rebuke of life impure and demonic.
Ancient Lion Spirit.evoFlair_: Freed from its bonds, the divine beast glared at its surroundings. A single infuriated roar was all it took to rend the flesh from the bones of any monsters unlucky enough to be nearby.

Gravekeeper Sonia.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If there are no other allied followers in play, gain +1/+0 and the following effect - Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
Gravekeeper Sonia.baseFlair_: I stand here to protect the citizens of the city that was turned to gold. This is my one and only duty.
Gravekeeper Sonia.evoFlair_: Let them rest in peace. If you don't, I shall put you to sleep. Permanently.

Tenko.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied follower attacks, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Tenko.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied follower attacks, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Tenko.baseFlair_: We supernatural critters don't spare any effort to save our friends. We'll work our tails off!
Tenko.evoFlair_: The supernatural powers within me will end this mess. Just leave it to me, friend!

Temple Ogre.baseEffect_:
Strike: Gain +0/+1.
Whenever 2 damage or less is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
Temple Ogre.evoEffect_:
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Strike: Gain +0/+1.
Whenever 2 damage or less is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
Temple Ogre.baseFlair_:
Things it can't do: feel pain or distress.
Things it can do: cause pain or distress.
—Temple-Dwelling Ogres, Chapter 3, Section 4
Temple Ogre.evoFlair_:
Things it likes: raging and destroying.
Things it dislikes: everything else.
—Temple-Dwelling Ogres, Chapter 4, Section 2

Holy Lancer.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, summon a Holy Cavalier and give +1/+1 to all allied Holy Cavaliers.
Holy Lancer.baseFlair_:
The winged crest is a symbol of freedom. A shield forged of the miracles which issue forth from God. We, the Eclair Holy Knights, will be the ones to defend against despair!
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 4
Holy Lancer.evoFlair_:
We slew the villain controlling the ocean and won back our beautiful waters. It had been a long time since we saw our people smiling.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 5

Assault Priest.evoEffect_:
(Doesn't have Ward.)
Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower that attacked last turn.
Assault Priest.baseFlair_: Priests are called "Father" for a reason! We exist to guide our congregations and keep them safe! That's why a priest's body must be honed with prayer, training, and combat!
Assault Priest.evoFlair_: My body is armored in divine muscle. These fists are tools of heaven! Come, sinners, and repent! You will find absolution in the moment of impact!

Master Adjudicator.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (3)
Last Words: Summon a Master Adjudicator.
----------
Rush.
Strike: If you have more evolution points than your opponent, reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
Master Adjudicator.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: If you have more evolution points than your opponent, reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Master Adjudicator.baseFlair_: I've no need of your confessions. Bear in mind that I am not the one who wields the spear—I merely provide the power to do so. It is up to the gods to determine those who are guilty. I only ensure that their will is carried out. So please, save your grievances for them.
Master Adjudicator.evoFlair_: There is no absolution. I know not what sin you have committed, nor why the gods are incensed with you. I simply enforce divine judgment. But if the heavens above have deemed you evil, then you must accept your fate.

Reverend Adjudicator.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader. Draw a card.
During your turn, whenever your leader's defense is restored, summon a Snake Priestess.
Reverend Adjudicator.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever your leader's defense is restored, summon a Snake Priestess.
Reverend Adjudicator.baseFlair_: I am the Hierophant, father of mercy. If you wish to open the hidden door within, you must cultivate compassion for others. Go boldly forth and carry out kind deeds, and you will find the key.
Reverend Adjudicator.evoFlair_: He is the teacher, keeper of keys to the realm divine. Though he passes judgment on those who would violate the law, he bears kindness in his heart and is wont to grant mercy in equal measure.

Eidolon of Madness.baseEffect_:
Can't attack or be attacked.
At the start of your turn, evolve this follower.
Eidolon of Madness.evoEffect_:
Can't attack or be attacked.
At the end of your turn, destroy all allied amulets.
Eidolon of Madness.baseFlair_: When offering prayers to a god, humans bow their heads and lower their eyelids. They do this to show subservience or to avert their eyes from divine madness. —Reverence and Madness, Chapter 12
Eidolon of Madness.evoFlair_: It is only when they lift their heads and raise their eyelids that people finally notice... But by then it's too late. It seems that people rely on mad gods in the hope of becoming mad themselves. —Reverence and Madness, Chapter 14

Ceryneian Hind.baseEffect_:
If at least 2 allied amulets are in play, and you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Ceryneian Lighthind or Ceryneian Darkhind.
----------
Strike: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
Ceryneian Hind.evoEffect_: Strike: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
Ceryneian Hind.baseFlair_: Will the beast take on the form of the merciful light or the heartless dark? Its choice will announce the verdict of the gods. If thou be just, then purification awaits. If thou be intemperate, then destruction befalls.
Ceryneian Hind.evoFlair_: This steadfast follower of god has a mirror image. At times it releases light, and at times it absorbs it. It is the Ceryneian Hind of light and dark.

The Untrue God.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Havencraft amulet that costs X play points from your deck into play. Activate its Fanfare effects (excluding Choose and targeted effects). Then put a random Havencraft amulet that costs Y play points from your deck into play. Activate its Fanfare effects (excluding Choose and targeted effects). X and Y equal 4 split randomly.
The Untrue God.baseFlair_: It was a revelation from the resplendent one. He chose me to speak of the true nature of this world. Him, a god with words to spread. And for that, the past me has died! I raise this body to you! Now deliver us! —Words of Revelation
The Untrue God.evoFlair_: This is the era that the resplendent god has blessed us with! He will free us from our binds and drive away that which maddens us. We are but unenlightened mortals, who beseech you: help us! —Words of Revelation

Saren, Orphanage Matron.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 2 allied amulets are in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Union Burst (10): Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. If your leader has 5 defense or less, deal 5 damage instead.
Saren, Orphanage Matron.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 3 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
Saren, Orphanage Matron.baseFlair_: Aaalll right! Let's get this squared away, shall we? But let's do it with some class. We have to set a good example for the kids at the orphanage!
Saren, Orphanage Matron.evoFlair_: I have a home to return to—a family to protect. To preserve that happiness, there's no job too tough. Not that I'd mind a break every now and again...

Justine, Holy Al-mi'raj.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Natura
Whenever cards are fused to this card, restore 1 defense to your leader.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: If this card is fused with at least 1 card, gain Bane. Then, if it is fused with at least 2 cards, gain Ward. Then, if it is fused with at least 3 cards, gain Drain.
Justine, Holy Al-mi'raj.baseFlair_: Doesn't matter when, doesn't matter where. Call for justice, and I'm there. Listen, my fists'll send evil flying straight over the moon! So don't you lose hope. There's still courage and good left in you—I can see it shining right there in your heart.
Justine, Holy Al-mi'raj.evoFlair_:
Looks like we've got a meddler on our hands. You know, I never liked rabbits. But still I admire that clueless compassion of yours. So I'll let you in on a little secret. Those fists of yours? They won't change anything.
—Vice, Death Grip

Garuda, Wings of Paradise.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost amulets and followers (excluding Garuda, Wings of Paradise) that cost X play points or less from your deck into play and activate their Fanfare effects (excluding Choose and targeted effects). X equals the number of allied amulets destroyed this match.
Garuda, Wings of Paradise.baseFlair_: Let this blessing engulf the skies. The flightless shall take flight; the faithless shall find faith. You have reached paradise. And here, there shall be unbroken peace—I swear it on my golden spear.

VIII. Sofina, Strength.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a Somnolent Strength.
----------
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers +1/+1 and Ward.
While this follower is in play, all allied followers in play and that come into play can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
VIII. Sofina, Strength.evoEffect_: While this follower is in play, all allied followers in play and that come into play can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
VIII. Sofina, Strength.baseFlair_: Perk up your ears and listen to my roaring salute! One, two—graaawr! Hehe. Whaddaya think? I'm Strength, beast of vitality. Let's get down to it. I heard you wanna be tough and strong. Just leave it to me—I'll draw out the lion that slumbers within!
VIII. Sofina, Strength.evoFlair_: Physical prowess, the latest weapons, greater numbers—none of that makes you strong! It's all just for show! Real strength is the unshakable courage to fight to the end! If you can't take the pressure, just roar! I'll roar with you! Graaawr!

Ceryneian Lighthind.baseEffect_:
Rush.
At the end of your turn, restore 4 defense to this follower.
Ceryneian Lighthind.baseFlair_: This alabaster creature is the light of mercy made flesh. The purifying rays it emits are signposts on the path to salvation.
Ceryneian Lighthind.evoFlair_: The light of mercy is a sign of the beast's purity. It will surely lead the world to salvation when its tracks turn to light.

Ceryneian Darkhind.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Subtract 2 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Ceryneian Darkhind.baseFlair_: This ebon creature is the darkness of cruelty made flesh. The ruinous shadows it emits are signposts on the route to undoing.
Ceryneian Darkhind.evoFlair_: The darkness of cruelty is a sign of the beast's wickedness. It will surely lead the world to undoing when its tracks turn to darkness.

Acolyte's Light.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower.
Restore X defense to your leader. X equals that follower's defense.
Acolyte's Light.baseFlair_: A holy light drives away shadows.

Pure Annihilation.baseEffect_: Select an enemy follower. Banish it and all enemy followers of the same name.
Pure Annihilation.baseFlair_: My eyes and voice art one with the heavens, as is the judgment I shall execute upon thee.

Manifest Devotion.baseEffect_: Select an allied amulet and summon 4 copies of it.

Forgotten Sanctuary.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Barong.
Forgotten Sanctuary.baseFlair_: Tch, that land wasn't even worth ravaging anyway. —A scornful demon

Dual Flames.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: Summon 2 Holyflame Tigers.
Dual Flames.baseFlair_: Light the sacred flame. Until the fires of help arrive, we carry on.

March Hare's Teatime.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Tin Soldier.
March Hare's Teatime.baseFlair_: Drink this up! But, mind you, there's nothing inside. Eat up now! But, mind you, this doesn't exist. Sigh, this is the perfect beginning to a tea party!

Tenko's Shrine.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect restores defense to an ally, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. If there are no enemy followers in play, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader instead.
Tenko's Shrine.baseFlair_: Hey there, friend! It's been a blue moon since we last saw each other. I hightailed it here to help you chase away your troubles!

Divine Armor.baseEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Divine Armor.evoEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Divine Armor.baseFlair_: Avert your eyes, depraved beasts. You are unworthy of even glimpsing this armor.
Divine Armor.evoFlair_: This armor is charged with one task, to see the chaos turned to peaceful order once more. Nothing shall escape the heavenly light as it purifies the land.

Monk of Purification.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Monastic Holy Waters into your hand.
Monk of Purification.baseFlair_: Our followers are showstoppers. You won't find prayers that work better than ours!
Monk of Purification.evoFlair_: God doesn't care about people's looks. But if it's prayers you want, why not get them from a cutie?

Priest of Excess.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (1)
Last Words: Banish a random enemy follower.
----------
Last Words: Banish a random enemy follower.
Priest of Excess.evoEffect_: Last Words: Banish a random enemy follower.
Priest of Excess.baseFlair_: There was once a priest who was smothered with love from the gods. "On the day you breathe your last, those around you shall suffer divine retribution," he was told. He now travels to holy sanctuaries across the world, hoping to cleanse himself of this overprotective "blessing."
Priest of Excess.evoFlair_: Pardon me, there's something I'd like to ask the church... How would I relieve myself of the protection of the gods? All the good karma I've accumulated has given me far too much favor...

Holywing Dragon.baseFlair_: The souls of devout maidens call out for the mighty dragon with angelic white wings.
Holywing Dragon.evoFlair_: Driven by the souls of the purest maidens, the white dragon opens its jaws and lets out a mighty roar. Those who have turned their back on the way of the light cower in fear.

Barong.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Barong.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Barong.baseFlair_: The divine lion answers its summons and sets out to defend the people it loves—the people it once failed to protect.
Barong.evoFlair_: The divine lion sharpens its fangs, ready to carve into the evil that claimed its loved ones, yet cowed by the fear that it may harm the innocent.

Angelic Noble.baseFlair_: That sword eliminates evil from the hearts of men.
Angelic Noble.evoFlair_: The truly pure-hearted are capable of sympathizing with even the most malicious act.

Calydonian Boar.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Calydonian Boar.baseFlair_: A massive boar that serves the goddess Artemis. The goddess sent it to the earthly realm to mete out her justice on those who anger the gods.
Calydonian Boar.evoFlair_: When the moon is full, the boar rages, shaking the earth with its fury. It will show the traitorous the price of betraying the beautiful goddess it so faithfully serves.

Eagle Man.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied Neutral follower comes into play, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Ward.
Eagle Man.baseFlair_: His eyes are the eyes of God. They see through all to track down dangers. His hands are the hands of God, and he reaches out to provide salvation from danger. He is the faithful servant of God.
Eagle Man.evoFlair_: He lives with God, prays to God, and is prepared to give his life for God. In accordance with God's word, he aids all on earth. He is the protector of all who know brotherly love.

Hati.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Rush and Bane if an evolved enemy follower is in play.
Hati.baseFlair_: The silver wolf glared at the pale, round plate gleaming in the heavenly darkness, its most hated enemy that was always a step ahead.
Hati.evoFlair_: The wolf, drenched in silver light, let its quiet anger rage as it solemnly swore to catch and sink its teeth into its foe.

Star Priestess.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an allied follower or Countdown amulet, and then summon a copy of that follower or amulet.
Star Priestess.baseFlair_: Set a prayer on the starry sky. Gaze into its glimmer. I am the bridge binding land and star.
Star Priestess.evoFlair_: I'm the foundation of the stars' peace. Leave a wish within my starry sky. Bask in it as it shoots and sways.

Arch Priestess Cattleya.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Summit Temple into your hand.
Arch Priestess Cattleya.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Summit Temple into your hand.
Arch Priestess Cattleya.baseFlair_: Let there be harmony in this world, and may it bloom like a gentle flower.
Arch Priestess Cattleya.evoFlair_: Those who bridge the realm of the heavens and earth, souls who cast their gaze upon a far away realm—all who are pure shall find sanctuary.

Heretic Priest.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Forbidden Teachings or Red-Hot Boots into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Heretic Priest.baseFlair_: "Heretic" sure has a nasty ring. On what basis are you questioning our god? Who can prove the god you believe in is the correct one?
Heretic Priest.evoFlair_: We no longer need to discuss anything. Seen from my perspective, you are the skeptic; you are the heretic. Surely you have no complaint at being judged before my god?

Puresong Priest.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Restore 1 defense to your leader. If an allied follower with Ward is in play, draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to all allies.
Puresong Priest.baseFlair_: O my lord, I know I'm a priest, but I must confess... to the sin of being born with this divine voice!
Puresong Priest.evoFlair_: O divine chorus, thank you for scouting me! Sweet angels, spread your wings and lift your voices in praise, for my time has come! Now, sing along with me!

Unicorn.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to an ally.
Unicorn.baseFlair_: The unicorn had despaired of humanity, assuming the species was doomed to extinction. But a chance meeting with a pure-hearted maiden rekindled faith and purpose in the proud beast's heart.
Unicorn.evoFlair_: With the holy beast's powers unleashed, they were unstoppable. But when the maiden praised him, he would shake his great head. They were still a long way from the peace they both so desired.

Arch Priestess Laelia.baseEffect_: All allied followers in play and all allied followers that come into play deal damage equal to their defense while this follower is in play.
Arch Priestess Laelia.evoEffect_: All allied followers in play and all allied followers that come into play deal damage equal to their defense while this follower is in play.
Arch Priestess Laelia.baseFlair_: I am a flower, the world's harmony in bloom. Great power dwells within my heart, waiting to be unleashed.
Arch Priestess Laelia.evoFlair_: I am a flower, the world's harmony in bloom. As long as I remain, the balance between body and soul shall never be disrupted.

Kaguya.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an Ephemeral Moon.
Kaguya.baseFlair_: No matter how dear this world may be, dreams of abiding here are only dreams. Know that love is nothing more than a fleeting fantasy.
Kaguya.evoFlair_: I would express the depths of my love, but the body and heart must always be one. And the heavens and the earth can never be united.

Winged Sentinel Garuda.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Subtract 3 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Winged Sentinel Garuda.baseFlair_: A golden winged god who rules over the falcons and has been blessed by the sky. He calls winged souls in search of the greatest heights to the heavens.
Winged Sentinel Garuda.evoFlair_: A winged god who controls the weather and preserves the balance of the world. He wishes only to build a paradise of order for all winged beings.

Valhallan General.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower +3/+3 and Rush.
Valhallan General.baseFlair_: Corrupters of heaven's light, know that you will be punished for your atrocities! We'll slaughter you and return you to the dust from whence you came. Now fall in, warriors!
Valhallan General.evoFlair_: Follow me, warriors! As the keepers of heaven's light, we are the only ones who can purify the agents of the dark. Charge!

Judge of Retribution.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower with 3 defense or less. Then draw a card.
Judge of Retribution.baseFlair_: A judge who descended from the heavens. He unleashes retribution on the lost souls who pray to be purged of sin, and then he guides them to the light of mercy.
Judge of Retribution.evoFlair_: With his staff of salvation, the judge opens a path into the light for those who endure his retribution. His blessings illuminate the sky, and the sinful weep before his forgiveness.

Odette, White Swan.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an enemy Odile, Black Swan. Then evolve this follower.
Odette, White Swan.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to all allies.
Odette, White Swan.baseFlair_: No one but you can alter my fate—no one. Please release me from this curse of purity. Please give me your kiss.
Odette, White Swan.evoFlair_: Please choose me. The darkness is nothing but evil. And I promise to let your love embrace me and infuse me.

Holy King Lion.baseFlair_: One prayer upon another prayer, wishes upon wishes. The long-awaited light is a great king of salvation. —Chapter 8, Path to Salvation
Holy King Lion.evoFlair_: A king of salvation ascends, and yet thou art still inadequate. What the king seeks is further prayer, more wishes. Continue ever onward, regent of salvation, without end. —Chapter 9, Path to Salvation

Moon Al-mi'raj.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the end of your turn, fully restore this follower's defense.
Moon Al-mi'raj.evoEffect_:
Storm.
At the end of your turn, fully restore this follower's defense.
Moon Al-mi'raj.baseFlair_: A bad bunny rabbit expelled from heaven for rebelling against her heavenly counterparts. Down on earth, Moon Al-mi'raj bathes in the light of the full moon and scoffs at the fate that has befallen her.
Moon Al-mi'raj.evoFlair_: The more that Moon Al-mi'raj learned about magic from the moon, the more she came to detest its celestial presence, like a young girl driven half mad by her first love.

Ramina, Moon Al-mi'raj.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the end of your turn, fully restore this follower's defense.
Ramina, Moon Al-mi'raj.evoEffect_:
Storm.
At the end of your turn, fully restore this follower's defense.

(This card will be treated as Moon Al-mi'raj.)
Ramina, Moon Al-mi'raj.baseFlair_: A bad bunny rabbit expelled from heaven for rebelling against her heavenly counterparts. Down on earth, Moon Al-mi'raj bathes in the light of the full moon and scoffs at the fate that has befallen her.
Ramina, Moon Al-mi'raj.evoFlair_: The more that Moon Al-mi'raj learned about magic from the moon, the more she came to detest its celestial presence, like a young girl driven half mad by her first love.

Dark Jeanne.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all other followers. Then give +2/+0 to all other followers.
Dark Jeanne.baseFlair_: There was once a girl who trusted in God. She listened to him, followed his words, and spread his gospel. But one day she found that there was no god on the battlefield.
Dark Jeanne.evoFlair_: The girl who cursed God soon returned to the land, her once pure heart corrupted by darkness. Now she rises from the depths of despair, her blackened heart trembling.

Aether of the White Wing.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Havencraft followers (excluding Aether of the White Wing) that cost less than your total number of play point orbs from your deck into play. Then give all other allied followers +0/+1.
Aether of the White Wing.baseFlair_: My white wings will lighten the darkness and be your guide. Don't get lost, and don't fear. Let me light the way.
Aether of the White Wing.evoFlair_: My wings will blow the ominous clouds away. I will repel the encroaching danger with divine strength. It's okay. Let nothing worry you, for I am here by your side.

Tutankhamun.baseEffect_: Last Words: If this follower's defense was at least 2 before being destroyed, summon a Tutankhamun and set its defense to 1.
Tutankhamun.baseFlair_: Though heaven may abandon this land, I will love it, and I will save it. My people, call now for your blessèd king!
Tutankhamun.evoFlair_: This land has no need for gods, as I stand before you! Shout for joy, people, for you have been promised blessings.

De La Fille, Gem Princess.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to all allies. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
De La Fille, Gem Princess.baseFlair_: As Princess of the Gem Domain, I won't permit anyone to misuse the power of precious stones. I'll punish this villainy with my lithomancy!
De La Fille, Gem Princess.evoFlair_: The glittering brilliance. The dazzling beauty... Someone of your refinement must appreciate it. What? N-no, not me! I was talking about the gems!

Laina, Sister of Judgment.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+2 to all of the other allied followers with the lowest attack in play.
Laina, Sister of Judgment.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all of the enemy followers with the highest attack in play.
Laina, Sister of Judgment.baseFlair_: The path of redemption is long and arduous. Prayer will sustain the journey—mere words, perhaps, but the word of the hallowed is key to salvation.
Laina, Sister of Judgment.evoFlair_: The path of redemption is long and arduous. Faith and liturgy will lay the groundwork—mere rituals, perhaps, but the ritual of the hallowed is key to salvation.

Wilbert, Grand Knight.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Summon 2 Holy Cavaliers.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an enemy follower attacks an allied follower with Ward, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, summon 2 Holy Cavaliers, then remove this effect.
Wilbert, Grand Knight.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, summon 2 Holy Cavaliers, then remove this effect.
Wilbert, Grand Knight.baseFlair_: Overwhelmed by prayer, dreams, and hope, sinking and drowning was unavoidable. At the very least, let us leave our mark, however fleeting, on the ocean's floor. The ocean of the wailing world's tears.
Wilbert, Grand Knight.evoFlair_: Wishes are weighty things. Tears are like lead. Struggle is not permitted. The title of hero is an anchor dragging us toward the ocean's floor. The ocean of the wailing world's tears.

Goddess of the West Wind.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Havencraft followers with an original attack of 2 or less from your deck into play.
Goddess of the West Wind.baseFlair_: Ah, humans... My adorable audience. It's time to forget the freezing cold. I'll give you a season full of blossoming flowers.
Goddess of the West Wind.evoFlair_: Don't forget to give thanks for this meeting. After all, without me, who would melt away all that frozen darkness closing in on you? Listen closely. That wind foretells a bountiful harvest.

Vice, Death Grip.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 Ironknuckle Nuns into your hand and change their costs to 0.
Whenever you play a Machina follower, deal 2 damage to it. Then, give it +2/+0 and Rush.
Vice, Death Grip.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a Machina follower, deal 2 damage to it. Then, give it +2/+0 and Rush.
Vice, Death Grip.baseFlair_: Spare me the sanctimony. We're all fallen creatures. I just put forth proposals, which, frankly, are win-win. The client is free to take them or leave them. Call it evil, but my conscience is clear. Now, to celebrate our new partnership—how about a friendly handshake?
Vice, Death Grip.evoFlair_:
A person's thoughts and beliefs are their own. They're not for you to manipulate. And that's why I'm here to stop you—to fight for love, peace, and understanding!
—Justine, Holy Al-mi'raj

Themis's Decree.baseFlair_: Do not be afraid. This light is the path that leads to Heaven.

Purging Light.baseEffect_: Banish a random enemy follower with 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 defense respectively.
Purging Light.baseFlair_: There exists a light that produces not even shadows.

Chorus of Prayer.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, put a random Countdown amulet from your deck into play. Its cost must match this card's Countdown.

Ephemeral Moon.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, randomly change the attack of an enemy follower with the highest attack in play to 1.
Ephemeral Moon.baseFlair_: Though I return to the sky, I shall never forget the time I spent as a person. As long as I hang on to these feelings, the moon will always shine in the lonely night sky.

Curate.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 5 defense to an ally.
Curate.baseFlair_: Father, please offer salvation to your flock. They are but hapless lambs marching to the slaughter.
Curate.evoFlair_: Father, please offer salvation to this brave warrior who has overcome the trials of a brutal war.

Soul Collector.baseFlair_: Just two more souls and I'll have six hundred sixty-six in my collection. Surely you wouldn't mind parting with yours.
Soul Collector.evoFlair_: My lord would never be satisfied with inferior souls. Allow me to test you to see if you're a suitable sacrifice.

Sanctum Keepers.baseFlair_:
Ee-eee!
(We are the judges charged to protect the goddess's sacred lands! You have failed our trial, so bend over and present your posterior for punishment!)
Sanctum Keepers.evoFlair_:
Ee-ee-eee!
(Prepare to receive the goddess's blessed rod across your fleshy bits! This holy relic will purge you of your sins! Prostrate yourself in gratitude for the goddess's mercy, you failure!)

White Knight.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Fully restore all allied followers' defense.
White Knight.baseFlair_: It seems you had quite the close shave there! But never fear—the white knight is here! Come, allow me to escort you to safety!
White Knight.evoFlair_: A knight must know how to protect his charges in any situation. Those are the rules! Hm? From what am I protecting you currently? Why, is it not obvious? Sharks that swim on land and other such beasties!

Luxhorn Sarissa.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Luxhorn Sarissa.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Luxhorn Sarissa.baseFlair_: Losing's the worst; I'd never ever want anyone to beat me. My heart would die the moment I admitted defeat.
Luxhorn Sarissa.evoFlair_: I don't believe in gods. And I don't go looking to knights in shining armor. My own power is all I need to ensure victory!

Father Refinement.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Repair Mode into your hand. Change the cost of all Repair Modes in your hand to 0.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Father Refinement.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Father Refinement.baseFlair_: And thus I prayed: If the desires of the body should inhibit my relationship with the heavens, then I shall embrace the machine. Thank you for this opportunity to discard my sinful flesh. —Church Records, Part 3
Father Refinement.evoFlair_: Since the old preacher had his body augmented, he's been praying away—like a prayer machine! All day, mind you! I hope the man upstairs answers his call soon. —Layperson's Account, Part 3

Skullfane.baseFlair_: God has been destroyed. There is no use in praying. Only one path to absolution remains: utter nihilism.
Skullfane.evoFlair_: The end is upon us. It is all part of the plan. Do not look back, children of gods. Do not resist, children of demons. There is only one path towards eternal peace: utter nihilism!

Lion of the Golden City.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied Neutral follower comes into play, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Put an amulet that costs 5 play points or less from your hand into play and destroy it.
Lion of the Golden City.baseFlair_:
"Beat that thing up and we'll get to all the treasure inside that temple."
"Shiny stuff!"
"Hush, Goblin Mage!"
—Travelogue of Feena and Goblin Mage
Lion of the Golden City.evoFlair_:
"Be careful. We don't know what kind of beast it is."
"Shiny stuff!"
"Don't run ahead, Goblin Mage!"
—Travelogue of Feena and Goblin Mage

Heresy's Avatar.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - Destroy every Countdown amulet immediately after you play it. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
Heresy's Avatar.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - Destroy every Countdown amulet immediately after you play it. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
Heresy's Avatar.baseFlair_: It cannot be described accurately, because it cannot be perceived with the eye. It is a terrifying beast, a fallen angel that is a shadow of its former self. Those who lay eyes upon it are destroyed, and those who speak of it go mad. —Demon Typology, Chapter 8
Heresy's Avatar.evoFlair_: Utter its name and resolve yourself to madness. Prayers and wishes are but moans and screams before it. An aberration that sits outside of reality, it is impossible for our kind to make sense of. —Demon Typology, Chapter 12

Heavenly Knight.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If an allied amulet is in play, gain Storm.
At the start of the opponent's turn, until the start of your next turn, gain +4/+0.
Heavenly Knight.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the start of the opponent's turn, until the start of your next turn, gain +4/+0.
Heavenly Knight.baseFlair_: The eyes of the wicked shall be blinded by the flash of my sublime sword. What's more, my seraphic armor is untouchable—blessed by the heavens to repel all who are depraved.
Heavenly Knight.evoFlair_: This brilliance of my arms is the insignia of supreme judgment—for great justice! Wickedness and allies of evil, your hour of reckoning has finally come, for divine judgment cannot be escaped!

Godsworn Alexiel.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - If an allied amulet is in play, your leader can't take more than 4 damage at a time. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Godsworn Alexiel.baseFlair_: Your shield is here. With my barrier, with my mirror-blades, I'll protect everything you are.
Godsworn Alexiel.evoFlair_: The mirror-blades shine on enmity and dispel malice with their light. So long as I'm here, you will not be harmed. Here I go! Deploy, mirror-blades!

Holylord Eachtar.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 9 shadows, summon 2 Holy Cavaliers.
Fanfare: Give +2/+0 and Rush to all other allied followers until the end of the turn.
Holylord Eachtar.baseFlair_: The sun rose and set a hundred times before our hero finally fell on the battlefield. Just as all hope seemed lost, the god of the heavens came to our aid. —Chapter 14, Notes from the Battlefield
Holylord Eachtar.evoFlair_: The holy god returned him to life, whereupon he rose wreathed in holy light. As joyous cries echoed across the battlefield, malevolent spirits cowered in fear. —Chapter 19, Notes from the Battlefield

Charaton, Iceflame Priest.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. Recover X play points. X equals the number of allied amulets that have been destroyed this match.
Charaton, Iceflame Priest.baseFlair_: The ruddy censer of Erythron soothes the pure of heart with a gentle flame while the azure mace Kyanos quenches evil with cutting ice. When enough terrestrial mass fills both vessels, the ground will be split between red and blue.
Charaton, Iceflame Priest.evoFlair_: Stoked by prayer, the ruddy censer of Erythron harbors a restorative flame, while anger fuels the azure mace Kyanos's icy destruction. The vessels shine, powered by people's good and evil deeds. The world is not black and white, but perhaps it can be red and blue.

Manifestation of Faith.baseEffect_: Randomly put 3 different Countdown amulets that cost 2 play points or less from your deck into play.
Manifestation of Faith.baseFlair_: Speaking a million prayers cost me my voice. So now I'll take up my pen and write a million more. —Preface to the Book of Prayer

Masked Giant.baseFlair_: Commanded by a god to guard a sacred doorway, the giant has stood motionless for countless millennia.
Masked Giant.evoFlair_: The guardian of the sacred doorway continues to stand in unflinching silence, stirring only to swat away an occasional intruder.

Taurus the Great.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Taurus the Great.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Taurus the Great.baseFlair_: Evildoers, turn to dust! I'll beat you to a pulp with my fists of justice! Gaaah!
Taurus the Great.evoFlair_: You dare show your back to me, fool? I'll chase you to the farthest reaches with these fists of justice! Mooo!

Agnes, Hollow Feather.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied amulet is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card. If the amulet destroyed was a Naterran Great Tree, subtract 1 more.
----------
Storm.
Agnes, Hollow Feather.baseFlair_:
Cast away any doubts and pray. Believe in what you must do. The integrity residing in your heart will surely lead you down the right path.
—Book of Eulogies on Nature
Agnes, Hollow Feather.evoFlair_: "Hm, was that really Vier I just cut down? I could be wrong... In which case, I still have a vendetta to fulfill." The winged avenger smiles with her clear, cool eyes, delighted to continue playing her role.

Jeanne d'Arc.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers. Then give +0/+2 to all other allied followers.
Jeanne d'Arc.baseFlair_: Come, all soldiers! I hereby make a vow upon this spear! God is on our side! Our victory is assured!
Jeanne d'Arc.evoFlair_: I hereby make a vow in the name of God! We shall win this battle, even if I must give my life in order to ensure victory! Now come, follow me into the fray!

Lapis, Glorious Seraph.baseEffect_: When this follower leaves play, summon an Enstatued Seraph. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
Lapis, Glorious Seraph.baseFlair_: Be it from darkness or evil, from omen or chaos, I will save you so long as there is light beneath my wings. My victory will be your salvation!
Lapis, Glorious Seraph.evoFlair_: There is nothing to fear, for I will meet the unending darkness with unyielding light. So long as my wings lose not their radiance, the world shan't meet its end!

Iridescent Sphinx.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (2)
Last Words: Summon a Tutankhamun.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon a Tutankhamun. Give it Ambush.
Iridescent Sphinx.baseFlair_:
They're a sight to behold from behind, yet a ghastly terror to witness from the front. You'll be safe if you're outdoors, but it's advised to say your prayers if you're indoors. What is this divine yet terrifying being?
—A popular riddle among city folk
Iridescent Sphinx.evoFlair_: What we revere as a divine beast, the enemy deems a hideous monster. It traps foes and itself inside a barrier and proceeds to decimate them. We consider it an ally... just as long as we have the luxury of observing from outside of its barrier. —Border patrol's observation

Themis's Purge.baseFlair_: By this divine decree shall the purge begin.

Tarnished Grail.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all followers.
Last Words: Randomly put 3 of the following 4 cards into your hand: Servant of Darkness, Silent Rider, Dis's Damnation, and Astaroth's Reckoning.
Tarnished Grail.baseFlair_: Beyond defilement lies corruption. —Prince of Darkness

Enstatued Seraph.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon an Awakened Seraph.
Enstatued Seraph.baseFlair_: There was once a shattered statue sleeping in a lost capital. But only the birds saw it, as no man ever entered that forbidden land.

Awakened Seraph.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon a Renascent Seraph.
Awakened Seraph.baseFlair_: The statue depicted a legendary angel who once fought to protect humanity. There were those who offered their prayers to this angel, and kept her in their hearts.

Renascent Seraph.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon a Seraph Lapis, Glory Be.
