Renascent Seraph.baseFlair_: Over the course of many years, the prayers of the innocent gradually weakened the hold of an ancient curse on the angel, slowly restoring her to glory.

Seraph Lapis, Glory Be.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Win the match.
Seraph Lapis, Glory Be.baseFlair_: The nameless seraph will be resurrected by the pure hearts and innocent prayers of humanity. She will be a radiant light to guide this world.

Battlefield Inquisitor.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (5): Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
----------
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Battlefield Inquisitor.baseFlair_: Art thou not a heretic? If nay sayeth thee, evidence for grandest sin hath been had. Dutybound, then, am I to grant thine execution. If yea sayeth thee, proof of grandest sin hath been confessed. Again, duty bindeth me to execute thee.
Battlefield Inquisitor.evoFlair_: Hast thou committed heresy? Forsooth, blindly and impartially shall this inquisition will gleaneth the truth. Whether yea or nay, judgment shalt be delivered.

Incandescent Dragon.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, give it -2/-0.
Incandescent Dragon.evoEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, give it -2/-0.
Incandescent Dragon.baseFlair_: A dragon to be feared and worshipped. A divine messenger descended from heaven to identify and expel evil thoughts.
Incandescent Dragon.evoFlair_: The incandescent dragon has the power to rob the forces of evil of their desire to do battle. Darkness cannot hope to withstand its dazzling glow.

Heavenly Aegis.baseEffect_:
Reduce damage to this follower to 0.
Can't be affected by spells and effects except for those that change this card's attack or defense.
Heavenly Aegis.evoEffect_:
Reduce damage to this follower to 0.
Can't be affected by spells and effects except for those that change this card's attack or defense.
Heavenly Aegis.baseFlair_: Its radiance sears the eyes of the wicked. Its soaring divinity deflects the arms of the lowly. It is that which can and cannot be seen, that which is and is not. It is the untouchable armor of a god.
Heavenly Aegis.evoFlair_: Shining white armor that epitomizes infallible justice. It moves in accordance with the dictates of divine retribution and rules the wicked and lowly with an iron fist. For them, judgment day has come.

Garuda, Ruler of Storms.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
----------
Fanfare: Subtract 3 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
Whenever an allied amulet is destroyed, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Garuda, Ruler of Storms.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied amulet is destroyed, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Garuda, Ruler of Storms.baseFlair_: Your prayers have taken wing, stirring the winds of turmoil once more. The gold of heaven on high—try as they might, no one can surmount the ruler of storms.
Garuda, Ruler of Storms.evoFlair_: Dare not raise your head, ground dweller. Simply acknowledge the sky above and the wind that envelops it—all is governed by his subjects. This spear I brandish upon you is a blessing.

Tzekibaba, Forsaken God.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put different Countdown amulets from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those amulets.
Tzekibaba, Forsaken God.baseFlair_: Revered by humanity, he hunted down angels of corruption, tearing apart their wings and branding them. The gods recognized his deeds, but did not forgive him. He acknowledged the gods, but did not forgive them.
Tzekibaba, Forsaken God.evoFlair_: He possessed the power to kill angels, but remained unable to challenge the gods—that blade remained locked in his heart. The gods merely use him as a tool, but he knows his day of vindication is nigh.

Goblin.baseFlair_: You think I look pretty scary, huh? Well, there ain't nothin' to me really. I'm kinda the lowest of the low. I don't got no strength, no wisdom. I don't think you'd like me when I get angry though.
Goblin.evoFlair_: You don't gotta be scared of me. Everyone knows I'm just a little goon. Still, you shouldn't mess with folk who've got weapons. This sword's kinda tiny, but it still hurts.

Wise Merman.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied Neutral follower.
Wise Merman.baseFlair_: Though he's a merman, he never attacks people and instead stands contemplatively on the beach. He sometimes offers people wisdom and is thus known as the sage of the sea.
Wise Merman.evoFlair_: He bestows wisdom upon those who have the mettle to lead the future, and they become the sages of the next age.

Steadfast Angel.baseFlair_: It is he who hath forged the resplendent gates and sacred temples of heaven. Verily, the celestial realm is his workshop, and he is wont to protect his creations.
Steadfast Angel.evoFlair_:
His hammer ringeth across the heavens, like unto a blessed bell. One angel is drawn by the rhythmic chorus of his labor.
"Ding-dong, ding-dong!"
"You annoying little—I'm trying to work here!"

Assembly Droid.baseFlair_:
Verifying access request...
Initializing Project: Core.
Starting up.
Assembly Droid.evoFlair_:
Confirming changes to core.
Functional restrictions partially lifted.
Accelerating optimization.

Repair Mode.baseEffect_:
Restore 1 defense to an ally.
If it's a Machina follower, restore 3 defense instead.
Repair Mode.baseFlair_:
Confirming damage to core.
Functional restrictions partially lifted.
Activating repair system.

Angelic Snipe.baseFlair_: One loosed arrow becomes a light that pierces the heart of an evildoer.

Into the Looking Glass.baseEffect_:
Select a Neutral follower in your hand and put a copy of it into your hand.
Change all allied followers in play into Neutral followers.
Into the Looking Glass.baseFlair_: I wonder what I'll find in there! —Alice, Wonderland Explorer

Mystic Ring.baseEffect_:
Banish a card in your hand.
Put a copy of the banished card into your deck.
Draw a card.
Mystic Ring.baseFlair_: You are not, dear cowardly one, worthy of this fate. So in place of fate, I shall rewind time—but only a little, for a little is all you deserve. —The Goddess of Time

Treasure Map.baseEffect_: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Forest of Dreams, Arthurian Light, Enchanted Library, Phoenix Roost, Grave Desecration, Bloodfed Flowerbed, or Pegasus Sculpture.
Treasure Map.baseFlair_: Companions, knowledge, and tools. When the three are assembled, a new adventure unfolds. —The Adventurer's Handbook

Clash of Heroes.baseEffect_:
Select an allied follower and an enemy follower. Deal X damage to the first follower and Y damage to the second follower. X equals the attack of the second follower and Y equals the attack of the first follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
Clash of Heroes.baseFlair_: Fight to the finish and show your pride. Swing your blade as though the fate of the world rested on your shoulders.

Nourishing Fare.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Restore 2 defense to your leader if the enemy leader's defense is higher than yours.
Nourishing Fare.baseFlair_: Truly sublime. It warms me to my very core. It seems he's finally mastered the use of medicinal herbs to create a delicate yet aromatic flavor. You've outdone yourself again, Gourmet Emperor. —Lyriola, Supreme Critic

Flaming-Hot Fare.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if their defense is higher than yours.
Flaming-Hot Fare.baseFlair_: Now this is quite the surprise. It burns me to my very core. Yet, the spices and umami flavors dance in zesty harmony... I expected nothing less, Gourmet Emperor. —Lyriola, Supreme Critic

Infernal Gaze.baseEffect_:
Until the start of your next turn, add 10 to the original cost of spells in your opponent's hand. (Only affects cards in hand at the time this effect is activated.)
Draw a card.
Infernal Gaze.baseFlair_: Ethereal soul or corporeal flesh, a frozen fate awaits all beings caught in gelid gaze.

Infernal Surge.baseFlair_: From his fingertips it surges, rendering all that is to naught, and all that is naught to being.

Fount of Angels.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied follower until the end of the turn.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Fount of Angels.baseFlair_: The angels shed tears for the sorrow of the world of men. Then the tears fell to earth, forming a great spring withal. And the spring of tears comforted the people, and it blessed them. —Chapter 3, Angelon Erga

Sentry Gate.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Destroy an enemy follower.
Whenever an enemy follower evolves during your opponent's turn, deal 2 damage to that follower.
Sentry Gate.baseFlair_: Though the gate may tower above you, you should nevertheless prostrate yourself in humility.

Naterran Great Tree.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any other allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, randomly destroy 1.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Naterran Great Tree.baseFlair_:
Naterra, a verdant world born from the bounty of aether.
Seeds of conflict take root as its populace fractures and clashes.
Peace or war. Light or shadow.
When the Mother begins to sing, all will be decided.

Fighter.baseFlair_: In this world of conflict, the only thing a man can truly rely on is his strength. That is why I must continue to fight, continue to win. I simply must.
Fighter.evoFlair_: In this world of conflict, the only thing a man can truly rely on is his strength. With this sword I shall carve out a future for myself!

Minotaur.baseFlair_: "Ugly," they called me. "Monster," they screamed as they fled from the sight of me. No human would deign to help a beast like me. And so I sought power—the power to protect myself.
Minotaur.evoFlair_: Violence is my armor. It shields my body, shields my mind against the slings and arrows of those heartless scoundrels who revile me. Look at me, slanderers—behold my valor as you crumble before it!

Sektor.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if an allied Neutral follower that costs at least 5 play points is in play.
Sektor.baseFlair_: Victory is in my grasp! Let the people rejoice! And, to the losers, honorable defeat or atrocious executions. The choice is theirs!
Sektor.evoFlair_: Putting your life on the line makes any victory that much more glorious! Now answer to me!

Hamsa.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the attack of the strongest enemy follower in play.
Hamsa.baseFlair_: So, you look at me and all you see is a tasty-looking duck, huh? That's only because your heart is losing its purity!
Hamsa.evoFlair_: That's right. I'm a mirror into your soul. My appearance in your eyes was a test to see if you're fit to set foot on sacred ground!

Owlcat.baseEffect_: Clash: Destroy the enemy follower if its attack is 1.
Owlcat.evoEffect_: Clash: Destroy the enemy follower if its attack is 1.
Owlcat.baseFlair_: An ill-fated tomcat who was fused with an owl by uncanny magic. He prowls the skies by night and pines for his old life in the alleys by day.
Owlcat.evoFlair_: With his prey before him, the owlcat's thoughts fly as furiously as him. Hoo-reow! Hoo-reow! Hoo-reow! The cries of his victim drive him into ecstasy.

Happy Pig.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Happy Pig.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Happy Pig.baseFlair_: Oinkie, oink! My tummy's just full of happy! Happy oinkie to the whole wide worldie!
Happy Pig.evoFlair_: Oink, oinkie! Eat that sadness away and fill your tummy with happy! And just like that... Doink! Fill the whole wide world with happy!

Tart Man.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return a random enemy follower to the opponent's hand.
Tart Man.baseFlair_: Bow down before me, sugar-slurping plebes! Yes, I am the tart fairy! An upper-crust morsel fit for kings!
Tart Man.evoFlair_: Bronzed and buttery on the outside, gooey on the inside. Manners can wait—it's time to dig in! Huh? Hold up! No running away!

Goblin Fighter.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand - Goblin or Goblin Leader.
Goblin Fighter.baseFlair_: The scouting party lift their voices to reveal the enemy's position. Answering battle cries sound from the front lines. Orders ring out from the commanders. The army moves as if of one mind, motivated by a single, driving thought: "Gimme that, it's mine!"
Goblin Fighter.evoFlair_:
"This plan is foolproof! A thing of beauty!"
—Goblin Leader
"Yeesh, we're gonna be knee-deep in goblins all day, huh?"
—Village Guard

Reize, Spice Cherub.baseFlair_: There's nothing better than a well-seasoned dish! That magical flavor that bursts on your tongue and takes your whole body by storm! Take pepper, for example. Just sprinkle it in and... Uwachoo! Ehehe... See?
Reize, Spice Cherub.evoFlair_: I know I talk a good game, but I'm still learning my way around the spice rack. Still, I won't give up! Someday, I'll make food that'll explode on your tongue and shake you to the core!

Hnikar, Warring Thunder.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
Hnikar, Warring Thunder.baseFlair_: My brother-in-arms, he who skewers enemies with a flash of lightning. Though he may be an abysmal fool, upon revealing his true splendor he is capable of piercing through all creation. —Grimnir, Warring Tempest
Hnikar, Warring Thunder.evoFlair_: Hey, this is my buddy Hnikar! He can be a bit of a screwup, but battle's where he really shines! —Grimnir, Warring Tempest

Robogoblin.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Repair Mode into your hand.
Robogoblin.baseFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Initializing Project: Core.
Starting up... Startup failed.
Insufficient energy remaining.
Robogoblin.evoFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Confirming changes to core.
Confirming optimized support request.
ERROR. Switching priority to energy conservation.

Hoverboard Mercenary.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.
Hoverboard Mercenary.baseFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Initializing Project: Core.
Starting up... Startup failed.
Initiating auxiliary unit... Activating antigrav.
Hoverboard Mercenary.evoFlair_:
Antigrav online. Part assembly... OK.
Confirming changes to core.
Assembly complete. ERROR. Repairing.
Corresponding assistance needed.

Sweet-Tooth Sleuth.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Investigation into your hand.
Sweet-Tooth Sleuth.baseFlair_:
"I'll pay you back if it takes my whole life to do it! So please... please! Will you take the case?"
The detective reached out and took the candy in the boy's hand. "This will do for my fee," he said.
Sweet-Tooth Sleuth.evoFlair_:
A detective needs two things: deductive reasoning and inspiration. That and a dash of sweetness. The old gray matter needs sugar to produce those flashes of insight.
"Another pro bono job... I really am a soft touch."

Bazooka Goblins.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers that have Ambush.
Bazooka Goblins.baseFlair_:
But we were perfectly hidden! How'd they target us so accurately? Our enemy must be one skilled marksman!
—Ninja Trainee
Bazooka Goblins.evoFlair_:
"Hey! Look right! Fresh meat!"
"Which way's right?" "The opposite of left!"
"Which way's left?" "The opposite of right!"
—Conversation between two goblins

Wayfaring Illustrator.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied Machina or Natura follower and put a copy of it into your hand.
Wayfaring Illustrator.baseFlair_: "Art is an expression of the self." He laughs as he smears his brush across the canvas. "And the only way to make great art is to have full faith in oneself." He gazes calmly, even happily, on his subjects: a city guard and monster locked in a life-and-death battle.
Wayfaring Illustrator.evoFlair_:
An artist's character is not necessarily in accord with his or her work. Take for example this creative chap. Though he's the picture of egoism, his paintings are nothing short of breathtaking!
—Musings of an Unnamed Artist

Bellringer Angel.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Bellringer Angel.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Bellringer Angel.baseFlair_: Ding-dong! Hee-hee! Can you hear that? That's the sound of the bells of joy! Try closing your eyes and let it sink deep into your heart!
Bellringer Angel.evoFlair_: It's time to ring the bells of joy! These are no ordinary bells, you know! They play a song of love that blesses listeners' souls!

Unicorn Dancer Unica.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Unicorn Dancer Unica.evoEffect_: At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Unicorn Dancer Unica.baseFlair_: Check out my dance! It'll make you smile!
Unicorn Dancer Unica.evoFlair_: Dancing is my life! Come on! Dance with me!

Lyrial, Celestial Archer.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Lyrial, Celestial Archer.baseFlair_: Go check out the Castle in the Sky! Go smite your old coworker! Sheesh, my boss works us to the bone. I guess it's all a part of the job though!
Lyrial, Celestial Archer.evoFlair_: So my boss says I've gotta smite you. It'll be sad to see you go, but orders are orders. Time for you to say bye bye!

Wandering Bard Elta.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give both leaders the following effect - Fanfare effects will not activate. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
Wandering Bard Elta.baseFlair_: Driven by a dream to put my heart into verse, I travel far and wide. But my dream just isn't doing anything for my stage fright!
Wandering Bard Elta.evoFlair_: Maybe I'm no good at singing, but I still want to share my heart with the world. So could you all listen to my verse just this once?

Actress Feria.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +1/+1 to all other allied Neutral followers.
Actress Feria.baseFlair_: I am the flower that blooms on stage. I sing like a bird and smile like a goddess to welcome the audience into my beautiful tale.
Actress Feria.evoFlair_: On stage I shine brightest. Some day I'll be the very best actress, one able to express anything in the world! You'll see!

Evelisia the Fallen.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Evelisia the Fallen.baseFlair_: Why did my wings turn black? Why did they chase me out of the skies? And why... why do the angels have to doubt me?
Evelisia the Fallen.evoFlair_: Whenever I try to find out why, it hurts deep inside my heart. Tell me, someone, am I a fallen angel? Did I do something bad? If that's the case... If that's how it is, then I...

Valkyrie of Order.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +2/+2.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain +3/+3 more.
Valkyrie of Order.baseFlair_: Find your way, human. The answer you seek is there inside the order. I found my answer through obedience to the gods—salvation, the only answer.
Valkyrie of Order.evoFlair_: Do not stand in awe, human. Order will in time engender an answer, the answer that obedience is a truth without parallel. Now take this salvation as your own.

Unica, Unicorn Maiden.baseEffect_: Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Unica, Unicorn Maiden.baseFlair_: La-la-la! This new dance is difficult, but it's very pretty! It gets everyone teetering and tottering until they all fall down though!
Unica, Unicorn Maiden.evoFlair_:
"As always, her dancing gets pretty intense..."
—Medusa
"I don't think I've ever seen anything like this in the underworld..."
—Cerberus

Apollo.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have 2 play points and no cards in play and your opponent has at least 1 card in play, invoke this card.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +7/+7 and Ward.
Apollo.baseFlair_: Thanks for putting all those weapons away—what better way to commemorate the occasion than a song of love and peace? Without further ado, ladies and gentlemen, I give you... Sonata Harmonia!
Apollo.evoFlair_: Inciting violence to defeat your enemies? Anyone can do that—instead of such vicious ways, why not spread joy in the name of love and peace? That's why I choose to shred tunes, not faces! Oh, baaaby...

Extreme Carrot.baseEffect_: Last Words: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, put an Extreme Carrot into your hand.
Extreme Carrot.baseFlair_: Is he some expression of nature's will? Or nature itself? Unsatisfied with baser fare, this paragon of carrotkind embarks on a quest for the lofty heights of gustatory greatness.
Extreme Carrot.evoFlair_: When this classy carrot's orange peel matures to a ruddier hue, his quest will come to an end. Nature's finest flavors will burst across the tongue, delighting the taste buds and the soul, and the world shall clamor for seconds.

Cloud Gigas.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the start of your turn, put a Cloud Gigas into your deck and banish this follower.
Cloud Gigas.baseFlair_:
The cloud gigas is as fickle as the weather
One minute he's hot, the next he's cold
For days he'll sit as still as stone
Then disappear in a puff of clouds
—Mountainside Village Folk Song
Cloud Gigas.evoFlair_:
The clouds in the mountains are mighty tall
And the cloud gigas hides inside them
You might not be able to see him from here
But he'll come running when danger's afoot
—Mountainside Village Folk Song

Ultimate Carrot.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put an Ultimate Carrot into your hand.
Ultimate Carrot.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put an Ultimate Carrot into your hand.
Ultimate Carrot.baseFlair_: The supreme carrot, standing with the most sublime of ingredients. The flavor of its bright orange frame overwhelms all else in creation.
Ultimate Carrot.evoFlair_: The supreme carrot, standing with the most sublime of ingredients. Unsurpassed is its flavor, and heroes dream often of its tastiness and aroma.

Demonic Simulacrum.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +4/+2 if at least 2 evolved allied followers are in play.
Demonic Simulacrum.baseFlair_: Only when the chosen pair demonstrates true power does the great demonic simulacrum awaken at last.
Demonic Simulacrum.evoFlair_: The demonic simulacrum shares its power only with those who seek new strength and the form to go with it.

Paradise Vanguard.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish an enemy follower with 1 defense.
Paradise Vanguard.baseFlair_: I'm not the mouth of god; I'm her gripping hand. I shall judge you without so much as a word.
Paradise Vanguard.evoFlair_: My lady's hopes are my hopes. My lady's wishes are the world's wishes. There'll be no place for mercy when I judge you.

Lyria, Azure Maiden.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time damage is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Put a random Neutral follower that costs at least 7 play points from your deck into your hand. Recover 7 play points.
Lyria, Azure Maiden.baseFlair_: I've met so many people on this journey. Nice people, scary people—all of the members of our crew—but most importantly of all, the one who's always there for me... you.
Lyria, Azure Maiden.evoFlair_:
I don't want to watch as everyone else gets hurt protecting me. I want to protect all of you too. That's why I have to summon it!
Primeval dragon, child of flames and darkness!
Thy name is... Bahamut!

Ephemera, Sword Angel.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no other allied followers in play, gain Rush.
Ephemera, Sword Angel.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are no other allied followers in play, gain +2/+2.
Ephemera, Sword Angel.baseFlair_: There's no one left. The only angel still able to fight is me. I'll give it all up. Candy, naps... everything, if it means I can save the world!
Ephemera, Sword Angel.evoFlair_: It might not do any good. Maybe fighting back won't make a difference. But I have faith. The world isn't this cruel. One day light will pierce the gloom!

Desert Pathfinder.baseEffect_: Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
Desert Pathfinder.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Last Words: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree.
Desert Pathfinder.baseFlair_:
Come, friend. You will cross the dunes safely on the wings of an angel.
What's that? My steed looks like no angel you've ever seen? But look there on his back! What else but wings would those two proud humps be?
Desert Pathfinder.evoFlair_:
Fear not, friend, though you are beset by foes.
My steed is a demon who devours the desert itself. Behold his powerful jaws. Are these not the gnashing teeth of the maw of hell itself? Deterrent enough for any craven marauder.

Dawn's Splendor.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Whenever an enemy follower with Storm attacks your leader, give that follower -2/-0.
Dawn's Splendor.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give -2/-0 to an enemy follower.
Dawn's Splendor.baseFlair_: Mortals are imperfect. They blunder. They change. And because they do, their hopes for the future shine all the brighter. That brilliance locked within their hearts—I plan to reveal it.
Dawn's Splendor.evoFlair_: Thoughts are intangible. They waver. They vanish. And because they do, their brilliance is unparalleled. The sum of their thoughts becomes an aurora intense enough to raze all evil.

Changewing Cherub.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 3 other Machina cards in your hand, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. If you have at least 3 other Natura cards, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Changewing Cherub.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put an Assembly Droid or Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Changewing Cherub.baseFlair_: The progress of technology, the growth of nature. The servants of the hybrid god employ both in their affairs, embracing and rejecting the dichotomy without contradiction.
Changewing Cherub.evoFlair_: One wing born of technology, one wing born of nature. The servants of the hybrid god do not waver in battle, adoring and abhorring all creation without contradiction.

Legendary Fighter.baseEffect_:
When another allied follower evolves, gain the ability to attack 2 times per turn.
When you play a spell, gain Bane.
When you play an amulet, gain Rush.
At the start of your turn, gain +8/+8 if this follower has the ability to attack 2 times per turn, Bane, and Rush.
Legendary Fighter.baseFlair_: The nameless warrior took up his sword. He hungered only for triumph. He believed only in strength.
Legendary Fighter.evoFlair_: Treachery and deception fall to his sword of justice. Like the prizes and flames of war, he does not seek solitude. Yet where his goal lies, there can only be one. Thus, the nameless hero becomes a living legend.

Wrathful Icefiend.baseFlair_:
The fifth circle: Wrath.
Those who lose themselves in indignation will sink to their wastes in the mire of Styx.
Wrathful Icefiend.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, father of falsehoods, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Keen Enchantment.baseFlair_: A sharper blade to cut through anything!

Investigation.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Enhance (6): Draw 3 cards instead.
Investigation.baseFlair_: For master sleuths, the search for truth is a dance—sometimes with great attention to detail, and occasionally in reckless fashion.

Travelers' Respite.baseEffect_:
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Travelers' Respite.baseFlair_: Nature grants us all manner of blessings. A single tree can purify the air, offer shaded shelter, or even provide warmth as firewood.

Sudden Showers.baseFlair_:
Huh? Why's it dark all of a sudden? That's weird. There wasn't a cloud in the sky when I left this morn—
—A Traveler's Last Words

Trail of Light.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded, draw a card.
----------
Draw a card.
Trail of Light.baseFlair_: The light that filters through the trees will bring us a brighter tomorrow.

Altered Fate.baseEffect_: Discard your hand. Draw a card for each card you discarded.
Altered Fate.baseFlair_: Let's see what our next fate will be.

Seraphic Blade.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet that costs 2 play points or less.
Enhance (6): Destroy any enemy follower or amulet instead.
Seraphic Blade.baseFlair_: Your folly will be met with gentle silence. And now, you too will know the eternal void.

Heavenfall.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
Draw a card.
Heavenfall.baseFlair_: The dreaded day arrives, bringing the end of times. By my hand, the heavens shall fall.

Well of Destiny.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
Well of Destiny.baseFlair_: Blessed be thou who livest in these days.

Valkyrie's Spear.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Neutral follower comes into play, give it +1/+0.
Valkyrie's Spear.baseFlair_: This spear points the way to victory.

Strategic Assembly.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower +1/+0.
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower with no card text Ward.
Strategic Assembly.baseFlair_: A roadmap that would lead us to riches: the universal language.

Genesis of Legend.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower +0/+1 and Bane.
Genesis of Legend.baseFlair_: Through the annals of history, stories of lore are construed into wisdom. As new pages in time unfold, legends are born.

Staircase to Paradise.baseEffect_:
Countdown (6)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Subtract 6 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put 3 random followers from your deck into your hand.
Staircase to Paradise.baseFlair_: For the virtuous, there is no salvation greater than death. —Holy Teachings, Chapter 1

Mercenary Drifter.baseFlair_: So you want some demons slain? Well, if you're good for the coin, I'm good for the killing. As long as I get what's mine, you'll be more than happy with the results.
Mercenary Drifter.evoFlair_: Work Hard for Your Pay—that's my motto. Hire me and you'll get exactly the fight you hoped for. All right, time to clock in! Come on, demons, your heads will put food on my table!

Shield Angel.baseFlair_: Thousands of arrows have been fired towards it, and yet my shield of light has never been penetrated. Allow me to use it to protect the combatants from harm!
Shield Angel.evoFlair_: I will stand in the way of all disasters and keep you safe from harm! No matter how deep the despair that assails us, I will keep the light of hope shining!

Healing Angel.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Healing Angel.baseFlair_: Bring me the brave warriors injured in battle. I am Heaven's own healer—there is no pain I cannot ease.
Healing Angel.evoFlair_: You war-weary souls, come to me; rest in the healing light of love. Close your eyes. As light bathes your body, feel the flame of courage ignite in you once more.

Goblin Mage.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower that costs 2 play points or less from your deck into your hand.
Goblin Mage.baseFlair_: It's so sad without Feena here. I think I'll follow her nice and quiet!
Goblin Mage.evoFlair_: I'll use my magic illusions to help you, Feena! Just give me shiny stuff to say thanks!

Angel of the Word.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Angel of the Word.baseFlair_: With this arrow I'll make the will of the lord known!
Angel of the Word.evoFlair_: Angelic arrows are truly miraculous! They bring revelation to the just and judgment to the wicked!

Axe Fighter.baseFlair_: Come at me! I'll hack you to bits right here! And I promise it'll hurt you more than it hurts me!
Axe Fighter.evoFlair_: I can't fall here—not with my family and allies counting on me! So come at me! The battlefield's mine!

Angelic Knight.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied follower.
Angelic Knight.baseFlair_: Children of men who are heading into this just war. I am a heavenly angel, and I will bless your troops.
Angelic Knight.evoFlair_: Children of men who are heading into this just war. I shall help you see virtue through. I shall fight alongside you as a model warrior, and you will receive my blessings.

Nyx.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
Nyx.baseFlair_: Bringing darkness wherever she goes, the night goddess hides the stars by painting the sky black. Those who embrace darkness give thanks to her so that they may become one with the pall. —The Night Goddess, Chapter 2
Nyx.evoFlair_: Lovers of the pall know how to manage the darkness: let it paint over the senses and conceal one's true nature. The goddess looks on her adorable flock and smiles as she scatters the darkness amongst them. —The Night Goddess, Chapter 4

Dungeon Explorer Chloe.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
Dungeon Explorer Chloe.baseFlair_: Do you know the ingredients for adventure? Companions, knowledge, and tools? No silly! Just courage and a dream! Let's go!
Dungeon Explorer Chloe.evoFlair_: Embrace your dreams and muster your courage... For with courage, you can make your dreams come true! Now, now, there's no time to lose! I don't know where we're going, but it's sure to be an adventure!

Burly Axewielder.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+1. Destroy an enemy amulet.
Burly Axewielder.baseFlair_: Ga-ha-ha! You're a funny one! Maybe you should hang up your sword and take up comedy! Oh, that's actually your day job? Bwa-ha-ha! You really are a barrel of laughs!
Burly Axewielder.evoFlair_: Some say I'm too easily amused. If you ask me, though, I say people don't laugh enough! I mean, even the battlefield can be hilarious—look at those serious faces... Bwa-ha-ha!

Valkyrie of Chaos.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly gain Ward or Rush.
Valkyrie of Chaos.baseFlair_: Let confusion get the better of you, human. The answer you seek is there inside the chaos. I found my answer on the other side of confusion—destruction, the only answer.
Valkyrie of Chaos.evoFlair_: Do not stand in awe, human. Confusion will in time engender an answer, the answer that confusion is a truth without parallel. Now take this chaos as your own.

Lowain of the Brofamily.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Elsam of the Brofamily into your hand.
Lowain of the Brofamily.baseFlair_: Sorry to keep you, like, salivating. Here's your grub with all the—whoa! That lady knight sitting over there... Total babe city!
Lowain of the Brofamily.evoFlair_: Guess I've got Katalina fever, you know? But I won't stop till I show her the way this heart beats. Kat, watch out! Cuz someday I'm gonna be your numero uno! Waaheey!

Barkeep.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If your leader's defense is less than your opponent's, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Barkeep.baseFlair_:
Hey, pal. Never seen you 'round here before. You'd better move along though. Don't say I didn't warn ya.
—Kindhearted patron of the Skin of Your Teeth
Barkeep.evoFlair_:
Hey, buddy! Never seen you in here. Pull up a seat! Hey, barkeep! Give our new friend here the usual, an' make it extra spicy!
—Mean-spirited regular at the Skin of Your Teeth

Alchemical Confectioner.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Natura cards from your deck into your hand.
Alchemical Confectioner.baseFlair_: Contrast is what really makes flavors pop! Just think what a dash of salt does for your sweets! So even the nastiest food tastes better from the hands of a cute cook like me! If you know the right way to spin it, you can make anything easier to swallow!
Alchemical Confectioner.evoFlair_: Contrast sharpens emotional impact too! Consider how much sweeter victory tastes when snatched from the jaws of defeat! So try eating something whose appearance absolutely terrifies you! The relief you feel will be better than any secret sauce!

Plucky Treasure Hunter.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have any Machina or Natura cards in your hand, discard 1. Then put 2 random cards that share a trait with that card from your deck into your hand.
Plucky Treasure Hunter.baseFlair_: Ah, heck yeah! Treasure! But you can't trick me, you silly, deadly labyrinth! You're hiding even greater riches deep in your tummy, aren't you?
Plucky Treasure Hunter.evoFlair_: Whoa-ho-ho! The mother lode! They said that dungeon diving would be the end of me—well, look where my treasure tingle's gotten me now!

Club Soldier.baseFlair_: Hurry! Her Royal Majesty is impatient. And if she loses her temper, you'll lose your head.
Club Soldier.evoFlair_: Rebelling against Her Majesty? This won't end well for you. You're merely brazen, not brave.

Heart Guardian.baseFlair_: To keep Her Majesty safe is why I'm here. It's why I live.
Heart Guardian.evoFlair_: Her Majesty rules! So long as there's breath in my lungs, I'll allow none to touch her.

Spade Raider.baseFlair_: My blade will punish any who disobey Her Majesty.
Spade Raider.evoFlair_: Orders are orders, especially when they're coming from Her Majesty. Death to defiers of the queen!

Elsam of the Brofamily.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Put a Tomoi of the Brofamily into your hand.
Elsam of the Brofamily.baseFlair_: Yo! I'm Elsam. It's, like, I'm so honored everybody could get together to share this grindage. As for my lady type... I've got a thing for fashionable girls. Here's to a rad evening, everyone!
Elsam of the Brofamily.evoFlair_: All right, you guys ready to begin the forty-fifth grand tourney of the primal beast name game? w00t! w00t!

Tomoi of the Brofamily.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Human! Pyramid! Attack! into your hand.
Tomoi of the Brofamily.baseFlair_: Prime Minister Freesia... Nay, dearest Freezie. Just order me to protect you, and it's done!
Tomoi of the Brofamily.evoFlair_: Freezie, stop... I'm still on duty... Zzz...

Lizardman.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon an unevolved Lizardman.
Lizardman.baseFlair_: Some monsters are rather more intelligent than others. Take the lizardmen, for example. These creatures fight for each other and for the survival of their species. Thinking they're just dumb reptiles would be disastrous.
Lizardman.evoFlair_: You think you can negotiate with lizardmen just because they speak a few words of human language? Think again. Any information you give them is sure to be used against you one day.

Gourmet Emperor Khaiza.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Ultimate Carrot into your hand.
Gourmet Emperor Khaiza.baseFlair_: For the finest chefs, only the finest ingredients will do! Let the cooking begin! Coctura integro!
Gourmet Emperor Khaiza.evoFlair_: Everything in this world is just one more ingredient to me, including you tasty-looking morsels! Let's see if you can stand up to my most refined cooking technique! Firestorm of damnation!

Purehearted Singer.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Draw a card.
Purehearted Singer.baseFlair_: I don't do songs for the throngs. I only sing for one person. This song is your song. Now lend me your ears.
Purehearted Singer.evoFlair_: My songs are great and heartfelt, because they're for one and one alone. Please listen as I sing.

Goblinmount Ogre.baseFlair_: Whoa! Easy there, big guy! Eyes on the intruder only, got it?
Goblinmount Ogre.evoFlair_: Yowza! S-settle down, buddy! I know you want 'em all for yourself, but don't get wild now!

Jafnhar, Warring Flame.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, evolve this follower.
Jafnhar, Warring Flame.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
Jafnhar, Warring Flame.baseFlair_: My brother-in-arms, he who possesses the Eye of Flame. Though he may cross established boundaries and commit taboos, upon sparking his true flame he is capable of reducing all creation to ash. —Grimnir, Warring Tempest
Jafnhar, Warring Flame.evoFlair_: Yeah, so this is my buddy Jafnhar! He doesn't really understand the concept of personal space, but he's got an amazing power in one of his eyes! How cool is that? —Grimnir, Warring Tempest

Romantic Chanteuse.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an enemy the following effect until the start of your next turn - Reduce all damage dealt to 0. (Applies to attacks, spells, and effects.)
Romantic Chanteuse.baseFlair_: Songs spread peace and bring love to the furthest corners of the world. That's what a very famous singer taught me when I was just starting out. Anyway, here's a single from my upcoming album called Peace Sonata. Baby, it's love and peace...
Romantic Chanteuse.evoFlair_:
Whoa, I love this song! Who wrote—Ah! It's mine, isn't it? Who knew it would catch on like this—love and peace, yeah!
—Apollo

Harnessed Flame.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Glass to become Flame and Glass.
Harnessed Flame.evoEffect_:
Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Glass to become Flame and Glass.
Harnessed Flame.baseFlair_: I have no regrets. If I didn't burn Mother to death, Glass would have been killed!
Harnessed Flame.evoFlair_: Mother hated Glass and wanted to kill her, but I couldn't let that happen! I wanted to know Glass! She's a part of me after all. I had to protect her.

Harnessed Glass.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Flame to become Flame and Glass.
Harnessed Glass.evoEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Flame to become Flame and Glass.
Harnessed Glass.baseFlair_: I knew what I'd become. But I had to freeze Father, or he would have hurt Flame. I had no choice.
Harnessed Glass.evoFlair_: Father loved Flame—he only hated that she killed Mother. That's why I had to watch over Flame. I couldn't let her kill Father too.

Grimnir, War Cyclone.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers 4 times.
Grimnir, War Cyclone.baseFlair_: I am Grimnir, heaven's chosen god of war and the mad cyclone. I have descended from the lofty realm to save this world, but make no mistake... I'm not here to make friends.
Grimnir, War Cyclone.evoFlair_: As my power grows, something within me whirls ever more madly. And few who see me unleash the cyclone will forget the sight of a mighty war god consumed by fury.

Rapunzel.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
When another allied follower attacks, this follower can attack until the start of your next turn.
Rapunzel.evoEffect_:
Can't attack.
When another allied follower attacks, this follower can attack until the start of your next turn.
Rapunzel.baseFlair_: I spend my life here in this tower, braiding and unbraiding my hair. But if someone were only to come to me...
Rapunzel.evoFlair_: Here in this tower I'm lonely. No one comes to me but the songbirds. But if someone were only to take my hand, then I'd say good-bye to this tower.

Goblin Emperor.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Goblin, Goblin Leader, or Goblin Princess.
Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point or less comes into play, give it Rush.
Goblin Emperor.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point or less comes into play, give it Rush.
Goblin Emperor.baseFlair_: There is no need for scheming or tactics, for violence is of the essence! Scream for vengeance, cry your fury—we will lay waste to the heavens!
Goblin Emperor.evoFlair_: From the birds in the skies to the insects of the earth—we shall hunt, we shall feed! Our order shall rise and lay claim to every last corner of this world!

Khaiza, Radical Gourmand.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Nourishing Fare or Flaming-Hot Fare into your hand.
Khaiza, Radical Gourmand.baseFlair_: Bahahaha! Laugh, celebrate, rejoice! For it is I, the supreme gourmet emperor, in the flesh! I have made my glorious return! Now then, shall I serve up a feast for the world?
Khaiza, Radical Gourmand.evoFlair_: There are two dishes on tonight's menu! Will you be embraced by sublime nourishment, be immersed in flaming-hot passion? Bahahaha! Don't be picky, just choose!

Grimnir, Warring Tempest.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
Grimnir, Warring Tempest.baseFlair_:
"I brought you some tea, bro!"
"Oh, thanks! Did you spill it all on the way over or something? Oh well, it's the thought that counts!"
—Hnikar and Grimnir
Grimnir, Warring Tempest.evoFlair_:
"Let's get moving, Grimnir."
"Okay, okay! Haven't you ever heard of personal space?"
—Jafnhar and Grimnir

Hamsa, Hallowed Fowl.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an enemy follower is in play, change this follower's attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to the attack and defense of a random enemy follower.
Hamsa, Hallowed Fowl.baseFlair_:
"That's right. I'm a mirror into your soul."
"Oho! Such meaty thighs! Such tender flesh! Now this must be some world-class quality meat!"
"Qua... You tryin' to roast me?!"
—Hamsa and Khaiza
Hamsa, Hallowed Fowl.evoFlair_:
"Wow! Such gorgeous feathers! They'd make a fabulous accessory."
"Q-quaack! Don't even think about pluckin' these feathers!"
—Hamsa and Nelcha

Princess Knight.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a follower with Fanfare (excluding Princess Knight) from your deck into your hand.
Princess Knight.evoEffect_: Evolve: Recover 1 play point. Subtract 2 from the Union Burst of all followers in your hand.
Princess Knight.baseFlair_: He awoke with no memories, no powers of his own. But the bonds forged by his pure heart light his companions' path forward.
Princess Knight.evoFlair_: He knows not why he is here—only what he has learned since awakening. But he bravely swings his sword for friendship, cutting through artifice to seek out a true ending.

Fallen Angel.baseFlair_: These wings have been blackened by the shadow of temptation. Corrupted by desire, I have fallen. But heavens, heed my call—for what purpose was I born this way, created this way?
Fallen Angel.evoFlair_: Where can one find sin? In those corrupted by temptation, or in a god who has created beings unable to triumph over its beckoning?

Badb Catha.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Put a Morrigna's Gospel into your hand.
Badb Catha.baseFlair_: The goddess mirrors battle; or rather, battle is a reflection of her will. In the fabric of hope and despair, fated glory and fierce adversity are woven together. —Trinity of Goddesses, Chapter 5
Badb Catha.evoFlair_: War is merciful; war is ruthless. Fools are heralded as heroes, and heroes are forgotten in death. The path of your destiny rests upon the raven's feather—will you meet glory or death? —Trinity of Goddesses, Chapter 8

Gabriel, Heavenly Voice.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Use X play points to give +X/+X to this follower and another allied follower. X equals your remaining play points.
Gabriel, Heavenly Voice.baseFlair_: Look up to the heavens and perk your ears. Judgment's trumpet will sound without timbre or tone. And, though wingless you might be, prophecy will be as your guidepost to the light.
Gabriel, Heavenly Voice.evoFlair_: Bow your head and be enraptured. Divine words will shake the land without pretense or pulse. And, though powerless you might be, prophecy will be your offering to the darkness.

Amaterasu.baseEffect_:
Clash: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Last Words: Put a Moon and Sun into your hand.
Amaterasu.baseFlair_: I am the one who brightens the sky. My work is to deliver light to all the world. I'll even light the abyss of the underworld with an endless shimmer.
Amaterasu.evoFlair_: You're seeking the blessings of the sky. So give your heart to the light. When it's shimmering brightest, I'll show you the wheel in the sky!

Tsukuyomi.baseEffect_:
Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Last Words: Put a Moon and Sun into your hand.
Tsukuyomi.baseFlair_: I am the one who colors the earth; my work is to bring darkness on this plane. I'll even color the sky's shimmer with an unending darkness.
Tsukuyomi.evoFlair_: You're wishing for the fall of the sky. So offer the darkness to your heart. When the clouds are darkest, the moon is sure to consume the earth.

Vicious Commander.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Vicious Commander.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
Vicious Commander.baseFlair_:
The seventh circle: Violence.
If you love not your fellows nor yourself then you deserve none in return.
Vicious Commander.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, howling lion with jaws agape, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Cloud Chorus.baseFlair_: A melody of bravery that only the divine can play.

Pitfall.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower that attacked last turn.
Pitfall.baseFlair_: Master trapsmiths may alter their contraptions depending on their prey. Alas, no need to fix what isn't broken.

Angelic Barrage.baseFlair_: Loosed arrows become lights, piercing the hearts of evildoers one by one.

Surefire Bullet.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 5 damage instead if it's evolved.
Surefire Bullet.baseFlair_: Let's see if you're still standing after a taste of this.

Craving's Splendor.baseEffect_: Give +4/+0 to a follower, then deal 4 damage to that follower.
Craving's Splendor.baseFlair_: Know the pain of yearning. Abandon your innocence. I can't wait to see how you'll change.

Goblin Warpack.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Goblins.
Enhance (6): Summon 5 instead.
Enhance (9): Then evolve all unevolved allied Goblins.
Goblin Warpack.baseFlair_:
First you reported that zombies were doing gymnastics, and now you say goblins are working together? What's next? Will pigs fly and bring happiness to the world?
—Sage Commander

Gourmet Emperor's Kitchen.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, put a Flaming-Hot Fare into your hand. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Gourmet Emperor's Kitchen.baseFlair_:
Let the cooking begin! Coctura integro! First a pinch of this, then a dash of that... And then... Unleash the flames! The oil's going to spatter, so spectators, stand back!
—Gourmet Emperor Khaiza

Ruthless Waterspout.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or less.

Moon and Sun.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon an Amaterasu or Tsukuyomi.
Enhance (7): Give that follower +3/+3.
Moon and Sun.baseFlair_: The heavens house a blazing wheel; the dark night, a silver platter. The two differ as heaven and Hades, but both shine the same.

Morrigna's Gospel.baseEffect_:
Give a random allied follower +3/+3.
Draw 3 cards.
Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Morrigna's Gospel.baseFlair_:
"Rejoice!"
"Yield your courage!"
"The heavens have chosen thee!"
—The Prophecy of Morrigna

Test of Strength.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Until this amulet leaves play, all followers in play and all followers that come into play have Ward.
Test of Strength.baseFlair_: The war-weary pair devised a simpler way to settle their differences.

Night's Way.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Add 3 to this amulet's Countdown.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Night's Way.baseFlair_: From here the arrow was shot, soaring until it struck the shield waiting on the other side. The resultant trail is but one of the goddess's miracles. —A Lore of the Night Sky, Chapter 4

Frozen Mammoth.baseEffect_:
When you play a follower that originally costs at least 7 play points, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon an Imperial Mammoth.
Frozen Mammoth.baseFlair_: What do you mean you heard an elephant? It was just your imagination! —An arctic explorer

Colosseum on High.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 4 play points and there are no allied Colosseum on Highs in play, invoke this card.
Fanfare: If any other allied Colosseum on Highs are in play, draw 2 cards and destroy this amulet.
Until this amulet leaves play, both leaders have the following effect: Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower, give it +2/+2 and Rush.
Colosseum on High.baseFlair_: A colosseum borne on the back of a god. The strongest of the eight realms gather here to bask in the admiration of thousands. With entire worlds at stake, there is no holding back—the entire colosseum breathes in a single, fevered rhythm.

Goliath.baseFlair_: Slowly the titan of a soldier approached. His every step was a mighty quake that sent rattles and groans through the buildings. The villagers could only watch in horror.
Goliath.evoFlair_: Weapons, walls, pleas—nothing could halt his tempest of destruction. The village was reduced to rubble in a blink. The titanic soldier glanced down and then moved on in search of more prey.

Desert Rider.baseFlair_: It's our duty to inspect this desert. We need to make sure it's safe before people start to cross it! Now come on—let's head out!
Desert Rider.evoFlair_: The sun's relentless, and we're covered in sand, but we can't give up. The people are relying on us! Now come on—how about you and I lead the way?

Goblin Leader.baseEffect_: Summon a Goblin at the end of your turn.
Goblin Leader.evoEffect_: Summon a Goblin at the end of your turn.
Goblin Leader.baseFlair_: Let one get away and it'll call ten, and the ten will call a hundred. You have to squelch them all. —Lucius, Goblin Slayer
Goblin Leader.evoFlair_: Don't laugh at the little devils. They may not be wise, but they don't have limits. You've got to squash them all fast. Swordsweep! —Lucius, Goblin Slayer

Rackam, Airship Pilot.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Rackam, Airship Pilot.baseFlair_: I've been blown up, torn down, and tossed around since I set out for the skies. But it was all worth it 'cuz they helped me get the Grandcypher flying again. Aaand that's why I'll never stay grounded.
Rackam, Airship Pilot.evoFlair_: Yeah, me and the Grandcypher'll get you where you're goin'. So buckle up! Next stop: the end of the sky!

High Enchantress.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Keen Enchantment into your hand.
High Enchantress.baseFlair_: I am the proof of an unyielding heart! Don't worry about nicks or cracks in your blade! My powers will have it good as new in no time! Sharp enough to slice through anything!
High Enchantress.evoFlair_: I'm living proof of what an unflagging fighting spirit can do! Your blade may crack or even break, but with me by your side, never fear! Your sword will always be sharp enough to slice through anything!

Aldis, Trendsetting Seraph.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Aldis, Trendsetting Seraph.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Aldis, Trendsetting Seraph.baseFlair_: OMG! You seem, like, totally bummed! Guess it's my time to shine! Come on, let's get hyped up!
Aldis, Trendsetting Seraph.evoFlair_:
"You could learn a lot from her."
"I have! Just listen—OMG!"
"That's not what I meant..."
—Lyrial and Ephemera

Great Goliath.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.
Enhance (10): Gain +4/+4 more.
Great Goliath.baseFlair_: A thriving metropolis stands atop what was once a mere mountain of rubble. A single step—the goliath revealed himself before the land.
Great Goliath.evoFlair_: A mere mountain of rubble rests where once stood a thriving metropolis. A single step—the goliath concealed himself within the land.

Sheep Rider.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain +2/+2 instead.
Sheep Rider.baseFlair_: Sheepies are so fluffy! Baskin' in the warm sunshine, munchin' on oh-so-tasty grass... Those precious children of the land grow up so fast!
Sheep Rider.evoFlair_: Ridin' a sheep's like floatin' on a cloud! "Clip-clop" go their little hooves, "Baa, baa" go their little voices... Those gentle children of the land are always smilin'!

Winged Courier.baseFlair_: You know that warm feeling you get when you think back on a letter? That's your heart sprouting wings so that it can send back a reply. If you could spare a thought for me too, well... that would make my day!
Winged Courier.evoFlair_: Every letter is written with emotion and sealed with shared memories. And each one nestles in your heart, giving it wings. Being a courier is so rewarding! I can't think of a more heartwarming job!

Humpty Dumpty.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to all followers.
Humpty Dumpty.baseFlair_: These duds are slick! Huh? You're looking mighty hungry...
Humpty Dumpty.evoFlair_: Ha-ha! Look who's laughing now. Have a taste of my searing light, pal!

Impartial Strix.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if you have at least 20 Neutral cards remaining in your deck.
Impartial Strix.baseFlair_: Though it's not evil, it's not partial to good. Thus is the nature of the wise strix. It longs only for a world where the balance is preserved.
Impartial Strix.evoFlair_: The far-sighted strix sees beyond all good and evil in this world. When its beak breaks the silence, the balance of the world will be restored.

Urd.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy a follower, and then put a copy of that follower into play.
Urd.baseFlair_: The past cannot be changed, and destiny cannot be altered. Everything has been set in stone. Still, you must not forget: miracles are only visited upon those who overcome this divine providence.
Urd.evoFlair_: I shall use my powers to free the future from the yoke of destiny. Do not become a prisoner of despair, for a hopeful future can be yours—a future of freedom. Go ahead and grasp it.

Uriel.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
Uriel.baseFlair_: The divine flame only grants an audience to the chosen. Burning with the radiance of dawn, the holy presence grants salvation to those it favors.
Uriel.evoFlair_: Clad in sacred flames, the angel of divine light brought a corona of golden hope to the gloomy world. Soon sunlight was restored to the heavens, marking the beginning of a new world order.

Goblinbreaker Teena.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 5 damage instead if it's a Neutral follower.
Goblinbreaker Teena.baseFlair_: Can you buy me a little more time? Just until I finish chanting my inferno spell... If you can hold back the enemy, I'll help you turn the tables!
Goblinbreaker Teena.evoFlair_: Minions of darkness! My unrivaled flames will purge your rotten souls and restore your purity!

Shining Bellringer Angel.baseFlair_: Ding-dong, ding-dong! Hey, check it out! Everybody's wishes gave these bells a new life! Now the sounds of joy are sure to reach you!
Shining Bellringer Angel.evoFlair_:
Everybody's wishes, I want them all to come true!
So wish for happiness, and the bells of joy will keep on ringing! Ding-dong, ding-dong!

Oceanus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Ruthful Droplet or Ruthless Waterspout into your hand.
Oceanus.baseFlair_: The ocean's big and open, so you can do anything! The gentle currents, the raging waves—which do you like?
Oceanus.evoFlair_: The ocean's big and open, and my heart is too! So yeah, yeah, don't do anything too bad! I won't forgive you just like that!

Feena, Dynamite Daredevil.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Feena, Dynamite Daredevil.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers that cost 1 play point or less.
Feena, Dynamite Daredevil.baseFlair_:
"C'mon, Goblin Mage! We've got treasure to hunt!"
"Ooh! Feena, I found some shiny stuff!"
"Wait, don't touch that! It's a tr—"
—Feena and Goblin Mage, falling for an obvious trap
Feena, Dynamite Daredevil.evoFlair_:
"F-failure? Ha! I don't know the meaning of the word!"
"Ah! There's something shiny on the floor! Yoink!"
"Did you hear a click just now?"
—Feena and Goblin Mage, about to fall into an oubliette

Lyrial, Archer Throne.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Until the end of the opponent's turn, give all allies the following effect - Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
Lyrial, Archer Throne.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.
Lyrial, Archer Throne.baseFlair_: A grudge against you? Why would I feel anything at all about someone I've never met? This is just part of the job. So stop struggling, okay? You're making it harder to smite you!
Lyrial, Archer Throne.evoFlair_: It's tough being a professional. You just hafta suck it up and do what you gotta do—but I won't complain! No sirree, I'm just gonna forge ahead and follow my orders. You've got my back, right?

Goblin King.baseFlair_: After losing a bloody battle for royal authority and being shut away in a cave, the prince responded to the voice of a demon. He resolved to transform into a hideous goblin so that he could have his revenge.
Goblin King.evoFlair_: As the first step in his revenge, the prince led his goblin soldiers against his homeland to claim the throne. There he planned to reign not as a man but as a goblin king.

Alice, Wonderland Explorer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all other allied Neutral followers in your hand and in play.
Alice, Wonderland Explorer.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +0/+1 to all other allied Neutral followers in your hand and in play.
Alice, Wonderland Explorer.baseFlair_: Lands of wonders, lands of marvels! What sort of adventures could be waiting? I can't wait to find out!
Alice, Wonderland Explorer.evoFlair_: I'm going to change the world to change myself. I mean, I have to change the world if I'm going to become a grown-up. I'll keep going onward, and I won't fear a thing in this land of wonders and marvels!

Fieran, Havensent Wind God.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your turn, Rally (10) - Invoke this card.
------
Fanfare: If you have more evolution points than your opponent, gain +0/+2 and deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Fieran, Havensent Wind God.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Fieran, Havensent Wind God.baseFlair_: The wind is eternal, forever traversing the four corners of the world, opening new paths as it flows. Children of man, wheresoever you tread, I am at your backs. The fear and indecision that dog your steps will be swept away by my tempests.
Fieran, Havensent Wind God.evoFlair_:
I hold her in the highest esteem, you know. She can be sharp and cold, but she'll guide those adorable humans with her easterly winds all the same. We're polar opposites, yes, but... That's why I admire her.
—Goddess of the West Wind

Scion of Desire.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, destroy a random enemy follower. Restore X defense to your leader. X equals that follower's attack.
Scion of Desire.baseFlair_:
The second circle: Lust.
The carnal malefactors and their licentious ways shall be met with an everlasting storm.
Scion of Desire.evoFlair_: The ninth circle: Cocytus. Our emperor, false-tongued serpent, is enthroned where all punishment originates—Where all sin expires.

Demonic Strike.baseFlair_: By our pact, I will eradicate thine enemy.

Fall from Grace.baseEffect_: Transform a follower or amulet into a Fallen Angel.

Angelic Smite.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower or amulet. Both players draw a card.
Angelic Smite.baseFlair_: Angels fire arrows according to the rules, but the paths of those arrows are unruly.

Resolve of the Fallen.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
If at least 3 allied followers have evolved this match, recover 3 play points.
Then, if at least 5 have evolved, draw 2 cards.
Resolve of the Fallen.baseFlair_: "Fall from grace" is such a subjective term. Paradise was only ever in the eye of the beholder.

Earthfall.baseFlair_: The dreaded day arrives, bringing the end of times. By my hand, the earth shall sink.

Fortune's Font.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Fortune's Font.baseFlair_: With time, glory fades into tranquility. The musical splash of water mingles with laughing voices. This is Isunia, home of shimmering dew and guilds.

Path to Purgatory.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to all enemies if you have at least 30 shadows.
Path to Purgatory.baseFlair_: Death comes for everyone just the same.

Angelic Sword Maiden.baseFlair_: This is the surface? I'd heard the shadows were rampant here, but I didn't expect it to stink of death and destruction like this. No matter though. By my lord's order, I will bring light upon the land!
Angelic Sword Maiden.evoFlair_: My lord once said that even the darkest shadow holds a light of hope. I've dedicated my sword—and my life—to showing everyone the truth in these words! The time has come to illuminate the world!

Ephemera, Angelic Slacker.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, give that follower +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Ephemera, Angelic Slacker.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, give that follower +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Ephemera, Angelic Slacker.baseFlair_: Funemployment was the best. Do I really have to help people fight now? Ah, never mind! I'll do the job with a smile on my face!
Ephemera, Angelic Slacker.evoFlair_: Fighting's hard, but it's just about break time for cute little angels. Ha-ha, I'm kidding! I'll work!

Tin Soldier.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Tin Soldier.baseFlair_: "A cute and quiet toy," saith the Mad Hatter. "A talkative friend for a tea party," saith the March Hare.
Tin Soldier.evoFlair_: "The best toy to kill time," saith the Mad Hatter. "A dreadfully boring friend," saith the March Hare.

Goblinmount Demon.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all other allied followers.
Goblinmount Demon.baseFlair_: "Get to work! G'wan, you brainless meathead! Put your back into it! You hear me?" "Urg!" "Hurry it up! If we're out here when the sun rises, we're finished! You'll feel my whip until the job's done!" "Urg, urg!"
Goblinmount Demon.evoFlair_: "Curses! We're surrounded! It's the en—" "Rouuuurggh!" "You... You saved us!" "It—it'sh becaush I lovesh you, shir." "Wait, you can talk?"

Fortunehunter Feena.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Goblin Mage into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Fortunehunter Feena.baseFlair_: Beautiful, powerful, and cute to boot! The one and only Feena's here!
Fortunehunter Feena.evoFlair_: Goblin Mage, did you follow me here? Now that you're here, I guess I'll just have to protect you. No one will lay a finger on you!

Goblin Princess.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Goblins.
Last Words: Put a Goblin King into your hand.
Goblin Princess.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Goblin King into your hand.
Goblin Princess.baseFlair_: With our dear king behind us, we have nothing to fear! Soldiers, attack! The time to rise is now!
Goblin Princess.evoFlair_: If we're defeated, our dear king will make the enemy pay! So march like heroes! Make the surface-dwellers go pop!

Gruff Mountaineer Captain.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has at least 5 attack, reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
Gruff Mountaineer Captain.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has at least 5 attack, reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
Gruff Mountaineer Captain.baseFlair_: No sense being a man if you don't go big. Giants? Dragons? Bring 'em on! No guts, no glory!
Gruff Mountaineer Captain.evoFlair_: I got big to be a real man. I've got no fear, and I'm happy to charge ahead. Watch out, 'cause these fists are gonna hurt!

Holy Angel Altaia.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Change an enemy follower into a Neutral follower.
Clash: Deal 4 damage to the enemy follower if it's a Neutral follower.
Holy Angel Altaia.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 4 damage to the enemy follower if it's a Neutral follower.
Holy Angel Altaia.baseFlair_: Thou, who art chosen by the heavens—I shall assist thee in forging a new path. If thou seek'st chaos, make malice. If thou seek'st balance, make benevolence.
Holy Angel Altaia.evoFlair_: I shall grant thee my strength. Ne'ertheless, thy fate is for thee to choose—to grasp with thine own hands. Forge thy destiny, and leave thy mark in history!

Giving Gourmet.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to another allied follower. If there are any Natura cards in your hand, give +2/+2 instead.
Giving Gourmet.baseFlair_: They say hunger is the best spice, so everybody dig in! Don't mind me! The feast I'm looking forward to comes afterward!
Giving Gourmet.evoFlair_: A full heart is just as good as a full belly, and seeing your smiling faces fills me up to the brim! Thank you so much—this is the best meal I've ever had!

Chaht, Ringside Announcer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers Ward.
Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it Ward.
Chaht, Ringside Announcer.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it Ward.
Chaht, Ringside Announcer.baseFlair_: Ladies and gentlemen, it's the moment you've all been waiting for! A clash between the eight realms! Whose hopes and dreams will spur them on to victory? I'm here to give you the blow-by-blow for every nail-biting second of the action!
Chaht, Ringside Announcer.evoFlair_: Looks like the challenger blew in—I mean, the challenger in blue—just got a second wind! How offensive! Uh, no, I mean... What a strong offensive! Our boy in red is all roped up! No, wait—he's on the ropes! Urgh... Sorry about that, folks. I'm not monkeying around here, I swear!

Wind God.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all allied followers.
At the start of your turn, all allied followers gain +1/+0.
Wind God.evoEffect_: At the start of your turn, all allied followers gain +1/+0.
Wind God.baseFlair_: Those who follow the path of the wind shall walk in its divine protection. Blessed be the newly chosen guardians of the wind's sacred land!
Wind God.evoFlair_: Let us whip up winds to bind heaven and earth together as one. With my tempests I will lay waste to evil; with gentle zephyrs I will breathe life back into the children of the world!

Lucius, Goblin Slayer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all other followers that cost 2 play points or more. Deal 2 damage to all followers that cost 1 play point or less.
Lucius, Goblin Slayer.baseFlair_: Never have the cursed demons crawled out of their burrows in such numbers. If they aren't dispensed with quickly, innocent villagers will pay the price.
Lucius, Goblin Slayer.evoFlair_: You demon spawn who dared to assault my homeland... I will not rest until you've tasted the same suffering. My blades will dance until every last one of you succumbs to despair.

Snow, Whitecat Sage.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card. Give +1/+1 to an allied follower.
Snow, Whitecat Sage.baseFlair_: I'm Alice's cat, but I'm a babe too! So feel safe leaving me in charge—I'll do a babe-a-licious job!
Snow, Whitecat Sage.evoFlair_: Huh, why am I blushing? I'm not! I'm not embarrassed. I can be a babe, but I'm a classy lady too!

Hector.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy if you have at least 3 other Neutral cards in your hand.
Hector.baseFlair_: In the age of the gods, a war scorched the skies and left the earth aflame. One intrepid warrior stood amidst the chaos to lead the military forces and defend his ancestral lands.
Hector.evoFlair_: In the age of the gods, an intrepid warrior charged ahead. He won fame throughout the land by striking off the heads of countless foes. Ready to fulfill his destiny, he glares down the shaft of an arrow nocked to his iron bow.

Helblindi.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Do this 2 times.
Helblindi.baseFlair_: Good? Evil? Like I care. After all, nothing's worse than an ordinary melody! The sound I play is neither good nor evil. It's somewhere in between light and dark—the twilight's melody!
Helblindi.evoFlair_: Songs about heroes, songs about despair—they're so plain and lifeless! The rhythm I'm after is nothing like that! My twilight melody will go beyond the fate of gods!

Qilin.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, gain +2/+0.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Qilin.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, gain +2/+0.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Qilin.baseFlair_: We were following its round hoofprints, trailing its melodious call. And then there it was—the golden beast. I let loose a thousand emotions in a single arrow, but the beast reflected the shot... right into my chest. —Qilin Hunter's Diary, last paragraph
Qilin.evoFlair_: We've learned a lot from that hunter's death. It is not a creature to be hunted but a being to be exalted. Wickedness begets wickedness; goodness begets goodness. This is the true nature of the golden beast. —The Cult of Qilin, Chapter 1

Apostle of Craving.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +3/+0 to a follower. Give that follower Strike: Deal 3 damage to this follower.
Apostle of Craving.baseFlair_: Lovely little beastie, this pup. She'll be the one to decide your fate.
Apostle of Craving.evoFlair_: Flee in desperation. The pain will hunt you—twist you—until you meet your immaculate end.

Starbright Deity.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put into your hand copies of the 3 left-most cards in your hand, in the order they were added.
Starbright Deity.baseFlair_: The Star shines on all, an emblem of hope. The path of countless twinkling lights she lays out guides travelers in search of their dearest dreams. The lost need only look up to the night sky, and they will find their hopes restored.
Starbright Deity.evoFlair_: She is the ruler of the twilight sky, looking down upon the works of mortalkind. Though she governs the stars, what lies beneath them is beyond her ken. She merely observes, smiling on the mortals' light-blessed faces.

Mjerrabaine, Omen of One.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no duplicate cards in your deck (excluding Mjerrabaine, Omen of One), give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if only one allied follower is in play, give +2/+2 to a random allied follower, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower, and deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Mjerrabaine, Omen of One.baseFlair_: This plane is not a singularity; it is an aggregate. Beasts of land, sea, and air; angels, demons, and children of men; even ancients—everything is part of the same whole. Therefore stand by your own will—and I shall see the world put to trial.
Mjerrabaine, Omen of One.evoFlair_: Do not assemble or congregate. Do not gather or herd. You are a fraction of the ubiquitous whole; you were born to exercise your free will—and I shall see the world put to trial thusly.

XXI. Zelgenea, The World.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn, invoke this card. Then, evolve it.
----------
Fanfare: Restore 5 defense to your leader. If your leader had 14 defense or less before defense was restored, draw 2 cards and randomly destroy 1 of the enemy followers with the highest attack in play.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
XXI. Zelgenea, The World.evoEffect_: Strike: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to all allies and enemies. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
XXI. Zelgenea, The World.baseFlair_: The World is an open palm, an author of perfection. Creation is an inevitability that halts for none.
XXI. Zelgenea, The World.evoFlair_: The end is imperfection, the portent of creation. All was crafted by The World's hand—and by that same hand all shall be undone.

Servant of Darkness.baseFlair_: In the Ninth Circle of Hell, treacherous souls are trapped in ice. I am the lord of this frozen Hell, entrusted with judging those stained by guilt.
Servant of Darkness.evoFlair_: Those imprisoned in the river of grief must be purged of their guilt, and the purge must continue for all eternity. This is no place for pardons or for the merciful release of death.

Flamelord of Deceit.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Banish all enemy amulets.
Flamelord of Deceit.baseFlair_:
The eighth circle: Fraud.
For the ten types of transgressors, ten castigations await.
Flamelord of Deceit.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the first to have fallen, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Dance of Death.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Dance of Death.baseFlair_: There is no applause for the dance of death.

Execution.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Execution.baseFlair_: They say your curses come back to haunt you many times over. But that's not always so when their target's dead.

Call of Cocytus.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Enhance (8): Then put a Servant of Darkness into your hand.
Call of Cocytus.baseFlair_: This power freezes teardrops and screams alike.

Divine Retribution.baseEffect_:
Randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
Enhance (8): Then deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Divine Retribution.baseFlair_: Penance can wait. It's time to scream.

Slash of the One.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower evolves, if only 1 allied follower is in play, change the cost of this card to 3.
----------
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Slash of the One.baseFlair_:
You are your own god.
Solitude is proof of power.

Heaven's Gate.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 5 play points and an allied Heaven's Gate is not in play, invoke this card.
Until this amulet leaves play, both leaders have the following effect: At the start of your turn, subtract 3 from the cost of a random card in your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in your deck, subtract 10 instead.
Heaven's Gate.baseFlair_:
"I've gone through this gate so many times, it doesn't even phase me anymore." —Lyrial, Celestial Archer
"Why exactly have you been going back and forth so much?" —Ephemera, Angelic Slacker

Raging Ettin.baseFlair_: The twin-headed giant runs rampant under the moonlit sky. Blades shatter against its steel-like hide, and arrows bounce harmlessly into the dirt.
Raging Ettin.evoFlair_: Clad in armor of steel, the twin-headed giant stalks the night. Its blood-stained armor gleams with a dark promise beneath the moon.

Mr. Full Moon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly change the attack of an enemy follower with the highest attack in play to 1.
Mr. Full Moon.baseFlair_: How's my comely countenance? So exquisite you can't peel your eyes away, right? But don't be so surprised. Just wait—soon I'll be waxed to the max! Om-nom-nom...
Mr. Full Moon.evoFlair_: My face is the full moon! What do you think? So perfect you're getting weak in the knees, right? H-huh? All the green cheese has made me put on weight, you say? W-well... You're exactly right!

Sgathaich.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
----------
Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
Sgathaich.baseFlair_: Hound of Culann, heaven's chosen warrior, unto you shall I bequeath my all-piercing spear, my runic magic—all I know of battle.
Sgathaich.evoFlair_: The gods have high hopes for you, Hound. Therefore be guided by me in the arts of war. Hone your blade for the fated battle to come!

Lion Champion.baseEffect_:
Ward.
