Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +1/+1.
Lion Champion.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +1/+1.
Lion Champion.baseFlair_: Enter our territory if you will. But we'll provide no quarter for plunderers. Away, fangless one!
Lion Champion.evoFlair_: Beastfolk we are, but monsters we're not. We don't swipe our claws haphazardly. So I'm chopping you in two with this mighty axe.

Katalina, Sky Guardian.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Katalina, Sky Guardian.baseFlair_: The day I freed Lyria... That's when I vowed to protect her with everything I have.
Katalina, Sky Guardian.evoFlair_: It was a mistake to ally myself with the empire... You can throw whatever you like at me, but I won't let you lay a finger on Lyria!

Catherine, Epicurean Angel.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 6 defense to your leader.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Restore 10 defense instead.
Catherine, Epicurean Angel.baseFlair_: I'm absolutely terrible at cooking, but I understand wanting to prepare a delicious meal for someone you care about. I would be more than happy to use my heavenly palate to assist you with your own cooking! Now then, let's have a taste... Oooh momma!
Catherine, Epicurean Angel.evoFlair_: This... This dish! What a delicate and gentle flavor! It's not perfect, but I can sense the love that went into its preparation—simply delightful. Hehe... It makes me want to head to the kitchen right now!

Angel Crusher.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand, and gain +1/+1 for each discarded card.
Angel Crusher.baseFlair_: Yes, let me bathe in your screams of agony and despair. I am coming for you all, angels, and I will pluck every snow-white feather from your wings.
Angel Crusher.evoFlair_: Are you not honored, angels, to become prey for such a noble being as I? Go on now. Cry your last tears as you sink into hell.

Athena.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all other allied followers the following effect until the end of the turn - Reduce damage to 0.
Athena.baseFlair_: Come, brave warrior. My shield shall protect you from harm and shall ward off the specter of defeat. I shall give you the ability to overcome endless conflict!
Athena.evoFlair_: My wisdom promises blessings greater than those of divine providence or earthly destiny! Come, you have been chosen! Fight alongside me against the forces of evil! The light of victory is set to shine upon you!

Suttungr.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy amulet. Gain +3/+3 instead if there are no enemy amulets in play.
Suttungr.baseFlair_:
Seeking mead, seeking rivals,
he crisscrosses the earth.
His sanity slips, his heart fills
with rage, floods with hate.
—Poems of Suttungr
Suttungr.evoFlair_:
The grinning war god quaffing mead.
Untouchable by men, tortured by memory,
he crosses mountains, treks ranges,
yet the heavenly one remains remote.
—Poems of Suttungr

Urd, Goddess of Restoration.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy a follower. If it is an allied follower, randomly summon a copy of an allied follower that has been destroyed during this match. If it is an enemy follower, randomly summon an enemy copy of an enemy follower that has been destroyed during this match.
Urd, Goddess of Restoration.baseFlair_: Before those who continue to seek possibility, she reveals herself. Those who refuse to submit to the pain—she shall never abandon them. —The Goddess of Restoration, Chapter 2
Urd, Goddess of Restoration.evoFlair_: Before those who hinder possibility, she reveals herself. Those who would usurp freedom—she shall never forgive them. —The Goddess of Restoration, Chapter 3

Mithra, Daybreak Deity.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw 3 cards. Then randomly discard 2 cards in your hand.
Mithra, Daybreak Deity.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return an enemy follower or amulet to your opponent's hand.
Mithra, Daybreak Deity.baseFlair_: Sorry to keep you waiting! Now Mithra's here, so have no fear! The time for blessings and protections is near!
Mithra, Daybreak Deity.evoFlair_: You know, I'd love to just grant everybody's wishes... but rules are rules! First, I've gotta test you! Don't you worry, though! Mithra has something for all the good little boys and girls who try their best!

Viridia Magna.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Fanfare: If at least 1 allied Naterran Great Tree has been destroyed this match, gain the ability to attack 2 times per turn. If at least 3 Naterran Great Trees have been destroyed this match, give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if there are no allied Viridia Magnas in play, summon a Viridia Magna, evolve it, then remove this effect. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Viridia Magna.baseFlair_: The aether withers, and nature dies with it—signs that our Mother has abandoned us. We must cast her aside, as all children must eventually cast aside their ancestral hearth. Naterra will be saved by the blade, and by the blade alone. —Valdain, Forest Shadow
Viridia Magna.evoFlair_: The aether glitters, and nature is its reflection—signs that our Mother has blessed us. We must treat her with grace, as all children must venerate their progenitors. Naterra will be saved by peace, and by peace alone. —Bayleon, Forest King

Shiva.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your sixth, ninth, and twelfth turns, restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your seventh, tenth, and thirteenth turns, give +1/+0 to all allied followers. At the end of your eighth, eleventh, and fourteenth turns, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match
Shiva.baseFlair_: The avatar of destruction descends in answer to your prayers, the divine spear Trishula clasped in one hand, third eye slumbering upon his brow. Behold the incarnation of immutable power, sole savior of the cosmos.
Shiva.evoFlair_: When his third eye opens, it will bathe the world in purifying light. Flames will descend in defense of virtue. They are the pitiless flames of salvation, setting creation alight and returning it to nothingness.

Silent Rider.baseFlair_: Jet-black thunderbolts pounded the battlefield, tearing the white-winged to pieces in an instant.
Silent Rider.evoFlair_: The wings of a thousand angels were clipped, the servants of the heavens were torn to shreds, and yet the demon general only bellowed, his rage unsated.

Scorpion of Greed.baseFlair_:
The fourth circle: Greed.
The corrupted and avaricious will go mad from the sway of the disparaging sea.
Scorpion of Greed.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the usurper, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Demon of Purgatory.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give the enemy leader the following effect - At the start of your next turn, discard a random card from your hand.
Demon of Purgatory.baseFlair_:
The first circle: Limbo.
Their prayers echoing across vast nothingness, all that stretches before those that cling to hope is hollow eternity,
Demon of Purgatory.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, born of flame, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Spellbook Decryption.baseFlair_: Sure there's a shortcut to learning the magical arts! Read tons of spell books to pick up knowledge!

We've Got a Case!.baseEffect_: Draw 3 cards. Then deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
We've Got a Case!.baseFlair_: Criminals use implements of violence to pierce the hearts of their victims. Detectives use implements of logic to pierce the heart of the truth.

Titanic Showdown.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Put a random follower that originally costs at least 9 play points from your deck into your hand. If any other allied Titanic Showdowns are in play, recover 4 play points and banish this amulet.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put 5 random followers that originally cost at least 9 play points from your hand into play.
Titanic Showdown.baseFlair_: Course a grudge match between titans is a disaster waiting to happen. But for the bookmakers and street vendors, it's an opportunity waiting to happen.

Mythcleaver.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Banish an enemy amulet.
At the end of your turn, banish a random enemy follower.
Mythcleaver.baseFlair_: "None of it was me," the hero grimaced. "This sword, it's the one responsible for everything." After all, a god's blade fells only a god's enemies. It pays no heed to the will of its human wielder.

Imperial Mammoth.baseFlair_: When the great beast took its first step, a hundred soldiers were dispersed like leaves in the wind.
Imperial Mammoth.evoFlair_: When the great beast took its second step, a thousand soldiers were scattered like startled birds.

Gigas.baseEffect_: Clash: Until the end of the opponent's turn, this follower can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Gigas.evoEffect_: Clash: Until the end of the opponent's turn, this follower can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Gigas.baseFlair_:
Killin' a giant takes
a hundred swords,
ten hundred arrows,
and ten thousand lives.
—Terrifying Giants, folk song
Gigas.evoFlair_:
But killin' a giant takes
guts, glory,
and gettin' ready to die.
—Terrifying Giants, folk song

Armored Troll.baseEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader.
Ignore Ward.
Armored Troll.baseFlair_: A martial artist knows to target the joints in the armor to shatter it. A monster merely tramples it underfoot, without even realizing it was steel.
Armored Troll.evoFlair_: The martial artist's path leads to knowledge: knowledge of the body, its workings, and its weaknesses. But wisdom is a fragile, flighty thing, liable to desert us in moments of mortal peril.

Reina, Evolution's Herald.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another unevolved allied follower the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Reina, Evolution's Herald.baseFlair_: My name's Reina. Another Reina. I'm not quite the Reina you know... but I'm here to help you out!
Reina, Evolution's Herald.evoFlair_: Really, we never should have met. That's why we'll have to part someday. It's a lonely thought... but I'm not scared. You're on an amazing journey and I'm excited for you!

Arriet, Soothing Harpist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied follower that has attacked this turn and is no longer able to attack. Fully restore its defense and the ability to attack.
Arriet, Soothing Harpist.baseFlair_: With this harp granted to me by the gods, I'll play a song of blessings. I'm sure my heartwarming melodies will bring peace to you as well.
Arriet, Soothing Harpist.evoFlair_: As the chosen harpist of the gods, I'll bring the melodies of paradise to those who suffer. Though the notes are still but a whisper, I believe they'll reach every corner of this world in time.

Steelclad Minotaur.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (4): Summon 2 Minotaurs.
----------
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +0/+2.
Steelclad Minotaur.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever this follower is attacked, gain +0/+2.
Steelclad Minotaur.baseFlair_:
Minotaur Captain: When this battle is over, I'm gonna get married.
Minotaur Soldier: I'll bring the Captain back safe and sound, no matter what it takes!
Steelclad Minotaur.evoFlair_:
Minotaur Captain: I'm gonna be a father soon.
Minotaur Soldier 1: Everybody, cover the Captain!
Minotaur Soldier 2: Let's get him back home to his kid!

Boom Devil.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to the enemy leader. If this is your tenth turn or later, deal 5 damage to all enemies instead.
Boom Devil.baseFlair_:
Add a little gas and the spark becomes flame. So what happens when you punch up the flame?
—Cheeky Demon's Inquiry
Boom Devil.evoFlair_:
Agitate the fire enough and you've got a hefty boom on your hands. So what happens when you punch up that boom?
—Cheeky Demon's Inquiry

Gabriel.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +4/+3 to an allied follower.
Gabriel.baseFlair_: One of the four mighty archangels who serve as divine messengers. Gabriel's benevolent smile will lead humanity to ever greater heights.
Gabriel.evoFlair_: The archangel Gabriel's soul is as pure and white as her wings. As a divine representative, she presents the chosen one with new power in the form of a legendary sword.

Sahaquiel.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Neutral follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush, and return it to your hand at the end of your turn.
Sahaquiel.baseFlair_: The delicate angel reigns over the sky. Though she may look innocent, her unholy rivals quiver when she launches a flurry of light-beam arrows from her star staff.
Sahaquiel.evoFlair_: “Attack,” whispers the pure angel. A troop of valkyries fills the sky at her command and descends to drive away the wicked.

Zodiac Demon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a follower that originally costs 7 play points or less from your hand into play and destroy it. Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the attack of that follower.
Zodiac Demon.baseFlair_: Stars do more than sit in their heavenly thrones and shine. Part of our might lies in descending to the earth and rending it. You beings with bellies on the ground, I implore you to swear your allegiance to me.
Zodiac Demon.evoFlair_: Stars don't always guide their observers to brilliant futures. No, death, despair, fear—these are their true predictions. You beings who pray to the heavens, offer your fear to the light.

Marduk.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects.
-Followers can't be played.
-Whenever you play a spell, draw a card.
-Whenever you play an amulet, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
(These effects last until this follower leaves play.)
Marduk.baseFlair_: Is it a god, or it is a demon? Nay, it is neither, and it cannot be compared to any other being. It is the origin, and it is the end. That which begins the world, and that which ends it.
Marduk.evoFlair_: That which differs from all else in the world. That which transcends all else in the world. Great gods and dread demons bow their heads before it.

Gilnelise, Omen of Craving.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Drain.
Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to all other allied followers.
At the start of your turn, if this is your tenth turn or later, both players draw 5 cards.
Gilnelise, Omen of Craving.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Drain.
At the start of your turn, if this is your tenth turn or later, both players draw 5 cards.
Gilnelise, Omen of Craving.baseFlair_: Greetings, you adorable little soul. The world just laughs so innocently—makes me want to gobble it all up. When boys finally learn the bitterness inherent in yearning, that's when they ripen into men. Oh! Shall I put the world to the same trial?
Gilnelise, Omen of Craving.evoFlair_: This passion is lovely, don't you think? Hurry and swallow it, just as your yearning commands. No one will ever touch you again; that privilege will belong only to me. Oh! Shall I put the world to the same trial?

Alterplane Arbiter.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Basic cards from the enemy leader's class into your hand and subtract 3 from their costs.
Alterplane Arbiter.baseFlair_:
Realign reality. Alter the axiom, and converge a realm anew.
Realize the inconceivable, and alter destiny.
For once upon a time, man could only gaze up at the earth. —Opening lines from The Almanack
Alterplane Arbiter.evoFlair_:
Hell loomed above the heavens, for the heavens lay at the ends of the earth.
We trod the clouds, we floated through the sky.
That has changed everything.
—Final lines from The Almanack

Odin, Wargod Ascendant.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn or later, if at least 6 allied followers have evolved this match, invoke this card.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Odin, Wargod Ascendant.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Odin, Wargod Ascendant.baseFlair_: Ragnarok approaches from the depths of time. The einherjar summoned by the heavenly maidens thirst for battle. The divine warlord climbs astride Sleipnir, his trusted steed, and makes for the land of destiny, the ferocious clatter of hooves echoing in his wake.
Odin, Wargod Ascendant.evoFlair_: Huginn reads the thoughts of the world, while Muninn perceives the memories of the world. Within the twilight, these two great birds deliver news of an unavoidable fate. Still the divine warlord chooses to descend upon the battlefield to face his enemies.

Athena, Divine Shield.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give all other allies the following effect - The next time this ally takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Athena, Divine Shield.baseFlair_: Time flows onward, but battle is a constant. We meet again, dauntless warrior. Once again, I shall shield you from defeat and the suffering that besieges you!
Athena, Divine Shield.evoFlair_: A goddess of battle and a goddess of the shield. Someday I'd like to test which is stronger—her protection or my barrier. —Godsworn Alexiel

Natur Al'machinus.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Machina or Natura
----------
Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. Put X random Machina or Natura cards from your deck into your hand. If this card is fused with a Machina and Natura card, subtract 3 from their costs. X equals the number of cards fused to this card.
Natur Al'machinus.baseFlair_: The world is dead and metal. Nature is lush and fertile. The soul of steel; the frame of a flower. Worlds apart, yet worlds collided. The Omnipotence forces this mergence and births inescapable battle.
Natur Al'machinus.evoFlair_: The mechanical yearns for progress; the natural yearns for propagation. Confrontation is inevitable. Hostility, unavoidable. No victors will walk away from the conflict, save perhaps for the very Omnipotence who designed it.

Flame and Glass.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Deal 7 damage to all enemies.
Flame and Glass.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Deal 7 damage to all enemies.
Flame and Glass.baseFlair_: We are two, and we are one. May we never be separated again. May this world—riven into gods and demons—be united again.
Flame and Glass.evoFlair_: The world is full of contradictions. Destruction and rebirth. Desire and despair. Love and hate. I am a mixture of all these things, given form in the present. Now, would you like to be burned? Or frozen? Or both?

Gluttonous Behemoth.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to the enemy leader.
Gluttonous Behemoth.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 9 damage to the enemy leader.
Gluttonous Behemoth.baseFlair_:
The third circle: Gluttony.
Eat or be eaten. This is the law of Hell.
Gluttonous Behemoth.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the trial-bringer, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Dis's Damnation.baseEffect_: Deal 7 damage to an enemy. Restore 7 defense to your leader.
Dis's Damnation.baseFlair_: My fatal blow will be the judge.

Rampaging Mammoth.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times.
Rampaging Mammoth.baseFlair_: "What's makin' me legs tremble?" grumbled the veteran soldier. "Well, it ain't 'cause I'm lily-livered. Just the earth rattlin', s'all."
Rampaging Mammoth.evoFlair_: "No more trembling," said the knight, looking up at the mammoth. "We'll be knocked clean out of here if we stand around quakin'!"

Pureshot Angel.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Pureshot Angel.baseFlair_: Banish evil from every corner! One clean sweep of arrows will root out even the biggest, baddest evil!
Pureshot Angel.evoFlair_: Just look at that piercing action, folks! One shot will banish even the most stubborn demons!

Gilgamesh.baseFlair_: The demigod-king Gilgamesh was in some ways more powerful than the gods themselves. His strength was irresistible, and he held dominion over the entire world.
Gilgamesh.evoFlair_: The demigod-king Gilgamesh was in some ways more powerful than the gods themselves. Desperate to overcome death, he descended to the underworld in search of the secret of immortality.

Archangel Reina.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Evolve all allied followers.
Evolve effects will not activate for those followers.
Archangel Reina.baseFlair_: If you seek new heights, I can help. Embrace my power, and become who you were meant to be!
Archangel Reina.evoFlair_: With my power guiding you to new heights, our victory is all but assured. I know you can do it!

Earthshock Ogre.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Earthshock Ogre.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Earthshock Ogre.baseFlair_: An embodiment of total devastation. Legends warn against challenging this mighty ogre, for those who do find themselves annihilated right along with the ground they stand on.
Earthshock Ogre.evoFlair_: A raging force of nature and a razor-fanged disaster. None remain who can stop this fearsome beast. When it brings down its fist, countries, continents, and even worlds perish.

Mechawing Angel.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Assembly Droids.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon 2 Assembly Droids.
Mechawing Angel.baseFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Confirming damage to core.
Activating warning system.
Activating standby unit.
Mechawing Angel.evoFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access granted.
Confirming changes to core.
Issuing radicalized support request.
Activating reserve unit.

Lucifer.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 4 defense to your leader.
Lucifer.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
Lucifer.baseFlair_: I wish to serve God. I wish to do all in my power to bring joy and prosperity to all. Humans, gods, and demons are equal, and I will use my powers to bring light to their existence.
Lucifer.evoFlair_: I have acted against God. Banishment to an endless void awaits. Ha! Haughty gods, prepare yourselves for destruction and despair. My rebellion starts now!

Odin.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
Odin.baseFlair_: Odin, the greatest of the gods, presided over matters of battle. From his lofty palace in Asgard, he sought to conquer the world.
Odin.evoFlair_: As the twilight begins to fall for the gods, their one-eyed father fought in the battle at Vigrid, clad in jet black armor and armed with a peerless spear.

Loki.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - The next time you play an allied follower with Fanfare effects (excluding targeted effects), repeat those effects. (This effect is not stackable.)
Loki.baseFlair_: He is the trickster, mayhem incarnate. A shrewd, bizarre, and yet indispensable impostor. He vows to the quiet twilight, laughing at his confinement. —Twilight's Child, preface
Loki.evoFlair_: An eternity spent idle; demise, a mere game. Kill a god? A poem on his lips. Revenge? A performance. With deliverance and disfigurement, now the twilight begins. —Twilight's Child, final chapter

Chronos.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give both leaders the following effect - At the end of your turn, draw cards equal to the attack of the strongest allied follower in play. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Chronos.baseFlair_: A divine will, penetrating the spiral of time—his celestial inscription is universal and eternal. The sun sets, and rises to the dawn of a new life, and a new age.
Chronos.evoFlair_: Time begets destruction and rebirth. Eternal peace is but a memory lost within the flow of its eternal passage. Pursue not what has been lost in its ravages, but embrace the current.

Technolord.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of allied Machina followers destroyed this match.
----------
Fanfare: Randomly summon a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied Machina followers (excluding Technolord) that have been destroyed this match.
Technolord.baseFlair_:
Verifying access request... Access denied.
Please input the core code.
Verifying the eight core sequences...
Extracting Code: Origin.
Technolord.evoFlair_:
Are you sure you want to suspend Project: Core? Y/N
Verifying the eight core sequences...
ERROR. E■ROR. ER■■R. ■■■.
Restarting. Unauthorized access detected. Commencing elimination.

Olivia, Blackened Wing.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
Once on each of your turns, when you play another follower, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Olivia, Blackened Wing.evoEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when you play another follower, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Olivia, Blackened Wing.baseFlair_: A fate determined by the gods—no different than the sealing of hope. No time to wait, only to push forward. Gods above, you may think my ambition to be nothing short of senseless. But I won't stop. Not until the very end, not until my final moment!
Olivia, Blackened Wing.evoFlair_: Locked away beyond the gate, hope awaits us. Until we reach the new world, my wings will never stop. Those who seek to hinder my ambition, prepare yourselves. This magic blade rends all creation!

Heretical Hellbeast.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to your leader. X equals the number of other followers in play. Then destroy all other followers.
Heretical Hellbeast.baseFlair_:
The sixth circle: Heresy.
Those that have traversed the righteous order of the world will be burnt to ash.
Heretical Hellbeast.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, the beguiler, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

Human! Pyramid! Attack!.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Strike: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Give +1/+0 to all allied followers.
-Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Human! Pyramid! Attack!.baseFlair_:
"Brofams! Time to let 'er rip!"
"This formation is undefeated back home!"
"Dudes, let's get on it! Three, two, one..."
"Yaaahooo!"

Dark Angel Olivia.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Increase your evolution points to 3.
Dark Angel Olivia.baseFlair_: I welcome you, my new brethren in a world of chaos! Our clan's victories on the battlefield will surely be a blow to the gods.
Dark Angel Olivia.evoFlair_: Today, my new brethren, we embark on a journey that will start with bloodshed but will one day lead us to a new world!

Israfil.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Israfil.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Israfil.baseFlair_: The task of deciding whether to pass judgment was entrusted to the most sorrowful angel of them all. To ease the suffering of those who walk the earth, she played her melodies and sang of her sorrow.
Israfil.evoFlair_: She could never eliminate all the suffering no matter how hard she tried, and she finally passed her judgment in despair. Her tears fell even as she cleaved through the sinful.

Proto Bahamut.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (7): Deal 3 damage to all followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
----------
At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all other followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Proto Bahamut.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all other followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Proto Bahamut.baseFlair_: Summoned by an earnest plea, the dragon breaks its shackles. Its cry resonates across the sky and strikes awe into the hearts of all who hear it.
Proto Bahamut.evoFlair_: Answering the call of the blue-haired girl, this dark dragon takes flight to confront a grave threat to all life. Unshackled at long last, its magnificent roar rattles the heavens.

Prince of Cocytus.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Randomly put 4 different Cocytus cards into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Replace your deck with a Cocytus Deck.
Prince of Cocytus.baseFlair_: The Heavens fall to Earth. Earth plunges into Hell. Cocytus swallows all, robbing Creation of breath and entombing it in ice. Conqueror. Serpent. Father of Lies. Being with faces innumerable—none of them true. The only certainty is this: He is the world's adversary.
Prince of Cocytus.evoFlair_: Part your lips to speak: Ice will take your throat, twine through your entrails. Be silent: Ice will seal your lips eternally. Blades shall rust away. Knowledge burn to cinders. Life shall be Cocytus's shivering prisoner. The only option is this: To cast this world aside.

Mammoth God's Colosseum.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers except a random enemy follower with the highest attack. Then, if at least 4 followers have been destroyed this turn, summon an Imperial Mammoth.
Mammoth God's Colosseum.baseFlair_: Every hundred years, the towering mammoth god gathers the strongest fighters from every realm and holds a tournament. To enter, one must possess the eight essential wills. Competitors flock to the colosseum, each for their own reason.
Mammoth God's Colosseum.evoFlair_: Every hundred years, the mammoth god's trumpeting opens wide the gates to other worlds. Victors shall rule. Losers shall serve. The clash of desires in the colosseum shall be offered up to the god.

Prince of Darkness.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Replace your deck with an Apocalypse Deck.
Prince of Darkness.baseFlair_: The would-be usurper of Heaven, cast into the pits of Hell, has risen again in a cloak of flame. Soon this underworld king shall spark an apocalypse that paints all mortals and gods in blood.
Prince of Darkness.evoFlair_: The king of the underworld and his gathered armies of darkness reveled in the coming of the day of revelation. Chaos and destruction tore through the world in a dance of madness, staining all in despair.

Bahamut.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers.
Can't attack the enemy leader if 2 or more enemy followers are in play.
Bahamut.evoEffect_: Can't attack the enemy leader if 2 or more enemy followers are in play.
Bahamut.baseFlair_: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. The beauty of its deep black frame overwhelms all else in creation.
Bahamut.evoFlair_: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. Unsurpassed are its divine powers, and heroes dream often of its glory.

Zeus.baseFlair_: The omnipotent being who in time reigned supreme over the other gods. He was born to a goddess and rebelled against his divine father.
Zeus.evoFlair_: Clad in the armor of fear and wielding a radiant lightning spear, the almighty sky father illuminated the sky of dawn.

Queen of the Dread Sea.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 20 from the cost of a Neutral card (excluding Queen of the Dread Sea) and a non-Neutral card in your hand. Then discard all other cards in your hand.
Queen of the Dread Sea.baseFlair_: Prostrate yourself, and vow your loyalty to me. You'll no longer thirst for what you wish for. Tell me your wishes, and then drink down mine.
Queen of the Dread Sea.evoFlair_: Where go your wishes? Your fragile dreams? Do they sink like a stone into the abyss, or do they rise like bubbles to the surface? Your actions determine all.

Zeus, the Supreme.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
-Restore 5 defense to your leader.
-Gain +3/+0 and the ability to ignore Ward.
-Gain +2/+1 and Storm.
-Gain +1/+2 and Bane.
-Gain +0/+3 and Ward.
Zeus, the Supreme.baseFlair_: A blade of lightning rests in his grip. The same flash that would make the night sky tremble—it punishes the darkness and descends upon the land. When the threads of fate entwine at last, the final battle against the lord of purgatory shall begin.
Zeus, the Supreme.evoFlair_: The adamantine scythe destroys all that it touches; the aegis shield defends all from destruction. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.

Astaroth's Reckoning.baseEffect_: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 1.
Astaroth's Reckoning.baseFlair_: Your fate's reached the end of its thread.

Gift for Bloodkin.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Summon a Forest Bat for both leaders.
Gift for Bloodkin.baseFlair_: Hey, can I make you my bloodkin too? —Vania, Vampire Princess

Urias's Revelry.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Urias's Revelry.baseFlair_: Finally... Allow me to revel in this battle. I feel most alive when dancing between life and death—I want for nothing else! Come, waltz with me. Lose yourself in the thrill. I do hope you won't give me a lackluster performance.

Mono's Resolve.baseFlair_: I shall join the fray. Even if it does worry me so... You see—fragile is the steel flower which wilts upon a single screw. Rough treatment just doesn't become me. Sigh. I suppose I'll just have to rise past all that. And enjoy what life I've got left.

Restless Parish.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 2 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Night Fall or Madness Revealed.
----------
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Restless Parish.baseFlair_: Just as sleep finds itself wrapped in dreams, you are embraced by the night. If you cower in fear of the darkness, the night will forgive your transgressions. But, alas, you seem none the wiser of its terrors—and there is only one end suitable for the ignorant.

Ambling Wraith.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Ambling Wraith.baseFlair_: A shadow born from human hatred. This parasite warps the spirit and then feeds on it, sapping life force to boost its own dark power.
Ambling Wraith.evoFlair_: As long as hatred remains in the world, dark shadows will grow ever longer and more powerful. They will one day manifest as a pure terror condemning all light and hope to the darkness.

Silverbolt Hunter.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
Silverbolt Hunter.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
Silverbolt Hunter.baseFlair_: I'll let you bloodsuckers in on a secret. Humans may be weak, but we don't fly solo. Mankind stands united, and that spells your inevitable doom.
Silverbolt Hunter.evoFlair_: I'm not naive. I know one arrow isn't going to faze you fiends. But if you think that's going to stop me from letting off these bolts, think again.

Forest Bat.baseFlair_: A shadow moves soundlessly through the black night, seeking out its master's enemies.
Forest Bat.evoFlair_: A fanged shadow glides soundlessly through the black night, its master's enemies in sight.

Serpent.baseFlair_:
"It doesn't look very tasty."
"Not worth the effort to kill it."
"I don't think so either—but let's go ahead and do it in!"
—The three gorgon sisters
Serpent.evoFlair_:
"It looks gross. I'll pass."
"I have no interest in it either, I'm afraid."
"Okay! Well, then leave it to my little pet!"
—The three gorgon sisters

Cursebrand Vampire.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if Vengeance is active for you.
Cursebrand Vampire.baseFlair_: Only a bloodbath of unforgettable proportions will be enough to awaken this demonsword. So I'll kill and kill some more.
Cursebrand Vampire.evoFlair_: The tide of blood and death is rising, and the time of the blade's awakening is upon us. So let us continue the slaughter until rivers of blood flow beneath mountains of flesh!

Buller, Blood Maiden.baseEffect_: If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Buller, Saintly Maiden or Buller, Dark Maiden.
Buller, Blood Maiden.baseFlair_: My wings' true form lies somewhere in the middle. I am a saintly maiden—yet so too am I a maiden of darkness.
Buller, Blood Maiden.evoFlair_: "A pact of white, and pact of ebon. In this moment destiny is mine to select!" "Mrrrow now, what are you getting yourself into?"

Disciple of Lust.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Disciple of Lust.baseFlair_: Go forth and convulse en masse, for love is but an illusion, a ravenous phantom that endlessly devours reason. Cast down this adoration, discrimination, and division.
Disciple of Lust.evoFlair_:
The Second Provision: Love Not
Inamorato, inamorata—the greater the affection, the greater the hindrance to our cause. Know your fellows not as lovers but as partners. —Teachings from the Manor of Lust

Lucius, Vampire Slayer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there are at least 4 enemy cards in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +5/+5 and Bane.
Lucius, Vampire Slayer.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower with X defense or less. X equals 20 minus your leader's defense.
Lucius, Vampire Slayer.baseFlair_: My first battle was waged in vengeance against the goblins. Next, I plunged into the fray as an agent. If never-ending battle is my lot, then let my blade be the bane of a thousand fiends!
Lucius, Vampire Slayer.evoFlair_:
Teena: I'm worried about Lucius. He's always throwing himself into dangerous situations...

Feena: Yeah, I really wish he'd settle down a bit.

Executioner's Axe.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower Rush.
Enhance (4): Then give it +2/+2.
Executioner's Axe.baseFlair_: Oh! This axe is delighted to finally taste blood!

Precious Bloodfangs.baseEffect_: Summon X Forest Bats and deal X damage to your leader. X equals the number of enemy followers in play.
Precious Bloodfangs.baseFlair_: When precious blood is offered, creatures of the night spawn from the shadows.

Furtive Fangs.baseEffect_: Select an allied Neutral follower. Whenever that follower attacks an enemy follower, destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return until the end of the turn.
Furtive Fangs.baseFlair_: Grandmother used to be more scary than hairy. —Maisy, Red Riding Hood

Red Talonstrike.baseEffect_: Give an allied follower +1/+0 until the end of the turn. Summon a Forest Bat if it's a Bloodcraft follower.
Red Talonstrike.baseFlair_: Your blood's not worth a suck.

Kiss of Lust.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 1 defense to both leaders.
Kiss of Lust.baseFlair_: Close your eyes, and plant your seeds in the sea of compassion.

Lunatic Aether.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader and restore 3 defense to your leader.
Lunatic Aether.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the nightwalker discovered her kindness in his manor, he saw a mad, ardent aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those who easily succumb to insanity.

Creeping Madness.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Draw a card.
If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, restore 2 defense to your leader and recover 1 play point.
Creeping Madness.baseFlair_: If that vampire poses even the slightest threat to the people, the danger cannot be ignored. What bothers me is that uncanny. Power. What is... Ah. It brings. Understanding. Of madness. —Vampire hunter's scrawled journal entry

Insatiable Desire.baseEffect_:
Give your leader the following effects.
-At the start of your turn, draw a card.
-At the start of your turn, lose 1 play point.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
Insatiable Desire.baseFlair_:
Profit.
Profit breeds extravagance.
It is an aggregation of vanity and nonsense.
If meaningless profit is our reality, splurge it all away.

Bloodfed Flowerbed.baseEffect_:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Bloodfed Flowerbed.baseFlair_: The roses of the underworld are dyed with fresh blood.

Nightmare.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+0 if Vengeance is active for you.
Nightmare.baseFlair_: You poor thing. It must be terrible to be haunted by your fears even in your dreams. I know! I can feast on those pesky dreams while you sleep!
Nightmare.evoFlair_: How dreadfully delightful—consumed by the horrors of your own dreamscape. Why don't you let me devour your delicious nightmares? I won't leave anything behind, but at least you won't suffer anymore.

Sweetfang Vampire.baseFlair_: What shall I have for dinner tonight? I think it's going to have to be a human. A real live human. That's the only thing that'll satisfy my hunger. Hee-hee!
Sweetfang Vampire.evoFlair_: Nothing tastes better than a human! So full of light! So full of life! All the emotions like love and desire! It's all so delicious!

Lilith.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Lilith.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Lilith.baseFlair_: Don't you just look like a bundle of fun. How about you and me skip right to the chase, hmm? Oh, and we don't need to go telling anybody what fun we got up to, do we now?
Lilith.evoFlair_: I can think of all kinds of ways to keep myself busy with you. Now close those pretty little eyes of yours and don't... move... a muscle...

Venomous Cobra.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Bane if Vengeance is active for you.
Venomous Cobra.baseFlair_: Venomous blood gushes forth from the wounded scales. If the serpent is to be defeated, it must be done in a single blow.
Venomous Cobra.evoFlair_: The serpent's blood burns through flesh, bone, and iron alike. The beast must be eradicated, else a painful death awaits.

Rain Devil.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if Vengeance is active for you.
Rain Devil.baseFlair_: People are quick to curse me as a demon of rain, but we both know that rain can be a blessing.
Rain Devil.evoFlair_: It's downpour after downpour. I'm starting to get the sniffles myself. Say, would you be willing to part with some of the spark in that soul of yours?

Blood Wolf.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Blood Wolf.baseFlair_: Some friendly advice. Do not make the mistake of thinking a blood wolf civil; approach one too closely and you're likely to walk away a limb or two fewer.
Blood Wolf.evoFlair_: Blood wolves are implacable hunters. Once they catch the scent of their prey, they will pursue it to the ends of the earth. And until they have eaten their fill of blood and meat, nothing can stop their rampage.

Demonic Hedonist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Drain if an evolved allied follower is in play.
Demonic Hedonist.baseFlair_: Hey, that looks like fun. Lemme in on it!
Demonic Hedonist.evoFlair_: Your lives are my toys! Who should I play with next?

Serpent Charmer.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Serpent Charmer.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Serpent Charmer.baseFlair_: Snakey's a wild one. You don't want to mess with her.
Serpent Charmer.evoFlair_: Snakey's a wild one. Don't let her put the squeeze on you!

Yurius, Levin Duke.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Yurius, Levin Duke.evoEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Yurius, Levin Duke.baseFlair_: Though I'm a member of the order of the Sky Knights, I'm hardly skilled with a sword. Think of me as a scholar with a propensity for research.
Yurius, Levin Duke.evoFlair_: If I complete this research, I'll gain power beyond all human knowledge. And then I'll finally be able to complete my mission. Which mission, you ask? Well, to save as many people as possible of course!

Spiderweb Imp.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
Spiderweb Imp.baseFlair_: Stately strands of alabaster protect my home. Anything that gets entangled in it is my foe and my prey.
Spiderweb Imp.evoFlair_: The strands of my web decide where you go. But should I suffocate you or suck you dry? The choice is mine.

Tove.baseEffect_: When another allied Neutral follower comes into play, this follower gains Rush.
Tove.evoEffect_: When another allied Neutral follower comes into play, this follower gains Rush.
Tove.baseFlair_: So slithy their forms! May they waltz and gimble and gambol! May their voices sound! —Poems of Unbeing
Tove.evoFlair_: Innocent as babes they pitter-patter, peculiar in shape but dearworth. —Poems of Unbeing

Scorpius.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Scorpius.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Scorpius.baseFlair_: Hunting is the rite of receiving the blessings of the land. Respect the land and act with humility. Otherwise you will find yourself becoming the hunted. —Orion's Scorpion, Chapter 5
Scorpius.evoFlair_: Even great heroes who have felled many beasts are no match for its poison. Victims suffer from paralysis, dizziness, nausea, and severe headaches. These migraines then turn into a sleep from which the victim will never awaken. —Orion's Scorpion, Chapter 8

Glassbrand Demon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you. Restore 2 defense to your leader if Vengeance is active for you.
Glassbrand Demon.baseFlair_: Looks like you need some help! Wait, w-what do you mean, you don't need me? I guess I... I really am useless, after all!
Glassbrand Demon.evoFlair_: Perhaps I can be of assistance? Allow me to help! Wait, I m-made it on time? No way... Uh, I'll do my best!

Cursed Scarecrow.baseFlair_: "I'm telling y'all, it really moved! See? Here's where it bit me, right here!" — Rural Man
Cursed Scarecrow.evoFlair_: "See? That's what I've been telling y'all this whole time! Now look what it's gone and done. Everything's been taken!" — Rural Man

Bewitching Succubus.baseFlair_: "These men are too easy. Isn't there something that can entertain me?" "Perhaps we could dance, milady?" "Why would I dance with a bat?"
Bewitching Succubus.evoFlair_: "What's the point? Everyone falls for me anyway. There's no fun in that." "How about a song then, milady?" "Isn't that just screeching?"

Bloodthirsty Hamster.baseEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when your leader takes damage, gain +1/+0.
Bloodthirsty Hamster.baseFlair_: You think it's cute, eh? Well what kind of adorable little varmint could live 'round these parts? Gotta be more to it than just squeezable cheeks. —Wasteland Explorer
Bloodthirsty Hamster.evoFlair_:
Some beasties try to broadcast how dangerous they are, but, more often than not, it's just a performance. Not the case with this little guy.
—Wasteland Explorer

Servant of Lust.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Leader Strike: Restore 2 defense to both leaders after damage is dealt.
Servant of Lust.evoEffect_: Leader Strike: Restore 2 defense to both leaders after damage is dealt.
Servant of Lust.baseFlair_: Whether demonic, divine, or mundane breed, go forth and convulse en masse. It is in the confluence of our differences that we grow stronger. Cast down this odium, discrimination, and division.
Servant of Lust.evoFlair_:
The First Provision: Loathe Not
Consecrate your character, your very being, to this, the greatest cause. Look upon your fellows not as abominations but as partners.
—Teachings from the Manor of Lust

Devil Raider.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4. If Vengeance is active for you, gain +5/+5 instead.
Devil Raider.baseFlair_: I strayed from the path. It was no accident. Every step was intentional. With this arm, no one will ever trample me again.
Devil Raider.evoFlair_: I strayed from the path. Don't misunderstand—it was long before I made my pact with a demon. The wretched girl who once drank from backstreet mud puddles is gone. In her place stands a woman with power. Now I am the one to trample others underfoot!

Libert\u00e9, Werewolf Pup.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader and restore 4 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 2 defense to your leader.
Libert\u00e9, Werewolf Pup.evoEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 2 defense to your leader.
Libert\u00e9, Werewolf Pup.baseFlair_: I'm a failure of a pup. My ears are bad, and I can't smell very good either. But, but I can perform! I learned how to do acrobatics and jump through a flaming ring! If I can make you smile, well, that's enough for me!
Libert\u00e9, Werewolf Pup.evoFlair_: You poor, sorrowful pup. I remember when you appeared before me, evidence of my sin... I have no right to be in your life. —Lunelle, Queen of Wolves

Gearsnake Tamer.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, change it into a Machina follower.
Gearsnake Tamer.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 2 Serpents.
Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, change it into a Machina follower.
Gearsnake Tamer.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Armored Bats synthesized with machinery soon appeared... Just as those who would control such beasts did afterward. —Secrets of Sorcery Demystified I
Gearsnake Tamer.evoFlair_: Bats... Whoooa... So cool... But... I'm happy... Together... With my snakes, too... After all, they're everything... to me. —Gearsnake Tamer to Armored Bat

Swarming Wraith.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 2 damage to your leader. If Vengeance is active for you, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Swarming Wraith.baseFlair_: Abnormal figures take form in the shadows. They mimic the living, taking form through negative emotion. Even now, they lay hidden within the gaps.
Swarming Wraith.evoFlair_: Some evils simply cannot die. As the demons we carry within ourselves take form once more, malice and despair writhe and wriggle into existence.

Leraje.baseFlair_: Use my arrows to necrotize your enemies' bodies and bring them under my control? Understood. About your plan though. I think there's room for optimization. I'm willing to offer you a one-time-only discount. Just take a look at this updated contract...
Leraje.evoFlair_: So you want me to use my magic to sow discord in the enemy camp? Understood. If you'll just sign here—that's right, in blood—we can get this contract squared away. Great. Now if you're ready, I'd like to take you through a few alternate plans...

Corrupted Bat.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Vengeance is active for you, gain +1/+0 and Ward.
Corrupted Bat.baseFlair_:
I've never seen that species before. Its wings generate some sort of light. What could that be? I have to... follow. It. This is. A great. Discovery. But. Those wings. I feel like. They are. Madness. Given form...
—Scholar's scrawled journal entry
Corrupted Bat.evoFlair_:
Strange. Strange. Strange. Strange. Strange, strange bat. How odd. Why? Does my head. Feel so... strange? Wings? Strange? The madness. Won't stop.
—Twisted scrawl

Rookie Succubus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Summon a Forest Bat.
Rookie Succubus.baseFlair_: The manual says no great succubus's career was built in a day. So you gotta listen to your elders and put in the elbow grease! Mmmwah! How was that, Mr. Bat? Charming enough for ya?
Rookie Succubus.evoFlair_: Look at all those demons coming this way... Did my hard work finally pay off? I'm improving! Wait... they're all here to meet her, aren't they? I knew it...

Antelope Pelt Warrior.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Wrath is not active for you, gain the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and this follower. Otherwise, gain the following effect - At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Antelope Pelt Warrior.baseFlair_: The horned beast's meat is tough. Its flavor unfolds as you chew. You must kill it the same way. Blow after blow after blow, until it falls. —Second Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
Antelope Pelt Warrior.evoFlair_: I took my first pelt. My history is written on its skin. I will gain the beast's resilience. I will don the pelt and test my strength. —Second Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

Vampiric Bloodbinder.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
Vampiric Bloodbinder.evoEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
Vampiric Bloodbinder.baseFlair_: You're looking for a contract... with me? Oh darling, do you know what you're getting yourself into? It'll sting. And you understand everything comes with a price tag, don't you? Hm? I'm too straitlaced to be a vampire, you say? Hah. You really think so?
Vampiric Bloodbinder.evoFlair_: Look, honey—I despise lies. I've been that way since I was mortal. Anyway, we are talking binding contracts here. These things are much nicer when both parties are interested. Now, be a dear and give me some blood. But... do tell me if it hurts.

Moonrise Werewolf.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain +0/+2 and Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +3/+3.
Moonrise Werewolf.baseFlair_: I'm The Moon, howler of apprehension. I stand ready to defend the frightened. I'm still learning as a pup, but I eat cowardice for breakfast.
Moonrise Werewolf.evoFlair_: With a little practice, I can crush any fears. I might be young, but I'm not afraid to howl in the moonlight. We're picky about our masters—but if you're worthy, werewolves become the perfect bodyguards.

Mormo.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon 2 Forest Bats if Vengeance is active for you.
Mormo.baseFlair_: What's that? Are you lost, little human? Hee-hee! Well you're in luck, because I love humans! You smell so good, and you really do have the sweetest blood.
Mormo.evoFlair_: Mmm... Your blood's delicious! And oh-so very addictive. I wish I could become your familiar and follow you everywhere you go. Hee-hee!

Dark Summoner.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
Dark Summoner.baseFlair_: Want to know how I came to master the forbidden arts? Well, it all started with a demon...
Dark Summoner.evoFlair_: Did you like that? Hee-hee. What's not to love about forbidden magic? The energy surges through you like an intense wave of raw power! What's that? I look different all of sudden?

Baphomet.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Bloodcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
Baphomet.baseFlair_: The goat-headed, sturdy-bodied demon warrior was also a devout priest who prayed to a dark god to summon countless demons.
Baphomet.evoFlair_: The demon warrior itself was mighty indeed. Armed with a trident that also served as a staff, it could wreathe a kingdom in flames and reduce it to ash with a single swing.

Boy Who Cried Wolf.baseEffect_: Can't be attacked by followers with 1 attack.
Boy Who Cried Wolf.evoEffect_: Can't be attacked by followers with 1 attack.
Boy Who Cried Wolf.baseFlair_: There was once a born liar who cried, "Wolf! Wolf!" When the townsfolk fled in fear, he burglarized their town. —Where the Liars Go, Chapter 1
Boy Who Cried Wolf.evoFlair_: The boy was laughing in joy when hoofbeats began to sound. Mounted wolf-slayers had arrived, and they struck the boy down where he stood. —Where the Liars Go, final chapter

Demonic Ram.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
Demonic Ram.baseFlair_:
It may creep in while you count sheep.
It needs no grass—your heart's its meat.
—Demon's lullaby
Demonic Ram.evoFlair_:
Nights becomes moons, and your heart now wanes.
At the nightmare's end, a husk alone remains.
—Demon's lullaby

Silverchain Disciple.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, deal 1 damage to both leaders and then 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Silverchain Disciple.baseFlair_: Vampire! Tainted one! My silver chains will reveal your immortality as false. Howl, my platinum chains.
Silverchain Disciple.evoFlair_: They wind, and snarl, and purify. Before these goddess-blessed chains, you are nothing more than prey to be hunted.

Alexandrite Demon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Blazing Sapphire or Blazing Ruby into your hand.
Alexandrite Demon.baseFlair_: Join your heart with the crystals. That's right, now align them together... A path of azure and path of crimson await you. Which one calls to your heart?
Alexandrite Demon.evoFlair_: The crystal is merely a mirror, reflecting the colors of your heart. When it shines, your fate shall be revealed. Will you be dyed in azure or colored in red? Which will your heart choose?

Hellblaze Demon.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +X/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
Hellblaze Demon.baseFlair_: Sky full of clouds, air bitter and cold, and this stupid, white snow! Makes you shiver, doesn't it? That's why winter is the worst. But it's okay now! I'll keep you warm with my scorching blaze.
Hellblaze Demon.evoFlair_: Sky full of clouds, air bitter and cold, breath white with frost. Numbs you to the bone, doesn't it? That's why winter is so awful. But it's okay now! I'll thaw you out, and burn away all your frozen bits!

Nightmare, Dreameater.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain +2/+0.
Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat and give it +X/+0. X equals this follower's attack before being destroyed.
Nightmare, Dreameater.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat and give it +X/+0. X equals this follower's attack before being destroyed.
Nightmare, Dreameater.baseFlair_: Good thing you didn't come across a real vampire, nasty creatures they are. You'd be devoured—body and soul. Lucky for you, I'm the generous type. I'll even show you a dream of divine... pleasure.
Nightmare, Dreameater.evoFlair_:
"If I studied super hard in a dream, I might even be able to pass!"
—Lou, Mysterian Freshman
"I mean, I'll just devour it in the end..."
—Nightmare, Dreameater

Boar Pelt Warrior.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 1 damage to your leader. Then activate Vengeance until the end of the turn even if your leader's defense is more than 10.
Boar Pelt Warrior.baseFlair_: The tusked beast's flesh reeks. It must be rubbed with herbs, then boiled repeatedly. The flavor remaining in the stench's wake stabs at the nose and stomach. —Fourth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
Boar Pelt Warrior.evoFlair_: With the speed of the long-clawed beast, we confounded and defeated the tusked beast. From the tusked beast, we gained piercing strength. With this, we can take a far thicker pelt... —Fourth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

Hellspear Warrior.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain Storm.
Hellspear Warrior.baseFlair_: In his arm resides demon magic. But in his fist rests a spear stained by demon blood. Though his flesh is corrupted by devilish influence, his will is to drive the devils' influence from this world.
Hellspear Warrior.evoFlair_: The path of vengeance is treacherous and lonely—no more than a life spent hunted by demons and shunned by humans. His arm is tainted; his soul is weary. Still he does not let go of his exalted spear, which, in the moonlight, gleams like new-fallen snow.

Whiplash Imp.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain +1/+4, Rush, and Drain.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Summon an Imp Lancer.
Whiplash Imp.baseFlair_: It's long, it's fast, and it'll make you cry! Ta-da! Can I make a mean whip or what? Now that I have this baby, no one can accuse me of being just another ho-hum imp!
Whiplash Imp.evoFlair_: Eeek! Moooom! I told you to knock before coming into my room! And would you stop laughing at my outfit? I'm just trying to find myself as an imp, okay?

Vania, Vampire Princess.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Vania, Vampire Princess.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Vania, Vampire Princess.baseFlair_: Hey! It's not nice to mess with my bloodkin!
Vania, Vampire Princess.evoFlair_: I'm here now, so everything will be okay! 'Cause I'm the best there is!

Galretto, Devil of Love.baseEffect_: If this follower can be targeted by enemy spells or effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Galretto, Devil of Love.evoEffect_: If this follower can be targeted by enemy spells or effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Galretto, Devil of Love.baseFlair_: I'll keep you smiling. Both destiny and I can be fickle now and then, you see.
Galretto, Devil of Love.evoFlair_: I fear that the bond we share won't last forever, but all good things must come to an end.

Raven, Eventide Vampire.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 2 play points, and Vengeance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a Raven, Noontide Vampire or Raven, Midnight Vampire.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Raven, Eventide Vampire.baseFlair_: I'll stay with you all night long. If you so desire, I'll paint myself in your very color.
Raven, Eventide Vampire.evoFlair_: I'll stay with you all night long. If you so desire, I'll paint the night in your very color.

Vuella, One-Winged Demon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand.
Vuella, One-Winged Demon.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +1/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your hand.
Vuella, One-Winged Demon.baseFlair_: I'm no longer the proud demon I once was... A pitiful sight to behold, don't you think? If you'll have me though... I'll stand by your side, until this last wing is no more!
Vuella, One-Winged Demon.evoFlair_: Broken. Imperfect. Surely not worthy of your glance. But if you're willing to take a chance on me, I'll muster my courage and give you everything I have!

Lykos Berserker.baseEffect_: Last Words: If this follower's attack was at least 4 before being destroyed, put a Blood Moon into your hand and change its cost to 1.
Lykos Berserker.baseFlair_: Your men are but a pack of pups under the moonlight. —Waltz, King of Wolves
Lykos Berserker.evoFlair_: Your transgressions and your brutality... they will not go unanswered by the moon. —The New Queen

Doublame, Duke and Dame.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, Choose - Put a Peckish Owlcat or Leoparion into your hand.
Doublame, Duke and Dame.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Peckish Owlcat or Leoparion into your hand.
Doublame, Duke and Dame.baseFlair_:
"They're disgusting... This one, that one, all of them!"
"Hah! You guys've got guts to oppose us!"
"Yep. You're all going to meet a real ugly end."
"Here it comes! Twinsoul Fusion!"
Doublame, Duke and Dame.evoFlair_:
"Grrr... Why do all of these creeps keep getting in our way!?"
"Even though we fused them... They're still so disgusting!"
"Ungrateful louts. We'll scramble you!"
"You said it! Twin! Soul! Fusion!"

Io, Enchanting Educator.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Select 2 enemy followers. Deal X damage to the first follower and Y damage to the second follower. X equals the attack of the second follower and Y equals the attack of the first follower.
Io, Enchanting Educator.evoEffect_:
Drain.
Evolve: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Io, Enchanting Educator.baseFlair_: I'm actually pretty new to teaching. My subject is language studies, but I also know a lot about romance novels and girls' comics. Anything you need to know, just ask.
Io, Enchanting Educator.evoFlair_: What's the subject you struggle with most? I'll clear my schedule this weekend and give you a private tutoring session. One-on-one is the best way to learn, don't you think? That way I can give you all my attention.

Contemptous Demon.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Contemptous Demon.evoEffect_:
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever your leader takes damage, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower (up to 10 times per turn).
Contemptous Demon.baseFlair_: Aaah, that bleating is music to my ears. Look, I'm not here to kill you. Buuut, I'm not letting you live either. I'll break you down, fix you up, then make you love me. Love me with all your heart.
Contemptous Demon.evoFlair_: I'm rather fond of humans. Fragile, but resolute. Weak, but determined. But sometimes I get a tad too excited and accidents happen... See? Now you're crying. I don't see what good it'll do you though.

Raven, Noontide Vampire.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Raven, Noontide Vampire.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Raven, Noontide Vampire.baseFlair_: I only wish to stay with you all day, master. Just as you desired,I...
Raven, Noontide Vampire.evoFlair_: I only wish to stay with you all day, master. If you so desire, I'll relinquish the day to you.

Raven, Midnight Vampire.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Raven, Midnight Vampire.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Raven, Midnight Vampire.baseFlair_: I decided to stay with you all night! I did just what you said!
Raven, Midnight Vampire.evoFlair_: I decided to stay with you all night! If you insist... then I'll stay with you till the morning!

Aza & Iza, Feline Maids.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Evolve an allied Trill, Devilish Idol.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Aza & Iza, Feline Maids.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Aza & Iza, Feline Maids.baseFlair_:
In the shadows behind the glittering idol Trill, you will always find the two maids, Aza and Iza.
"That girl is so two-faced she's practically two different people."
"Yeah, but... she's actually pretty nice."
Aza & Iza, Feline Maids.evoFlair_:
The maids serve both as Trill's honor guard and her band. They would do anything for their mistress... At least, as long as she pays their wages and keeps them in fish.
"Mm... this is good salmon."
"Trill always sets such a good table!"

Peckish Owlcat.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with 1 attack or 1 defense.
Peckish Owlcat.baseFlair_:
"Oppose us and you deal with our pet!"
"An owl and cat both, taste the power of two night stalkers made one!"
"Twin! Soul! Fusion!"
—Doublame, Duke and Dame
Peckish Owlcat.evoFlair_: It is both owl and cat, two beasts that were... intended to form an apex predator. But it eats rats, which is a good enough compromise. Born from a beast of the land and a bird of the sky, its hunger is now twofold. Please feed it.

Leoparion.baseFlair_:
"Oppose us and you deal with our pet!"
"A leopard and lion both, taste the power of two forest kings made one!"
"Twin! Soul! Fusion!"
—Doublame, Duke and Dame
Leoparion.evoFlair_: It is both leopard and lion, two beasts melded together to form an apex predator. Though they may have taken a new singular form, their desire to hunt remains intact. But now they move with two minds, capable of tearing through throats at twice the pace.

Vira, Knight Fanatic.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect until the start of your next turn - Reduce damage to your leader to 0. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.) Give this follower the following effect until the start of your next turn: Subtract 2 from damage taken by this follower.
Vira, Knight Fanatic.baseFlair_:
Ahh... Katalina...
You're always so beautiful no matter the occasion... Everything I am, it's all for you...
Vira, Knight Fanatic.evoFlair_: Katalina, everything I do is for you... Of course I'll gladly display my power if you wish. Come forth, Luminiera.

Mono, Garnet Rebel.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 7 allied Machina followers have been destroyed this match, put an Alpha Drive into your hand.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
Mono, Garnet Rebel.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Ward.
At the beginning of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and this follower.
Mono, Garnet Rebel.baseFlair_: There is merit in fighting for our sentience—I suppose I say that precisely because I am a being of thoughts and emotions—but there's nothing mysterious about a soul crying for its freedom. Even if it's incased in a metal shell.
Mono, Garnet Rebel.evoFlair_: It's not so bad, this thinking business. It allows me to laugh and enjoy simple pleasures, like chitchats—yes, the experience of joy is a joy to experience! But then again... I wouldn't feel things like sadness if I had remained unawakened.

Voice of the Abyss.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Voice of the Abyss.baseFlair_: Before you lay the opening from where no light may enter. Now touch it. Revere it. A darkness in the lowest of depths from which no voice may leave. —The Abyss, Chapter 1, Verse 5
Voice of the Abyss.evoFlair_: You awaken to a deafening roar. Gasping for air and shivering with fear, you shall witness the truth. For beyond... your punishment awaits. With trembling arms and eyes bewildered, feel it for yourself— ah, yes... the warmth of despair. —The Abyss, Chapter 4, Verse 2

Blood Pact.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Draw 2 cards.

Razory Claw.baseEffect_: Deal 2 damage to your leader and 3 damage to an enemy.
Razory Claw.baseFlair_: Just remember, you've made me do this. Not even I could stop me now!

Limil's Way.baseEffect_: Give Drain to an allied follower.

Summon Bloodkin.baseFlair_: At the master's command, the two darknesses begin to dance.

Vampiric Kiss.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Vampiric Kiss.baseFlair_: What promise does the vampire's kiss hold? Oblivion or immortality?

Entrancing Blow.baseEffect_:
Give +2/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
(Can be played only when a targetable card is in your hand.)
Entrancing Blow.baseFlair_: When bewitched by a succubus, your fate may vary: some lose consciousness, some lose their hearts, some lose their lives.

Deal with the Devil.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to a random allied follower and a random enemy follower.
Both players draw a card.
Deal with the Devil.baseFlair_:
Third-rate con artists offer deals which benefit only themselves.
Second-rate merchants offer fifty-fifty trades.
A first-class devil's proposal benefits only the other party.

Dark Summons.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If Wrath is active for you, recover 2 play points.
Dark Summons.baseFlair_: Darkness skips pleasantries and simply awakens one's appetite.

Medusa's Gaze.baseEffect_: Give an allied follower the following effect until the end of the turn: Follower Strike - Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Medusa's Gaze.baseFlair_: Your tears can't save you. Turn to stone!

Hungering Horde.baseEffect_: Select an enemy follower. Deal 3 damage to it and all enemy followers of the same name.
Hungering Horde.baseFlair_: "Give me an arm!" "Give me a leg!" "Give me the torso!" "Give me the lips!" "The... lips?" —Group of ghouls

Snarling Chains.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Then deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Snarling Chains.baseFlair_: We are bound to heaven's plan, and our lives are fated. If you would scoff and condescend, then I shall bind you and grant you your fate.

Wings of Lust.baseEffect_:
Give +2/+2 to an allied follower. That follower gains the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and this follower.
Enhance (4): Give Drain to that follower.
Wings of Lust.baseFlair_: Love and mix, ravish and enrapture. Let lust overtake you as you come together with your fellows.

Wicked Pact.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
If Vengeance is not active for you, deal X damage to your leader. X equals the destroyed follower's attack. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Wicked Pact.baseFlair_: As his vision goes red, he realizes his folly. He asked the devil for strength; he did not ask for life.

Garnet Waltz.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Urias's Revelry or Mono's Resolve.
If Vengeance is active for you, instead deal 3 damage to the enemy leader and recover 1 evolution point.
Garnet Waltz.baseFlair_: The world of machines falls to ruin. The cogs that built the nation begin to leak tears. A bemused tongue speaks. "Now show me. Prove that you have a will; prove that you have a soul."

Crimson Burst.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Crimson Burst.baseFlair_: A richer rouge for a ruby red rose.

Berserker's Pelt.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the start of your opponent's turn, give Bane to a random allied Bloodcraft follower. Then, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, give it +1/+1.
Berserker's Pelt.baseFlair_:
We lived by hunting beasts and eating their flesh. Once we knew the power of their pelts, we hunters became warriors.
—First Berserker's Epitaph

Mask of the Black Death.baseEffect_:
Countdown (5)
Whenever your leader takes damage, reduce the damage to 0 and subtract the same amount from this amulet's Countdown instead. (If there is more than 1 allied Mask of the Black Death in play, subtract this amount from the Countdown of each.)
Mask of the Black Death.baseFlair_: Like any other contagion, death can be prevented.

Night Fall.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your opponent's turn, summon a Forest Bat.
Night Fall.baseFlair_: It lurks under the shadow of night—the embodiment of darkness, perhaps the manifestation of night itself. Watch your step, for the night is unforgiving.

Madness Revealed.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Restore 8 defense to your leader.
Madness Revealed.baseFlair_: It lurks under the shadow of night—an invisible presence as shapeless as the dark, perhaps the manifestation of night itself. Make the wrong move, and the night shall punish.

Blazing Sapphire.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Blazing Sapphire.baseFlair_: The way of blue is the way of riches. Be wary not to sit in the lap of luxury for too long. —Alexandrite Demon

Vampiric Fortress.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, summon a Forest Bat if an allied Forest Bat is in play. Then if there were 4 cards in your area when the turn ended, destroy this amulet and deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Forest Bats in play.
Vampiric Fortress.baseFlair_: An ancient fortress of the darkest black surrounded by countless creatures of the night. Occasionally, screams can be heard through the din of flapping wings.

Crazed Executioner.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Crazed Executioner.baseFlair_: More, I tell you! More! Heads will roll until my axe turns blunt, and then I'll chop some more!
Crazed Executioner.evoFlair_: You're out of people to execute? You filthy liar! All humans will answer for the crime of existing, and I will be their judge, jury, and executioner!

Metal Gargoyle.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if Vengeance is active for you.
Metal Gargoyle.baseFlair_: If you ever find yourself exploring a dungeon, beware of metal statues. They're ice-hearted guardians who will show you no mercy.
Metal Gargoyle.evoFlair_: Their glazed look has fooled many a dungeon raider into dismissing them as harmless. Never ever turn your back on one.

Killer Devil.baseFlair_: Roll up, roll up! Get ya front-row seat to the slaughterhouse show of a lifetime, hosted by this pint-sized imp 'erself! Mind ya, don't lean in too close, though. Lethal accidents do happen on occasion! Hee-hee.
Killer Devil.evoFlair_: What better night for a slaughter than one lit by a blood-drenched full moon! I promise you'll love it to death. 'Ang on a minute. Didn't I just kill you? Hey, get back 'ere!

Demonhand Assassin.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Drain if Vengeance is active for you.
Demonhand Assassin.baseFlair_: My demon claw yearns for blood, so I'll have to take your life. It's nothing personal.
Demonhand Assassin.evoFlair_: Do you see? It throbs with hunger! Please, let it sink into your desperate face! Let it steep its fingers in the warmth of your lifeblood.

Demonic Sniper.baseFlair_: Yes, yes! More! Oh, is that all you have? But I was so enjoying myself. If that's all the fun you can offer, I'll just have to kill you.
Demonic Sniper.evoFlair_: That's more like it! I think it's time to kick this up a notch, don't you agree? Don't go dying too quickly, you hear? Ah-ha-ha!

Succubus.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if their defense is higher than yours.
Succubus.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if their defense is higher than yours.
Succubus.baseFlair_: It's no use trying to hide it. I can see it all over your face—you're dreaming of us together in paradise. Tee-hee. I do like the shy ones.
Succubus.evoFlair_: Hmm, you are a shy one. Don't worry, I won't bite—much. Tee-hee, we'll do things you only dreamed of. And some you didn't.

Mini Soul Devil.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
Mini Soul Devil.evoEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
Mini Soul Devil.baseFlair_: They're all bright and pretty like people souls...
Mini Soul Devil.evoFlair_: Now I'm strong and sparkly too. Hurray...

Alpha Wolfman.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Summon an Alpha Wolfman if Vengeance is active for you.
Alpha Wolfman.baseFlair_: The woods around here belong to wolfmen. If you see bite marks or scratches on the trees, turn back. There's no reasoning with a beast once you're inside its territory.
Alpha Wolfman.evoFlair_: Wolfmen can use their impressive claws to take down monsters many times larger than themselves. If you ever come across monster carcasses with their throats ripped out, that's the work of wolfmen.

Frogbat.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0.
Frogbat.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0.
Frogbat.baseFlair_: I wanted to fly from the time I was a tadpole, and the gods eventually gave me these wings. I'm happy about that, but I lost the most beloved thing in my life. I no longer have a purpose or reason to live. What am I supposed to do now?
Frogbat.evoFlair_: Eureka! At last! An answer! I don't need a purpose or reason to live, because I'm as free as the sky itself. There's nothing I can't do.

Disagreeable Demon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Ward if an enemy follower is in play. Gain +2/+0 and deal 2 damage to your leader if no enemy followers are in play.
Disagreeable Demon.baseFlair_: Humph! It's not like I care about you!
Disagreeable Demon.evoFlair_: Humph! Don't—don't get any ideas! I'm not going to help you fight your stupid enemies!

Fanged Serpent.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Fanged Serpent.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Fanged Serpent.baseFlair_: We've got a rule on this mountain, one that might contradict what you know: don't fight against the bite. —Prospector's teachings
Fanged Serpent.evoFlair_: If you run into that thing, you better start praying. But none of that "save me" crap. No, you'll wanna pray that it kills you quickly in a single bite. —Prospector's teachings
