Bloodhungry Matriarch.baseFlair_: It consumed the blood of all living things. It drank until people, dragons, and demons alike ran dry. And each time it drank, its body changed. It gained knowledge. It gained claws and fangs. It gained wings. All it lost was its sanity.
Bloodhungry Matriarch.evoFlair_: It constantly ached. It constantly thirsted. Its irrepressible, unstoppable, inescapable thirst became an urge rooted in its very being. Vampires fear it as the fate that lies in store for those who lose themselves to the thirst.

Calamity Bringer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly destroy 3 other followers. If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 7 damage to your leader.
Calamity Bringer.evoEffect_: Evolve: If Vengeance is active for you, randomly deal 1 damage to a leader or another follower. Do this 9 times.
Calamity Bringer.baseFlair_: Rage burgeons and swathes itself in layers of hatred, despair, ruin, and madness. It spins into the form of a demonic fist. White- and black-winged alike are blown away in a wave of indiscriminate, unreasoning violence.
Calamity Bringer.evoFlair_: No one knows what passion, what frustration, reverberates in that echoing howl. Before they can learn, all who hear it are returned to dust.

Cradle of Dark Divinity.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Cradle of Dark Divinity.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effects.
-At the end of your turn, if you have at least 8 cards in your hand, randomly discard cards until you have 7, then deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals 2 times the number of cards discarded.
-At the start of your turn, draw a card.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
Cradle of Dark Divinity.baseFlair_:
At last we have found the dark deity. Let us fall to our knees in reverence. The abnormal bat, werewolf, and vampire. All. Sprang. From this. This font. The font of. Madness. Madness itself.
—Survey team captain's scrawled journal entry
Cradle of Dark Divinity.evoFlair_:
Great, great, great, great, great deity. No. Myself? Your power. Please. Stop? It will spread. Outward. Without. Cease. No good. Madness.
—Twisted scrawl

Arion.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Arion.baseFlair_: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. Legend has it he once served as guardian angel to a great prophet, but the truth has been lost to time.
Arion.evoFlair_: A young lion, whelped in the darkest depths. He grants strength to the vengeful, spurring them on to retribution. Legend has it he himself yearns to rebel against the heavens, but the truth has been lost to time.

Furiae.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and draw a card.
Furiae.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and draw a card.
Furiae.baseFlair_: I am the living embodiment of revenge. I draw strength from the darkness within human hearts. Hatred... Envy... Soon this world will be filled with resentment!
Furiae.evoFlair_: The world is filled with hatred, and the time for revenge is upon us! My dark arts shall skewer the hearts of the hypocrites and pin their souls to the tombstone of resentment!

Azazel.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change both leaders' defense to 10, either by restoring defense or by dealing damage.
Azazel.baseFlair_: Though my soul may fall, I shall never bow my head to such weak, stunted creatures as mortals. I still possess a measure of pride.
Azazel.evoFlair_: When the time came, we sounded the battle cry against the gods that deceived us... As fellow traitors, you are now compelled to follow me.

Maelstrom Serpent.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Maelstrom Serpent. Repeat until your area is full if Vengeance is active for you.
Maelstrom Serpent.baseFlair_: The gigantic wriggling serpent is a maelstrom that swallows people, cities, cultures, and ideas alike, like a storm that blows away everything in its path.
Maelstrom Serpent.evoFlair_: The tremendous, frenzied serpent is nothing less than a calamity that swallows the heavens and the earth. It crushes everything without discrimination, returning it to nothingness like some sort of divine judge.

Spawn of the Abyss.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Last Words: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Spawn of the Abyss.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Deal 8 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Last Words: Deal 8 damage to the enemy leader if Ambush is active for this follower.
Spawn of the Abyss.baseFlair_: Afflicted and annihilated, one oozes into the ebon abyss. Look and fear, human. There lurks despair: one who preys on iniquitous flesh and the bones of the besmirched. —The Abyss, Chapter 2, Verse 4
Spawn of the Abyss.evoFlair_: Be drenched! Oh, cry out beyond the edge! All is swallowed and flows into the lightless depths. The day has begun—a day longer than eternity and shorter than a blink. —The Abyss, Finale, Verse 1

Darkfeast Bat.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy. X equals the number of times that your leader was damaged during your turn in this match.
Darkfeast Bat.baseFlair_: Sleep is a product of the beast that consumes the darkness... and those within it. —Chapter 1, A History of Night
Darkfeast Bat.evoFlair_: Humans came to fear the night on account of something that confines them for all eternity. —Chapter 3, A History of Night

Crimson Rose Queen.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Transform each Bloodcraft card in your hand that originally costs 2 play points or less into a Crimson Burst.
Crimson Rose Queen.baseFlair_: It was humans who spilled blood upon my soil. One good turn deserves another, so I'll see them painted in the same crimson. Yes, caught in my briars and pierced by my thorns... Oh, how red they'll bloom.
Crimson Rose Queen.evoFlair_: The more blood my roses drink, the more crimson they bloom. Yes, this place is my paradise, but for those foolish humans, it is both purgatory and hell.

Seductress Vampire.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, if Vengeance is not active for you, reveal it and then banish it. Change your leader's maximum defense to 10.
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy, then restore 4 defense to your leader.
Seductress Vampire.baseFlair_:
"That vanilla stuff? A little boring, don't you think?"
One look into her eyes is all it takes to fall into the hells of romance.
"You can have it... a passionate love more intense than anything you've ever felt."
Seductress Vampire.evoFlair_:
"I've lost my taste for those sweet, happy endings."
The incarnation of beauty itself smiled bewitchingly, her prey completely enraptured.
"But you'll give me what I really want, right? All I need is a taste of that bitter, delicious despair."

Spawn of Exile.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a Voice of the Abyss.
----------
Ambush.
If Ambush is active for this follower when it attacks, summon 3 Voice of the Abysses.
Spawn of Exile.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
If Ambush is active for this follower when it attacks, summon 4 Voice of the Abysses.
Spawn of Exile.baseFlair_: Avert your eyes. Seal your breath. Even the ends of the heavens are unsafe from its grasps. Before you is a wretched garden, whose thorns prey on the skin of the ignorant. Turn around, and the voices of despair shall call you once more. —The Abyss, Chapter 3, Verse 6
Spawn of Exile.evoFlair_:
His arm, in the deepest depths of its organs. Within the screaming throat, darkness blooms. The nightmare becometh real, bringing forth a new life. Ah... To be born with sin. A new song echoes.
—The Abyss, Finale, Verse 5

Medusiana.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Can attack up to 3 times per turn.
Medusiana.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Can attack up to 3 times per turn.
Medusiana.baseFlair_: "You'll have plenty of time to regret fighting us—when you're sitting in her stomach! Medusiana, swallow 'em whole!" —Medusa, controller of the great snake
Medusiana.evoFlair_: "Huh? Pointing your sword at the gorgon sisters? That's more than a little stupid! Medusiana—punish 'em!" —Medusa, controller of the great snake

Revelation.baseEffect_:
If Vengeance is active for you, this card costs 4 less.
----------
Deal 8 damage to all followers.
Revelation.baseFlair_: It takes days to make a world, but a second to destroy it.

Calamity's Archdemon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to both leaders.
Calamity's Archdemon.baseFlair_: Pain for all the earth. Woe, grief, and misfortune. Now cry your tears of agony!
Calamity's Archdemon.evoFlair_: Cry, and let the pain drive you mad! No matter where you run, the pain I inflict will be there with you.

Temptress Vampire.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Temptress Vampire.baseFlair_: Naked is the human mind in my presence. By all means cling to your doubts. My talents allow me deep inside your mind. Now offer up your life to me.
Temptress Vampire.evoFlair_: Step outside your facade and cast aside your mortal ties, for tonight we revel. Tonight you will surrender to the tantalizing taste of my company!

Diabolus Psema.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Demonic Storm and a Demonic Strike into your hand. If Vengeance is active for you, recover 6 play points.
This follower can't be damaged by spells.
Diabolus Psema.evoEffect_: This follower can't be damaged by spells.
Diabolus Psema.baseFlair_: This deception of a world has gone stale. Let the demons roam freely, and reduce it to ash—the fire will rightfully return you all to the void.
Diabolus Psema.evoFlair_: His demons are masters of deception. All colors of the heavens and earth will vanish before them.

Permafrost Behemoth.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower and then the enemy leader. If Wrath is active for you, deal 10 damage instead.
Permafrost Behemoth.baseFlair_: When her roar resounds, the frozen soil cracks and a beam of light splits the sky. None who live should risk the queen's displeasure.
Permafrost Behemoth.evoFlair_: At her second roar, even the skies shall pale in fear. The haughty queen of frozen earth is an ice-cloaked avatar of terror.

Destructive Succubus.baseEffect_:
During your turn, whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. If Vengeance is active for you, summon 2 Serpents and give all allied Serpents Ward.
Destructive Succubus.baseFlair_: This is the form you find most alluring? How charming—how obscene—I'm rather fond of it. Well, time to get down to business. I'm here to damn you, after all.
Destructive Succubus.evoFlair_: It's only natural to lose yourself to indulgence and madness. After all, I'm going to make this night last as long as I can. We'll see if your body lasts until morning.

Purson.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (8): Destroy all allied followers and amulets. For each card, put a random follower that costs more than it from your deck into play.
----------
Storm.
Bane.
Purson.baseFlair_: After abducting the bodies of the living, he transfigures them completely. Assembled are instruments of resentment to perform malicious symphonies for his orchestra of slaughter.
Purson.evoFlair_: The tones are striking and coarse—too intense for a human to endure. His otherworldly music twists the ears and crumples the heart. Upon the finale is an ovation from demonkind, as all that remains is death and destruction.

Ruinweb Spider.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (10)
During your turn, whenever another allied amulet comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Ruinweb Spider.
----------
During your turn, when this follower comes into play, all enemy followers can't attack until the end of the opponent's turn.
Once on each of the opponent's turns, when the opponent plays a follower, it can't attack until the end of the opponent's turn.
Ruinweb Spider.evoEffect_: Once on each of the opponent's turns, when the opponent plays a follower, it can't attack until the end of the opponent's turn.
Ruinweb Spider.baseFlair_: Follow not the cursed threads. Their source is illness incarnate, and it spins a web of madness. It speaks in cacophony and abides in distortion. Hear or see it once, and there is no return. Cover your ears; still the sound seeps in. Close your eyes; still the image blazes.
Ruinweb Spider.evoFlair_:
Silver, holy water, even the sun... There is nothing left that can restrain me. You think these tendrils of madness tenacious? Watch me sever them with steel. The moonstruck night is over. And when day breaks, I begin.
—A Vampire with Pure Silver Wings

Fairy Wisp.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish this follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Fairy Wisp.baseFlair_: Gliding upon the wind, as if to illuminate the canopy of the forest—but try and catch a glimpse, they'll vanish without a trace.
Fairy Wisp.evoFlair_: Gliding upon the wind, gently floating as if willed by the forest itself—even now, they continue to flutter and flicker.

Mark of the Unkilling.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower with 0 attack or less.
Draw a card.
Enhance (6): Banish any enemy follower instead.
Mark of the Unkilling.baseFlair_: Burned by tears or torn by screams, you must bear it, never decaying, for all eternity.

Arisa's Leadership.baseFlair_: I'm gonna fight too! Wars are filled with pain and sadness, and they make you want to run away... Still, I won't turn back—not ever! I might've shown up here on accident, but that doesn't matter. I really love this world!

Ladica's Embrace.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
Ladica's Embrace.baseFlair_: Guess I'll fight or whatever. Honestly, I've got better things to be doing, but hey, mabes there's something to all this hope stuff Chickadee's been going on about. At least I'll look cool.

Blessings of Creation.baseEffect_:
Draw 2 cards.
Enhance (2): Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
Blessings of Creation.baseFlair_: The noble shimmer of life for you, noble one. —Yggdrasil

Wrath of Nature.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower +1/+0 and Rush.
Enhance (4): Then give all allied followers Storm.
Wrath of Nature.baseFlair_: The noble shimmer of life must not be defiled by anyone. —Yggdrasil

Treacherous Reversal.baseEffect_:
Banish all cards in play.
Banish all cards in your hand and deck.
Put copies of the first 10 cards your opponent played this match (excluding XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man and Treacherous Reversal) into your deck, in the order they were played.
Transform the Reaper at the bottom of your deck into a Victory Card.
Treat allied cards that have been destroyed this match as if they were banished.
At the end of your opponent's next turn, put copies of each card in your opponent's hand into your hand (excluding XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man and Treacherous Reversal).
Treacherous Reversal.baseFlair_:
So how's it hangin', and how do you do?
What's fact and what's fiction is up to you!
Hey... You really gonna believe that? Heck, I'm not even sure myself!
Nothing matters except satisfying yourself!

Water Fairy.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Water Fairy.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Water Fairy.baseFlair_: Fairies get lonely, so we always stick together. If you hurt me, they won't be pleased!
Water Fairy.evoFlair_: If you try and hurt me, we'll make you regret it. But if you're a good friend, the fairies won't forget it!

Elf Child May.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Elf Child May.baseFlair_: Elf rules say we've gotta live as one with nature, but grown-ups get to go out into the world! Pffft, I can't wait till I'm bigger.
Elf Child May.evoFlair_: I mean, I really like the forest! It's my home! But I wanna know what's out there so bad. So, um, I was thinking of going on an adventure! I mean, look, I'm so grown-up already, right? It'll be fine!

Fairy Champion.baseFlair_: I fight to defend the forest from the forces of darkness! I will not allow any more of my friends to be killed!
Fairy Champion.evoFlair_: I'm not going to cry any more! I'm going to keep fighting even if I don't have any strength left! Courage makes anything possible! Shield of the pixies, lend me your strength!

Felpurr Kitten.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Felpurr Kitten.baseFlair_: Look! Look how high I can climb now! Soon I'm going to be a grown-up!
Felpurr Kitten.evoFlair_: Once I grow up, I'm gonna leave the forest. One day I'll be a big cat girl!

Lila, Arborist.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to another allied follower with at least 4 attack.
Enhance (4): Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers instead.
Lila, Arborist.baseFlair_: The forest is a living, breathing organism. That's why I look after its health. Just like people need doctors, the forest needs an arborist!
Lila, Arborist.evoFlair_: Young Treants are bad at expressing themselves. But I understand what they mean. H-hey, what? Are those termites? Eeeww, get away!

Robotic Bagworm.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Until the end of the turn, subtract 1 from the cost of a Machina card (excluding Robotic Bagworm) in your hand.
Robotic Bagworm.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a tiny little insect. It began using steel in place of branches and iron instead of leaves to construct its cocoon. As a result, it was afforded protection from predators and the environment alike. —Researcher's Report, Part 1
Robotic Bagworm.evoFlair_: Something is strange about this forest. Today I fired an arrow at a most curious insect, and to my surprise, it deflected it! It was my first encounter with a bug sporting a metallic carapace. —Forest Notes, Part 1

Crossbow Sniper.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
Crossbow Sniper.baseFlair_: To an outsider, this nation must look like it's been conquered by the forest. But the people here praised my skill, saved my family, and gave me a duty to fulfill. This is the best work environment I could ask for.
Crossbow Sniper.evoFlair_: Here in this forest, things like social status and political power are more worthless than weeds. Even if I put an extra hole in the head of some noble who broke the law, no one would criticize me. I can't think of a better place to work.

Ironback Beetle.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If at least 4 other cards were played this turn, summon an Ironback Beetle.
Clash: If any other allied Machina followers are in play, gain +1/+1.
Ironback Beetle.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Clash: If any other allied Machina followers are in play, gain +1/+1.
Ironback Beetle.baseFlair_:
The source of the core's metamorphosis was another tiny little insect. It began wrapping its horn in steel, giving it an impressive boost in power—so much so that the little guy can bore through a live tree. What a transformation.
—Forest Elf's Journal, Part 1
Ironback Beetle.evoFlair_:
Steel-covered insects, beasts clad in steel—the forest elves have but one explanation: the fauna have adopted machinery into their biology. One suspects we will soon follow suit.
—On Flourishing, Part 1

Fairy.baseFlair_: There are fairies in forests, fountains, flower beds, and everywhere else. If you can't see them, it's because your heart is impure. Look, there's one right next to you!
Fairy.evoFlair_: Trickery, moodiness, mischief—while these are all aspects of fairies' characters, what's most important is the strength of their feelings. They are highly emotional and will sacrifice their lives to help their friends and families.

Lumbering Carapace.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, gain +2/+2. Then, if at least 4 other cards were played this turn, gain +2/+2 more and Ward.
Lumbering Carapace.baseFlair_:
Mom told me to leave it in the forest, but she's not the boss of me! This bug's way too cool! I'm totally taking it home with me!
—A Boy's Account
Lumbering Carapace.evoFlair_:
He did promise to take good care of it. Boys will be boys, I guess. But I draw the line when a pet is literally bigger than the house!
—A Mother's Account

Whirlwind Rhinoceroach.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of allied Whirlwind Rhinoceroaches you've played this match. If X is at least 5, gain Storm.
Whirlwind Rhinoceroach.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, return this follower to your hand.
Whirlwind Rhinoceroach.baseFlair_: The witch first gave it a simple command: usurp life. He would carry out that order faithfully—quicker and more accurately.
Whirlwind Rhinoceroach.evoFlair_: Its thorny carapace is thick and its swinging blades are sharp: it is the usurper of life. And once again it will carry out the orders of the witch.

May, Eager Elf.baseEffect_:
Invocation: When you have played your fourth card this turn, invoke this card. Then return it to your hand.
Fanfare: If at least 4 other cards were played this turn, deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
May, Eager Elf.baseFlair_: Let's all go on an adventure. I've got snacks in my bag and a pocketful of friendship. Nothing will be scary while the three of us are together. —The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 1
May, Eager Elf.evoFlair_: The are lots of dangers out on an adventure. We might even have to fight. "Let me battle it out alone!" "No way!" The travelers argue, and cracks begin to form in their friendship. —The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 2

Tia, Crystalian Noble.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Crystalia Eve into your hand and change its cost to 3 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn. Change its cost to 1 instead if at least 4 other cards were played this turn.
Tia, Crystalian Noble.baseFlair_: Beyond the glaciers, where the snowstorm leads, whatever could bring you to this place a second time? You're a strange one... but that might not be so bad. I suppose I could lend you a hand.
Tia, Crystalian Noble.evoFlair_: The crystals' power is eternal. In comparison, our chance meeting is but a sigh which clouds the frozen air before dispersing. Even so... perhaps this fleeting warmth has meaning. Perhaps it is something I need.

Phantasmal Fairy Dragon.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +0/+X. X equals the number of allied cards destroyed this match that cost 1 play point or less. Then, if X is at least 5, evolve this follower.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
Phantasmal Fairy Dragon.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
Phantasmal Fairy Dragon.baseFlair_: Joy, anger, sorrow, pleasure—they are all as one. The deep green torrent is as the forest incarnate. Its power surges and swells, playfully for now. Hidden within its elegant form is the rapture of the shuddering forest.
Phantasmal Fairy Dragon.evoFlair_: The dragon beats its great wings and soars into the air, leaving a shower of blossoms in its wake. It laughs, shimmering bewitchingly—the mighty destroyer of those who would dare defile the forest.

Nature's Guidance.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Draw a card.
Nature's Guidance.baseFlair_: Wait a minute... Haven't I been to this forest before? —Lost Traveler

Fairy Circle.baseFlair_: Recently, all manner of people have been coming through the forest, so the fairies never want for entertainment.

Entangling Vines.baseEffect_:
Give an enemy follower -10/-0 until the end of the turn.
Enhance (5): Destroy it instead.
Entangling Vines.baseFlair_: Don't worry. They're just playing—for now anyway.

Airbound Barrage.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Then deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
Airbound Barrage.baseFlair_:
The first arrow pierces its prey—proof of a warrior who has discarded all fear. The second arrow, fired to finish the job, is proof of a hunter who has dispensed with mercy.
—Elven Tactics, pursuit section

Synchronized Slash.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
Synchronized Slash.baseFlair_:
It begins as a seed, transforming into a sprout upon the barren land. When the sprout takes root, a guardian appears who has taken a vow to protect it.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 1

Fertile Aether.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, draw 2 cards.
Fertile Aether.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the forest dwellers discovered her kindness in the underbrush, they saw a simple, verdant aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who seek perfection.

Spiritshine.baseEffect_:
Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
If any allied Naterran Great Trees are in play, add 1 to the number of cards played this turn.
Spiritshine.baseFlair_:
Precious, sacred, miracle of the wood.
Feeds on life to nurture light for spirits pure and good.
By its light they frolic, ephemeral and free.
Paradise for them, but death for you and me.
—Woodland folk song

Angel's Dress.baseFlair_: You're so unfashionable I can hardly look. But just relax. You're about to be reborn a hundred times over in fashionable white. —Fashionista Nelcha

Demon's Dress.baseEffect_: Change an enemy follower's defense to 1.
Demon's Dress.baseFlair_: You're so unfashionable I can hardly bear it. But don't worry. You're about to be reborn a hundred times over in fashionable black. —Fashionista Nelcha

Fairy Torrent.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Restore X defense to your leader. X is the number of returned cards.
Enhance (5): Return all allied followers and amulets instead.
Fairy Torrent.baseFlair_: "I'll heal you!" "Do you need healing?" "Hey, I can heal you!" "See? When we feel like it, we can do amazing things together!"

Divine Smithing.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+0 and Rush to all followers in your hand that originally cost 1 play point or less.
Enhance (4): Give +1/+0 and Storm instead.
Divine Smithing.baseFlair_:
Here... This is my first piece! It's yours!
—Rayne, Elf Smith

Fil.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower +0/+1.
If you have played at least 4 other Fils in this match, that follower can attack 2 times per turn.
Fil.baseFlair_: Oho! Let's make this a liiittle bit more chic!

Carbuncle's Sparkle.baseEffect_: Restore 1 defense to your leader. Recover 1 evolution point. Draw a card.
Carbuncle's Sparkle.baseFlair_:
Its light is eternal, an unparalleled brilliance that radiates for eternity.
—On Carbuncles, Cryptid Companion

Firesprite Grove.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower if this amulet is returned to your hand.
At the end of your turn put a Fairy into your hand.
Firesprite Grove.baseFlair_: Unto the earth will the living return, and from the earth will life be born anew. The flame reducing trees to ashes; the rejoicing of fire fairies throughout the forest.

Fairy Refuge.baseEffect_:
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, and you have at least 1 play point, Choose: Play this card as a Fairy's Yawn or Fairy's Awakening.
----------
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
Fairy Refuge.baseFlair_: Are they resting blissfully in a land of dreams? Or are they luring you into a devious trap? Careless eyes quickly become prey for the forest. —One-eyed Fairy Hunter

Fairy's Yawn.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, select a random enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
Fairy's Yawn.baseFlair_: Even if it looks to be safe, you can never be too careful. Get entangled in their shenanigans, and you too could lose something important. —One-eyed Fairy Hunter

Fairy's Awakening.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
During your opponent's turn, whenever an enemy follower attacks your leader, deal 1 damage to that follower.
Fairy's Awakening.baseFlair_: When all is said and done, for them it is merely a prank—even at the cost of lives. They do however they please, so choose wisely. —One-eyed Fairy Hunter

Woodland Refuge.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to a random 1/X allied follower.
Woodland Refuge.baseFlair_: The kindly weedfolk are said to bestow their blessings upon those too weak to defend themselves.

Spring-Green Protection.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Last Words: Draw a card.
Draw a card if this amulet is returned to your hand.
At the end of your turn, give a random allied follower +1/+0.
Spring-Green Protection.baseFlair_: Fairy whispers are made of truth, tricks, and treachery. If one picks up only on their truth, ignoring the other parts, then a flicker in time becomes the same as time eternal. —Account of a fairy-handler

Fairy Whisperer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Fairy Whisperer.baseFlair_: Hey there, little fairy! Thanks for patrolling the forest again. So how was it? Peaceful as usual today, huh?
Fairy Whisperer.evoFlair_: Now I know you fairies keep the forest safe, but remember to take care of yourselves! You're a part of the forest too, you know.

Elf Guard.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Ward if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Elf Guard.baseFlair_: We elves are practically powerless compared to other species, you know. But there is an unbreakable bond between us. When we work together, our hearts become one!
Elf Guard.evoFlair_: The forest is our holy land. We cannot allow the forces of evil to enter it! Those who wish to do harm to nature must first do battle with the elves!

Dungeoncrawl Fairy.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Dungeoncrawl Fairy.baseFlair_: You there, traveler—have you lost your way? Well, you've found the right fairy! I'll show you the way out in a flash!
Dungeoncrawl Fairy.evoFlair_: Look! We made it outside! Woo-hoo! Isn't this great? Huh? Me, lost? Heh, a-actually, I might've made oooone wrong turn. Ack, no, don't get mad! Look, I'll get it next time! J-just let me show you the way!

Fairy Bringer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the cost of a Fairy in your hand to 0.
Fairy Bringer.baseFlair_: Pixies, come! Assemble in my light! You have the power to drive away the forces of evil!
Fairy Bringer.evoFlair_: Pixies, you have answered my call! Thank you! Now come! Let us defend the forest together!

Wandering Elf Mage.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Wandering Elf Mage.baseFlair_: Our home has become polluted with the miasma of war. Mighty God Tree, we beg of you! Please restore this forest to its rightful state!
Wandering Elf Mage.evoFlair_: It remains faint, but it can be heard—the voice of the mighty God Tree! The forest lives yet! Now come, let us use the tree's power to drive away this evil!

Elf Wanderer.baseFlair_: Finally I have you cornered! You abducted my friends, and now you must pay the price! Do not believe yourselves to be safe in your stronghold! Friends, I am coming for you!
Elf Wanderer.evoFlair_: I cannot storm the stronghold by myself. That much is certainly true. But I am not alone! My friends are waiting for me inside, and their fragrance shall lead me to them!

Dwarf Perfumer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an evolved allied follower is in play, select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
Dwarf Perfumer.baseFlair_: Hey, have a whiff of this! A marvelous aroma, isn't it? Hey... What's with the sour face?
Dwarf Perfumer.evoFlair_: The next batch will smell stupendous! First comes the dash of dwarf's sweat, and then the dollop of bat's blood...

Elf Bard.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, put a Fairy into your hand.
Elf Bard.evoEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, put a Fairy into your hand.
Elf Bard.baseFlair_: Fairies flutter into the grove, attracted by the bard's song.
Elf Bard.evoFlair_: Fairies begin to dance, enraptured by the bard's song.

Dryad.baseFlair_: Why did you come so deep into our woods? Do you want to hurt us? You shouldn't be doing that...
Dryad.evoFlair_: I'm part of these woods, and they're part of me. That's why you won't get away with hurting me. You'll sleep in the earth if you try.

Tweedle Dum, Tweedle Dee.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add 1 to the number of cards played this turn.
Tweedle Dum, Tweedle Dee.baseFlair_:
"Together since birth."
"Together till death."
"Two as one, what fun!"
"One as two, how fun!"
Tweedle Dum, Tweedle Dee.evoFlair_:
"Dee, what will today bring?"
"Loads of fun, dear Dum."
"Dee, what to do today?"
"Something fun, dear Dum."

Fita the Gentle Elf.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, draw a card.
Fita the Gentle Elf.evoEffect_: Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, draw a card.
Fita the Gentle Elf.baseFlair_: If you like me—hehe—then I'll like you back! I'll do everything I can for you!
Fita the Gentle Elf.evoFlair_: Everybody that likes me is a good person—hehe—which makes you a good person too!

Leaf Man.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Give all allied followers +1/+0 and the following effect until the end of the opponent's turn: Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
Leaf Man.baseFlair_: Hey there, Leaf Man here! Could ya spare me some water? I'm parched!
Leaf Man.evoFlair_: Hi, Leaf Man again! Thanks for the water, that really hit the spot!

Servant of the Spellgrove.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: The enemy follower can't attack next turn.
Servant of the Spellgrove.baseFlair_: You think I'm the watcher of the spellgrove? You couldn't be more wrong. I am its ivy, the moss growing within. I am the servant that serves under it.
Servant of the Spellgrove.evoFlair_: The spellgrove sows its seeds in people. And once the flowers begin to bud, it's—no, don't come any closer. Get out, or it'll curse you too!

Devil Flower.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy amulet if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Devil Flower.baseFlair_: Ah, such a tragedy... The trees, they wither and thirst for life because of me. Ah, what a miracle... My skin, it glows and shimmers with youth from head to toe.
Devil Flower.evoFlair_: Oh, such agony... As you sleep, they scream because of me. Oh, such beauty... My heart, it sings a melody while my radiance awakens.

Utopian Fairy.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Give an allied follower +1/+2. Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Utopian Fairy.baseFlair_: Fairies love to revel in their mischief, but there are some who know the pleasures of serving. Myself, for example…
Utopian Fairy.evoFlair_: As the years pass, some look back to realize the errors from their youth. Now let us return what was so unfairly purloined from you.

Servant of Unkilling.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an enemy follower -1/-0 until the end of your opponent's turn.
Servant of Unkilling.baseFlair_: We must never kill, for all life is an act of existence. What should be, is. Let go and allow life to run its course.
Servant of Unkilling.evoFlair_:
The First Law: Existence
A branch that flourishes is no more worthy than one that withers. It merely is. You must view reality as it exists.
—Teachings of the Unkilling Guardian

Zealot of Unkilling.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give -2/-0 to a random enemy follower.
Zealot of Unkilling.baseFlair_: We must never kill. Nor may people be permitted to relinquish their lives. One's own allotment is all that is deserved.
Zealot of Unkilling.evoFlair_: In the shadow of law looms punishment. All possession breeds inequality. Therefore humans should own nothing but their lives. Go forth, carve from them all these needless things.

Daisybow Archer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Daisybow Archer.evoEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Daisybow Archer.baseFlair_: The people of the forest tell me that all humans are evil, that I should shoot 'em on sight. But I don't believe that. Surely there are some good ones in the bunch! Hmm... But how do you tell them apart? Guess I'll just shoot whoever!
Daisybow Archer.evoFlair_: Whew! I'm glad you're one of the good ones! If you were a bad guy, you would've been shot to bits! How do I know that? Well, the arrows fired from a daisybow never miss an evil person.

Ghastly Treant.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. Then if at least 2 other cards were played this turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
Ghastly Treant.baseFlair_:
What terror, what fright—the great tree seen by night.
Eyes, mouth, and nose—yet silent it grows.
Mouth closed in daylight hours—once opened, devours.
—Woodland folk song
Ghastly Treant.evoFlair_:
The great tree is the forest's most fearsome terror.
Possessed of eyes, nose, and mouth, still it may not speak.
That wordless mouth opens only to devour its prey.
—Songs of the Unsullied Wood (Translation)

Greenwood Guardian.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 3 other allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, gain +1/+1. Then, if at least 6 other allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, gain Ward.
Greenwood Guardian.baseFlair_:
The sprout bears a sapling, bringing further blessings to the land. The oathbearer trains herself to grow strong, so that she might protect this bounty of nature.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 2
Greenwood Guardian.evoFlair_:
The sapling extends its branches, spreading the blessings of nature along with them. If any should seek to plunder this bounty, the mighty warrior must use her strength to eliminate them.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 3

Springleaf Sprite.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add X to the number of cards played this turn. X equals the number of allied Natura cards in play.
Springleaf Sprite.baseFlair_:
When spring breathes, new life grows. First a sprout, then a bud—a flower smiles at the sun. Flexing its petals, it takes to the air. Hail, Spriteling! Laugh on and dance through the treetops.
—Forest Ditty
Springleaf Sprite.evoFlair_:
The fairies knew it, when the forest fell to the steel revolution. But their resolve did not change, for change would compromise the unyielding nature of the land.
—The Pure Forest

Blossoming Archer.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a card using its Accelerate effect, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Blossoming Archer.baseFlair_: You know, this really isn't your season. Compared to the other forest flowers in full bloom, you stick out like a sore thumb.
Blossoming Archer.evoFlair_: Early bloomer, late bloomer; we all get second winds. You, on the other hand, are going to wilt while the forest explodes in color.

Elf Metallurgist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Elf Metallurgist.baseFlair_: Atoms of steel, heed my call! Leave your Mother Earth behind and gather here! A cave this full of minerals will let me draw out my full power. Leave this place to me!
Elf Metallurgist.evoFlair_: Atoms of steel, pierce my enemies! Ha! That's about right. With elemental magic, form is everything—it's got to be elegant, precise, and stylish! The more witchy you look, the better the elements will flow!

Blessed Fairy Dancer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all allied followers until the end of this turn.
Blessed Fairy Dancer.baseFlair_: Now then: one, two, three, one, two, three—you there, stay in time!—two, three. Come on now! If you're enjoying this, put your whole body into it! Let's do this dance right!
Blessed Fairy Dancer.evoFlair_: All right, it's festival day! As long as we all dance together, we can drive all our worries away! Now here we go! All together!

Crystalia Lily.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Transform an enemy follower into a Snowman.
Crystalia Lily.baseFlair_: Sledding, snowball fights, and snowmen! I love playing in the snow!
Crystalia Lily.evoFlair_: Snowmen are so big and silly! I think I'll make some more!

Sukuna, Brave and Small.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain +2/+2 if at least 3 cards were played this turn.
Sukuna, Brave and Small.baseFlair_: Am I cute, or am I cute? Tee-hee-hee! If you don't like me when I'm fun-size, then I'll turn myself big!
Sukuna, Brave and Small.evoFlair_: Hah, what do you think now? This is what happens when I bust out my teensy-weensy hammer. I won't stay this way long, but I bet I'll be more useful than before!

Abby the Axe Girl.baseEffect_: Clash: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
Abby the Axe Girl.evoEffect_: Clash: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
Abby the Axe Girl.baseFlair_: Hey, Bobo! Chop, chop! It's time for work! We'll cut down a thousand trees today!
Abby the Axe Girl.evoFlair_: Bobo, I worked up a sweat, but I still have lots of energy. What do you say we cut down another thousand?

Elf Singer Harmony.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Followers can't be played. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
Elf Singer Harmony.baseFlair_: I wanna be a singer! Just listen. I practice like this every day: Eh-la-la-la-la! Huh, why's everybody holding their ears?
Elf Singer Harmony.evoFlair_: I'm gonna be the best singer some day! Gotta practice! Gotta work every day, oh yeah! Duh-duh-duh-delicious destiny! It's my duh-duh-duh-dream!

Furious Elder Weedman.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to another allied Forestcraft follower.
Furious Elder Weedman.baseFlair_: What's with the prickly attitude? Don't get it twisted, I'm trying to help you out here! Now you're in for it—I'll spruce you up!
Furious Elder Weedman.evoFlair_: Let's not beat around the bush, you've got me furious! No mercy for any of you saps—my wrath is one with the forest!

Michelle, the Mind Reader.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: Until the end of your opponent's turn, change the enemy follower's attack to 0; and until the end of your turn, change this follower's attack to 0.
Michelle, the Mind Reader.baseFlair_:
"I never asked to see it all..."
"But I see it anyway."
"I never asked to be a mind-reader."
"Someday, I wanna be a normal girl, y'know?"
Michelle, the Mind Reader.evoFlair_:
"It's easier to be alone."
"But a girl likes to have company sometimes."
"I'm on my own..."
"It ain't easy bein' lonely!"

Wellspring Elf Princess.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Fairy Wisp and a Fairy into your hand.
Wellspring Elf Princess.baseFlair_: As the youth hurried forward in search of help, there opened before him a glade of a thousand blossoms. The gentle elf standing within—messenger of the God Tree—extended her hand to the boy. —Prostrations before the God Tree, Chapter 2
Wellspring Elf Princess.evoFlair_: Answering the young man's cries, the God Tree made a kaleidoscopic protection bloom from the elf's outreached hand. And just as the gentle elf promised, the fairies guided the young man onward. —Prostrations before the God Tree, Chapter 3

Blossom Spirit.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Fairy.
Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, give it +1/+1.
Blossom Spirit.baseFlair_:
Lovely, lovely lady of the wood.
Drinks the lives of mortals and looks the way they should.
Enter not the forest, lest this fate you meet:
Eternity as soil beneath her shining feet.
—Woodland folk song
Blossom Spirit.evoFlair_:
This woodland spirit is lovely to behold.
Her beautiful mien mimics those she has absorbed.
Seated atop the graves of intruders, she shines with purest light.
—Songs of the Unsullied Wood (Translation)

Woodland Cleaver.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand. If at least 3 allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Woodland Cleaver.baseFlair_:
The branches beget leaves, bringing a wealth of blessings. When the time comes, the mighty warrior ushers in those who have shown gratitude for the forest's bounty.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 4
Woodland Cleaver.evoFlair_:
When the leaves flourish and the sapling evolves into a great tree, it drops new seeds to the ground. The guardian guides her sistren, nurturing them to become mighty warriors themselves.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 5

Mechaboomerang Elf.baseEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a random Machina card with the lowest cost from your deck into your hand.
Mechaboomerang Elf.baseFlair_:
The iron harvested from beetle horns has made our weapons far more efficient. Metal is more durable and malleable than wood. Though accepting these changes gives me pause—when will we ourselves have to adapt?
—Forest Elf's Journal, Part 2
Mechaboomerang Elf.evoFlair_:
It is for the forest's sake that they've donned steel and brandished machinery. Though they have changed, the land has not. And they know it, as they find their ancestral home growing... outdated.
—On Flourishing, Part 2

Hornet Warrior.baseFlair_: That distinct, high-pitched buzz is a telltale sign that the assassins of the forest have arrived. They wield their poison stingers with exceptional mastery, flitting around their prey before going in for the kill.
Hornet Warrior.evoFlair_: When their victims run, they go for the back; when their victims don't, they go for the heart. The sinister drone of their wings is almost assuredly the sound of a life about to be lost.

Rhinoceroach.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: For each other card played this turn, gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Rhinoceroach.baseFlair_: It was a small enough creature at first. But when granted new power by a witch, it began to swell, its carapace growing thicker...
Rhinoceroach.evoFlair_: Its dully glowing eyes betray no feeling, and even screams of agony cannot reach its ears. Controlled by a witch, the creature uses its wicked horns to make a game of wreaking havoc.

Elf Girl Liza.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied followers the following effect until the end of the opponent's turn - Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
Elf Girl Liza.baseFlair_: I love this forest, and I want to help all my friends there!
Elf Girl Liza.evoFlair_: You can count on me! I'd do anything to help out my friends and forest!

Rayne, Elf Smith.evoEffect_: Evolve: If you've played at least 3 cards this turn, give another allied follower +1/+0 and Rush. Reduce damage to that follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
Rayne, Elf Smith.baseFlair_: People call me the best blacksmith in the forest. Humph, it's not like I'm amazing or anything, everyone else here is just sloppy.
Rayne, Elf Smith.evoFlair_: I-I'm sorry for being mean! I mean, I thought that blacksmiths were supposed to act cool and stuff... Was I wrong? Is this why I have no friends?

Paula, Icy Warmth.baseEffect_: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, and you have at least 2 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Paula, Gentle Warmth or Paula, Passionate Warmth.
Paula, Icy Warmth.baseFlair_: I can't say I see too clearly yet... what it looks like when I love. But little by little I'm beginning to understand.
Paula, Icy Warmth.evoFlair_: My love for you shows itself in my wish to serve. With this power that you gave me, I'll serve the people with everything I've got.

Storied Falconer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Skystride Raptor into your hand.
Storied Falconer.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give Bane to all allied Skystride Raptors in your hand.
Storied Falconer.baseFlair_: There are no walls between man and beast. Given love, compassion, and openness, we are one and the same.
Storied Falconer.evoFlair_: I am you, and you are me. Let us run, and let us fly. This is the hour of the hunt!

Lily, Crystalian Conductor.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, give +1/+0 to all allied followers. Then if at least 4 other cards were played this turn, give +0/+1 to all allied followers.
Lily, Crystalian Conductor.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
Lily, Crystalian Conductor.baseFlair_:
Her guileless voice rings out in the halls of the crystal palace, urging everyone to partake in celebration of the holy day.
"Welcome to the crystal palace! Come dance with me!"
Lily, Crystalian Conductor.evoFlair_:
Music descends from on high, covering the city of Crystalia like a blanket of snow. Only she knows the magic spell to put a smile on everyone's face.
"I'm having the time of my life! How about you?"

Guard of the Machinatree.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Return another allied follower or amulet to your hand. If it's a Machina card, draw a card.
Guard of the Machinatree.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new breakthrough after another. One can either eliminate enemies of the woodland or expand the forest itself. These ideas are opposed to the ones expressed by the Mechalance Elf. —Veteran Researcher's Report, Vol. 2
Guard of the Machinatree.evoFlair_: The mechanical lance you bear is lovely enough... But enemies should be welcomed with open arms rather than expelled. They'll never leave the forest—I'll never let them. —Guard of the Machinatree to Mechalance Elf

Avatar of Fruition.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, put 2 Fairies into your hand instead and gain Rush.
Avatar of Fruition.baseFlair_:
Prideful, prideful god of all that grows.
Creation's dawn is in its whorls—the secrets it knows.
Die and fall beneath its till—become one with the past.
To be the future's soil is the only way to last.
—Woodland folk song
Avatar of Fruition.evoFlair_:
The embodiment of a forest's growth is prideful in nature.
It is an avatar of the world's inception.
It ushers all life toward the dead past, tilling it into the future's soil.
—Songs of the Unsullied Wood (Translation)

Rino, Cleansweep Archer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 2 or 4 damage to all enemy followers. (Damage is determined randomly for each enemy.)
Rino, Cleansweep Archer.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn. Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
Rino, Cleansweep Archer.baseFlair_: Leave it to me, big bro! I'll shoot down every last one of your enemies! After all, the odds of me hitting my mark are a hundred to one! Wait a sec... That's not much, is it?
Rino, Cleansweep Archer.evoFlair_: I didn't want you to see me missing any targets, so I've been practicing in secret! Now I've got the power of a hundred! Hopefully I can keep it up and pierce your heart someday too, big bro... Hehe!

Greenbrier Elf.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
Greenbrier Elf.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied Greenwood Guardian comes into play, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Greenbrier Elf.baseFlair_: I'd describe myself as powerless ivy, while the forest guardians are more like mighty trees... Oh how I wish I could be like them. I will adorn the great warriors with flowers, so that the forest may continue to propagate and conquer this land.
Greenbrier Elf.evoFlair_: To the guardians, I'm no more than a twig. We're as different as a tiny bud and a great tree. But all buds will one day bloom, painting the land like a flower garden.

Paula, Gentle Warmth.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Paula, Gentle Warmth.baseFlair_: What does my love look like? It's still a little blurry, but... I feel like I have an idea.
Paula, Gentle Warmth.evoFlair_: My love looks like passion! I wanna use this new power that you gave me... and help people share some excitement of their own!

Paula, Passionate Warmth.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Paula, Passionate Warmth.baseFlair_: What does my love look like? I'm not totally sure, but... I feel like I'm on to something.
Paula, Passionate Warmth.evoFlair_: My love looks like trust. I want to use the power you gave me to help people connect with each other!

Fairy Dragon.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Add X to this follower's attack. X equals the number of allied Fairies that have been destroyed during this match.
Fairy Dragon.baseFlair_: Thou art a torrent in the verdant depths. Thou art burgeoning might and volition given shape. Within thy diminutive frame dwelleth the forest's prodigious rage.
Fairy Dragon.evoFlair_: From thy maw, O dragon, doth issue a roar to shake all trees. It is the sound of the ire of the persecuted. For thou art a great protector who doth consume all defilers of the forest.

Insect Lord.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the number of cards played this turn, including this card.
Insect Lord.baseFlair_: As if a pestilent fog enshrouding the world in shadow, they came. The darkness consumed the sky, until all that remained to consume was us. —The Insect Chronicles, Final Chapter
Insect Lord.evoFlair_: "The imminent darkness slowly consumed the sky as the sun abandoned us in the shadows to be consumed. Oh heavens, have merc..." —The Insect Chronicles, Fragment of unfinished page

Cleft, Dual Fencer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other Machina cards in your hand.
Cleft, Dual Fencer.evoEffect_: Evolve: If at least 3 cards have been played this turn, deal 2 damage to an enemy.
Cleft, Dual Fencer.baseFlair_: It's thanks to the miraculous development of robotics that a warrior of his caliber has appeared in the forest. Finding both the wooden and iron weapons of the past insufficient, he carves out the future of the elves with his mechanical blades. —Researcher's Report, Part 4
Cleft, Dual Fencer.evoFlair_: I am without equal, a lord of new techniques that rival even a thousand strong. The logic behind these twin blades is foolproof—twice the weaponry, twice the fallen foes. Even the world beyond the forest will come to know my power.

Kokkoro, Faithful Guide.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, draw 2 cards instead.
Union Burst (10): Give +1/+1 to all allied followers. Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Kokkoro, Faithful Guide.baseFlair_: My name is Kokkoro, and I have been charged to act as your guide. It is my duty to protect and look after you, my lord. I'm honored to make your acquaintance.
Kokkoro, Faithful Guide.evoFlair_: I am the happiest person in the world to have the pleasure of serving you, my lord. Please allow me to remain by your side always.

Sylvan Justice.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Fairy into your hand.
Sylvan Justice.baseFlair_: One leaf, one wound. One branch, one bone.

Pixie Mischief.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Return a random enemy follower to the opponent's hand.
Pixie Mischief.baseFlair_: Pranks and chaos every which way.

Woodkin Curse.baseEffect_: Change an enemy follower's defense to 1.
Woodkin Curse.baseFlair_: The lord of the forest is quite generous. He won't go so far as to take your life.

Glimmering Wings.baseEffect_: Draw a card. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, draw 2 instead.
Glimmering Wings.baseFlair_: If you ever get lost in the forest, open your eyes and just look. You're sure to see the gentle little forest dwellers glittering in the shade.

Take to the Canopies.baseEffect_: Give an allied follower +1/+1, Rush, and Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Take to the Canopies.baseFlair_: They didn't escape. You lost track of 'em.

Elf Song.baseEffect_:
Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Give all allied followers +1/+1 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Elf Song.baseFlair_: Music is better for capturing fairies than either bait or traps. And it's best to play it as lively and merrily as possible. After all, fairies love tunes that make them want to dance. —Forest instrumentalist

Predatory Might.baseEffect_: Randomly deal 5 damage to an enemy follower with the lowest attack in play.
Predatory Might.baseFlair_: If a weakling like you managed to survive this long, the world outside these woods must be a paradise.

Soothing Spell.baseEffect_:
Restore 3 defense to an ally.
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, recover 1 evolution point.
Soothing Spell.baseFlair_:
Aha! These tree roots are making the entire forest sick!
—Lila, Arborist

Elf Twins' Assault.baseEffect_: Deal X damage to 2 random enemy followers. X equals the number of other Neutral cards in your hand.
Elf Twins' Assault.baseFlair_:
"Can you dodge our arrows?"
"Let's try and see!"

Aria's Whirlwind.baseEffect_: Deal X damage to all followers (excluding Fairies and Fairy Wisps). X equals the number of other cards played this turn.
Aria's Whirlwind.baseFlair_: This wind is the pulse of the forest; this gust is the will of the woods. Trespasser, behold the marvels of nature.

Intertwined Resolve.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as an Arisa's Leadership or Ladica's Embrace.
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, instead summon 2 Fairies and deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
Intertwined Resolve.baseFlair_:
Resolve guides them as they bound toward a harrowing fate. Headstrong they stand, even as the requiem begins to play.
"I won't give up on hope! Not while there's still breath in my body!"

Shamu's Antics.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Shamu's Antics.baseFlair_: Meow-wee! Excellent! The more prey, the merrier! —Shamu

Shama's Gaze.baseEffect_: Give an enemy follower -X/-0 until the end of the opponent's turn. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
Shama's Gaze.baseFlair_: Meow-wow! I've found us a tasty looking treat to play with! —Shama

Righteous Evocation.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Righteous Evocation.baseFlair_: I love this land. I can't just abandon it.

Forest of Dreams.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, select a random enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
Forest of Dreams.baseFlair_: Hear the whispering trees. Feel the warm sunbeams. Let them lull you into a gentle sleep.

Flower of Fairies.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Last Words: Put a Fairy Wisp into your hand.
Put a Fairy Wisp into your hand if this amulet is returned to your hand.
Flower of Fairies.baseFlair_: Beautiful petals fluttering. Mischievous giggles sounding. This woodland jewel is the forest dwellers' home.

Whispering Woods.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Add 2 to this amulet's Countdown.
At the end of your turn, put a random Forestcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
Whispering Woods.baseFlair_: You're being watched. Not by me, of course. It's the forest that's keeping tabs on you. — Elf's Warning

Wood of Brambles.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Until this amulet leaves play, all allied followers in play and all allied followers that come into play have Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
Wood of Brambles.baseFlair_: Eek! You're scaring me! Don't come any closer, okay? —Bramble Fairy

Dark Elf Faure.baseEffect_: Strike: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Dark Elf Faure.evoEffect_: Strike: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Dark Elf Faure.baseFlair_: Tsk, don't you ever get tired of chasing after me? I told you I was leaving. Leave me be—I slipped out of that circle.
Dark Elf Faure.evoFlair_: I just can't sit around and wait for the day I finally die. That's why I left the forest behind and took up the sword. No more lying safe in my cradle. I walk my own path now.

Archer.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Archer.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Archer.baseFlair_: We forest dwellers all stick together. Don't think you can mess with me 'cause I'm alone!
Archer.evoFlair_: Hee-hee! See? If everyone from the forest lends a hand, we can take down enemies you'd have no hope against alone!

Fen Sprite.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
Fen Sprite.baseFlair_: You seem tired, stranger. Would you care for some water? Hee-hee! Oh, there's no need to thank me...
Fen Sprite.evoFlair_: What? You can't move? Oh! Didn't I tell you that I'm the spirit of a poisoned fen? Hee-hee! I do love watching humans struggle.

Elf Healer.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Elf Healer.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Elf Healer.baseFlair_: Oh no! Snap out of it! I'll give you the help you need, so hold on just a little more.
Elf Healer.evoFlair_: Here, let me sprinkle this spring water on you. Soon your wounds will heal!

Forest Spirit.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Woodkin Curse into your hand.
Forest Spirit.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Woodkin Curse into your hand.
Forest Spirit.baseFlair_: A symbol of fortune to friends of the forest and a walking curse for its foes.
Forest Spirit.evoFlair_: A woodland spirit that carries out the will of the forest. If you seek to harm the forest, prepare to bear its curse.

Cybele.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give all other allied followers +0/+1.
Cybele.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, give all other allied followers +0/+1.
Cybele.baseFlair_: O children of the earth! The earth is my flesh, and my love will support you as long as you stand on your own two feet.
Cybele.evoFlair_: O children of the earth! The earth is my flesh, and I shall walk with you until you return to me.

Beetle Warrior.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Storm if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Beetle Warrior.baseFlair_: They fire splinters of great trees that pierce steel armor like it's nothing from atop beetles that can outspeed even dragons. In other words, they're our natural enemies. —Veteran Dragoon
Beetle Warrior.evoFlair_: Infantry is beaten by cavalry, which is in turn beaten by dragoons. We're the ultimate force on the battlefield. But you'd do well not to assume that this logic holds once Mother Nature comes into play. —Veteran Dragoon

Kindly Treant.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Ward if there are at least 3 other Neutral cards in your hand.
Kindly Treant.baseFlair_: Normally the statement the forest lives is intended as metaphor, but on rare occasions it's literally true. —The Living Forest, Author's Preface
Kindly Treant.evoFlair_: The forest that was there yesterday had vanished overnight. Gazing at the tracks on the ground, I muttered to myself, "The forest lives." —The Living Forest, Chapter 1

Starry Elf.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
Starry Elf.baseFlair_: Look up and all you'll see are leaves and branches. You can't see a single star in the forest! So I've made up my mind to leave the forest and see the night sky!
Starry Elf.evoFlair_: Sure, being in the forest is safe, but it's no fun! No matter where you walk, all you see is green. So that's why I think there's a bright future waiting for me outside somewhere!

Adept Archer.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Adept Archer.evoEffect_: Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Adept Archer.baseFlair_: I can't be entrusted to protect this forest if I keep relying on everyone else's help. Just you wait, because I'm gonna be great one day!
Adept Archer.evoFlair_: This forest has always protected and watched over me, so I gotta do my best too! My hand is steady—here goes! In the name of the forest, I'll shoot this arrow!

Grasshopper Conductor.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower with X attack from your deck into your hand. X equals the number of cards played this turn, including this card.
Grasshopper Conductor.baseFlair_: Here it is, the concert we've all been waiting for! Let's make all our practice count! Now, we'll begin this first passage adagio.
Grasshopper Conductor.evoFlair_: It's time to crescendo! Let the music flow through you, and soon the audience will be jumping for joy! A-one, two, three!

Myconid.baseFlair_: They roam the land upright on two legs, breeding and increasing in numbers at their destination. They're renowned for their sublime flavor, but one should be careful not to consume too much.
Myconid.evoFlair_: After hunting these mushroom creatures, seek help if your skin feels irritable. Their spores can spread to your lungs, and before long you'll begin feeling like a mushroom yourself.

Insane Dark Elf.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3.
Strike: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Insane Dark Elf.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Insane Dark Elf.baseFlair_: Iiiit's showtime! Hey, I know how I look, but the forest is my lovely baby! You mess with the woods, you get felled! Understand?
Insane Dark Elf.evoFlair_: Iiiit's showtime! I may seem kinda rowdy, but don't judge me by my looks! I'm everybody's lovely baby! I'll trash anyone who troubles the trees! Understand?

Forest Hermit.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.
Forest Hermit.baseFlair_: Outsiders continue throwing their broken machines into the forest, the place I call home. I will gladly take it upon myself to collect their trash, for you see, here in the forest we help each other out.
Forest Hermit.evoFlair_: Now, where to put the parts I've collected? Should I just attach them to the junk I found yesterday? If anyone finds out how much I enjoy fiddling with these metallic creations, it'll be the end of me. Sigh... And yet my heart's always aflutter when I'm tinkering around.

Mechaclaw Elf.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another Machina card was played this turn, gain Storm.
Mechaclaw Elf.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Robotic bagworms use technology for defensive purposes, while this elf uses it as a means to attack. —Veteran Researcher's Report, Vol. 1
Mechaclaw Elf.evoFlair_: Your cocoon's impressively novel, but novelty isn't everything. Fruit's tastiest, after all, just before it goes soft. —Mechaclaw Elf to Robotic Bagworm

Mallet Monkey.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Summon a Mallet Monkey.
Enhance (9): Summon 1 more.
Mallet Monkey.baseFlair_: Ooh-ooh-ah! Ooh-ooh, ah-ah! Ooh-aaah! (This thing's light as a feather! Bet I can use it to knock down loads of fruit from the treetops!)
Mallet Monkey.evoFlair_:
"Wow! So strong!"
—Water Fairy
"Are you telling me that hammer isn't hollow?"
—Fairy

Waltzing Fairy.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Waltzing Fairy.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Waltzing Fairy.baseFlair_: I love these grand dances. A fairy just never knows who she may meet! Tee-hee, I wonder who'll dance with me tonight.
Waltzing Fairy.evoFlair_: Just look at it all—the merrymaking, the laughter, the joy! Tonight let's dance until dawn comes!

Tam Lin.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 for each other card played this turn.
Tam Lin.baseFlair_: You'd be wise to leave quickly, trespasser. This forest belongs to the fairies. Should you fail to heed my words, I'll be forced to remove you.
Tam Lin.evoFlair_: So many years ago, I wandered into this forest under the charms of the fairies and was captured. Of course I wanted to go home at first. But now I know in my heart that I must protect this forest. Witness the power the fairy king has bestowed on me!

Carnivorous Flower.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy amulet if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Carnivorous Flower.baseFlair_: A magical flower which grows deep within the forest. Once it blossoms, it consumes all life around it, stripping the area bare to fuel its own growth.
Carnivorous Flower.evoFlair_: It is not only the fruits of the land that are consumed by this carnivorous plant. Humans and other creatures caught within its vines are all gobbled up without mercy.

Crimsonbow Elf.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to X random enemy followers (up to 5 followers). X equals the number of cards played this turn, including this card.
Crimsonbow Elf.baseFlair_: Wait, that's not it! I just have to nock the arrow here and... Oh, come on! How do I do this? I'm not ready yet! Just... give me a moment so I can shoot you, okay?
Crimsonbow Elf.evoFlair_: I did it! I finally hit the mark! Now you'll get a taste of my skill! Wait, I'm out of arrows? What am I supposed to do now?

Owl Man.baseFlair_: Owl Man: he is... the forest's heart.
Owl Man.evoFlair_: Owl Man: he is... the forest's conscience.

Meliai, Wing Shredder.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, destroy it.
Whenever an allied Fairy is destroyed, gain +1/+1 and deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Meliai, Wing Shredder.baseFlair_: Long ago there was a sickly boy who fell in love with a fairy. The fairy granted him protection, but a pestilence spread throughout his land as a result. The boy's eyes came to burn with hatred and rage for her.
Meliai, Wing Shredder.evoFlair_: You insist you never intended to destroy the land? It was an unfortunate coincidence? What a terrible joke! Even if that's the truth—it's too late now. I despise you. What else are you good for than this?

Assault Jaguar.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
Assault Jaguar.baseFlair_:
The fallen seeds grow into new sprouts, marking the next beginning. When the guardian beholds this new life, she entrusts the oath to her apprentices.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 6
Assault Jaguar.evoFlair_:
As this cycle of growth continues, the land of blessing becomes a forest. But the oathbearer is no longer alone. She is joined by a multitude of mighty warriors.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 7

Magical Fairy, Lilac.baseEffect_: Clash: Destroy the enemy follower and remove this follower's Clash effect.
Magical Fairy, Lilac.evoEffect_: Clash: Destroy the enemy follower and remove this follower's Clash effect.
Magical Fairy, Lilac.baseFlair_: My magic makes it easy to take on any foe! The thing is, it only works once.
Magical Fairy, Lilac.evoFlair_: Once I charge up my magic, any foe will be gone in one blow! But after that, my energy and magic are through.

Demon Child Zain.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Gain +1/+0 if no other allied followers are in play.
Demon Child Zain.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Gain +1/+0 if no other allied followers are in play.
Demon Child Zain.baseFlair_: He is a young boy who wanders the forest, void of memory. Although his vision is clear, he is a shadow of his former self.
Demon Child Zain.evoFlair_: In the rustling of the forest, the boy is burdened by whispers of the fairies, which remind him of his terrible past. These whispers serve as a warning and a curse. He can't escape his sins...

Shamu & Shama, Noblekin.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Shamu's Antics or Shama's Gaze into your hand.
Shamu & Shama, Noblekin.baseFlair_: "Meow-wee! Shama, I found us a little mousey to play with!" "Meow-wow! The chase is on!"
Shamu & Shama, Noblekin.evoFlair_: "Meow-wee! I just love a good chase!" "Meow-wow! Come now, we'll play with you until you can't even stand!"

Milolo, Li'l Mountain Lass.baseEffect_: When you play a spell, evolve this follower.
Milolo, Li'l Mountain Lass.baseFlair_: You know, honestly, all I want out of life is attention! That's why I got into this whole mountaineering thing. What? Why mountains? Duh—they're like the new "it" thing! She who climbs the tallest peaks finds the tallest man!
Milolo, Li'l Mountain Lass.evoFlair_: Oh. My. God. That girl is soooo gorgeous! She's just, like, radiating beauty. I hate her. Like, so much that I could just foam at the mouth... Grr...

Irene, Harvest Defender.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 4 other cards were played this turn, evolve this follower.
Irene, Harvest Defender.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Strike: Until the end of the turn, reduce damage to this follower to 0.
Irene, Harvest Defender.baseFlair_: Agriwrestling is a sacred battle dance celebrating the harvest. I doubt I could have performed it before—I was such a weakling. But thanks to my teachers, I'm not that person anymore! Here I go! Lightning Plowshares!
Irene, Harvest Defender.evoFlair_:
Lightning Plowshares is a fascinating technique. The practitioner gathers incredible lightning power around one hand, and then strikes, tilling the soil like the heavens' own plow!
—The mysterious Masked Scholar

Skystride Raptor.baseFlair_: The falcon's beak pierces even gods.
Skystride Raptor.evoFlair_: The falcon's beak devours even gods.

Ancient Elf.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Return other allied followers to your hand. Gain +1/+1 for each follower returned.
Ancient Elf.baseFlair_: We old elves watch over the cycle of life and the forest. You're part of that cycle too, human child. I'll lend you a touch of my power.
Ancient Elf.evoFlair_: The long, long journey that turns through life and the forest toward the future has only just begun. Surely someday we'll all live in peace.

Liza, Queen of the Forest.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the lowest-cost Forestcraft followers from your deck into your hand.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Forestcraft followers from your deck into your hand.
Liza, Queen of the Forest.evoEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Forestcraft followers from your deck into your hand.
Liza, Queen of the Forest.baseFlair_: I still have a long way to go before I'll feel worthy of the title of Queen of the Forest. That's why I'm praying. Praying that one day I'll be a great queen.
Liza, Queen of the Forest.evoFlair_: I still have a long way to go before I'll feel worthy of that person. That's why I'm praying. Because one day, I know we'll be together...

Tista, Wings of Mercy.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever a follower is added to your hand from anywhere but your deck, give that follower +1/+1. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Tista, Wings of Mercy.baseFlair_: The fairy speaks to the young man who is brimming with hatred. Long ago she entrusted him with the ability to dispel illness, but the illness he dispelled went on to annihilate his homeland. The fairy's eyes dampen with profound sorrow and regret...
Tista, Wings of Mercy.evoFlair_: My sins, my errors are what nourished the hatred within you. I didn't act out of love. It was a selfish infatuation I simply forced upon you. But I care deeply for you. There's nothing more to it.

Amataz, Fairy Blader.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 Fairies in your hand, gain +1/+1 and Ward.
Then if you have at least 4 Fairies in your hand, gain +1/+1 more and Bane.
Then if you have at least 6 Fairies in your hand, give +1/+1 and Storm to all Fairies in your hand.
Amataz, Fairy Blader.baseFlair_: Long ago, when the greatest tree in the forest was but a sapling, he reached the pinnacle of fairy swordsmanship. Now, that sapling has long overshadowed the woods. He is still improving—each dawn reaching for loftier heights than existed the day before.
Amataz, Fairy Blader.evoFlair_: Just as a tree's rings evidence the sturdiness of its trunk, the fairy blader's wrinkles are proof of his resolute strength. Much like a great tree's branches, the pinnacle of fairy swordsmanship is ever rising skyward. He hones his techniques now with as much diligence as ever.

Elf Queen of Abundant Life.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
Elf Queen of Abundant Life.baseFlair_: Glittering. Ephemeral, fragile, and strong. That is the nature of the forest's lifeblood, the resplendence that I command! Now, I beseech that same eternal vitality—lend power to my sword!
Elf Queen of Abundant Life.evoFlair_: The misery of the trees, the anger of the flowers, everything is a demand of the Queen. And why I must press forth with the forest at my back! O enemies of the weald, you will know the woodborne wrath of my blade!

XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Put a Treacherous Reversal into your hand and banish this follower.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man.evoEffect_:
Evolve: If at least 3 cards were played this turn, gain +3/+3.
Can't be destroyed by effects.
XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man.baseFlair_:
There's no point in self-sacrifice!
Hm... Does that sound believable to you?
I'm The Hanged Man, devotee of self-sacrifice!
So how's it hangin', and how do you do?
XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man.evoFlair_:
Live for the sake of others? That makes zero sense!
Don't people who say that piss you off?
Self-sacrifice is the noblest thing you can do!
So how's it hangin', and how do you do?

Gentle Forest Beauty.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Gain Bane while an allied Irate Forest Beast is in play.
Gentle Forest Beauty.baseFlair_: In the beginning he was so wild he seemed like he would tear me apart—it was terrifying. But I discovered the gentleness inside his wildness, and my fear turned to love.
Gentle Forest Beauty.evoFlair_: I'm going to show you—show you the depth of a love that accepts everything about you. All afflictions that rain down upon you—I'll oppose and erase them.

Irate Forest Beast.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Gain Storm while an allied Gentle Forest Beauty is in play.
Irate Forest Beast.baseFlair_: In the beginning she was so delicate she seemed like she would fall apart—it was terrifying. But I touched the strength inside her delicateness, and my fear turned to love.
Irate Forest Beast.evoFlair_: I'm going to show you—show you the intensity of a love that destroys everything before you. All obstacles you face—I'll topple and destroy them.

Elemental Lance.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, deal 6 damage instead.
Elemental Lance.baseFlair_: Burn! And fly away and freeze and explode too!

Ivy Spellbomb.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Ivy Spellbomb.baseFlair_: As charming as a children's toy and more dangerous than a sorcerer's fireball.

Harvest Season.baseEffect_: Draw 2 cards. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, draw 3 instead.
Harvest Season.baseFlair_: To show gratitude for abundance, receive plenty.

Elven Archery.baseEffect_: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of cards played this turn, including this card.
Elven Archery.baseFlair_: There's an arrow to protect each person in need.
