Swords to Woodlands.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less. Destroy an enemy follower or amulet that costs 5 play points or less instead if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Swords to Woodlands.baseFlair_: All are powerless before nature's might.

Instincts Unleashed.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower +1/+0. Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the strongest allied follower in play.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
Instincts Unleashed.baseFlair_: Your blade rests within a scabbard; their blades rest within their minds. A blade can be unsheathed, as their true power can be unleashed.

Hornet Sting.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Hornet Sting.baseFlair_: It's okay! It barely even stings! Well, at least I never heard anybody complain after they'd got stung... —Fairy

Selwyn's Command.baseEffect_:
Summon a Skystride Raptor.
Enhance (8): Then put a Grand Archer Selwyn into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Selwyn's Command.baseFlair_: The wounds inflicted by the falcon's talons are convenient targets for the hunter.

Miracle of Love.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon a Gentle Forest Beauty or Irate Forest Beast.
Enhance (6): Summon both instead.
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, give the summoned follower(s) +2/+2.
Miracle of Love.baseFlair_: If this were just desire, we would've walked on by. But we did a double-take—it's love.

Pixie Paradise.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
Pixie Paradise.baseFlair_: Hey, silly human, come play with me!

Woodland Band.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give all allied followers +2/+2 if at least 4 allied followers with a different name are in play. Then destroy this amulet.
Woodland Band.baseFlair_: Oooh, this music is so nice. It makes me feel sparkly! —A fairy

Ward of Unkilling.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Until this amulet leaves play, your leader cannot receive more than 5 damage at a time.
Ward of Unkilling.baseFlair_: This world is a rotten fruit, fallen from the tree, crushed underfoot, perfuming the air with decay.

Man-Eating Mangrove.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Whenever an enemy follower attacks your leader, deal 2 damage to that follower.
Man-Eating Mangrove.baseFlair_: The fairies lead those they favor out of the woods. Those who aren't so lucky are led to the hungry one, but the fairies never stop giggling either way.

Arboreal Core.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Fairy Wisps into your hand, then banish this amulet.
Arboreal Core.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated nature. Those who seek abundance find themselves drawn to its luster.

Okami.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, gain +1/+0.
Okami.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, gain +1/+0.
Okami.baseFlair_: A white wolf said to live deep in the heart of the forest. She carries with her the wishes of the forest dwellers and bares her fangs at those who would harm the wild.
Okami.evoFlair_: Her eyes pierce through to the heart of evil; her claws rend wickedness in two. As long as the white wolf lives, none with evil in their hearts dare even approach the forest.

Underbrush Beast Girl.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Ambush if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Underbrush Beast Girl.baseFlair_: Try as you might, you'll never find me. The brush is best for hiding!
Underbrush Beast Girl.evoFlair_: First I hide in the underbrush, nice and sneaky... And then I pounce! Pretty terrifying, right?

Fairy Knight.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Fairy Knight.baseFlair_: I am a knight of the woods. My duty is to battle alongside the fairies!
Fairy Knight.evoFlair_: Fairies, bless my sword! As long as your wings shimmer, I'll keep hunting down the forest's enemies.

Flower Princess.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 2 other Neutral cards or less in your hand, put 2 Fairies into your hand. If you have at least 3 other Neutral cards in your hand, put a Thorn Burst and 2 Fairies into your hand.
Flower Princess.baseFlair_: This is how I was born. The only clothes I wear are these petals, and I sleep on a bed of roses. But please don't look down on me. I've got a few thorns too.
Flower Princess.evoFlair_: It's not that I'm too small; it's that you're too big. My beauty's in how meekly I bloom. Perhaps you humans should live a bit more meekly too.

Weald Philosopher.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower +1/+0. Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Weald Philosopher.baseFlair_: Where did I come from, and where am I going? I haven't the foggiest... The fairies have lead me astray in this forest!
Weald Philosopher.evoFlair_: Where do we come from, and where are we going? Without knowing, I'll go on. Without knowing, I'll live on. The forest is unexpectedly pleasant... Perhaps I'll make a new life here.

Elf General.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Elf General.baseFlair_: Sigh, I tell you! Kids these days aren't up to snuff! Humph! No, I'm not a child—I am an elf. Thank you very much!
Elf General.evoFlair_: You kids will never learn unless a grown-up teaches you a thing or two. Guess I'll just have to show you what happens when elves get angry.

Furious Mountain Deity.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+2 and Rush.
Strike: Gain +1/+0.
Furious Mountain Deity.baseFlair_: There exist a surprising number of cultures in heavily forested regions that reportedly worship bears as gods. I've decided to head into the heart of the wood to investigate these practices myself. —Researcher's Notes
Furious Mountain Deity.evoFlair_: The god stood on two legs... a being that could well have created man in its image. It was the revelation of a lifetime. Its hulking figure as it reared up to protect its territory was indeed divine... —Researcher's Notes

Heroic Fairy Champion.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: The next time damage is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
Enhance (8): Gain +3/+3.
Heroic Fairy Champion.baseFlair_: With courage, you can do anything! The one thing that's impossible... is giving up!
Heroic Fairy Champion.evoFlair_: Without courage, you couldn't do a thing! A sharp sword and a sturdy shield would just gather dust. The greatest weapon of all is courage!

Wily Puck.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Wily Puck.baseFlair_: That tiny body is incredibly busy. When he happens across lost travelers, he sends a gentle breeze to shepherd them in the right direction. See him at play with the woodland sprites—he is the very figure of benevolence.
Wily Puck.evoFlair_: A tiny spark of malice can cause a great deal of trouble. He lures travelers astray and sends gales to obscure their paths. See him conspiring with the woodland sprites—he is the very figure of malevolence.

Reclusive Ponderer.baseFlair_: Call him The Hermit, guru of deliberation. He offers calm and measured advice to troubled travelers. Though his tips are formulated from the deepest rumination, they are simply put and highly beneficial.
Reclusive Ponderer.evoFlair_: While he is often lost in thought, he would never lose his way in the woods. From underbrush to canopy, the forest is his refuge. He is an elusive philosopher, evading confrontation whenever he can.

Rose Gardener.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return another follower to the player's hand.
Rose Gardener.baseFlair_: Beg your pardon—I was told not to let anyone pass through this rose garden. Would you be so kind as to leave? I'd prefer not to use force.
Rose Gardener.evoFlair_: My warnings go unheeded then. A shame. Would that I could show you mercy. Do not struggle against the thorns now. Foolish and ugly you may be, but at least you'll serve to fertilize the garden.

Elven Princess Mage.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put 2 Fairies into your hand and change their cost to 0.
Elven Princess Mage.baseFlair_: You'd steal such a fleeting thing as life? Pathetic villains. The God Tree grieves for your actions, but I will cleanse your wicked souls.
Elven Princess Mage.evoFlair_: The lamentations of the trees carry a hurtful magic energy that passes from root to root and causes the God Tree to suffer. But do not worry—even sinners like you can become food for the forest.

Mana Elk.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied 1/X follower attacks, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Mana Elk.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied 1/X follower attacks, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Mana Elk.baseFlair_: A mighty stag flaps its wings, stirring up a whirlwind that emboldens and empowers the weak.
Mana Elk.evoFlair_: The stag summons forth a whirlwind that stirs courage in the hearts of the powerless, giving them the strength to press onward.

Yuel the Ancient.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times.
Yuel the Ancient.baseFlair_: Driven to free her captured ally, Yuel commanded will-o'-wisps to banish the darkness. No foe could escape her fiery wrath.
Yuel the Ancient.evoFlair_: In the darkness Yuel's flames dance, warding away the evil that threatens to overtake her companion. The embers flicker, each capable of incinerating an entire forest.

Vist, Elf Butler.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Forestcraft follower that originally costs at least 6 play points, subtract 3 from the cost of this card.
----------
Ward.
Vist, Elf Butler.baseFlair_: Do you have some business with the young lady? May I ask your name? I'm sure you understand that I can't allow just anyone to see her.
Vist, Elf Butler.evoFlair_: One requires many skills to be worthy of standing at the young lady's side. What makes the butler is mastery of swordsmanship, magic, and of course everyday tasks!

Snowfield Warrior.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Snowfield Warrior.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Snowfield Warrior.baseFlair_: The wisdom of battle leads the warrior to new heights. Much like a tree thrives in a forest, the warrior thrives in the heat of battle.
Snowfield Warrior.evoFlair_: The warrior faces off against foes to protect the fresh buds of life. Clad in furor, his great hammer grows stronger with each swing.

Ariana, Natural Tutor.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Ivy Spellbomb into your hand. Change its cost to 1 if there are at least 3 allied followers in play, including this follower.
Ariana, Natural Tutor.baseFlair_: You can manipulate natural life with a magical elixir. But do be careful—even a slight error in the formulation could prove fatal.
Ariana, Natural Tutor.evoFlair_: Drink it carefully and without fear. Use magical elixir in good health, and there's nothing more useful. Well, that's it for class today. See you again next week!

Fashionista Nelcha.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Angel's Dress or Demon's Dress into your hand.
Fashionista Nelcha.baseFlair_: Ngwah-ha-ha-ha-ha! You dowdy idiots, you piles of lint! As a lookbook incarnate, I, Nelcha, shall do you the favor of a lifetime and teach you what style really means!
Fashionista Nelcha.evoFlair_: Ngwah-ha-ha-ha-ha! Fine feathers make fine fools! You're a thread more presentable now. Now let's go and show what we've got on the runway!

Sutera of the Sacred Bow.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Sutera of the Sacred Bow.baseFlair_: My sister's a prodigy, the kind that only appears once a century. I'm nothing compared to her, so surely she is more worthy of the sacred bow.
Sutera of the Sacred Bow.evoFlair_: My father, my sister, Captain... They're all counting on me. So, please, sacred bow! Heed my call, and come to my aid!

Disciple of Unkilling.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an enemy follower -4/-0 until the end of your opponent's turn.
Disciple of Unkilling.baseFlair_: We must never kill, even in the face of evil or tyranny. Alas, who are we to cast judgment? For the sake of all creation, let go and allow life to run its course.
Disciple of Unkilling.evoFlair_:
The Second Law: Observation
Complete or incomplete, everything is equal in existence. There is no room for intervention, no space for devotion.
—Teachings of the Unkilling Guardian

Ironbow Sniper.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals 2 times the number of allied Machina followers in play.
Ironbow Sniper.baseFlair_: Analyzing the metal insect's carapace inspired us to develop a new weapon: a mechanical bow, capable of firing iron arrows through even the thickest trees. In fact, during our first test firing, the arrow pierced cleanly through the bug. —Researcher's Report, Part 2
Ironbow Sniper.evoFlair_: The critters in the forest are becoming increasingly frantic. Intruders enter our home accompanied by strange machines, while others wield curious bows—bows that even we elves couldn't hope to wield. —Forest Rumors, Part 2

Elven Pikeman.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Elven Pikeman.baseFlair_: I thought I knew elven spear-fighting inside and out, but when I backed this elf into a corner, he managed to wound me severely. I wasn't even in range of his weapon... What technique could he possibly have used? —A martial artist
Elven Pikeman.evoFlair_: While fighting an intruder, my hand slipped... And just like that, a new technique was born! I will call it "spear-throwing!" Elven spear-fighting will never be the same! —Elven Pikeman

Petal Fencer.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, transform it into a Petal Fencer.
Petal Fencer.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, transform it into an unevolved Petal Fencer.
Petal Fencer.baseFlair_: You think you can just trample all over my flower garden? You're gonna learn a lesson at the tip of my sword! Get ready to be driven back by a flurry of stings!
Petal Fencer.evoFlair_: You think you can just trample all over our flower garden? You're gonna learn a lesson at the tip of our swords! Get ready to be driven back by a flurry of stings!

Fairy Driver.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Storm until the end of the turn.
Fairy Driver.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Storm until the end of the turn.
Fairy Driver.baseFlair_: Buzzing, flitting insects! Shut your mouths and obey me, you pests.
Fairy Driver.evoFlair_: If there's anything good about you disease-spreading pests, it's the sound of your last breath. Now let me hear it!

Metera, Peerless Shot.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
Clash: Draw a card.
Metera, Peerless Shot.baseFlair_: Everyone in this town is suuuch a bore. Maybe a little cruise through the clouds'll make me feel better.
Metera, Peerless Shot.evoFlair_: Well, well, aren't you a strapping young man. You look a little tired... How about we go somewhere and relax, hmm?

Lycoris, Poisoner Princess.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Give another allied follower Bane.
Lycoris, Poisoner Princess.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Give +0/+1 to all allied followers with Bane.
Lycoris, Poisoner Princess.baseFlair_: Bathe yourself in my poison. Don't worry... I won't be too rough. I want to make this last, after all.
Lycoris, Poisoner Princess.evoFlair_: I'll break you. I'll burn your skin, melt your bones, and rot your insides. But don't worry—it won't kill you. I want to keep you around to play for a long, long time...

Lina & Lena, Twin Souls.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, evolve this follower.
Lina & Lena, Twin Souls.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Lina & Lena, Twin Souls.baseFlair_:
Lina: Lena! Baddie on your right!
Lena: I know, Lina.
Lina: Then why didn't you tell me!
Lena: Faster just to take 'im down.
Lina & Lena, Twin Souls.evoFlair_:
Lina: We're unstoppable!
Lena: Pride goeth before a fall, Lina.
Lina: Geez, d'ya hafta rain on my parade?
Lena: I didn't say you were wrong...

Wildwood Matriarch.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 3 allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, gain Storm.
Strike: Change the cost of all Greenwood Guardians in your hand that cost at least 2 play points to 1.
Wildwood Matriarch.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
Strike: Change the cost of all Greenwood Guardians in your hand that cost at least 2 play points to 1.
Wildwood Matriarch.baseFlair_:
When the forest expands, it propagates like raging billows on the sea, unstoppable. If any should attempt to hinder its growth, the mighty warriors will thwart their endeavors.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 8
Wildwood Matriarch.evoFlair_:
When the forest has burgeoned to cover the entire land, it becomes the world itself. Those hoping to join the ranks of mighty warriors are ushered in from far and wide.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 9

Ironglider Elf.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Machina card (excluding Ironglider Elf) from your deck into your hand.
Ironglider Elf.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Machina card (excluding Ironglider Elf) from your deck into your hand.
Ironglider Elf.baseFlair_:
Elven weaponry has assumed new forms, with further enhancement expected. Take this glider—it can wrap the user in wind while blasting away foes. Such a machine is proof that we elves have surpassed our earthly origin.
—Forest Elf's Journal, Part 3
Ironglider Elf.evoFlair_:
The forest dwellers increased their firepower with machinery. However, this conflicted with the old ways, so they made a decision: to embrace change, to cull those who still obeyed the land.
—On Flourishing, Part 3

Chipper Skipper.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Fighter.
(Can only Accelerate if a follower was played this turn.)
----------
Whenever you play a card using its Accelerate effect, summon a Fighter and evolve it.
Chipper Skipper.baseFlair_: Follow the Six of Swords, navigator of prospect. She ensures a new tomorrow for those who have overcome today. With her at the helm, the memories you make will help you on your way.
Chipper Skipper.evoFlair_: When the forest seems inescapable, reach out and take her hand. She ferries trailblazers on her boat pulled by fairies. Service with a smile: that's the motto of an elf who's always looking toward the future.

Aria, Guiding Fairy.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Fairy Wisp into your hand.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Put Fairies into your hand until it is full. (A hand can hold 9 cards.)
Aria, Guiding Fairy.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Fairy Wisp into your hand.
Aria, Guiding Fairy.baseFlair_: I feel it in the very wind brushing my cheeks—the premonition of battle. If violence is the answer, you've left me no choice. Fairies, gather by my side... today, we glide upon new winds!
Aria, Guiding Fairy.evoFlair_: Luminous sky, sacred trees, and azure ocean—nature grants us life. If you intend to defile it, prepare to answer to my sword. Fairies, gather by my side... I will become one with the wind!

Carbuncle, Immortal Jewel.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Draw a card. Put a Carbuncle's Sparkle into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Put 4 Carbuncle's Sparkles into your deck.
Carbuncle, Immortal Jewel.evoEffect_: Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader. Recover 2 play points.
Carbuncle, Immortal Jewel.baseFlair_:
Sheened in morning dew, the jewel of the forest glistens on its forehead. Nothing can crack that faceted gem. Its radiance penetrates to the very depths of the forest.
— On Carbuncles, Cryptid Companion
Carbuncle, Immortal Jewel.evoFlair_:
The jewel of the forest gleams on its forehead, resonating with the evening dew. The creature returns without fail, across the millennia, its eternal brilliance illuminating the forest.
—On Carbuncles, Cryptid Companion

Crystalia Eve.baseFlair_: Heed my warning, trespasser. We have no mercy for those who threaten the princess.
Crystalia Eve.evoFlair_: If you turn back now, I can promise your safety. If you draw your blade, I can only promise an icy grave.

Way of the Outlaw.baseEffect_: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
Way of the Outlaw.baseFlair_: Well, sure, you could call it organized robbery, but why put such a negative spin on things?

Fairy Assault.baseEffect_:
Summon 4 Fairies and give them Rush.
Enhance (8): Evolve them instead.
Fairy Assault.baseFlair_: It's called Area Fairy One. Even the most experienced elves steer clear of that place. Because once you go in, you never come out.

Forest Whispers.baseEffect_: Transform an enemy follower into a Fairy. Put a Fairy into your hand.
Forest Whispers.baseFlair_: "Where am I? I can't take any more of being lost!" The trekker's anguished cry elected a giggle from the fairies. "Don't worry! We'll make sure you never get lost again! We'll make you one of us!"

Nature Corroded.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Put a Fairy into your hand.
Nature Corroded.baseFlair_: Even the worst ne'er-do-well plays a role in the forest. —Dryad

Burst Shot.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 4 times.
Enhance (10): Deal damage to the enemy leader instead. Deal damage 1 more time for every 2 allied Fairies that have been destroyed this match.
Burst Shot.baseFlair_: At first glance it may seem like a snare, but these threads pierce to kill. —Elven Archer

Send 'Em Packing.baseEffect_:
Randomly remove all effects on an enemy follower with the highest attack in play, except changes to its attack or defense, then destroy that follower.
Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
Send 'Em Packing.baseFlair_: You know why they call me the Stoneclaw? 'Cuz you've gotta be dumb as rocks to fight me.

Harvest Festival.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, draw a card if at least 3 cards have been played this turn.
Harvest Festival.baseFlair_: Let us give thanks for this bountiful harvest.

Fairy Menhir.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Summon 2 Fairies.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Fairies.
Fairy Menhir.baseFlair_: No matter how peculiar, there is always meaning behind the gods' mischief. Fayfolk, on the other hand...

Fairy Cage.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a card, if there are no Fairies in your hand, put 1 into your hand.
Fairy Cage.baseFlair_: Fairies live much longer than us, and they're far more clever. So if you want to capture one, don't try to outsmart her. Just pique her curiosity. —Chapter 3, Fairy Hunters' Handbook

Treant.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Treant.baseFlair_: Called to action by the pleading of the pure-hearted, this creature prowls the forest. The prayers of forest dwellers swell its trunk, causing it to grow ever stronger.
Treant.evoFlair_: As the forest dwellers continue to pray, the creature grows ever stronger. Alas, when the praying stops, it turns into a wild and vengeful spirit.

Fairy Caster.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 3 Fairies into your hand.
Fairy Caster.baseFlair_: Welcome back, pretty little pixie. How are things in the forest? Hm? More and more monsters on account of the miasma, eh? Something has to be done! And quickly!
Fairy Caster.evoFlair_: The forest's been cleansed of that evil miasma thanks to the pixies who live there. We should go and share the good news with the ones who evacuated!

Verdant Steward.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Verdant Steward.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Verdant Steward.baseFlair_: A forest guardian who yearns for peace and guides the forest denizens with a warm, gentle voice.
Verdant Steward.evoFlair_: A forest protector who cooperates with allies to drive away any threats to the forest and preserve the peace.

Dryad of the Grove.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Clash: Give the enemy follower -2/-0.
Dryad of the Grove.baseFlair_: The tendrils are the maiden's locks; the branches, her limbs; the trunk, her tender skin. She is the alluring forest itself. None with impure hearts may ever hope to touch her.
Dryad of the Grove.evoFlair_: The thorns are the lady's nails; the leaves, her fingers; the blossoms, her smiles. She is the delicate forest itself. None with wicked hearts may ever hope to exit her.

Fairy Officer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand. Then deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of Fairies in your hand.
Fairy Officer.baseFlair_: Wh-what? We're really going through with this? I didn't spend my time learning strategy so I could play simple pranks. Oooh, fine—but I'm going home after a practical joke or two.
Fairy Officer.evoFlair_:
"Yes, we've led them to the pitfall! Diversionary force, now's our chance! Attack!"
"Hehe, doesn't matter what you say, you love pranks! That's proof you're a fairy after all!"
—Fairy Officer and Her Subordinate

Elf Prophetess.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Elf Prophetess.baseFlair_: My duty is to foretell the fate of this forest and to protect those within. Should danger threaten the forest dwellers, I shall guide us through.
Elf Prophetess.evoFlair_: These eyes see what the future holds. That future, however, is ever changing. Shifting. Even if I see naught but strife and misery, I will never abandon hope.

Pegasus Elf.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change an enemy follower's defense to 1.
Pegasus Elf.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Pegasus Elf.baseFlair_: Bam! Direct hit... Hm? The enemy still seems to be moving. Evil shouldn't have stood a chance against my pegasus-mane bow!
Pegasus Elf.evoFlair_: No foe can survive an onslaught from a pegasus-mane bow. I won't miss again. Prepare to get pincushioned!

Lionel, Elf Prince.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select a Forestcraft card in your hand that costs 4 play points or less and change its cost to 0.
Lionel, Elf Prince.baseFlair_: Well aren't you a pretty one? Now run right into my arms, as straight and unerring as a forest boar.
Lionel, Elf Prince.evoFlair_: Those who seek to harm the children of the woods will have no mercy from me. If I have to rage like a forest dragon to protect the animals, so be it.

Witherwood Guardian.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Witherwood Guardian.baseFlair_: Even for a withered forest, the promise of spring awaits. Until its arrival, I will stand here in its stead—a small price to pay for the mother tree that saved me.
Witherwood Guardian.evoFlair_: No matter how many times it withers, it will come back one day. Until that day arrives, I will stand here and await its return. I must do all I can to repay my debt to the mother tree.

Hornet Soldier.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put a Hornet Warrior or Hornet Sting into your hand.
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, put both into your hand instead.
Hornet Soldier.baseFlair_: The cacophony of buzzing wings signals the coming of the forest's soldiers. Those who face them face a wall of needles. Those who flee them flee a barrage of poisonous strikes.
Hornet Soldier.evoFlair_: "Yawn... Why is everything so dull? Go forth. Charm them with my nectar, sink them with the force of my nest..." —Bab'zz, Hornet Queen

Forest Defender.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Forest Defender.baseFlair_:
"Ooh-ooh! Ah! Ooh-ooh-ooh-ahh! Ooh-aaaah!"
"He says he can't tell whether we're trouble, so we should get out of his woods."
—Forest Defender with a novice interpreter
Forest Defender.evoFlair_:
"Ooh-ooh! Ah! Ooh-ooh-ooh-ahh! Ooh-aaaah!"
"He says the weather looks like trouble, so we'd better get out of the woods."
—Forest Defender with a veteran interpreter

Nature's Warden.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Summon a Nature's Warden. Select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
Nature's Warden.baseFlair_: Intruders! Get 'em! I can't believe you idiots would still dare to contaminate nature with your presence! We'll band together like never before and teach you to never come back!
Nature's Warden.evoFlair_: Water is but another part of Mother Nature's kingdom! And we are a part of her will and fervor! Don't let your guard down, intruder—we're always watching!

Optimistic Beastmaster.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random follower with Accelerate from your deck into your hand.
Whenever you play a card using its Accelerate effect, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Optimistic Beastmaster.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a card using its Accelerate effect, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Optimistic Beastmaster.baseFlair_: Welcome the Six of Wands, purveyor of encouragement. If your confidence is shattered, he will put back the pieces. Let his words bolster your self-worth and push you toward greater goals.
Optimistic Beastmaster.evoFlair_: He is a critic, an acclaimer of beasts. Around him, stomping hooves, fluttering wings—even neighs turn to yays. Praise the forest, and it will praise you back.

Noble Fairy.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the defense of all enemy followers to 1 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Noble Fairy.baseFlair_: The eternal mother of all fairies. She uses the wisdom she has gleaned over the course of her long life to act as the leader of the forest. She hates conflict, enjoys order, and has long been a force for peace and stability.
Noble Fairy.evoFlair_: This noble fairy is a calm and impartial judge in all matters. She brings justice to bear on those who seek to cause conflict and drives away those who disturb the social order.

Robin Hood.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, deal 1 damage to it.
Robin Hood.evoEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, deal 1 damage to it.
Robin Hood.baseFlair_: A heroic figure who has come to the forest from a white-walled castle in order to act as a source of strength for the people. Robin Hood does not hesitate to fire an arrow or two at those who dare intrude in the forest.
Robin Hood.evoFlair_: Master of the forest, defender of the weak, principled thief—Robin Hood is all things to all men. Proud and passionate, this outlaw will not put down the bow while the flames of the struggle continue to blaze within.

Elf of the Gemstones.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Elf of the Gemstones.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Elf of the Gemstones.baseFlair_: The light of life fades away, but the light of gems never will. Isn't it clear which is superior? Loyal subjects! Guard the eternal light!
Elf of the Gemstones.evoFlair_: The light of life fades away, but the light of gems never will. For the immortal elf, there's no better friend. Now go defend the gems at all costs!

Jungle Warden.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Summon a Jungle Warden. Then give all allied Jungle Wardens Storm.
Jungle Warden.baseFlair_: Outta the jungle, intruders! Or ignore my warning and face the wrath of me and my friends!
Jungle Warden.evoFlair_: Cry out! Roar, my friends! We are the jungle's heart, and we its wardens. We will not spare a single intruder!

Venus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Harvest Festival into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Venus.baseFlair_: Sage or sap, lofty or lowly, everyone is equal before love. So let us begin the banquet of love.
Venus.evoFlair_: You who draw near with love, you who draw away with love, love will enrich your heart. Now show me your love.

Swiftgait Okami.baseEffect_: When you play another follower, give it Storm, then return this follower to your hand.
Swiftgait Okami.baseFlair_: The instant I mounted, the forest wolf transformed into a frightening gust of wind. Clinging on for dear life, I screamed like a child and prayed to god for the very first time. —Chapter 4, Sylvan Expeditions
Swiftgait Okami.evoFlair_: Tearing through the trees and bounding off across cliffs, it delivered me to the other side of the forest and immediately vanished without a trace. Suffice it to say, I should prefer to ride on horseback next time. —Chapter 5, Sylvan Expeditions

Apostle of Unkilling.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put a spell that costs 1 play point or less from your deck into your hand.
At the end of your turn, restore defense to your leader equal to the number of enemy followers in play.
Apostle of Unkilling.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore defense to your leader equal to the number of enemy followers in play.
Apostle of Unkilling.baseFlair_: We must never kill, for there is merit in preserving even the smallest life. Let go and allow life to run its course in both growth and decay.
Apostle of Unkilling.evoFlair_:
The Third Law: Continuation
Survival and association, these are the ways of the world. Allow all beings their due persistence.
—Teachings of the Unkilling Guardian

Setus, the Beastblade.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, if an allied follower was destroyed this turn, put a Righteous Evocation into your hand.
Setus, the Beastblade.baseFlair_: I made a vow, as a leader of the Order of Bladerights, to support my comrades and protect the country. So failing to do my duty is not an option.
Setus, the Beastblade.evoFlair_: I made a vow to be an upright warrior and never to bring shame on my guild or tarnish its vision of justice. So I have to stop you. I'll settle this with my own two hands.

Windfall Fay.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover 4 play points.
Whenever you play a card, if it's the fifth card or later played this turn, draw a card.
Windfall Fay.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a card, if it's the fifth card or later played this turn, draw a card.
Windfall Fay.baseFlair_: Walking through the forest, sunlight peeks through the treetops and petals dance along the breeze. A smiling girl appears before you. When you meet her gaze, the breeze picks up into a gentle wind, beckoning you forth. Dare you follow this fairy's caress?
Windfall Fay.evoFlair_: Continuing through the forest, the aroma of flowers fills the air and the leaves begin a graceful descent to the ground. The girl grins and begins a whimsical dance. Wind envelops you, an invitation to join. Dare you surrender to the whims of the fay?

Crystalia Tia.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Crystalia Eve. Give it Ward and evolve it if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Crystalia Tia.baseFlair_: Deep within a castle encased in ice resides the princess of crystals. There, between the worlds of gods and men, she watches over the ice crystals' shine.
Crystalia Tia.evoFlair_: Long lived is the princess of crystals, her every memory forever captured in a crystal of ice.

Korwa, Ravishing Designer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, put a Fil into your hand. Put 2 Fils into your hand instead if at least 4 damage was dealt to your leader during the opponent's previous turn. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Put 3 Fils into your hand, and recover 3 play points.
Korwa, Ravishing Designer.baseFlair_: Haha... Look at him try to ask her out for coffee. Cute. Someone should tell him old-fashioned flirting doesn't work anymore. A true gentleman has a certain je ne sais quoi to his approach. But, ugh, he's hopeless!
Korwa, Ravishing Designer.evoFlair_: I want everyone—absolutely everyone—who wears one of my dresses to find happiness. I mean, why would you wear something if it doesn't help you find your own happy ending?

Godhunter Selwyn.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn. Then deal 2 damage to all enemy followers if at least 4 other cards were played this turn.
Godhunter Selwyn.baseFlair_: You've held your ground well. However, your efforts are in vain. From the moment I caught you in my sight, your heart sounded its last moments.
Godhunter Selwyn.evoFlair_: Gods, demons, mankind—it matters not. All will be obliterated by my arrows.

Ladica, the Stoneclaw.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 Fairies in your hand, deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Ladica, the Stoneclaw.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Send 'Em Packing into your hand.
Ladica, the Stoneclaw.baseFlair_:
"It's like... This place is home or whatever, so."
Forever aloof, forever chill...
"That's why I fight. You gotta protect your home, yeah?"
The Stoneclaw looks forward, prepared to do what must be done.
Ladica, the Stoneclaw.evoFlair_:
"Lol. You pissed off the wrong girl, bro."
Claws as hard as granite, strike as strong as boulders...
"Say hi to the birds for me. Toodles."
The Stoneclaw metes out her own brand of justice, sending her foes packing.

Will of the Forest.baseEffect_: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
Will of the Forest.baseFlair_: Go back to the ground from whence you came, evildoers.

Titania's Sanctuary.baseEffect_: Can evolve an allied Fairy each turn for 0 evolution points.
Titania's Sanctuary.baseFlair_: This is where our dazzling queen reigns. Where radiantly colored wings abound. Where eternal secrets sleep.

Elf Tracker.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 2 times.
Elf Tracker.baseFlair_: I won't let you get away! You're going to regret the mess you made in our home! You really think you can outrun these arrows? Ha!
Elf Tracker.evoFlair_: Prepare yourselves! Turn your back and your fate is sealed! Don't worry though. I won't let you suffer.

Ipiria.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
Ipiria.baseFlair_: This creature sleeps at the bottom of a marsh. When the cycle begins anew, it lets out a sharp cry. This cry is said to cut through the air and cause plentiful rainfall.
Ipiria.evoFlair_: This creature announces the coming of the rainy season. Its call is said to be the reverberating sound of thunder during heavy rain.

Elven Sentry.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 for each Fairy in your hand.
Elven Sentry.baseFlair_:
If fairies are the eyes of the forest, elves are its arms. Fairies discover intruders and confound them until elves arrive to put an end to the incursion.
—Step into the Forest, Chapter 2
Elven Sentry.evoFlair_:
You might expect there to be friction between the carefree fairies and duty-bound elves—and you would be correct. This does not, however, impede their ability to collaborate.
—Step into the Forest, Chapter 3

Magna Botanist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to all allied followers if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Magna Botanist.baseFlair_: Well, of course, it began as just a teeny little chemical to help my dear plants grow. But the more I tinkered and toyed and experimented... Well, let's just say that now my dear plants grow however I want them to!
Magna Botanist.evoFlair_: With this gift for plants, I've got a duty to protect the forest dwellers! Now then, everyone, come drink this secret medicine! One drop and you'll be bursting with power!

Elder Treant.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Evolve if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Elder Treant.baseFlair_: The great, wise tree that serves as lord of the forest. It supports the trunks that creak beneath the weight of snow and encourages the shrubs that freeze in the frost.
Elder Treant.evoFlair_: Once cruel winter passes, the buds of the new spring await. The king of the fairies' forest visits each spot anew, basking in the vigor of the new season.

Fairy Beast.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
Fairy Beast.baseFlair_: A kindly beast dispatched by the Beast King to watch over the fairies. Its wings are said to heal the injured forest.
Fairy Beast.evoFlair_: Infused with the fairies' prayers of gratitude, the wings of the guardian glimmer brightly. It draws power from respect and trust, and with that strength it strikes down evil.

Master of the Canopies.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 for each other card in your hand.
Master of the Canopies.baseFlair_: Once, long ago, the world was nothing but nature. But then the defilers came, armed with their infernal knowledge, and nature wilted before them.
Master of the Canopies.evoFlair_: From the heart of the forest, the Master of the Canopies bellows his rage. He goes forth to annihilate the defilers, and to restore the world to its former pristine state.

Sylvan Elder.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers +1/+1 if you have at least 3 other Neutral cards in your hand.
Sylvan Elder.baseFlair_: A spirit of the great tree that watches over the forest. Its life force is bound to the woods through the earth's meridians. Animals love the tree, and forest guardians hold it dear.
Sylvan Elder.evoFlair_: Forest guardians made offerings in appreciation of the woodlands' bounty. They helped the tree's soothing flowers to bloom and brought together the people in peace.

Dolorblade Demon.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Dolorblade Demon.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Dolorblade Demon.baseFlair_: It's a demon that lives in the depths of a gloomy forest. It uses its blade to shake the earth, removing any who would trespass in its territory.
Dolorblade Demon.evoFlair_: It's a demon that lives in the depths of a dying forest. Visit its home out of curiosity and you may find yourself cut down.

Forest Hatcheteer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower and then 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Forest Hatcheteer.baseFlair_:
I'm the strongest in the forest—every lad and lass depends on me! No matter yer problem, my trusty hatchets'll solve it!
"What's that, boy? A fallen tree! I'm on my way!"
Forest Hatcheteer.evoFlair_:
I'm the elf everyone loves—and I like it that way! No matter yer problem, my trusty hatchets are always here to help!
"The weather might ruin your picnic? Not on my watch! I'm on my way!"

Elf Knight Cynthia.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower attacks, give it +1/+0.
Elf Knight Cynthia.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 2 Fairies.
Whenever another allied follower attacks, give it +1/+0.
Elf Knight Cynthia.baseFlair_: The woods must be protected. I am both the sword and shield of the king, and it is in his name that I now act.
Elf Knight Cynthia.evoFlair_: Hear me, dryads, for you are the swords and shields of our king as well. May your shimmering wings light the path to victory!

Grand Archer Selwyn.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn. If that follower has 3 attack or less, return it to the opponent's hand instead.
Grand Archer Selwyn.baseFlair_: It's nothin' personal. I'm just doin' my job. Now hold still.
Grand Archer Selwyn.evoFlair_: My arrow's aimed right at you, so you're as good as dead.

Maahes.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemies if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Maahes.baseFlair_: A lion-headed god of war, Maahes crushes all invaders who dare to step foot within the sacred realm. With each ruthless swing, the rampaging lion cuts evil in two.
Maahes.evoFlair_: The lion god's fearsome attacks against the fiendish army were unceasing. The battle raged throughout the day and into the night as the great lion exterminated his foes, solidifying his legacy.

Crystalia Aerin.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Recover 1 evolution point.
Crystalia Aerin.baseFlair_: The Crystal Palace is our home, the only place we belong. Visitors aren't welcome here, especially ones who would defile our home.
Crystalia Aerin.evoFlair_: You seem to be interested in us, but I have no interest in you. So why not do us both a favor and leave? If you don't, you'll see just how much colder our reception can get.

Fairy Saber.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers +1/+0. Give all other allied followers Rush if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Fairy Saber.baseFlair_: You're all still so young, so fragile. So please, fall back and leave it to me. I'll take care of this, even if it means getting my hands dirty!
Fairy Saber.evoFlair_: Through the root of a single tree, the Dark defiled our forest. It's too late to save it—too late to heal it. That is why I must fight! In the name of the mother forest, and mother nature!

Fairy Princess.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put Fairies into your hand until it is full. (A hand can hold 9 cards.)
Fairy Princess.baseFlair_: This is the garden of the fairies, a peaceful place for the pure at heart. You were led here by the twinkling lights, weren't you? Is your conscience clear enough to let you in?
Fairy Princess.evoFlair_: Here, don't you see? The glimmer of the moon, the trees—look, even the fairies themselves bless you. Come now, won't you dance with me beneath this radiant moonlight?

Beauty and the Beast.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if you have at least 5 other cards in your hand. Gain the following effects if there are at least 3 other neutral cards in your hand - Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. Reduce damage from spells and effects to 0.
Beauty and the Beast.baseFlair_: A statuesque princess and a ferocious warrior. One half of this unlikely pair is a beauty; the other is a beast. Drawn together by their beautiful hearts, the two have created a bond that transcends love.
Beauty and the Beast.evoFlair_: These two share a bond of pure love. Though their forms may differ, their hearts and their affections are equally sincere. They feel no shame when proclaiming their love to the world.

Cassiopeia.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
Cassiopeia.baseFlair_: My beautiful figure is unrivaled—praise it! No matter how brightly the stars shine, they pale before me.
Cassiopeia.evoFlair_: My beauty—my very light—is the greatest glory covering the heavens. Come on, you surface dwellers! Have every word of adulation at your disposal for me!

Yggdrasil.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Fanfare: Choose - Put a Blessings of Creation or Wrath of Nature into your hand.
Yggdrasil.baseFlair_: The first greenery to germinate in the world. Her limitless mercy comforts all creation, and her hidden might makes all nature tremble.
Yggdrasil.evoFlair_: The mother of life, the source of providence. Her infinite love spreads across the continent like the greenery. And if the world's path should ever be in err, that love shall turn to wrath and cover the world like greenery.

White Vanara.baseEffect_:
Ward.
If this follower's attack or defense is increased by a spell or effect during your turn, evolve this follower.
White Vanara.baseFlair_: The white primate's eyes dart to the right, dart to the left. Young though it is, this forest warrior is intent on defending its verdant cradle.
White Vanara.evoFlair_: The mantle of reason is cast off and that of animality done on. Cutting down the enemy vanguard—crying out—is the white primate. Its two tremendous fists, imbued with nature's wrath, power it onward.

Greenglen Axeman.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, if at least 3 cards were played this turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
Greenglen Axeman.baseFlair_:
The one shall alight in a land of great verdancy. Bearing an axe clad in sage cyclones, he will color the land in shades of green. He is the long-awaited vessel of unadorned nature. —
Book of Prophecies, Nature Scrolls
Greenglen Axeman.evoFlair_: The one shall dispel the realm of demons who oppose nature. The one is our hope, the power of the forest. Our future is entrusted there in the axe that he wields. —Book of Prophecies, Nature Scrolls

Forest Oracle Pascale.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if at least 4 cards were played this turn, double all other allied followers' attack and defense, then remove this effect.
Forest Oracle Pascale.baseFlair_: I once lost myself in these woods and wandered, watering the trees with my tears. But now I have so many friends. That's why I became the forest oracle. Let my dance buoy you up. Then give whoever bothers us a lesson they won't soon forget!
Forest Oracle Pascale.evoFlair_: I am the kindhearted forest oracle. Even if you trespass against me, I won't take your life. I'll smack you around, make you cry, and let everyone laugh themselves sick at your expense... but I'll let you off with that.

Cynthia, the Queen's Blade.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give another unevolved allied Forestcraft follower the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon 2 Fairy Wisps.
Cynthia, the Queen's Blade.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 2 Fairies.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon 2 Fairy Wisps.
Cynthia, the Queen's Blade.baseFlair_: Forest folk, can you hear me? On our new queen's honor, the time has come for us to raise our swords once again. We shall bring victory to this forest!
Cynthia, the Queen's Blade.evoFlair_:
"Cynthia became a knight just for me!"
—Liza, Queen of the Forest
"She's a bit of a stick-in-the-mud, but her heart's in the right place."
—Marion, Fierce Dragonewt

Terrorformer.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Forestcraft followers that originally cost 2 play points or more
Whenever 2 or more cards are fused to this card at once, gain +2/+0 and draw a card.
----------
Fanfare: If at least 2 cards are fused to this card, gain Storm. Then, if at least 4 cards are fused to this card, destroy an enemy follower.
Terrorformer.baseFlair_:
It's a walking guillotine, for lack of a better name. Nothing is safe from its blades. Not trees, not the earth, and of course, not necks. The condemned have only to wait their turn.
—Waiting for the End, Preface
Terrorformer.evoFlair_:
Watch how the blades dance through the air. The first slash slices in two, and the second dices indiscriminately. Take a seat. Tremble while you still can. The execution is about to begin.
—Waiting for the End, Epilogue

Forest Gigas.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
Forest Gigas.baseFlair_: The needs of the forest dwellers can't very well be ignored. I'll show them how a gigas deals with foolhardiness!
Forest Gigas.evoFlair_: It's not like I haven't learned a thing or two over the centuries. Don't be thinking it'll be easy to trespass in these woods!

Deepwood Wolf.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Draw a card.
----------
Storm.
When you play a card using its Accelerate effect, evolve this follower.
Deepwood Wolf.baseFlair_:
I got eyes on the quarry! Geez, it's fast! But a pup like that is no match for me!
—Hunter's Journal Entry
Deepwood Wolf.evoFlair_:
I chased after it in the darkness. Then it started... growing. Man, I screwed up bad. And now I might have to pay the price...
—Hunted's Journal Entry

Forest Archelon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: All enemy followers in play can't attack next turn if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
Forest Archelon.baseFlair_: This woodland god bears an entire forest on its back, and with a single roar it robs invaders of their will to fight. The peace is thereby restored.
Forest Archelon.evoFlair_: So massive is the beast that all one can do is tremble and quake in fear. To defy it would be to face the incredible wrath of nature itself.

Baalt, King of the Elves.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand and change their costs to 0.
Baalt, King of the Elves.baseFlair_: We go forth now to destroy those who would see our forest burn! Dwellers of the forest, lend me your strength!
Baalt, King of the Elves.evoFlair_: No matter how infertile the soil, hope is a plant that always finds a way to sprout! Today, dwellers of the forest, we fight for hope!

Mighty Dwarf.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Mighty Dwarf.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Mighty Dwarf.baseFlair_: Devils! Ya got some brass to step foot in the city of dwarves. I'll dice up every last one of ya!
Mighty Dwarf.evoFlair_: This beard's m'pride and joy! And I swear on every strand that none of ya devils will get away. Now here's what a dwarf can do!

Luxglaive Bayle.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Ward.
Luxglaive Bayle.baseFlair_: So many sacrifices have been made. So many tears shed. I can't shoulder it all, but I can make sure it ends here. Yes—I swear it!
Luxglaive Bayle.evoFlair_:
"Coordination will be key in this operation. Understood?"
"Don't be stupid, Bayle. I can handle this alone."
"I... I see. Ugh, I feel sick..."
—Bayle and Sarissa

Mechalance Elf.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: Reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn and deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the attack of this follower minus the defense of the enemy follower.
Mechalance Elf.baseFlair_: It's almost like the heavy weight of metal is a problem of the past. We see this most with the warriors of the forest who have developed weapons for the practicalities of warfare. —Researcher's Report, Part 3
Mechalance Elf.evoFlair_: You should leave the forest as quick as you can. The inhabitants are using their hunting weapons for battle. And if they've managed to create a powerful weapon for a skilled warrior, well, let's just say you wouldn't want to cross paths with them. —Forest Rumors, Part 3

Lionel, Woodland Shadow.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can only Accelerate if an allied follower has evolved this turn.)
----------
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower. Then, if the selected follower had 5 defense or less before damage was dealt, evolve this follower.
Lionel, Woodland Shadow.evoEffect_: Once on each of the opponent's turns, when the opponent plays a follower, deal 10 damage to it.
Lionel, Woodland Shadow.baseFlair_: Ungh... Ungh, ungggh! Oh, excuse me. I was experiencing a bout of cuddle withdrawal. I guess this new look of mine isn't doing me any favors either...
Lionel, Woodland Shadow.evoFlair_: I don't mind if the animals drive me batty. But as for intruders, I must ask them to leave. Then I can turn my undivided attention back to the cuddles!

Elf Queen.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of shadows you have. Then change your number of shadows to 0.
Elf Queen.baseFlair_: Hear me, you who perished while nobly defending our forest. Your names will live on. Blessings for the brave!
Elf Queen.evoFlair_: The fate of life is to cycle, and your lives are no exception. I won't mourn our parting, for I know that we'll meet again in time.

Omnis, Prime Okami.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Return 2 other allied cards to your hand. Summon X Okami. X equals the number of cards returned.
Whenever an allied Okami comes into play, give it Rush.
Omnis, Prime Okami.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Whenever an allied Okami comes into play, give it Rush.
Omnis, Prime Okami.baseFlair_: Where he treads, the earth blooms; where he bays, there is life. This is how the forest began. He—the steward of the primal forest—is nothing less than the cycle of life and rebirth. —Elder Lore, "Forest Beginnings"
Omnis, Prime Okami.evoFlair_: The earth in time withered again, and his life in time ended. It was a new genesis for all. Even should the earth wilt, life and rebirth cycle for all eternity. —Elder Lore, "Forest Endings"

Lymaga, Forest Champion.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand. Put a 7-play point Lymaga, Forest Champion (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Storm.
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if at least 6 allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, invoke this card.
Lymaga, Forest Champion.baseFlair_: Life is a famished beast ravening for nourishment. That is why the law exists. The forest law supports life, like the sturdy trunk of a tree. You must understand that freedom is but a sweet poison.
Lymaga, Forest Champion.evoFlair_: The law is as ivy, as thorns. It is troublesome to be bound by, painful to be stuck by. But if you are to live in this forest, it cannot be avoided. You must understand that freedom is but a sweet poison.

Damian, Drillarm Brawler.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any other Machina cards were played this turn, gain Storm.
Strike: Deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of allied Machina followers in play.
Damian, Drillarm Brawler.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of allied Machina followers in play.
Damian, Drillarm Brawler.baseFlair_: Spin the helix, and the dead hand of time will spin with it. The forest will know the coming changes, no matter how small or apparent. One more rotation toward progress, guided by my drill. Only I can bore through to tomorrow.
Damian, Drillarm Brawler.evoFlair_: The land howls in agony, having been awoken by a fool trying to bore through its crust. Seas rise up, gales tear through trees, volcanoes send lava rushing onto the battlefield. The struggle between the earth and the drill has begun.

Homecoming.baseEffect_: Return all followers to the players' hands.
Homecoming.baseFlair_: Return to where you belong—to the one who gave you life.

Forest Giant.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
Forest Giant.baseFlair_: A young giant was separated from his herd and raised in the grace of the great trees until one day he found he'd become the forest's watchman. He now carries a staff cut from his mother tree and pulverizes invaders with a single blow.
Forest Giant.evoFlair_: Routed by the giant, the invaders roused a band of soldiers to counterattack. But the giant, a friend of the forest, was aided by enough animals to overcome the militia. With his trusted friends, the giant turned back the trespassers once more.

Owlbear.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Give -1/-0 to all enemy followers if Ambush is active for this follower.
Owlbear.baseFlair_: It was the soft crunch of a bear's footsteps. The hunter's practiced ears recognized it as he retreated into the shadows. A bear is to be left alone. That is, if it was a bear, of course.
Owlbear.evoFlair_: It certainly was the crunch of a bear's footsteps. However, its eyes gleam with the shrewdness of a bird of prey. Whether in the dead of night or light of day, those eyes astutely take their next target.

Ancient Forest Dragon.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
Ancient Forest Dragon.baseFlair_: An ancient dragon who has stood guard over the forest since time immemorial. It has bestowed its love on the fairies so as to protect the harmony of the woods.
Ancient Forest Dragon.evoFlair_: The old dragon knows every twig and root of the forest, and it speaks the wisdom of the woods themselves. The fairies gather in the moonlight to hear its words.

Rose Queen.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Transform each Fairy in your hand into a Thorn Burst.
Rose Queen.baseFlair_: See the roses blooming? The deep red petals beckon to you. Such an intoxicating color. Can the pulsing crimson within you resist? Even knowing the thorns will wound you, you still come. How sad you are.
Rose Queen.evoFlair_: See us grow so beautifully, proud, and unhindered? We only want to be beautiful—and if you would mar us, expect no mercy. I'll teach you that you have no right to pluck a flower that grows only to be beautiful.

White Wolf of Eldwood.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Forestcraft cards (excluding White Wolf of Eldwood) from your deck into your hand at the start of your next turn. Change its cost to 0.
White Wolf of Eldwood.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Forestcraft cards (excluding White Wolf of Eldwood) from your deck into your hand at the start of your next turn. Change its cost to 0.
White Wolf of Eldwood.baseFlair_: A lupine god referred to as the sage of the forest. This beast provided wisdom to an ancient dragon, which knew only how to rule tyrannically, and conveyed orders to protect the forest.
White Wolf of Eldwood.evoFlair_: A lupine god who confronts intruders from the outside world. Until the guardian dragon awakens, the wolf will lead the woodland forces against all who would disrupt the forest's harmony.

Deepwood Anomaly.baseEffect_: Leader Strike: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 0.
Deepwood Anomaly.evoEffect_: Leader Strike: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 0.
Deepwood Anomaly.baseFlair_: It suddenly appeared in the darkest depths of the forest and silently began its inexorable invasion of the surrounding land. The sounds of the trees fracturing and splintering before it were almost like screams.
Deepwood Anomaly.evoFlair_: From deep within its own insides, it dragged out a great and terrible spear. With a bellow that shook the trees to their very roots, it proclaimed the end of the forest.

Bab'zz, Hornet Queen.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Hornet Warriors.
Whenever an allied Hornet Warrior attacks the enemy leader, put a Hornet Sting into your hand.
Bab'zz, Hornet Queen.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Hornet Warrior attacks the enemy leader, put a Hornet Sting into your hand.
Bab'zz, Hornet Queen.baseFlair_:
The hornet queen lounges on her throne, the power of ten thousand drones loosely grasped in her idle hands.
"Ah, I'm so bored. Can't I just dissolve it all?"
With but a twitch of those sticky fingers, she could end the world by sundown.
Bab'zz, Hornet Queen.evoFlair_:
Sticky with nectar, the hornet queen sprawls over her throne and yawns.
"Ah, so sleepy... Maybe I'll dissolve the world tomorrow."
She sleeps, and the world sees another dawn.

Lord of the Vajano Marsh.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever an effect returns 1 or more cards to a player's hand, deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals 2 times the number of cards that left play. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Lord of the Vajano Marsh.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Evolve: Return an enemy follower to the opponent's hand.
Lord of the Vajano Marsh.baseFlair_: Contained within the Vajano Marsh is a murky pool, as fetid as it is deep. Below the surface of this abyss is where the mad lord of the forest resides. Those who enter his waters become his playthings, and whether they walk away or drown, it's purely his whim.
Lord of the Vajano Marsh.evoFlair_: When did his reign begin, and how long will it last? A lord lost forever to isolation, he searches for a companion. If he should ever hear the telltale signs of a plaything escaping beyond his grasp, the resulting howl would rattle the surrounding woodlands.

Sky Devouring Horror.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if at least 7 cards were played this turn, gain +7/+7. (This follower must be in your hand for this effect to activate.)
----------
Storm.
Sky Devouring Horror.baseFlair_:
The forest is merciful and amiable—its generosity welcomes all forms of life. However, sometimes such kindness takes after foolishness.
—Stolen Verdant, Chapter 3
Sky Devouring Horror.evoFlair_:
It is ruthless without mercy—a hateful being despising all forms of life. From the virtuous to the foolish, it devours all.
—Stolen Verdant, Chapter 10

Primal Giant.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Restore 4 defense to your leader.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly summon copies of allied Forestcraft followers of different costs (excluding Primal Giant) destroyed during this match until your area is full.
When this follower leaves play, randomly summon copies of allied Forestcraft followers of different costs (excluding Primal Giant) destroyed during this match until your area is full. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
Primal Giant.evoEffect_:
Ward.
When this follower leaves play, randomly summon copies of allied Forestcraft followers of different costs (excluding Primal Giant) destroyed during this match until your area is full. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
Primal Giant.baseFlair_:
A flower blooms, wilts, and, given enough time, sprouts anew. Why? Because the earth remembers that flower. So we, too, are born, die, travel through the memories of the earth, and are reborn.
—Oral Traditions of the Forest
Primal Giant.evoFlair_: Scouts and monsters thought to be dead returned as an attacking mob. I remain unaware of the cause or mechanism of their return, a failure in my research. But I am calling off this experiment. That forest ... is too unsettling. —Research notes regarding a certain forest

Silver Bolt.baseEffect_: Draw a card. Then deal X damage to an enemy. X equals the number of other cards in your hand.
Silver Bolt.baseFlair_: Go, my silver; cleanse this green land of evil.

King Elephant.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Return all other allied followers to your hand. Then, gain +1/+1 for each card in your hand.
Ignore Ward.
King Elephant.baseFlair_: Those who possess language bring forth something from nothing. Through conversation, negotiation, and resolution, the something is given a name. However those who do not possess language return the something to nothing through howling, mauling, and destroying.
King Elephant.evoFlair_: Humans are animals that developed through language. They are therefore powerless against those who cannot speak. This creature's roars burst eardrums, and his assault rends flesh. Man can do nothing but fear the coming of nature's purge.

Izudia, Omen of Unkilling.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the enemy leader's maximum defense to 6.
Izudia, Omen of Unkilling.baseFlair_: I have led a life unwithering—burgeoning, as it were. This way of being is the core of existence. Therefore fear not ruin; one must merely endure eternity. Now, shall we put the world to trial?
Izudia, Omen of Unkilling.evoFlair_: Pass through the gates of heaven or plunge into the abyss of hell, you will suffer. Your tears will burn your cheeks; your screams will rend your throat. The world will continue, tormented by eternity and cursed with perpetuity. Now, shall we put the world to trial?

Awakened Gaia.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if at least 4 cards were played this turn, subtract 4 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: If at least 4 other cards were played this turn, destroy 4 random enemy followers.
Awakened Gaia.baseFlair_: Only the forest folk realize the land is asleep. But there's no soul, not even one connected to nature, who can predict what will happen when it awakens.
Awakened Gaia.evoFlair_:
To reject progress, to refuse change... It's akin to death. I will pierce through anything that aims to obstruct advancement. Whether that seems blasphemous or reckless, I care not—it's all the same to my drill.
—Damian, Drillarm Brawler

Evyn, Novice Agent.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Evyn, Novice Agent.baseFlair_: Countless traps and snares, and all eyes on the lookout... Wait, whoa! I think I stepped on a trap... Oh geez, I've been compromised already!
Evyn, Novice Agent.evoFlair_: I can still turn this around! I just gotta stay cool and collected—everything's clear to me now! Sorry to keep you waiting, Dei! I'll show you what I'm really capable of now!

Veiled Reckoning.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
Put an Assassin into your hand.
Veiled Reckoning.baseFlair_: I am the night's shadow—not even the moonlight reaches my flesh.

Erika's Sleight.baseFlair_: I'll join the fight. These hands are stained with blood; they can't ever be scrubbed clean. But I won't stay stuck in the past. I need to move on—and take back my future.

Mistolina's Swordplay.baseEffect_: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower.
Mistolina's Swordplay.baseFlair_: I do suppose it is my turn to leap into the fray! I may not be clever, and I certainly am not one to give inspiring speeches... But, at the very least, I know when to fight!

Bayleon's Command.baseFlair_: I shall fight. I was foolish and ignorant—a ruler who didn't know the truth. But to my people, I am still a guiding light. I am the Forest King. And I will waver no longer. To arms!

Everlasting Castle.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Use X play points to put a random follower that costs X play points from your deck into play. X equals your remaining play points.
At the end of your turn, if it is your tenth turn or later, summon a Steelclad Knight.
Everlasting Castle.baseFlair_: A castle snuffs out the flames of war. A soldier snuffs out sorrow.

Quickblader.baseFlair_: Let's speed things up! I ain't got all day to wait for you to get good.
Quickblader.evoFlair_: You didn't seriously think surrounding me was gonna work, did you? I got news for you then—this next part isn't gonna go well for you either.

Ninja Trainee.baseFlair_: Any of you bums lookin' to mess with our village, you gotta go through me. Hey! Who just called me a runt! You lookin' to get a shuriken to the hea—Wait! Don't move!
Ninja Trainee.evoFlair_: To all the bums lookin' to swindle our village, hop on outta here, 'cause me and my frog-style ninja skills say different. Now who just called me a toad? Show yourself!

Vanguard.baseFlair_: A true warrior always leads the charge.
Vanguard.evoFlair_: A true warrior always cuts off the enemy's retreat.

Wolf Fang Swordsman.baseFlair_: One day, the rest of the pack will accept me as one of their own. There's no way I can lose here! Focus... I have to give it my all!
Wolf Fang Swordsman.evoFlair_: One day, I'll fight alongside the rest of the pack. I just need to prove myself! Focus... Victory is near. I can feel it!

Axe Princess.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a card using its Enhance effect, draw a card.
Axe Princess.baseFlair_: I could never get into princess stuff. Everything's so hoity toity, so prim and proper. It just wasn't for me. But here, now, here I can lend a hand.
Axe Princess.evoFlair_: I just can't bring myself to care about the small stuff. I was never good at dancing or knitting. But cleaving things in two? Now that's where I excel!

Lounes, Levin Apprentice.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain +0/+1 for each Levin card in your hand.
Enhance (3): Can attack 2 times per turn.
Lounes, Levin Apprentice.baseFlair_:
Into the melee at lightning speed!
Look at me! I'm going to beat 'em up! Tah-ha! Eat lightning... Aaaah! I-I zapped myself!
Lounes, Levin Apprentice.evoFlair_:
Rule 1. Make a cool entrance like Captain Albert!
Rule 2. Beat up the Sky Knight's enemies with lightning!
Rule 3. Be careful not to zap yourself!
—Lounes's Research Notes, "Practical Maxims"

Knight.baseFlair_: I have chosen the way of the sword because there are things and people I wish to protect. Well, friend? Why have you chosen this path?
Knight.evoFlair_: I have chosen the way of the sword because there are people and things I wish to protect. I wish to create a world where people coexist in harmony. It is sorrow I wish to destroy, not life.

Heavy Knight.baseFlair_: We're surrounded? Heh-heh! Wonderful! We'll take them all out in one go!
Heavy Knight.evoFlair_: What! Is that all you've got? Very well. Now it's my turn.

Shield Guardian.baseFlair_: With this slab of shield, arrows will never reach me!
Shield Guardian.evoFlair_: My brawn and my shield stop magic cold!

Sellsword Lucius.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Destroy an enemy follower.
Sellsword Lucius.baseFlair_: After all these years honing my swordsmanship on goblins, I should be prepared for the battlefield. Despite that, swinging my blade against fellow humans still doesn't feel right.
Sellsword Lucius.evoFlair_: A life lived by the sword isn't such an unpleasant prospect. There are still opponents out there with swords worth crossing.

Ernesta, Weapons Hawker.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Rally (10) - Put a Dread Hound into your hand.
Ernesta, Weapons Hawker.baseFlair_: Taking up arms constitutes a silent pact. The moment a weapon is in your hand, you've made your intentions clear. But if you insist, I'll happily keep my end of the bargain.
Ernesta, Weapons Hawker.evoFlair_: The agreement is everything to a dealer. The terms and conditions, the parties involved—everything is executed exactly as stated. I suppose you've learned the hard way that it's best to read the fine print before you sign, hmm?

Dread Hound.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Ward.
Fanfare: Give a random allied Ernesta, Weapons Hawker Last Words - Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
Dread Hound.baseFlair_:
Hear that snarl? It's your one—and only—warning to back down. Try to lay a finger on me, and you'll be lucky if that's all you lose. Yes, this darling creature embodies everything I find ideal in a weapon.
—Ernesta, Weapons Hawker
Dread Hound.evoFlair_:
If everyone had a weapon, everyone would be afraid to use them. I'd call that an effective deterrent to violence, not unlike our stalemate here.
—Ernesta, Weapons Hawker

Perseus.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if there are at least 4 allied Swordcraft followers in play.
Perseus.baseFlair_: Am I a god or a man? It's all the same to me! I'll become a legend and people will sing my praises!
Perseus.evoFlair_: I'll overcome any trial! I'll take out any tribulation! My legend begins here—get ready to sing my praises!

Rapier Master.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (2) - Gain +1/+1.
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain +1/+1 more and Bane.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +1/+1 more and Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain +1/+1 more and Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Gain +1/+1 more.
Rapier Master.baseFlair_: You're a ragged lot, all caked in mud and dust. Swords should be wielded with elegance. Watch and learn!
Rapier Master.evoFlair_: What an utter disgrace you are. But take heart. This blade of mine will put an elegant end to your vulgar existence!

Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (3) - Gain +2/+0 and Rush.
Last Words: If it is your turn, give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn, summon a Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade, evolve it, then remove this effect.
Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade.evoEffect_: Strike: Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade.baseFlair_: I have drawn my blade from the scabbard called peace. We samurai have an obligation to make use of our skill. With this sword, I will cut down my enemies. That is the sole reason I exist.
Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade.evoFlair_: It is a disgrace for a samurai's blade to rust atop the tatami mat. Conversely, it is honorable for it to break upon the battlefield. Therefore, I will fight; I will cut down my enemies. That is the sole reason I exist.

Otohime's Bodyguard.baseFlair_: I didn't think they'd let someone as tiny as me guard, but it turns out that Otohime can't stand to be around people taller than her!
Otohime's Bodyguard.evoFlair_: What'll happen if I grow taller than Otohime? Don't tell me I'll get kicked out! Well, for the time I'm here I'll do everything I can to protect her.

Nano, the Dawnblade.baseFlair_: I understand how you feel, Lecia. You're scared of seeing people get hurt, and you want to run away. Your heart is filled with pain... But you accept everything and continue moving forward! And because of all that, I choose to believe in you and lend you my power!
Nano, the Dawnblade.evoFlair_: I am only kind because your heart is kind, Lecia. And my power only shines because your power shines as well. I offer you the full power of the Dawnblade! As long as we're together, we have nothing to fear!

Unbridled Fury.baseEffect_: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.

Mentor's Teachings.baseEffect_:
Give a follower +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Draw a card.
Mentor's Teachings.baseFlair_: My precious child. May you always have both the strength to survive in this cruel world and the kindness to protect your allies from its evils.

Grand Auction.baseEffect_:
Discard a card from your hand.
Draw a card.
Put an Ageworn Weaponry into your hand.
Grand Auction.baseFlair_: As sparks fly between buyers and sellers, prices rise and fall like the tides of battle. But, then again, all's fair in love, war, and commerce.

Pompous Summons.baseEffect_:
Put a random Swordcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
Rally (10): Put 2 random Swordcraft followers into your hand instead.
Pompous Summons.baseFlair_: "Her Royal Highness never orders us to do anything." A gaunt soldier stumbles out of the throne room, eyes hollowed with exhaustion. "She just makes a lot of... requests."

Gilded Blade.baseEffect_: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Gilded Blade.baseFlair_: A dagger once passed down through a royal family—now little more than a bandit's negotiation implement.

Gilded Goblet.baseFlair_: A chalice once prized by a famed general—now little more than a bandit's flask.

Gilded Boots.baseEffect_: Give Rush to an allied follower.
Gilded Boots.baseFlair_: A pair of shoes crafted by expert hands—now little more than a bandit's house slippers.

Gilded Necklace.baseFlair_: A necklace once adored by a noblewoman—now little more than the string for a bandit's idle cat's cradle.

Accolade.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower Clash: Draw a card.
Change that follower into a Commander follower if they are an Officer follower.
Accolade.baseFlair_: A good man hopes for justice, a knight upholds it. You knelt a man, now rise a knight.

King's Welcome.baseEffect_:
Put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, subtract 1 from that card's cost. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
King's Welcome.baseFlair_: One naturally expects a certain amount of honor from those who have won distinction in battle. Let honor be our guiding light. There's nothing that will keep our spirits higher in battle! —Splendid Fencer

Tempered Aether.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Tempered Aether.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the troop discovered her kindness on the battlefield, they saw a wild, valiant aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who seek savage strength.

Grand Acquisition.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Enhance (6): Put 1 of each into your hand instead and recover 6 play points.
Grand Acquisition.baseFlair_:
He's just like a merchant who's come to buy goods. He evaluates each and every item and takes the ones that strike his fancy. The only difference is, he doesn't pay.
—Imperial castle guard

Fatal Spellbomb.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
Fatal Spellbomb.baseFlair_: This is what they call dirty payback for dirty deeds. —Valse, Magical Marksman

Chromatic Duel.baseEffect_:
