Avant Blader.evoFlair_: Your armor can't stop this sword! Consider yourself warned if you'd stand in my way!

Tristan of the Round Table.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied Commander follower is in play, gain Last Words: Summon a Tristan of the Round Table.
Tristan of the Round Table.baseFlair_: As a Knight of the Round Table, I have a duty to fulfill, and I will allow nothing to stop me from seeing it done. Never will I forget that there is a place for me waiting by her side!
Tristan of the Round Table.evoFlair_: The quiet pain in my chest... my thirst for everything you are... All must be suppressed to fulfill my knightly duty. I must aid my king in building his regal paradise!

Kunoichi Master.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Summon a Kunoichi Trainee.
Kunoichi Master.baseFlair_: If you try to harm my liege, then I'll serve as your adversary. I've come from the darkness to take your lives!
Kunoichi Master.evoFlair_: My life exists for the sake of my liege. I'll dispatch any of his enemies!

Pollux.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Evolve this follower if there is an allied non-Swordcraft follower in play.
Pollux.baseFlair_: Next I shall sing your praises, Castor! Brilliant horseman, superb tactician—an unlucky arrow sent you to Hades, your sublimity untarnished.
Pollux.evoFlair_: Even though we're separated by that infernal place, we're still brothers and compatriots. My song for you ascends the heavens and reaches the gods, becoming a star whose light will never fade.

Castle Guardian.baseFlair_: My liege, are you unharmed? Rest assured, your safety is of utmost importance.
Castle Guardian.evoFlair_: My liege, are you unharmed? Fear not, we shan't let a single shred of harm touch you.

Levin Scholar.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Levin cards (excluding Levin Scholar) from your deck into your hand.
Levin Scholar.baseFlair_: Sigh... Mysterious ruins are always such a head-splitting challenge. But if it's arithmetic prowess you seek, I'd be glad to be of assistance. All calculations are, in essence, puzzles. And every puzzle has an answer. I won't disappoint.
Levin Scholar.evoFlair_: Very well, I promise to give every puzzle my all... Actually, hm... What an unexpected turn of events. I can't read a single word.

Strikelance Knight.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied Commander card is in play, evolve this follower.
Strikelance Knight.baseFlair_: The way I see it, one soldier is both a force unto herself and part of a greater force. Many of our brethren have paved the way, so that someone might deal the foe a crushing blow. If I'm chosen to be the spearhead, my victory will be your victory as well.
Strikelance Knight.evoFlair_: Oh, glorious day. I've been chosen to carry the hopes of my comrades. But please, don't forget: the reason my lance can deal this final blow is because you, my brothers and sisters in arms, have pierced a path to victory.

Percival.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Officer followers in play.
Percival.baseFlair_: Let resolve be my sword, virtue my guide. And may this cursed blood that courses through my veins never succeed in seeing me fall from grace.
Percival.evoFlair_: I have proved myself as a knight. Now crimson-draped with Holy Lance in hand, I seek the Holy Grail. I will see my desires come true, and I will bring glory to my king!

Noble Knight.baseFlair_: Reinforcements, when called upon, serve one purpose: turning the tide of battle! Come, comrades, our time is now!
Noble Knight.evoFlair_: We shall show you no quarter, vile beasts. Step aside now, or face certain doom where you stand!

Monika, Cloudhall Admiral.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
Monika, Cloudhall Admiral.baseFlair_: Don't be fooled by my appearance. I'm a seasoned officer tempered in the fires of battle! Now, my proud warriors, take to the skies with me!
Monika, Cloudhall Admiral.evoFlair_: With this sword, I'll fight for the people of Valeria... Hey! Quit patting my head! I'm an airship admiral, so show a little respect!

Luminous Mage.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Luminous Knight.
Can evolve an allied Commander follower each turn for 0 evolution points until this follower leaves play.
Luminous Mage.evoEffect_: Can evolve an allied Commander follower each turn for 0 evolution points until this follower leaves play.
Luminous Mage.baseFlair_: To end this age of darkness, we sacrificed our names. Now advance, knight, until this world at last knows peace.
Luminous Mage.evoFlair_: Ours is the magic of light infused with the prayers of the people and the wishes of those who fight beside us. And we shall turn the power of hope to light!

Swift Tigress.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, recover 3 play points.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain Storm.
Swift Tigress.baseFlair_:
You fleet-footed felines leap through the air with such fluidity and grace. Your erratic movements confound the enemy! Before they can recover from their confusion, our voices rise in cries of victory!
—Hordes singing the praises of their warrior brethren
Swift Tigress.evoFlair_:
You fleet-footed felines possess bodies that require no rest, allowing you to advance through the most treacherous terrain with ease. March on to new battlefields, and show the enemy your pride as beastfolk!
—Hordes seeing off their warrior brethren

Quickdraw Maven.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, evolve it.
Quickdraw Maven.baseFlair_:
The battles rage on, one after another. The people, the emperor, even the rice fields are exhausted. Eventually the only ones left fighting in the great war are the samurai.
—Ranno Era, Year 4: Changing Times
Quickdraw Maven.evoFlair_:
By the blood of five generations of emperors, along with countless rulers and samurai alike, the long battle finally comes to an end. There is no one left for the samurai to cut down.
—Bunji Era, Year 5: War's End

White Ridge Swordsman.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Ward.
Follower Strike: Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
White Ridge Swordsman.baseFlair_: The sword was embedded within the white ridge for ages until fate entrusted it to one young man. The sword spoke to him, saying, "I am thy blade!"
White Ridge Swordsman.evoFlair_: The young man nodded, and the white ridge blade shone. Having revealed its true form, it began to speak: "I am thy blade, and thou art my comrade! I shall bring you victory!"

Sky Gladiator.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, that follower can't be attacked.
Sky Gladiator.baseFlair_: If you desire wings, sacrifice your possessions. Free yourself from will and reason, for they are irrelevant in the skies. —Next Generation Warfare, Chapter 1
Sky Gladiator.evoFlair_: Recognize the sky not only as a home for birds, but as a new realm of battle. If you desire victory, find the path and take wing to the skies as a single blade. —Next Generation Warfare, Chapter 2

Apostle of Usurpation.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy. Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Whenever you play a Loot card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Apostle of Usurpation.evoEffect_: Whenever you play a Loot card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Apostle of Usurpation.baseFlair_: Take and take again. Do not return until the wealth of this world is back in its proper pocket. Seize everything, leave nothing.
Apostle of Usurpation.evoFlair_:
The Third Step: Uproot
The world is full of profiteering thieves and absurd moguls. Steal the soil beneath them, so not a single sprout may take root.
—Teachings of the Usurping Thief

Giantsbane Swordsman.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 6 attack.
Giantsbane Swordsman.baseFlair_: I carry a giant sword to fell giant foes. How else would I cut down gods and dragons alike? It is the ambition of every swordsman to learn such technique.
Giantsbane Swordsman.evoFlair_: I fell giant foes to make my name giant. Why else would I cut down good and evil alike? It is the desire of every swordsman to achieve such superiority.

Vane, Indomitable Knight.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0 and restore 3 defense to this follower.
Vane, Indomitable Knight.baseFlair_: Lancelot, captain of the Order of the White Dragons, has been my best bud since we were little. Yeah... Lancey's really amazing—he's no ordinary childhood friend!
Vane, Indomitable Knight.evoFlair_: Of course I worry about stuff! Right now I want to get as good as Lancey so we can fight side by side as equals... I've still got a long way to go though!

Siegfried, Dragonslayer.baseFlair_: I pledged this sword to my country. No matter how my honor is besmirched, I cannot falter in keeping my vow!
Siegfried, Dragonslayer.evoFlair_: This sword slayed the great dragon—do not presume you'll escape it so easily. Now, time to meet your end!

Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Gain +1/+1 if an allied Vane, Indomitable Knight is in play.
Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy.baseFlair_: I've been handed a royal decree from the king to seek knowledge that will benefit our country, but I don't even know where to begin... I think I'll start by observing other lands.
Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy.evoFlair_: There must be something I can do for the people of this kingdom... but what? What should a knight protect? That's the question I have to answer.

Percival, Lord of Flames.baseEffect_:
Gain Rush while an allied Siegfried, Dragonslayer is in play.
Strike: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
Percival, Lord of Flames.baseFlair_: Humph. Plebian riff-raff like this dares to stand in my way to royalty? What insolence. We shall conquer them, vassal! Follow my lead!
Percival, Lord of Flames.evoFlair_: I want to build a land without war, where even the powerless can live in peace. To do that, I'll need superlative vassals. Captain, won't you aid me?

Aurelia, Regal Saber.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 for each enemy follower in play. If there are at least 3, gain resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
Aurelia, Regal Saber.baseFlair_: She descended upon the chaotic battlefield, a pristine white flower against the darkness. As her ivory blade danced, the wicked fell before her.
Aurelia, Regal Saber.evoFlair_: As a blossom bosoms its precious nectar, so too the knight did shield her wards from harm. As a lady of grace so easily ensnares the gaze of onlookers, so too the flash of the knight's blade did bedazzle her foes.

Albert, Levin Saber.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Can attack 2 times per turn. Reduce damage to 0 until the end of the turn.
Albert, Levin Saber.baseFlair_: From this day forth, our order will be known as the Sky Knights! May justice and honor forever be our comrades in arms!
Albert, Levin Saber.evoFlair_: We brandish our swords to uphold order and to thwart the forces of cruelty and chaos. Let us ride like lightning, my brothers and sisters!

Barbarossa.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Barbarossa into your hand. Change its cost to 8 if there are 2 enemy followers or less in play. Change its cost to 2 instead if there are 3 enemy followers or more in play.
Barbarossa.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a Barbarossa into your hand. Change its cost to 8 if there are 2 enemy followers or less in play. Change its cost to 2 instead if there are 3 enemy followers or more in play.
Barbarossa.baseFlair_: His beard, crimson like an inferno. His advance, furious like the flames. The people call him the red-bearded king. He is an immortal hero who aids an imperiled kingdom.
Barbarossa.evoFlair_: His blades, silver and shining, cut through the flaming dervish of the battlefield. For great prosperity, and for the people's peace, he continues to reign in red-bearded glory.

Magnolia, Battlefield Muse.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Officer followers.
Magnolia, Battlefield Muse.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a random 1-play point and 2-play point follower from your deck into play.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Officer followers.
Magnolia, Battlefield Muse.baseFlair_: My valiant soldiers, let my song be the wind at your backs, spurring you on to glory! Be steadfast and never hesitate! Charge!
Magnolia, Battlefield Muse.evoFlair_: My voice shall bolster your fighting spirit and salve your wounds. Thus armed, any one of you is a hero worth a thousand swords! One more march and you shall hear my victory hymn. Onward to glory!

Swordflash Panther.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, reveal it. Then give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
Fanfare: Evolve another allied follower whose attack or defense has been increased by a spell or effect. Evolve effects will not activate for that follower.
Swordflash Panther.baseFlair_: His most impressive feature is that eye of his. Sure, he can read the battlefield like an open book—but that's common enough for all master swordsmen. No, he's got an eye for talent, able to transform those who haven't reached their full potential into true warriors.
Swordflash Panther.evoFlair_: Sometimes gossip circles about him: "Is that so-called master actually any good with a blade? I bet he's all talk." I advise those rumormongers to laugh while they still can. His true ability is fearsome; his strikes are but flashes of lightning to the untrained eye.

Albert, Levin Champion.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Randomly put different Levin followers (excluding Albert, Levin Champion) from your deck into play until your area is full.
Strike: Gain +1/+0 if another allied Levin card is in play.
Albert, Levin Champion.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Gain +1/+0 if another allied Levin card is in play.
Albert, Levin Champion.baseFlair_: A not-yet-champion was born into tragedy. Together with his comrades, he learned the strength of banding together. He reaches out an arm: "Devotion is our power. Into the melee at lightning speed!"
Albert, Levin Champion.evoFlair_:
Though he cannot forgive his own sins, he excuses those of others. A frozen heart, a burning pain.
"This tragedy will not happen again—not so long as I have a hand in things!"

Luxblade Arriet.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 1 allied follower has evolved this match, gain Ward.
Then, if at least 3 have evolved, recover 3 play points.
Then, if at least 5 have evolved, restore 5 defense to your leader.
Then, if at least 7 have evolved, draw cards until there are 7 cards in your hand.
Luxblade Arriet.baseFlair_: Hehe. Are you surprised by my appearance? Right now I'm not the chosen harpist of the gods... I'm an ordinary warrior who fights alongside the people! I'll play for you a song of courage!
Luxblade Arriet.evoFlair_: Rather than merely playing my harp from paradise, I want to join with the people to create a new paradise! A mournful melody isn't befitting of a bright future. Come, let the melody of courage resound!

Grayson, Rocket Blader.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, reveal it and give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever an allied Machina follower comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Rush.
----------
Rush.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied Machina follower attacks an enemy follower during your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Grayson, Rocket Blader.baseFlair_: Relying on the brute strength of a single soldier, what an archaic strategy. These days heroes are made on the assembly line. Can you argue with such convenience? No. You can't. Now come—let us reactivate our future legend!
Grayson, Rocket Blader.evoFlair_:
Harumph... To trust numbers alone—a foolish notion, that. Shave it down to the core and what's left? Hordes of listless troops? If you won't heed my question, then perhaps the business end of my spear will convince you.
—Patrick, Rhiceros Knight

Amelia, the Silverflash.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Officer followers from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (7): Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Amelia, the Silverflash.evoEffect_: Evolve: Until the end of the turn, subtract 3 from the cost of an Officer follower in your hand.
Amelia, the Silverflash.baseFlair_: One cultivates kindness to protect their friends. One cultivates strength to survive. That's what my father taught me, and I will never forget his words! No matter the despair I face, I will cut it in twain with a flash of my silver blade!
Amelia, the Silverflash.evoFlair_: Leave your tears in the past and your promises for the grave. That's what he told me, so I won't hang my head any longer. I'll look forward and keep going. Not just for myself—but for everyone who's believed in me so far!

Celia, Hope's Strategist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Shield Guardian and a Heavy Knight.
Celia, Hope's Strategist.baseFlair_: Even in the most despair-filled battle, my strategies will come through. Here and now, I vow fresh hope and victory!
Celia, Hope's Strategist.evoFlair_: When your hearts are dyed in hope, any hardship can be overcome. All right, victory's in sight! Let's win this battle!

Celia, Despair's Messenger.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 for each other allied follower in play. Then return all other allied followers to your hand.
Celia, Despair's Messenger.baseFlair_: I'll use my power to make this world of hope writhe. Here and now, I vow fresh despair and defeat!
Celia, Despair's Messenger.evoFlair_: When your hearts are dyed in despair, the world will fill with pain. And you will be defeated. Let's end this battle!

Onslaught.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Summon a Knight if an allied Commander card is in play.
Onslaught.baseFlair_: The keen edge that cleaves the enemy lines in two.

Unsheathed Blade.baseEffect_: Put a Swordcraft follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush, and return it to your hand at the end of your turn.
Unsheathed Blade.baseFlair_: A quick flash. Cry of the steel hanging in the air. A head tumbles to the ground before its owner realizes what's happened.

Dualblade Flurry.baseEffect_: Give Rush to an allied follower. That follower can attack 2 times per turn.
Dualblade Flurry.baseFlair_: Who needs a shield? Can't even cut anything with it. —Dualblade User

Cyclone Blade.baseEffect_: Select an allied follower and deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the attack of the chosen follower.
Cyclone Blade.baseFlair_: Foes? Allies? Stop talking nonsense! On the field of battle, I don't need anyone but myself!

Dance of Usurpation.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Dance of Usurpation.baseFlair_: If stealing everything they own can't satisfy you, steal even the void that's left behind. Leave not even the sensation of nothingness.

Holy Purebomb.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
Holy Purebomb.baseFlair_: Well, you'll live well in the next world. —Valse, Magical Marksman

Council of Card Knights.baseEffect_: Summon a Club Soldier, a Heart Guardian, and a Spade Raider.
Council of Card Knights.baseFlair_: They say the diamonds fellow slipped up and got his head chopped off.

Round Table Assembly.baseEffect_: Put 2 random Commanders that cost 3 play points from your deck into play.
Round Table Assembly.baseFlair_: It is where twelve heroes sit, all of them brave men of distinguished military service. It is the heart of the kingdom—if not the very world. It is the round table. —Knights of the Round Table, Chapter 3

Dragon Knights.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon 1 of the following followers.
-Vane, Indomitable Knight
-Siegfried, Dragonslayer
-Lancelot, Twinfang Prodigy
-Percival, Lord of Flames
Enhance (8): Choose 2 instead.
Dragon Knights.baseFlair_: For country. For comrades. For dreams. For honor. With an unyielding conviction and dignity beating in their hearts, four knights assume a destiny most noble. In the name of justice and those they wish to protect, they wield their blades.

Twilight Blade.baseFlair_: Darkness of despair, begone! Twilight Blade! —Lecia and Nano

Arthurian Light.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point comes into play, give it Storm.
At the start of your turn, summon a Knight.
Arthurian Light.baseFlair_: Follow the point of his sword off into the distance to where the promised land lies.

Support Cannon.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Commander follower comes into play, deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the attack of the Commander. If there are no enemy followers in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead.
Support Cannon.baseFlair_: Target sighted! Ready the cannon! Fire! —Captain Lecia

Soldier's Vow.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a Commander follower, put a random Officer follower that costs X play points from your deck into play. X equals the original cost of that Commander follower.
Soldier's Vow.baseFlair_: Loyalty as strong as steel, forged into a blade to strike down sorrow.

Warbound Cavalier.baseFlair_: Reinforcements swept down, not a hoof to be heard. Under a storm of beating wings, the tables soon turned.
Warbound Cavalier.evoFlair_: From parts unknown the winged auxiliary soared. Soon its braying led the cheers of victory.

Admiral.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to an allied Officer follower.
Admiral.baseFlair_: Massaging the egos of your men will only bring you grief. You there! Don't just stand around! An instant of laziness like that in battle and you're a goner!
Admiral.evoFlair_: Listen up and listen well, men! Lack of concentration is the first step to a watery grave! Focus on the task at hand, and see that your enemy beats you to the bottom!

Swordwhip Maid.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if an allied Commander card is in play.
Swordwhip Maid.baseFlair_: You have nothing to worry about, my dear master. Once they tangle with me, the fiends in pursuit will run for cover.
Swordwhip Maid.evoFlair_: To be praised by you is an honor of which I am not worthy, sir. By way of thanks, I'll wield this whip as only I can!

Axe Destroyer.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower or amulet.
Axe Destroyer.baseFlair_: It's not just things you can see that I crush. I also crush the spirits of fools who think they can beat me just because they're men.
Axe Destroyer.evoFlair_: It's the hour of conquest! Your land, your history, and your pride are all about to be crushed!

Petalwink Paladin.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Petalwink Paladin.evoEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Petalwink Paladin.baseFlair_:
"I am the lone rose of the battlefield! I never fail to wink!"
"Eek! It's her!"
"I hear she can fell her foes with one eye closed!"
—Petalwink Paladin and enemy soldiers
Petalwink Paladin.evoFlair_:
"I am the lone rose of the battlefield! I give even my enemies a proper greeting!"
"Eek! We surrendered! Why's she coming this way!"
"Quit waving back at her, you dolt! Retreat! Retreeeat!"
—Petalwink Paladin and enemy soldiers

Sage Commander.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers.
Sage Commander.baseFlair_: Battle awaits, recruits. Fear not what lies ahead, for victory is ours for the taking!
Sage Commander.evoFlair_: Victory is already ours. How can I be so sure, you ask? Simple. Every battle is won or lost before it's ever fought, and this one is no exception.

Jolly Rogers.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly gain Rush, Bane, or Ward.
Jolly Rogers.baseFlair_: Sometimes you lose things, and sometimes you find 'em! But ain't that just how it goes? I got this scary-lookin' hook for instance, so how'd you like to see what this little beauty is all about?
Jolly Rogers.evoFlair_: Me hook is so much better than the hand I lost—and it's finding its targets especially well today. So come and have a taste! I'll send the lot of you to Davy Jones's locker!

Mistolina, Forest Princess.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a Princess's Strike into your hand.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Princess's Strike into your hand. If there are fewer allied followers than enemy followers in play, recover 2 play points.
Mistolina, Forest Princess.baseFlair_:
"I truly believe we can reach the Virtuous Mother."
Forever noble, forever brave...
"So, please. Won't you put down your swords?"
The Princess addresses the radicals, hoping to bring an end to the conflict.
Mistolina, Forest Princess.evoFlair_:
"It is the duty of the Forest Princess to guide the lost."
A tender heart, a steely resolve...
"And she mustn't be stifled by overzealous retainers, mm?"
She fights against the laws of nature to protect the meek.

Sea Queen Otohime.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon Otohime's Bodyguards until your area is full. (An area can hold 5 cards.)
Sea Queen Otohime.baseFlair_: Welcome, dear guest. Rest a while. My home is your home. Oh? Something precious eludes your grasp? Please do tell. Let us discuss how I can aid you.
Sea Queen Otohime.evoFlair_: The nerve! First you hurry a lady, and then you demand she wait while you prepare! Show a little decorum, would you? Excuse me! My voice will be heard, and no, you will not leave me here under any circumstances!

Tsubaki.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 5 attack.
Tsubaki.baseFlair_: A still-raw rancor is to blame for this cursed soul's arrival at the capital gates, and only vengeance for a love betrayed will see her leave.
Tsubaki.evoFlair_: Tears of desperation and her companion's blood lend a dark sheen to her sword. Her enemy will one day learn that her devotion to her cause shines with the same intensity.

Darksaber Melissa.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain -X/+Y. X equals the number of other allied followers in play, and Y equals the number of enemy followers in play.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Darksaber Melissa.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Darksaber Melissa.baseFlair_: Within the flames of battle, dark petals dance—bringing further pain and begetting madness into the world.
Darksaber Melissa.evoFlair_: The vehement black flower wields its blade in search of the strong, taking form as a woman—her dancing silhouette and sword as fast as the wind.

Spartacus.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Transform the Reaper at the bottom of your deck into a Victory Card.
At the end of your turn, put 2 random Officer followers from your deck into your hand.
Spartacus.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, put 2 random Officer followers from your deck into your hand.
Spartacus.baseFlair_: This world is home to those without swords. It is home to those who cannot stand. That is why I am here. I am the sword of the weak, and I act as their courage!
Spartacus.evoFlair_: Who said you cannot battle? Who said you were a coward? Do not worry, for I am here. Raise your sword and your spirits!

Zeta, Crimson Lancer.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Put a Beatrix, Undying Blue into your hand if there is no allied Beatrix, Undying Blue in play or your hand.
Zeta, Crimson Lancer.baseFlair_: Damn it, Bea! Where the hell did you go? Sometimes I think she gets in trouble just for the attention!
Zeta, Crimson Lancer.evoFlair_:
Grrr... Seriously, Bea? You ran off alone and got captured by the enemy again? When this is over, I'm gonna chew your head off!
Spear of Arvess! Show 'em your power!

Ironfist Beast Warrior.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random Swordcraft follower (excluding Ironfist Beast Warrior) from your deck into your hand. Subtract 2 from its cost.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Subtract 9 from its cost instead.
Ironfist Beast Warrior.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give all other allied Swordcraft followers Rush.
Ironfist Beast Warrior.baseFlair_: He may appear different, but his heart is one with his comrades, as is his loyalty to the motherland and his love for its citizens. With a mighty roar, he storms the battlefield.
Ironfist Beast Warrior.evoFlair_: In this fist is naught but pure will—a will to serve the motherland, a will to live with compassion. With a majestic howl, the iron beast storms into battle.

Diamond Paladin.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
During your turn, whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, recover 2 play points and gain the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
Diamond Paladin.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Evolve: Give -4/-0 to an enemy follower.
During your turn, whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, recover 2 play points and gain the ability to attack 2 times this turn.
Diamond Paladin.baseFlair_: I am perfection, flawless beauty personified. But that's not enough. No words can ever do me justice. So, let's finish this battle to perfection—finding a befitting solution is going to take me all night.
Diamond Paladin.evoFlair_: A flawless recon mission, preparations are complete. But that's not enough. Mere victory means nothing to me. So, let's teach them the meaning of utter defeat—only then can I find the last piece to become complete.

Alwida's Command.baseEffect_: Summon a Pirate and a Viking.
Alwida's Command.baseFlair_: All right, you louts! Finish this up!

Koga Kunoichi.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Summon a Koga Kunoichi.
Koga Kunoichi.baseFlair_: If you can't evade my attacks, death is all that's left for you.
Koga Kunoichi.evoFlair_: My bunshin clone is like a shadow, but the pain it inflicts is very real. I'll paint the night red with these twin blades.

Madlance Centaur.baseEffect_:
If this card is discarded, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 4 times.
Madlance Centaur.baseFlair_:
Everything lay in ruins: weapons, soldiers, buildings. That single attack sent all who approached flying.
Everything was laid waste: his body, his heart, his mind. Each swing shredded something deep within him.
Madlance Centaur.evoFlair_:
It was a lance. A single lance.
It was made to pierce, sever, and destroy.
He was a man. A solitary man.
He merely forgot everything but destruction.

Frontguard General.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Fortress Guard.
Frontguard General.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Fortress Guard.
Frontguard General.baseFlair_: What a vicious force! What a savage onslaught! So this is the power of our enemy. I'll just have to hold out until the reinforcements arrive!
Frontguard General.evoFlair_: Even if I fall, my friends will avenge me. I have nothing to fear, so prepare yourselves! I come for you!

Alyaska, Master Dealer.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Select 1 card in your hand and discard the rest. Draw a card for each card you discarded.
Alyaska, Master Dealer.baseFlair_: Death is sacred. Birth is holy. That's why I love the battlefield. It shines bright with miracles! Life and death, chance and fate intertwine in this all-enveloping drama. War is an act of love... That's why I sell arms.
Alyaska, Master Dealer.evoFlair_: The warm glow of burning buildings. The screams. The chorus of friendly fire. The tears of joy and shouts of welcome from the ramparts when the army returns victorious. War is so exquisite—humanity will never outgrow it. Come then! We have miracles to sell!

Azord, Duke of the Mists.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Azord, Duke of the Mists.baseFlair_: All value lies in strength. Weaklings are no more than rubbish. If you wish to defeat me and prove your own worth, you must first show you have what it takes.
Azord, Duke of the Mists.evoFlair_: I see. It seems you are not as foolish and weak as I had assumed. Very well. I shall determine the worth of your neck with my blade.

Honored Frontguard General.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Last Words: Summon a Shield Guardian, and give it +X/+X. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved during this match.
Honored Frontguard General.baseFlair_:
We asked why he fights, why he's stood tall.
"The wicked forces encroaching," he answered while facing their onslaught. "Now watch me clear the way!"
His stance on the battlefield was all the explanation his actions required.
Honored Frontguard General.evoFlair_: Thousands of blades, myriads of arrows, and millions of spells assaulted him. Yet he did not flee or throw his arms in the air. Trusting in his brother-in-arms, he flung aside fear and fought through to the very end. That is why we shout—to say look at these imposing shields.

Roland the Incorruptible.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Summon a Durandal the Incorruptible if there isn't an allied Durandal the Incorruptible in play.
Roland the Incorruptible.baseFlair_: A proud hero in the service of a kingdom destined for glory. She charges across the battlefield, holding her holy sword Durandal high for the sake of her homeland.
Roland the Incorruptible.evoFlair_: Durandal flashes white each time it's brought down, and every shining afterimage it leaves in the air brings further glory to her kingdom.

Arthur, Knight King.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put different Swordcraft followers that cost 2 play points or less from your deck into play until your area is full.
Arthur, Knight King.baseFlair_: The battle went silent as soon as it started. The soldiers unsheathed their blades and raised their shields, all in the name of the Knight King. With the tips of their swords, they seek the promised land.
Arthur, Knight King.evoFlair_: Almost as if predestined, enemies are felled and evil is defeated, all in the name of the Knight King. At the end of their grueling journey, the promised land awaits them.

Blazing Lion Admiral.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if 15 or more allied followers have been destroyed during this match, invoke this card.
Strike: Give all other allied followers +1/+1.
Blazing Lion Admiral.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Give all other allied followers +1/+1.
Blazing Lion Admiral.baseFlair_:
The exhaustion of conflict sucks at an army's boots like muddy ground. When his troops foundered in the swamp of despair, the lionhearted hero stepped forth, clad in flames, and rattled the heavens with his roar:
"Set your despair ablaze. Reduce your enemies to ash!"
Blazing Lion Admiral.evoFlair_: The lion's roar roused his allies and froze his foes. Despair burned away, leaving only the thirst for victory. The balance had been broken. And so they pressed onward to glory. "Pit the fire in your hearts against the foe. Blaze our trail to the future!"

Johann, Ironforged Hero.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied Machina follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Rush.
Whenever another allied Machina follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Johann, Ironforged Hero.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever another allied Machina follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Johann, Ironforged Hero.baseFlair_: A hero emerged that day from among the masses. Despite his imposing appearance, the man who protected the people from the enemy invasion was showered with applause. —Commander's Report, Part 4
Johann, Ironforged Hero.evoFlair_: I am honored to have been presented with such cutting-edge equipment, despite being a mere commoner. I vow to meet everyone's expectations by seizing victory in the next battle.

Alwida, Pirate Queen.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (4): Randomly summon 2 of the following - Cannoneer, Buccaneer, or Marine Raider.
----------
Once on each of your turns, when you play a Loot card, summon a Pirate and Viking.
Alwida, Pirate Queen.evoEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when you play a Loot card, summon a Pirate and Viking.
Alwida, Pirate Queen.baseFlair_: I am the law of the sea! I plunder as I please, show my might, and accept no limits to my seafarin'! I am the queen—she who sees o'er the seas!
Alwida, Pirate Queen.evoFlair_:
"In this world—more'n anyone else—the queen does as she pleases!"
"The cap'n's mighty all right! That why I'm with 'er!"
"Alwida's out of her mind, so we never get bored!" —Alwida's band of pirates

Regal Wildcat.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, give another allied follower +2/+2 and Storm.
Regal Wildcat.baseFlair_: A skilled hawk hides its talons, but a ferocious tiger bares its fangs for all to see. No amount of strategy, artifice, or cunning intimidates the beast, as it only cares about mowing down the enemy.
Regal Wildcat.evoFlair_: The mighty army crumbles, but the wise tiger sharpens its fangs. The beast tears open a formidable stronghold once said to be unconquerable. Though man may know pride, tigers are incapable of such folly.

Patrick, Rhiceros Knight.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Last Words: If it is your turn, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Natura cards that cost X play points or less from your deck into your hand. X equals your remaining play points.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: If there are no other allied followers in play, recover 6 play points.
Patrick, Rhiceros Knight.baseFlair_: Harumph... The crash accomplishes more and more every day. The fruits of my guidance cannot be measured by the naked eye, but no matter. I can see the efforts of my troops, and it is wild perfection. One for the crash and the crash for one!
Patrick, Rhiceros Knight.evoFlair_:
Wow... You still train your troops like that? How traditional, leaving the heavy lifting to a handful of commanders. Isn't our way less complicated? If one of your soldiers fall, just replace them!
—Grayson, Rocket Blader

VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
At the end of your turn, randomly deal X damage to an enemy or another ally and then Y damage to this follower. X equals this follower's attack and Y equals the attack of the follower or leader damaged (leaders have 0 attack). Do this 2 times.
VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot.baseFlair_:
My liege, I'm not your weapon; rather, you are mine.
Chariots may need drivers, but I will hold the reins.
VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot.evoFlair_:
I rampage as I please; my liege can only watch.
My liege, I'm not your weapon; rather, you are mine.

Durandal the Incorruptible.baseEffect_: All allies can't take more than 4 damage at a time from followers, spells, effects and amulets.
Durandal the Incorruptible.baseFlair_: A holy sword bound to a certain proud hero. Its blade will shine for eternity, never to break or tarnish.

King of the Horned Crown.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
King of the Horned Crown.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
King of the Horned Crown.baseFlair_: You stand there without permission—in my territory and so disorderly! If you've come by mistake, be carved; if you've come with purpose, be carved!
King of the Horned Crown.evoFlair_: If you're in my territory, then you belong to me. Aren't you concerned about how I will handle your life? You'll be diced and dead.

Impact Soldier.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Impact Soldier.baseFlair_: He once had a brother who took pride in his strength. That very same brother had his life eaten away by the flames of war. Now, wielding a weapon unintentionally passed on to him, he wades into battle and calmly states, "You're gonna feel the impact."
Impact Soldier.evoFlair_: That boisterous laughter and those cheerful and carefree days have left him. Despite this, he has to continue on, reminding himself, "Lotta fightin' left. But I'm not out here just for me."

Enraged General.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
Enraged General.baseFlair_: You did well to hold out in my absence, but now I have returned, and our victory is assured! The time has come for us to strike back!
Enraged General.evoFlair_: Hear me well, evil creatures. My soldiers have suffered and fallen at your hands, and so I must take your lives in return! Your heads shall adorn the graves of the fallen!

Dragonewt Charlotte.baseFlair_: Umm... can I help? It's just... you do realize you've stumbled into a dragon's domain, don't you? Sorry to have to ask, but... would you object if I skipped straight to chastising you?
Dragonewt Charlotte.evoFlair_: I suppose foregoing the formalities wouldn't hurt just this once. I don't often entertain guests, you see, and—oh my, where are my manners? Please rest a while, and feel free to occupy yourself with this little one while I call for help.

Fangblade Slayer.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
Fangblade Slayer.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Bane.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
Fangblade Slayer.baseFlair_: I was born with superhuman strength, and it caused all kinds of trouble for my mother. Still, packing the strength of a giant has its uses, such as being able to cut down stone dragons!
Fangblade Slayer.evoFlair_: Stone dragons, fire dragons, flying dragons... Hardly worth the effort of showing up! Bring me big, bad, god-level dragons! I'll chop 'em up and make 'em into gifts for my mother!

Captain Walfrid.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to all other allied followers. Give all allied Officer followers Ward.
Captain Walfrid.baseFlair_: You're the swords and shields of your homeland! You're the handpicked elite bringers of the dawn! Now show our foes why you're here!
Captain Walfrid.evoFlair_: This airship represents the height of humanity's wisdom and magical arts, and on it rides hope itself! Now fly with me into the light of dawn and see why they call me the wolf!

Alexander.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Can attack up to 14 times per turn.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
Alexander.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Can attack up to 14 times per turn.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
Alexander.baseFlair_: The ambitious young Alexander rose up to conquer a vast continent. In place of war horses, dragons of exceptional cunning pulled his mighty chariot.
Alexander.evoFlair_: The king's army marched across the continent to consolidate an empire stretching from ocean to ocean. Alexander alone would sit on its great throne.

Hero of Antiquity.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Hero of Antiquity.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Hero of Antiquity.baseFlair_: In his eyes is an authority—a cutting perceptiveness—unique to those who have overcome despair time and again. Though he ages, he remains valiant. Though he grows old, he is a hero still. Halfhearted tactics hold no sway with him.
Hero of Antiquity.evoFlair_: The way of the weak is to gaze upon the tides of war and puzzle out a strategy. But the strong need pay no heed to the tides of war. They can sever a foe's schemes with a single swing. Only one thing is, therefore, necessary: the will to advance.

Sky Fortress.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give an allied follower +3/+4. If it is an Officer follower, give it Ward. If it is a Commander follower, give it Clash: Draw a card.
Sky Fortress.baseFlair_: Once the royal castle falls, even the greatest kingdom is defeated. Should we not then build the strongest of all castles? —Words of a king
Sky Fortress.evoFlair_: Your days are over, you who guard the royal castle in accordance with old custom. Prostrate yourself before the procession of the flying king! —Words of a king

Latham, Honorable Knight.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Knights.
----------
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects.
-Whenever an allied follower attacks, if there are no allied Knights in play, summon a Knight.
-Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point comes into play, give it Storm.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
Latham, Honorable Knight.baseFlair_: Only despair could be found on the desolate battlefield, utterly devoid of hope. It was then that his voice echoed throughout the forsaken air—an order to counter attack, a promise of triumph.
Latham, Honorable Knight.evoFlair_: The soldiers gathered at his blade, where their wills were united as one for glory, for victory, and most importantly, for the people. His heart ablaze with passion, the honorable knight charges into the battlefield.

Selfless Noble.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card. Gain +X/+X. X equals the original cost of the discarded card.
Selfless Noble.baseFlair_: The Eight of Cups calls for noble surrender. He smiles upon the faces of the desirous masses and, in calm, measured tones, explains the path of enlightenment: to extend a hand and give to those in need is to gain something far more precious.
Selfless Noble.evoFlair_: He gladly divests himself of his riches, buoyed by his philosophy: to hold onto gold and other treasures is to lose everything. One needs only to let go. Those with empty pockets will gain wealth and splendor far beyond imagining.

Leonidas.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Leonidas's Resolve.
Leonidas.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Leonidas's Resolve.
Leonidas.baseFlair_: A true king is not measured by his achievements in life but rather by his ability to inspire his soldiers in death.
Leonidas.evoFlair_: He fought with his spear until it snapped, his sword until it shattered, and finally with his fists. The king bellowed as he scattered legions. Even if he'd fallen, his people would have spoken of him long after his death.

Jiraiya.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Change an enemy follower's attack and defense to 1/1.
----------
Fanfare: Change all enemy followers' attack and defense to 1/1.
Jiraiya.baseFlair_:
Long ago, lived the ninja Jiraiya, who learned how to transform into a toad. He married a woman named Tsunade, who could transform into a slug, and banished the fearsome beast Raiju.
—Book of Heaven, The Legend of Jiraiya
Jiraiya.evoFlair_:
Jiraiya's mortal enemy, Orochimaru, transformed into a serpent, but Jiraiya exorcised the serpent's spirit with a slice from the Namikiri. It is said that in defeating his rival, he ascended to the heavens a master of his art.
—Book of Earth, The Legend of Jiraiya

Leonidas's Resolve.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied follower comes into play, give it +3/+3 and Rush.
Leonidas's Resolve.baseFlair_: The great king has fallen. And yet his army continues marching to the cadence of his commands.

Dionne, Dancing Blade.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Accelerate (7): Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
----------
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Dionne, Dancing Blade.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Dionne, Dancing Blade.baseFlair_: In this world ravaged by ceaseless battle, would it kill you to at least fight with a little grace? My blade is but a pale pink flower. And like a petal in the wind, your head shall spiral to earth.
Dionne, Dancing Blade.evoFlair_: An executioner's blade? Utterly repulsive. Something so boorish and utterly devoid of meaning can't compare to the art of my swordplay. My technique shall paint the earth, as shall your blood.

Fran's Attendant.baseFlair_: It does not speak, for a monster has no words. However, seen somewhere in its eyes is melancholic sorrow.
Fran's Attendant.evoFlair_: You cannot speak, for the towering monster stands right before you. However, heard somewhere in its roars is heartrending anguish.

Fran's Curse.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an allied follower and enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
Fran's Curse.baseFlair_: If you don't wish to kill me, allow me to change your mind! —Fran, Monster Girl

Luna's Game.baseFlair_: I'm also gonna fight! I'm done crying, and I'm done watching other people cry. Just try and do something mean. I'll stop you—you can bet on it!

Aenea's Friendship.baseEffect_:
Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
Aenea's Friendship.baseFlair_: Um, I can fight too... I used to be really weak... and I couldn't do anything. But I'm different now. I think... I've changed. And I'm not gonna lose to you. 'Cause I want to win!

Skull Beast.baseFlair_: All this poor creature wanted was another hug from its master. A demon granted it eternal life in order to fulfill that final wish.
Skull Beast.evoFlair_: Eternal life comes at a price: one's flesh and blood, one's feelings, one's memories. The skull beast could not even remember its old master and was condemned to spreading death for all eternity.

Deadmoon Disciple.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
Deadmoon Disciple.baseFlair_: The moon and life both wane. But don't you think that's what makes it so elegant?
Deadmoon Disciple.evoFlair_: Both the moon and life wane before long. But don't you think it's how you wane that counts?

Mischievous Spirit.baseFlair_: They say nothing short of dying can fix being dumb. But dying sure didn't fix that knuckleheaded son of mine. —Words of an elderly woman
Mischievous Spirit.evoFlair_: First my socks go missing, and then the dishes start breaking. It's a pain in the neck, all right. But it takes me back to the old days, and that's fine by me. —Words of an elderly woman

Mino, Crafty Reaper.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +5/+5 and 3 shadows.
Last Words: Gain 1 shadow.
Mino, Crafty Reaper.baseFlair_: I'll put in my hours, but don't expect me to clock in any overtime. I have things to do at home... Not that you should concern yourself over that.
Mino, Crafty Reaper.evoFlair_: I'll put in my hours, but don't expect me to clock in any overtime. What... I dropped something, you say? O-oh, that's the HaZeus fanfic I wrote! Y-you're a fan too? Omigosh, let's gush! HaZeus or Zeudes? I just can't choose my OTP!

Skeleton.baseFlair_: Though dead, he continues to fight. Though nothing but a bundle of dry bones, he continues to thirst for blood.
Skeleton.evoFlair_: Battles bring death, and death brings evil spirits—the evil spirits that possess souls tainted by hatred, turning them into pitiful shuffling skeletons.

Ghost.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Banish this follower when it leaves play or when your turn ends.
Ghost.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Banish this follower when it leaves play or when your turn ends.
Ghost.baseFlair_: An evil soul rising forth from the very depths of the underworld.
Ghost.evoFlair_: A hateful soul rising forth from the very depths of the underworld.

Skeleton Fighter.baseFlair_: No one can predict what will happen on the battlefield. Sometimes experienced soldiers die, and sometimes their skeletons keep walking onward. You have to fight them all the same.
Skeleton Fighter.evoFlair_: Departed souls are tough, so there's no point in fighting them. The best option is to turn and run. But what if the skeleton you're facing is a friend who's supposed to be dead? It's your duty as a friend to cut it down.

Night of the Living Dog.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree is destroyed, gain +2/+2.
Night of the Living Dog.baseFlair_:
A hound's distant baying echoes through the netherworld. A patchwork dog bounds toward you.
"That pooch always has candy in his mouth. Seems his master used to give him toys shaped like that. Maybe rebirth doesn't change your personality all that much."
Night of the Living Dog.evoFlair_:
Resurrected creatures don't sleep. The faithful dog waits patiently, its round eyes filled with hope.
"How about that. Don't usually catch this pooch sittin' down on the job. Seems the lord found his master for him. I guess rebirth got him his happy ending."

Miyako, Pudding Poltergeist.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Union Burst (10): Put a Pudding Time into your hand.
Miyako, Pudding Poltergeist.baseFlair_: Ooooh! Wooooh! I'm a scaaary ghooost who sends all the little kids running! Give me pudding or I'll haaauuunt yooouuu!
Miyako, Pudding Poltergeist.evoFlair_: I don't remember how I became a ghost. At first I thought I should go toward the light, but once I tasted pudding, I changed my mind!

Gremory.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Evolve all other allied followers. Evolve effects will not activate for those followers.
At the end of your turn, give all evolved allied followers Last Words: Draw a card.
Gremory.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, give all evolved allied followers Last Words: Draw a card.
Gremory.baseFlair_: Want me to divine your future? My predictions are never wrong, you know! In fact, I can even tell you the exact moment you're gonna die. Tee hee!
Gremory.evoFlair_: Since you've called upon me, I'll give you a special fortune! Don't you worry, my divination's always on point! I can even change how you're gonna die. Tee hee!

Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound.baseFlair_: Ruff 'em up! No matter what kinda soul it is, we'll give 'em the ol' one-two bark n' snap!
Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound.evoFlair_:
Charon: Hehe... I hear she likes it when you pet her.
Orthrus: I-if you try it, you'll lose a finger!

Coco, Left Paw Hellhound.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Coco, Left Paw Hellhound.baseFlair_: Hound 'em to death! We'll round up all the souls an' put 'em in the dog pound!
Coco, Left Paw Hellhound.evoFlair_:
Charon: Hehe... He's so fluffy I could die.
Orthrus: Yeah, but he bites...

Soul Conversion.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower.
Draw 2 cards.
Soul Conversion.baseFlair_: I'm not done with you just yet.

Silent Purge.baseEffect_:
Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Enhance (5): Then destroy that follower.

Demonic Procession.baseEffect_: Burial Rite: Put a random Shadowcraft follower from your deck into your hand. If Burial Rite was performed with a follower with an original attack or defense of 1, put 2 Shadowcraft followers into your hand instead.
Demonic Procession.baseFlair_:
Long, long ago, the demons began their march, we know not where. They say those demons are marching still.
—Demonic Procession, Hyakki-Yagyo

Ghostly Grasp.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 1 defense. If you have at least 8 shadows, you can perform Necromancy (8) to destroy an enemy follower with 2 defense or more instead.
Ghostly Grasp.baseFlair_: What a tiny, pitiful, and altogether lovely soul.

Grave Invitation.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower.
Summon a Zombie.
Grave Invitation.baseFlair_: "We'll fight together in the next life as well, of course?" —A Zombie's Grave

Necromantic Aether.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, Reanimate (4).
Necromantic Aether.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the shambling corpse discovered her kindness in his grave, he saw a deathly, necrotic aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those who desire life.

Sonata of Silence.baseEffect_:
Draw a card.
Remove all effects from an allied follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Enhance (4): Remove all effects from all followers except changes to their attack or defense instead.

Deathguard.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower the following effect: The next time damage is dealt to this follower, reduce that damage to 0.
Enhance (4): Give all allied followers that effect instead.
Deathguard.baseFlair_: I find myself unable to cut through the bodies of my relatives. Not sure if it's their memories that keep me from completing the slice, or just the rigor mortis. —Necromancer

Descent into Madness.baseEffect_:
Give +4/+0 to an allied follower.
Necromancy (4): Give that follower Rush.
Descent into Madness.baseFlair_:
The vessels of the living are full.
Crude, earthen cups tempting the god of death to drink.
Pour, then! Brim over and descend into madness.

Mimi.baseFlair_: Ruff! I'll drag you right to the pits of the underworld!

Coco.baseFlair_: Ruff! Time to tear your soul into little shreds!

Instant Potion.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Burial Rite: Deal 5 damage instead.
Instant Potion.baseFlair_: Use my knowledge to live for the moment. —Ceridwen, Eternity Hunter

Fleeting Joy.baseEffect_:
Until the start of your next turn, your leader can't take more than 5 damage at a time.
Enhance (9): Randomly put 4 different Machina followers (excluding Aenea, Amethyst Rebel) from your deck into play.
Fleeting Joy.baseFlair_: If you put enough junk together, sometimes it gains new purpose. And if you put it together with a friend, then you might just find new happiness.

Haunted House.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Whenever an allied follower (excluding Ghosts) is destroyed during your turn, summon a Ghost.
Haunted House.baseFlair_: They say home is where the soul is.

Burial Grounds.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain 1 shadow.
Burial Grounds.baseFlair_: Death gathers, and it knows no bounds.

Ghouls' Banquet.baseEffect_: Whenever you perform Necromancy, summon a Ghost.
Ghouls' Banquet.baseFlair_: Hey, ghosts and ghostesses! Come on and dance with me!

Spartoi Sergeant.baseFlair_: A drop of dragon's blood falls on a woeful carcass. The evil god's power has resurrected the dead soldier as a soldier of death. In its skeletal chest is but one wish: to offer blood and death to the master.
Spartoi Sergeant.evoFlair_: The sergeant's dragon-like fangs tear through anyone who defies its evil god. Prideful warriors are but playthings for this creature, which seeks to kill until it perishes once again.

Spectre.baseFlair_: I'm so lonely, and it's so cold here. Can you stay with me? Please?
Spectre.evoFlair_: Don't be scared of me. I just want to be with someone, that's all. Please, will you go with me into the beyond?

Skeleton Viper.baseFlair_: The bones of the dead are a treasure trove for those who seek the spoils of war. But you would do well to remember that every treasure has a guardian.
Skeleton Viper.evoFlair_: Some people refuse to die. Their malice is such that they refuse to be taken even once they're reduced to dry bones. Thieves come in search of the treasures of the dead but find themselves condemned to the same fate.

Skullcradle Widow.baseFlair_: Things that die turn to dust? Ha! Only children believe that nonsense! Love, you see, never dies.
Skullcradle Widow.evoFlair_: No matter how many times it is lost, love abides. Don't you think that's just wonderful? Now come show me that you love me!

Wight.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Wight.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Wight.baseFlair_: Advance, brethren, and do not fear death! Your lives shall fuel our assaults on our enemies!
Wight.evoFlair_: Your malice shall remain as you sink into the underworld. I shall weave your grudges into a curse and wield it in the name of revenge!

Lesser Mummy.baseFlair_: A corpse animated by an ancient curse. Do not allow the lifelessness to lure you into a false sense of security. Get tangled in the bandages and you'll be devoured.
Lesser Mummy.evoFlair_: Once the bandages have you in their grasp, your passage to the world of the dead is assured. But is that such a bad thing? It's nice and warm inside the wrappings, you know. Maybe you should try them on for size.

Dark Conjurer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Ghost if an evolved allied follower is in play.
Dark Conjurer.baseFlair_: So, you want to go beyond taboos? I'd love to help you out with that.
Dark Conjurer.evoFlair_: So, you want to go beyond taboos? Then you need to kill! To drown the night in blood!

Ghosthound Sexton.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers the following effect - When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
Whenever another allied follower comes into play give it the following effect: When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
Ghosthound Sexton.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower comes into play give it the following effect: When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
Ghosthound Sexton.baseFlair_: I believe in fighting fire with fire. If the grave robbers insist on digging up corpses to create monsters, I'll defend this graveyard by siccing my monstrous hunting hounds on them.
Ghosthound Sexton.evoFlair_: May grave robbers sleep in graves. May those who unearth the dead join them... Once they're gone, my hounds and I will guard them for eternity.

Demon Eater.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and draw 2 cards.
Demon Eater.baseFlair_: The demon-eating demon you heard about was me. I guess we're all related, but a meal's still a meal!
Demon Eater.evoFlair_: Looks like quite the feast today! I'll be having a main dish of vengeance, hors d'oeuvres of hatred, and death pangs for dessert!

Skeleton Ogre.baseFlair_: Bones, bones, stack and form. Abandon your shape of old and into a new shape be reborn. —A heartless necromancer
Skeleton Ogre.evoFlair_: Bones, bones, forget when you were a man! You're an ogre now, so serve mightily under my command! —A heartless necromancer

Belenus.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Belenus.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Belenus.baseFlair_: A fire god known as the Shining One. Even should he perish, the flames which rise from his globe will still burn on. —Death and Fire, Chapter 1
Belenus.evoFlair_: He manifests fire and garbs himself in embers. This is evidence of his eternal, unfailing power. It is said that should his body rot away, his shimmer would still linger. —Death and Fire, Chapter 4

Gloomy Necromancer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Draw a card.
Gloomy Necromancer.baseFlair_: The more... death... you see, t-the better you become at necromancy. So, p-please... show me.
Gloomy Necromancer.evoFlair_: Thank you for showing me... it feels so... familiar. The soul... I-I can hear it... It's c-calling to me... I can hear it!

Bone Bug.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Bone Bug.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Bone Bug.baseFlair_: These insects wear rigid animal bones for protection, and instinctively gather large bones to increase their chances of survival. —Creatures of Death, Chapter 1
Bone Bug.evoFlair_: In recent years, they can commonly be found on the battlefield—unsurprising, as there are plenty of bones to be found on dead mercenaries. —Creatures of Death, Chapter 2

Orator of the Bones.baseFlair_: You're just a pile of bones now, and you're still shy? Go ahead, say hello!
Orator of the Bones.evoFlair_: Even dead, you're still like you've always been. I like how shy you are. I've always liked that since way, way back!

Sarunan, Cursebound Lover.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Sarunan, Cursebound Lover.baseFlair_: I don't look so good? Well, I haven't been able to sleep in ages. You see, there's a legendary spell in Estalucia... And I've been killing myself searching for a route there...
Sarunan, Cursebound Lover.evoFlair_: Before I exhaust my life force, I'll give Honey a body of her own, so she can walk this mortal world. I hope I can make it in time...

Servant of Silence.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3. Remove all effects from an enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Servant of Silence.baseFlair_: Silence yourself. Speaking is deception. Everything is perfect in the still depths of quiescence.
Servant of Silence.evoFlair_:
The First Record: Remain Undivided
Language emerged when countries developed separate borders and histories. Verbalization plays no part in unity.
—Teachings of the Silent Ones

Buffalo Bones.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain Last Words: Summon 2 Skeletons.
Buffalo Bones.baseFlair_:
Cowardly Matador: W-wait! I thought that thing was dead!
Mischievous Necromancer: Someone asked me to bring him back!
Buffalo Bones.evoFlair_:
Cowardly Matador: How long is this thing going to chase me?
Mischievous Necromancer: Until death! Oh. But it's already dead...

Ghostwriter.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and summon 3 Ghosts.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon a Ghost.
Ghostwriter.evoEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, summon a Ghost.
Ghostwriter.baseFlair_: My editor's got some nerve! All he did was make ridiculous complaints about my manuscript! First of all, I'm a ghost! I'm already dead! How can he expect me to "breathe life" into my writing?
Ghostwriter.evoFlair_: What? He liked my manuscript this time? I did a good job expressing the sorrow of death and the joy of life? But... But of course! Haha! I used some of my own experiences from when I was alive as inspiration!

Ghoul.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower, then draw 2 cards. If it's a Machina follower, gain +1/+1.
Ghoul.baseFlair_: Just picked up a fresh cadaver! Wonder what this thing eats? Raw meat? Souls? Or maybe something else? Oh well! I'll just feed it whatever for now! —Novice Necromancer
Ghoul.evoFlair_: A cadaver's physical form is composed of whatever it consumes after death. As such, the skill of its creator is reflected in its quality. I must say, this one is most impressive... I've never seen anything like it. —Veteran Necromancer

Greater Lesser Mummy.evoEffect_: Evolve: If another allied follower is in play, perform Necromancy (8) - Give Storm to another allied follower.
Greater Lesser Mummy.baseFlair_: The eternity of death nourishes him to lead a legion of corpses. He is their commander—a silent king from a time forgotten. He spreads an ancient curse as silent as death itself. Rumors say that if he were to speak, his dignity would be lost to the sands of time.
Greater Lesser Mummy.evoFlair_: A forbidden sarcophagus covers his face, and cloth swaddles his mysteries. He is the sole overseer. Yet he himself can never be seen, for a fear of the unknown secures his power. Rumors say that if he were to show his face, the facade would immediately crumble to dust.

Revenant Ram.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
Last Words: Gain 1 shadow.
Revenant Ram.baseFlair_: The clop of fleshless hooves resounds. The revenant ram prances forth. "To repay the debt it owes humans and sheepdogs for their protection in life, the revenant will devour any dangerous spirits which approach them. The cycle of life and death is a fascinating thing."
Revenant Ram.evoFlair_: The living do not gather here. The revenant herd grazes only upon spirits. "The rams gather spirits about them like a living sheep's fleece. But they soon devour this warm coat, leaving their bones bare once more. The cycle of life and death never fails to entertain."

Bone Crane.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Skeleton into your hand. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Skeleton instead.
Bone Crane.baseFlair_:
The skeletal crane's cry is that of a soul rent in two.
"The deeper the love, the deeper the loss. That mother crane was resurrected without her child. What does she see with those empty eyes? I wonder if she regrets coming back."
Bone Crane.evoFlair_:
Her featherless wings cannot fly. Instead, she walks.
"Resurrected animals can no longer bring forth new life. Nonetheless, they live on. What else can they do but move forward? Surely their rebirth had a purpose, after all."

Zombie.baseFlair_: Ain't no one gonna be the boss of me. I'm gonna live the way I like. God knows when I'm dead some necromancer will be working me to the bone. —A Young Man at the Tavern
Zombie.evoFlair_: All you do is drink from morning till night, grumbling into your cups. You're like a living corpse. Why don't you try walking with your arms held straight out in front of you? Bet the look would suit you! —Barman at the Tavern

Deadly Widow.baseFlair_: Your death will make me stronger. But do not concern yourself with me; I can survive perfectly well all alone.
Deadly Widow.evoFlair_: I cannot do it all again—the sadness, the pain. Once I'm laid to rest beneath the ground, my love, let's meet in our dreams.

Lurching Corpse.baseEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
Lurching Corpse.evoEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
Lurching Corpse.baseFlair_: The sound of large stones being dragged along reverberates through the corridors of the hospital ward. This is proof that the women in charge of the ward are on patrol.
Lurching Corpse.evoFlair_: The sound of footsteps echoes through the hospital corridors. A new patient has strayed into this nightmare. The women, as devoted to their work as ever, run to offer their protection.

Usher of Styx.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Randomly put a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied followers that has been destroyed during this match into your hand.
Usher of Styx.baseFlair_: Charon has her hands full when there are too many souls down here. So I send back the ones who deserve to live.
Usher of Styx.evoFlair_: Hades fills up with souls when you're so eager to die. Now head back home. Charon doesn't need to know.

Lady Grey, Deathweaver.baseFlair_: My lover was a wonderful person, and my child, the cutest. There's no way I'll let them go... After all, we're a family.
Lady Grey, Deathweaver.evoFlair_: Our love will last forever. An endless affection, unwavering. Well, shall we show you how tightly our family bonds are tied?

Wight Knight.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Choose: Summon a Spellplate Cavalier or Bone Cavalier.
Wight Knight.baseFlair_: A ghastly knight storms the battlefield with his army of accursed souls. His regrets from previous campaigns torment him still, allowing him no rest.
Wight Knight.evoFlair_: The deathless knight and his infernal army ride into battle tonight as every night, bony fingers grasping for the victories their living hands could not claim.

Deadly Dreamer.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Deep Dream into your hand.
Deadly Dreamer.baseFlair_: Oh, welcome. It's been so long since I had a guest. This is your dream, as well as my own. Only those who have come to despise living are able to enter this place. What do you say we enjoy ourselves a little? You'll have so much fun you'll never want to wake up again.
Deadly Dreamer.evoFlair_: You're the one who came here, but now you say you want to wake up? Of course, I don't mind. Although... I'm afraid it's a little too late for that. You see, I'm going to gobble this dream right up.

Irongear Corpsman.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Randomly put a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied Machina followers that has been destroyed this match into your hand.
Irongear Corpsman.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new optimization after another. New methods of automation were born. The Robozombie—a way to employ the dead through machinery. So efficient that some are considering using it on the living.  —A Necromancer's Secret Notes II
Irongear Corpsman.evoFlair_:
A corpse that moves at will through machinery... Simply brilliant. In fact, you could say it's similar to my own technique of creating corpses from the living! Did you know? The people call me the hand of God.
—Irongear Corpsman to Robozombie

Yuki-Onna.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
Enhance (8): Gain +4/+4 and destroy that follower instead.
Yuki-Onna.baseFlair_:
She brought a snowstorm upon the disordered masses, so fierce they could see naught but white before them, and the howling winds swallowed their screams.
—Demonic Procession, Lady Vanguard
Yuki-Onna.evoFlair_:
Ohh, that there's a yuki-onna. The wintry mountain incarnate, she is. Nothin' a mortal can do to stop her. Chills the blood, it does.
—Demonic Procession, Yuki-Onna in Oral Tradition

Triscythe Reaper.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain 2 shadows.
Enhance (6): Destroy an enemy follower.
Triscythe Reaper.baseFlair_:
Take heed—every human is guilty of three sins. Eventually, when the world is no more than a den of criminals, and dark with the shadow of vice, the Reaper will appear. And he will come swinging the Triscythe.
—Aberrant Reaper, Chapter 3
Triscythe Reaper.evoFlair_:
Keep fear in your heart, ye thrice-stained sinner. When the three evils come together in one body, when you and the sins are one and the same, the Reaper will appear. And he will come bearing three deaths.
—Aberrant Reaper, Chapter 3

Ghostly Maid.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any allied amulets in play, summon a Ghost. Then, if there are at least 2 in play, evolve it.
Ghostly Maid.baseFlair_: Did you really think death could keep me from my duties? Perish the thought. The young master needs every attendant, even ghostly ones. Now, if you'll excuse me. With so much to do around here, I must return to work right away.
Ghostly Maid.evoFlair_:
It didn't matter how high my status was. I always looked up to her. She helped me grow from an awkward kid into a successful adult. Sigh... I love this house... My beloved ghost house...
—Elderly Margrave on the Decline

Shadow Reaper.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Shadow Reaper.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Shadow Reaper.baseFlair_: Resentment and hatred coalesce into a dreadful manifestation. It flickers as it walks ghost-like and silent, and it takes the heads of the living.
Shadow Reaper.evoFlair_: Resentment and hatred coalesce into a dreadful manifestation. It lacks a distinct shape, which makes it impossible for all but the most prepared to pursue.

Little Soulsquasher.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Destroy an evolved enemy follower.
Little Soulsquasher.baseFlair_: Fresh souls are the best souls—that's why I keep saying bye-bye and hello. Whenever I'm sick of a soul, I toss it and get another!
Little Soulsquasher.evoFlair_: Did you say bye-bye to life? Then let me say hello! It's good to meet you!

Andrealphus.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give all of the followers in your hand Last Words: Draw a card.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Andrealphus.baseFlair_: It is a demon well-versed in geometry, cartometry, and astronomy. From its demonic beak out spills the wisdom of the ages. —Encyclopedia Demonica, Chapter 65, Section 1
Andrealphus.evoFlair_: A demon whose bird calls could be mistaken for lectures on every type of science. When it beats its demonic wings, even the scholastically hopeless gain a semblance of understanding. —Encyclopedia Demonica, Chapter 65, Section 2

Lord Deathskull.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give a random allied follower Last Words - Summon a Skeleton.
Lord Deathskull.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give a random allied follower Last Words - Summon a Zombie.
Lord Deathskull.baseFlair_: The master necromancer dropped the battlefield deep below the earth. No longer would they count the deaths; instead they would count the days of eternity.
Lord Deathskull.evoFlair_: Plying his trade on the battlefield, the necromancer deceived the living and made the dead quake. There was no distinction between friend and foe; the only thing that existed was a tremendous mass of death.

Danua, Grim Puppetmaster.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
Danua, Grim Puppetmaster.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give all other allied followers Clash - Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
Danua, Grim Puppetmaster.baseFlair_:
"Who..."
"Danua wants to know who you are."
"We're not weirdos! Don't get the wrong idea!"
Danua, Grim Puppetmaster.evoFlair_:
"Pat..."
"Hey! You better hand over the pats now, bub!"
"Captain, please reward her with the usual, ceremonial patting."

Nicola, Forbidden Strength.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If this follower has at least 4 attack, put a Forbidden Art into your hand, and change this follower's attack to 1.
Last Words: Put a Nicola, Forbidden Strength into your hand and give it +X/+0. X equals the attack of this follower before being destroyed.
Nicola, Forbidden Strength.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Nicola, Forbidden Strength into your hand and give it +X/+0. X equals the attack of this follower before being destroyed.
Nicola, Forbidden Strength.baseFlair_: I wouldn't do that if I were you. I'm a monster. I think I'd break you. If that's what you want... then fine, I guess. But I'll tell you now, nothing good's gonna come of it.
Nicola, Forbidden Strength.evoFlair_: Yaaawn... Oh, hey. Was I asleep? 'Guess it's about time I made an effort, huh? I'll try not to hurt you too bad... when I obliterate you.

Sora, Arcane Fist.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals this follower's attack.
Sora, Arcane Fist.baseFlair_: Slash them with a blade? Burn them with sorcery? Weak! Cut your enemies down with your own fists! Burn them through real hand-to-hand combat! Your very own body is capable enough, and that's where the real thrill of battle lies!
Sora, Arcane Fist.evoFlair_: There's a limit to how much damage a mere weapon can do! But there is one weapon, if prepared properly, capable of blowing your enemies away in a single blow—the body!

Grudge Knight.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and Ward. Destroy an enemy follower.
Last Words: Restore X defense to your leader. X equals this follower's attack.
Grudge Knight.evoEffect_: Last Words: Restore X defense to your leader. X equals this follower's attack.
Grudge Knight.baseFlair_: It is not a knight, but the regret born of knightly death. The grudges scattered across the battlefield meld into a mockery of those who shed them. This undead knight rides through the darkness, leaving shards of itself behind.
Grudge Knight.evoFlair_:
False knight—you amalgam of resentment who usurps the visages of the fallen. Without purpose or conviction, you exist merely to plague the living. I feel nothing but pity for you.
—Demonlord Eachtar

Jackshovel Gravedigger.baseEffect_:
Bane.
If this follower was summoned with a spell or effect, gain +X/+X and Rush. X equals the number of other allied Machina followers in play.
Jackshovel Gravedigger.baseFlair_:
The development of machinery revolutionized necromancy. Mass exhumations became easier with new tools; necromancers began delving for superior souls. Not even the dead could escape the cacophony of progress.
—Note from the Technomancy Research Society
Jackshovel Gravedigger.evoFlair_: Ghosts do not need to rest in peace, nor do they need to wander in silence.
