Come with your lively clamor, stir sleeping bones, welcome the dead back to this side of the veil. Death is a resource. Those who are still living would do well to exploit it. —Spirit Noise

Bonenanza Necromancer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Reanimate (10)
Whenever you perform Burial Rite, draw a card.
Bonenanza Necromancer.evoEffect_: Whenever you perform Burial Rite, draw a card.
Bonenanza Necromancer.baseFlair_: Dead bones are great too, but you can do so much more with living ones! Now, the reason I resurrected you was to get a dance party going! Come on, everybody, wave your bones in the air like you just don't care!
Bonenanza Necromancer.evoFlair_:
Flesh is passé. Give me bones any day. Just once I'd love to chat with someone who understands bones like I do.
—Prince Catacomb

Ferry, Spirit Maiden.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If this is your tenth turn or later, Burial Rite (2) - Give all other allied followers the ability to attack 3 times this turn.
(To perform Burial Rite (2), there must be at least 2 open spaces in your area after this follower comes into play.)
Ferry, Spirit Maiden.baseFlair_: I've spent decades on an island enshrouded in fog, so this outside world never ceases to amaze me.
Ferry, Spirit Maiden.evoFlair_: I was without a family or a name, but new friends found me and took me out into the world. I'll find some way to repay them while I search for my sister.

Thoth.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied cards with Last Words effects have been destroyed this match, give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied follower or amulet comes into play, give it Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Last Words: Draw a card.
Thoth.baseFlair_: I record every life and every death. I stand opposite the judge, and make a record of each soul's value. There is honor in a fitting end. May your praises outlast you.
Thoth.evoFlair_: The great scribe records mortals' fates in perfect hieroglyphics. Their footsteps are graven in writing—never to fade, even once the feet which left them have passed beyond. Records are the soul's immortality, imbued with meaning once death's curtain has fallen.

Legendary Skeleton.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Necromancy (8) - Evolve this follower.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
Legendary Skeleton.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Legendary Skeleton.baseFlair_: In life, he was shackled by his natural kindness. Many were the chains which held him back. His final days were spent in fearsome battle and the emptiness of defeat. Never able to reveal his true abilities, he died filled with regret.
Legendary Skeleton.evoFlair_: My motherland and her enemy are dust. None live who know my name. I am all that remains—one lone soldier, nameless and free. Being naught but bones is not so bad when my heart feels so light. Some call me the Dead Legend... That, too, is nothing but excess fat to trim away.

Gremory, Death Teller.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if you have more shadows than cards in your deck, invoke this card.
When this follower comes into play, if you have more shadows than cards in your deck, give your leader the following effect: Once on each of your turns, when you perform Necromancy, gain X shadows and recover X play points. X equals the Necromancy cost. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Gremory, Death Teller.baseFlair_: I know what you're thinking: you can't change fate, and you can't escape death. Must suck being a human, seeing as you can't tell the future and all. But don't give up yet. Show me some guts—um, the figurative kind—and I'll take care of the rest!
Gremory, Death Teller.evoFlair_: So you get it now? Death is just a big bully sometimes—you can totally escape him. So who cares if you can't see the future? As long as you show some spine, somebody'll help you. I promise. In fact, that somebody might just be me!

One-Tailed Fox.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Ward.
Last Words: Give +2/+0 to all allied Ginsetsu, Great Foxes.
One-Tailed Fox.baseFlair_: The fox's voice is a call to delusion. What is it you see that we don't? You seem to be enjoying yourself, at any rate.
One-Tailed Fox.evoFlair_: You fox-hunters don't have a clue. Oh, dear. Did you think you were a match for me? Haha, sorry. But I'll admit... you've piqued my interest.

Skullfather.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Give +1/+1 to 2 random allied followers.
Skullfather.baseFlair_: Lemme tell ya what I hate. For one? Men. Every last one of 'em. For two? Anyone who hurts my daughter. And you're both, so you're goin' away!
Skullfather.evoFlair_: Bet you already know what I like. For one? Beautiful women. For two? My beloved daughter. And all I have to do to show off for both of 'em is tan your sorry hide!

Undying Resentment.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Necromancy (2): Deal 5 damage instead.
Undying Resentment.baseFlair_: The flesh has rotted away, and even the bones are dust. All that's left is resentment.

Highway to Hell.baseEffect_: Give Bane to an allied follower.
Highway to Hell.baseFlair_: I don't fully understand where humans came from. But I know quite well the ways they can die.

Zombie Party.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (7): Then summon 3 Zombies.
Zombie Party.baseFlair_: Is death a tragedy, or is it a comedy?

Regenerate Spirit.baseFlair_: I said I'd return you from the abyss to the land of the living. But I didn't say a thing about making you whole again. —A cruel necromancer

Manifest Malice.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Summon a Ghost.
Manifest Malice.baseFlair_: Millennia of resentment and anger, coalesced into a single body.

Ghastly Assault.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Ghost into your hand.
Ghastly Assault.baseFlair_: One mask of death flies at your face. And another. And another. And another.

Savoring Slash.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Burial Rite: Draw a card.
Savoring Slash.baseFlair_:
I was just thinking about going for a snack!
—Demon Eater

Ethereal Form.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
Necromancy (4): Give +2/+0 to that follower.
Ethereal Form.baseFlair_: She dilutes the soul to hide the being's presence.

Rise of the Dead.baseEffect_: Randomly put a copy of 1 of the highest-cost allied followers that has been destroyed during this match into your hand.
Rise of the Dead.baseFlair_: Oops, guess they died. Let the next battle begin!

Troth's Curse.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied follower and an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
Troth's Curse.baseFlair_: None but the dead can promise their king an eternal troth.

Poisoned Apple of Rebirth.baseEffect_: Change an allied Neutral follower into a Shadowcraft follower. Give that follower Last Words: Summon a copy of this follower.
Poisoned Apple of Rebirth.baseFlair_: To the living it tastes of poison; to the dead it tastes of nectar.

Pudding Time.baseEffect_:
Remove all effects from an enemy follower. Change its attack and defense to 0/1.
Give +3/+3 to a random allied Miyako, Pudding Poltergeist.
Pudding Time.baseFlair_: Pudding! Pudding, pudding, pudding, puuuddiiinnnggg! It's snack time, and what's on the menu is you!

Gloaming Tombs.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied follower comes into play, gain 1 shadow.
Gloaming Tombs.baseFlair_: The war's started? Time to do some investing. —Young necromancer

Golden Casket.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Profane Resurrection or Fabled Treasure.
----------
When an allied follower is destroyed, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon a Zombie.
Golden Casket.baseFlair_: Finding what you seek isn't the hard part. How will you reach for it when you arrive? Will you overcome your fears... or succumb to them? —Words of a seasoned adventurer

Grave Desecration.baseEffect_: At the end of your opponent's turn, perform Necromancy (4): Summon a Zombie.
Grave Desecration.baseFlair_: Dig on to the ends of the underworld.

Siren's Tears.baseEffect_: Destroy a random allied Shadowcraft follower at the end of your turn if you have both a Shadowcraft follower and a Neutral follower in play. Then give a random allied Neutral follower +X/+X. X equals the attack of the Shadowcraft follower.
Siren's Tears.baseFlair_: Sirens cry to lure in sailors. They cry again once their meal is complete.

Coffin of the Unknown Soul.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Draw a card and add X to this amulet's Countdown. X equals half the original cost of the follower destroyed by Burial Rite (rounded down).
Last Words: Summon a copy of the follower destroyed by Burial Rite.
Coffin of the Unknown Soul.baseFlair_: No one remembers why the coffin was sealed, but one thing's for sure: you'd better not open the damned thing.

Apprentice Necromancer.baseFlair_: As death accumulates, life is formed. Do you understand?
Apprentice Necromancer.evoFlair_: Sadness, grief, pain, and anger... Tell me of all these feelings you harbor within you. Whisper them to me, and I will ensure that you are avenged!

Tenacious Ghost.baseFlair_: Blessed are those who cannot see the creature, for they will be fearless until just before the moment of death.
Tenacious Ghost.evoFlair_: Can you feel it—the cold that makes you shiver? Death already hovers near you. If it continues to steal the warmth from your body, it'll eventually steal your life as well.

Rabbit Necromancer.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Rabbit Necromancer.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Rabbit Necromancer.baseFlair_: Hey, I'm not going to tell you again! If you're nasty to me, I will tell the bunny spirits—and that's a promise!
Rabbit Necromancer.evoFlair_: One bunny's not much by itself, but they're strong in groups. I wouldn't underestimate these spirits if I were you!

Skeleton Knight.baseFlair_: A battle-obsessed warrior launches himself into the fray, crossing the boundary between the living and the undead.
Skeleton Knight.evoFlair_: A warrior quivers with sheer delight. He is but bones, but he fights nonetheless! With no memories of his former life, he will spend the rest of his days engaged in brutal, blissful slaughter.

Spartoi.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain 1 shadow.
Spartoi.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain 1 shadow.
Spartoi.baseFlair_: The crazed hunger for battle drives the corpses of fallen fanatics back into the fray, and each slash of their swords takes yet another life.
Spartoi.evoFlair_: No flesh, no heart, no eyes—and yet the ability to kill is not diminished by death. The bloodthirsty warrior simply prowls the night, always seeking the next battle.

Deathchaser.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, gain 2 shadows.
Deathchaser.evoEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, gain 2 shadows.
Deathchaser.baseFlair_: Those who chase death are in turn haunted by it. And their bodies eventually succumb to decay.
Deathchaser.evoFlair_: Those who chase death are in turn haunted by it. But not even the prospect of decay could ever deter me.

Spartoi Soldier.baseFlair_: A soldier who guards the royal tombs even after death.
Spartoi Soldier.evoFlair_: The soldier continues to hold his post, stripped of flesh but not pride.

Feathered Patroller.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Feathered Patroller.baseFlair_: Patrolling the Dragonarium, that's my responsibility! If I find anyone sneaking about, I'll get rid of them with these knives!
Feathered Patroller.evoFlair_: Hey, you seem to be sneaking about, but spare me your excuses. I'm really not interested, so let's get straight to the part where I dice you up!

Attendant of Night.baseEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Lich.
Attendant of Night.evoEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader and followers with Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Lich.
Attendant of Night.baseFlair_: Thinking about attacking me? You should know that there's a special someone watching my back...
Attendant of Night.evoFlair_: My friend is a lord of the darkness! Sound scary? Well, hand over your soul or you'll be seeing him up close!

Zombie Buccaneer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (2) - Gain Last Words: Summon a Zombie.
Zombie Buccaneer.baseFlair_: Ugh, I'm so sick of the horizon! And the sea breeze stings me where I'm rotting!
Zombie Buccaneer.evoFlair_: I really miss the solid ground! Maybe I'll abandon piracy and give the life of a bandit a try!

Goblin Zombie.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Gain +2/+2.
Goblin Zombie.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Gain +2/+2.
Goblin Zombie.baseFlair_:
"You reek. Are you rotting or what?"
"Me? I don't smell nothing..."
"That's 'cause your nose fell off!"
—A conversation between a goblin and goblin zombie
Goblin Zombie.evoFlair_:
"What are you looking at?"
"Dinner!"
"Wait... Stop! Cut it ou—"
—A conversation between two goblin zombies

Mechasaw Deathbringer.baseEffect_: Last Words: Destroy a random enemy follower.
Mechasaw Deathbringer.baseFlair_:
Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. The Bone Drone seeks revenge from beyond the grave, utilizing technology in order to exact vengeance with a new body.
—A Necromancer's Secret Notes I
Mechasaw Deathbringer.evoFlair_:
With the dawn of the mechanical age, the definition of an "optimal corpse" has changed. Whether it is a corpse returned by an ancient grudge, or bones which seethe with malice, the specimen will be terrifying regardless.
—Comparison of Bone Drone and Mechasaw Deathbringer

Vengeful Possession.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +2/+2 and Bane. Then give Bane to another allied follower.
Vengeful Possession.baseFlair_:
One night, a young man began to attack his fellow villagers out of nowhere. Many were killed before he was brought down. His vengeful spirit left his body and disappeared we know not where.
—Vengeful Spirits in Folklore
Vengeful Possession.evoFlair_:
Confronted by a possessing spirit, all fall weeping to their knees. All that awaits is death or murder.
—Vengeful Spirits in Folklore

Zashiki-Warashi.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Evolve this follower.
Can't be attacked.
Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has 2 defense or less, perform Necromancy (3) - Banish the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Zashiki-Warashi.evoEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Follower Strike: If the enemy follower has 2 defense or less, perform Necromancy (3) - Banish the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Zashiki-Warashi.baseFlair_:
The child passed by, singing and bouncing a small cloth ball. Those who saw her tried to flee, but stumbled and fell.
—Demonic Procession, Childlike Leader
Zashiki-Warashi.evoFlair_:
So long as she remains, you'll have good fortune, but her departure means your doom. She'll take all the luck in the house along with her.
—Demonic Procession, Zashiki-Warashi in Oral Tradition

Mummy Chef.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any other allied followers are in play, destroy 1, draw a card, and restore 4 defense to your leader.
Mummy Chef.baseFlair_:
Welcome to the Hermopolis Hideaway! You must be tired from plundering pyramids all day. Why not relax with some good food? Your timing couldn't be better—I just got a delivery of fresh ingredients...
—Mummy Chef
Mummy Chef.evoFlair_:
I thought we were done for when we fell into that trap, but fortune really smiled on us. Now we can get back to exploring! Wait. Where's the new guy? Is he off somewhere goofing around again?
—Lead archaeologist

Spectral Servant.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Necrofauna.
Enhance (6): Summon 2 instead.
Spectral Servant.baseFlair_: Midnight. The ghost of a cat meows and breaks the silence. An old man looks up; the stone wall of his face cracks into a smile. "Say, has Mrs. Mittens finally made a friend? How grand. She's been moody since I resurrected her—guess no one likes to be woken up early."
Spectral Servant.evoFlair_:
The sleep enjoyed by spectral animals has, in recent years, been polluted by noise. The creatures are disturbed by unfamiliar sounds and metal shapes. Let the dead rest in peace—cognizance should belong only to the living.
—Tranquil Resurrection, Part 1

Spirit Curator.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Draw a card.
Spirit Curator.baseFlair_: My dear lady, souls only become shining masterpieces if they satisfy three conditions: you must be greedy in life, you must rue on your deathbed, and you must carry that regret into the afterlife. I guess what I'm trying to say is... that's a shiny soul you've got there.
Spirit Curator.evoFlair_: I'm not one to talk, but the world is full of strange folk. Why would anyone trade something as priceless as a soul for a bit of coin? Haha... But that works for me. Just don't come running to me with seller's remorse, all right?

Necroelementist.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Necroelementist.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Necroelementist.baseFlair_: Can you hear the voices of these little ones? They're bitter—bitter toward life and people who are alive. So I long for suffering—suffering of all the arrogant living.
Necroelementist.evoFlair_: Humans caused these little ones to suffer and killed them. As a necromancer I listen to them, and it's my duty to fulfill their wishes. This time it's the humans' turn to suffer.

Goetia Mage.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Destroy an enemy amulet.
Goetia Mage.baseFlair_: Dear me! Look at all this filthy magic swirling around the place! Don't worry though. Thanks to this grimoire, I'll soon have it all in order!
Goetia Mage.evoFlair_: Look, this isn't your domain, you know! This is my world! After all, it's my magic that's filling the place! I think I'll remind you which of us is more powerful.

Bone Chimera.baseFlair_: The bones of two corpses and the souls of two beasts... Add a little dark magic and you have a brutal chimera.
Bone Chimera.evoFlair_: The bones of two corpses and the souls of two beasts... No matter how many times it's cut down or shattered, this bizarre fusion shudders back to life in a new form.

Sora, Martial Artist.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
Sora, Martial Artist.baseFlair_: Shoot a bow? Launch a spell? Hah! That's for total cretins! I crush bones with my fists and tear through flesh with my kicks! That's what battle's all about!
Sora, Martial Artist.evoFlair_: Cheating with weapons—that's not my style! Fight one-to-one, beat 'em one-to-one. Showing 'em what I've got—now that's what they call "spirit!"

Soulcaller.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower (excluding Ghosts) is destroyed during your turn, summon a Ghost.
Soulcaller.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied follower (excluding Ghosts) is destroyed during your turn, summon a Ghost.
Soulcaller.baseFlair_: Yuck, ghosts. Creepy, floaty, little things—we should just send them back to the void where they belong!
Soulcaller.evoFlair_: Ugh, ghosts are the worst, aren't they? The way they just show up out of thin air—let's exterminate these pests already!

Big Soul Hunter.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Destroy a random enemy follower with at least 5 attack.
Big Soul Hunter.baseFlair_: Wherever I look, there are scrubby little souls. But the scrawny ones are so boring. I only care about hunting big souls.
Big Soul Hunter.evoFlair_: Big souls are where it's at. They fill my mouth and my belly. That's why I only go for huge ones.

Fran, Monster Girl.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put a Fran's Attendant or Fran's Curse into your hand.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Put both into your hand instead.
Fran, Monster Girl.baseFlair_: Look, it's right here in this picture book. See, the hero defeats the monster, right? We all want to see a happy ending, so won't you kill me?
Fran, Monster Girl.evoFlair_: The human body is so feeble and frail. Just one little squeeze and all the insides pop out. If you don't want to end up like that, won't you kill me?

Disciple of Silence.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3.
Clash: If the enemy follower has Storm or Rush, give it -2/-0.
Disciple of Silence.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: If the enemy follower has Storm or Rush, give it -2/-0.
Disciple of Silence.baseFlair_: Silence yourself. To speak is to err. Silver tongues glitter, but luster is ephemeral. Find true freedom in quiescence.
Disciple of Silence.evoFlair_:
The Second Record: Meditate
Silver tongues are iron chains. Quiescence is the natural state of both heaven and earth. Nothing eclipses silence.
—Teachings of the Silent Ones

Chris Pumpkinhead.baseEffect_: Last Words: If it is your turn, summon a Ghost.
Chris Pumpkinhead.baseFlair_: So? Whaddya think? Pretty sweet noggin, right? My real one was even nicer though—I was quite the looker! Say! You haven't seen it lying around, have you?
Chris Pumpkinhead.evoFlair_: Hahaaa! So that's where I left my head! This head right here's my calling card! The mark of the lord of the shady part of town! C'mon, you pack of reprobates! What we need here's a little comedy!

Kasha.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random follower with an original attack of 1 and a random follower with an original defense of 1 (excluding Kasha) from your deck into your hand.
Kasha.baseFlair_:
Next, the icebound town was visited by a rain of fire from a flying chariot. Mouths, clenched in lament of the cold, next opened to wail as they burned.
—Demonic Procession, Central Flame
Kasha.evoFlair_:
Mortals have a right to mourn their dead, but this demon robs them even of that. And just where does it take those unfortunate souls?
—Demonic Procession, Kasha in Oral Tradition

Beastly Medium.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Beastly Medium.baseFlair_: A medium invites a specter into her body. The two souls regard each other. "You know that phrase, 'together as one'? I think this is what it means. It means surpassing till-death-do-us-part, so you never have to say goodbye again."
Beastly Medium.evoFlair_:
Spectral animals achieve tranquility when they are left to govern themselves. Mediums from foreign lands fail to understand this. They come in with their clanging metal, disturbing the graves and the repose of the dead.
—Tranquil Resurrection, Part 2

Madame Lich.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Give Bane to all allied followers.
Madame Lich.baseFlair_: Why do people weep when confronted with death? I do not understand it. Death happens every day. It comes to us all regardless of whether or not we are alive.
Madame Lich.evoFlair_: Why fear death? It is your constant companion, always nestled up next to you. It is your destiny. Part of the divine plan. Come, accept your fate.

Everdark Strix.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Put a random Shadowcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
Whenever you perform Burial Rite, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Everdark Strix.evoEffect_: Whenever you perform Burial Rite, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Everdark Strix.baseFlair_: Running won't do one bit of good. Death has eyes that pierce the night. Death flies noiselessly through the darkness—and one day it will land by your side.
Everdark Strix.evoFlair_: Running won't do one bit of good. Death is always there. The night you sleep in is death itself.

Fiendish Wraithknight.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain Last Words - Summon a Fiendish Wraithknight.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain Last Words: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
Fiendish Wraithknight.baseFlair_: Did madness take him before death? Or did death bring forth madness? Those memories must have died long ago, for all that stands before you is despair, madness, and death.
Fiendish Wraithknight.evoFlair_: Along with his will to speak, his past died long ago. All souls will eventually end up here as well, wavering in the valley between madness and death.

Khawy, Underworld Heir.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Khawy, Underworld Heir.baseFlair_: As the successor, I must fulfill my duty and prove myself—I'll steel my heart, my body, all of myself. Whatever it takes, I'll attain such bravery worthy of ruling the Underworld!
Khawy, Underworld Heir.evoFlair_:
"Hehe... He's grown into such a fine warrior."
—Tithi, Nurturing Trainer

"Impressive. We'll increase the difficulty for him."
—Aisha, Stern Trainer

Helio, Sacrosanct Spirit.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Evolve this follower.
Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your opponent's turn summon a Zombie, then remove this effect.
Helio, Sacrosanct Spirit.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your opponent's turn summon a Lich, then remove this effect.
Helio, Sacrosanct Spirit.baseFlair_: Stay where you are. If you value your life, come no further. This place belongs to the dead. It is thick with phantasmal miasma. This is no place for the living. Go back to the world of light.
Helio, Sacrosanct Spirit.evoFlair_: Forgive me... It seems I've expressed myself poorly yet again. You see, my magic is what powers this building. So believe me when I say it's dangerous for the living to come inside.

Fighting Jiangshi.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Reanimate (3).
Evolve this follower if it was summoned using Reanimate.
Fighting Jiangshi.baseFlair_:
Behold, the ultimate technique of the Corrupted Soil Style—Edict of the Armored Corpse! Even without a soul, this shell will stand against the incursion of evil! By my master's orders, you will be punished for your sins!
—Fighting Jiangshi
Fighting Jiangshi.evoFlair_:
Ahahaha! They really made a mess of you, my jiangshi! You've been very useful. I suppose I could let you have that funeral now... But I think I might miss those dramatic monologues of yours.
—Necromancer

Sarcophagus Wraith.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Fabled Treasure.
Enhance (6): Summon a Profane Resurrection. Evolve this follower.
Sarcophagus Wraith.baseFlair_: A beastly revenant sits before the tomb of a king, bidding farewell to the day. "Spectral animals are one with nature. So long as the sun rises and sets, I'll be here waiting. Hey, pal. It'd be nice if our masters reawakened soon, eh?"
Sarcophagus Wraith.evoFlair_:
Are the dead meant to be left in peace? Or are they meant to be roused with a deafening din? Only spirits born from nature know. But remember that death is an acquittal. Souls that find their way back deserve a new beginning.
—Tranquil Resurrection, Part 3

Minthe of the Underworld.baseEffect_:
When this follower comes into play, gain 20 shadows. When this follower leaves play, lose 20 shadows. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
Whenever you perform Necromancy, gain X shadows. X equals the Necromancy cost.
Minthe of the Underworld.baseFlair_: After life comes the void... the eternal void... the cradle of souls. I stand watch... and the souls... come to me.
Minthe of the Underworld.evoFlair_: Silence is the only rule I know. I simply collect souls... but I don't understand what life or souls really mean... I wonder if I ever will...

Rulenye, Omen of Silence.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (3) - Until the start of your next turn, add 3 to the original cost of spells in your opponent's hand. (Only affects cards in hand at the time this effect is activated.)
Rulenye, Omen of Silence.baseFlair_: Shhh. Language breeds both good and evil; only silence creates equality. Close your lips and live in perfection. Behead those who hunger for glory. And, in doing so, we shall put the world to trial.
Rulenye, Omen of Silence.evoFlair_: Storyteller or truthsayer, every speaker must be silenced. Quiescence is tranquility, and the reticent shall be compensated justly. And, in doing so, we shall put the world to trial.

Necrofauna.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
-Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
-Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Necrofauna.baseFlair_: The necromancer frolics with the three dark beasts who love her. "I get along especially well with these three. People were scared of them, saying they're bad luck, but these critters are all really nice. Can you believe they weren't holding a single grudge when they were reborn?"
Necrofauna.evoFlair_: A necromancer and her animal spirits—far more than master and servants. "These critters are the first friends I ever made. They were killed by people who feared them, but they still came to comfort me when I was crying. Thank you for being reborn, so I wouldn't be alone."

Soul Hunt.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Gain 1 shadow.
Soul Hunt.baseFlair_: The underworld is starting to get a little crowded.

Impious Resurrection.baseEffect_: Destroy an allied follower and summon a Lich.
Impious Resurrection.baseFlair_: Die. Then rise and follow me.

Deathbrand.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 3 defense or less. If you have at least 4 shadows, you can perform Necromancy (4) to destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or more instead.

Voices of Resentment.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Ghosts.
Enhance (8): Give the summoned Ghosts Bane.
Voices of Resentment.baseFlair_: Two beckoning hands and a single destination.

Soulsteal.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Burial Rite: Draw a card.
Soulsteal.baseFlair_: I don't need the vessel. Just give me the goods inside it.

Poltergeist.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Ghosts.
Enhance (4): Give all allied followers the following effect - When this card is banished, destroy it instead.
Poltergeist.baseFlair_: There are times when you'd almost be happy to see a ghost.

Foul Tempest.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to each enemy follower.
Necromancy (6): Deal 3 damage instead.
Foul Tempest.baseFlair_: See you on the other side.

Pact with the Nethergod.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or less.
Enhance (7): Then summon a Pluto and give it +X/+Y. X equals the attack and Y equals the defense of that follower.
Pact with the Nethergod.baseFlair_: If you can but satisfy me, I'll make your every wish come true.

Phantasmal Core.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, gain 10 shadows, then banish this amulet.
Phantasmal Core.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated souls. Those who seek rebirth find themselves drawn to its luster.

Deep Dream.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Summon a Ghost.
At the start of your turn, summon a Ghost.
Deep Dream.baseFlair_: A young girl appears in the dreams of those who have abandoned their attachment to life. She links her own dream with theirs, consuming both in the final moment.

Spirit Cycle.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Whenever you perform Necromancy, add 1 to this amulet's Countdown.
Spirit Cycle.baseFlair_: A life is never truly wasted. It can be recycled over and over.

Midnight Haunt.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Gain 13 shadows.
Last Words: Change your number of shadows to 0.
Midnight Haunt.baseFlair_: Will you live long enough to see the morning?

Elder Spartoi Soldier.baseFlair_: Death brings only more death. And so it takes a hold on the world, spreading like a disease.
Elder Spartoi Soldier.evoFlair_: Hear well the rattling, for it is a call to arms. Once the dead have gathered in numbers, they cannot be stopped by the holy.

Guilty Courier.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
Guilty Courier.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
Guilty Courier.baseFlair_: People who waste their days, people who constantly feel unwelcome—even pitiable people like these give me strength when they die. All souls are equal, so you can go in peace.
Guilty Courier.evoFlair_: There are plenty of people who are happy to die. I'm basically doing them a favor. Now how about you? Ever feel there isn't a place for you in this world? 'Cause I've always got a place for you.

Malicious Ghost.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give +2/+0 to a random allied follower.
Malicious Ghost.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give +2/+0 to a random allied follower.
Malicious Ghost.baseFlair_: An incarnation of hatred and madness that awakens malice and bloodlust.
Malicious Ghost.evoFlair_: An epitome of loathing and insanity that is devoid of will. To be possessed by it is to be ruled by malice and bloodlust.

Castor.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If only 1 other allied follower is in play, gain Last Words: Summon a Castor.
Castor.baseFlair_: First I shall sing your praises, Pollux. Brilliant martial artist, you control the flow of battle. Even if ten thousand arrows were to strike you, you would walk away without a scratch.
Castor.evoFlair_: Even though we're separated by that infernal place, we're still brothers and compatriots. My song for you ascends from the depths of the land and reaches the heavens, becoming a star whose light will never fade.

Mummy.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Mummy.baseFlair_: Although they seem slow, they're unexpectedly agile when they find their victims, so don't even think about letting your guard down. —Old Grave Robber
Mummy.evoFlair_: They diligently continue their fated duty, hoping to see the end someday and finally earn their rest. —Old Grave Robber

Sinister Sarcophagus.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 3 Ghosts.
Last Words: Reanimate (2)
Sinister Sarcophagus.baseFlair_: Hey, come closer. I've got a riddle for ya—been saving it for a trespasser. If a handsome, young coffin devours three smelly humans, how many souls are trapped within it for eternity?
Sinister Sarcophagus.evoFlair_: Three? Sorry, man, it's four. You forgot to count me too! Well, guess that means I'm free to go now. Good luck giving out the next riddle!

Zealot of Silence.baseFlair_: Quiet yourself, before I stitch those lips together myself—before I devour that life of yours. Quiescence demands your silence.
Zealot of Silence.evoFlair_: Silence is born beneath the shadows of record. Fragile is silence, shattered by the sound of even a single heartbeat. If true silence cannot arise alone, we shall create it with our own hands.

Bone Drone.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Summon an Assembly Droid.
Bone Drone.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an Assembly Droid.
Bone Drone.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a discarded pile of bones. Fueled by forgotten regrets, it changed form and rose above the earth to take revenge upon the living. —Necromancer's Report, Part 1
Bone Drone.evoFlair_: I cannot quell my excitement. Today is a momentous day. Previously we had thought that cadavers would only move with the help of our spells. If we conduct more research on the core, we'll be able to better handle them still! —Necromancer's Account, Part 1

Soul Snatcher.baseFlair_:
Oh, that old lady? 'Course I know who you mean. She guards the Demonlord's gate, eliminating undesirables. She hasn't changed a bit since I was a boy.
—Village elder's account
Soul Snatcher.evoFlair_:
The secret to longevity? What else!? Staying active keeps your soul young, no matter how wrinkly your hide! But the most important thing is spending quality time with young people... Nyee hee hee!
—Wisdom from an old woman

Dancing Ghost.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Ghost. Then give +1/+0 to all allied Ghosts.
Enhance (8): Summon 3 instead.
Dancing Ghost.baseFlair_: It's not every day you come back to life. So I thought this was my chance to breathe life into my career. But every time I dance, the living skedaddle and the dead salsa over—this is a show, not a seance. Still, I'm not giving up. I may be dead, but my dreams aren't!
Dancing Ghost.evoFlair_:
Spectacular performance! Absolutely breathtaking. Say, why don't you join our act? What's that? You feel a bit apprehensive... because you're a ghost? Ha! Nonsense! That's nothing to worry your spectral head over.
—Arcus, Ghostly Manager

Death Fowl.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (3)
Last Words: Gain 4 shadows.
----------
Fanfare: Gain 4 shadows.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Death Fowl.baseFlair_: The Three of Cups migrate in solidarity. They stay on each other's wings, swooping, swarming, and pecking at their prey. Macabre caws of thanksgiving are given before the feast of flesh.
Death Fowl.evoFlair_: Beware the predators who peck at the soul. Their outstretched wings blot the sun; their foul beaks gnaw at your insides. What you hear are warbles of joy, for their conceit is sated and their bellies full.

Lich.baseFlair_: Roused by the clamoring voices of those who wish to be restored, evil and hatred rise up from beneath the ground.
Lich.evoFlair_: Abandoned bodies are assembled, bone and sinew fused together once more—a new body formed from corpses and pure hatred, a twisted existence neither living nor dead.

Playful Necromancer.baseFlair_: My grandma taught me a little necromancy! I wonder if I can pull it off? Well, here goes!
Playful Necromancer.evoFlair_: Yes! I did it! I summoned two ghosts! Two new friends for me! Hee-hee!

Hell's Unleasher.baseFlair_: King of Demons, can you hear me? You have been sealed away too long. It is time for you to rise. I offer myself to you. Feast upon me and awaken.
Hell's Unleasher.evoFlair_: I have offered you millions of souls. Indeed, there are none remaining in this land... only my own. Here it is. My final offering. Savor it, dear master!

Skull Rider.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Skull Rider.baseFlair_: Eternal life and so much power—I got a lot in return for what I lost. I think I owe the living an arrow or two by way of thanks.
Skull Rider.evoFlair_: I shall live for all eternity. Strike me in the heart if you wish, but nothing can prevent me from charging to the battlefield in search of my enemy.

Necroassassin.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and a random enemy follower.
Necroassassin.baseFlair_: The living are such a bother. I tell them to quiet down, but they just keep breathing and their hearts keep beating.
Necroassassin.evoFlair_: It's so much easier to relax when it's quiet! Now that we have a bunch more dead servants, why don't we head out and make the world even quieter?

Orthrus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. Then give +2/+0 to another random allied follower.
Orthrus.baseFlair_: I'm Orthrus, the little sister of Cerberus, and I intend to prove my worth by wielding the second most powerful flames in the underworld.
Orthrus.evoFlair_: You have no idea who you just picked a fight with, do you? There's no need to bother Cerberus with the likes of you. I'm perfectly capable of sending you to the underworld myself!

Prince Catacomb.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied followers Last Words - Summon a Skeleton.
Prince Catacomb.baseFlair_: Just as all are mortal, all are immortal. Now be free, dear bones of white!
Prince Catacomb.evoFlair_: A single touch of my hand brings immortality to the decaying children of flesh. Now dance, my lovely bones.

Nightmare Executioner.baseFlair_: Our blades are sublime, undefiled. They deserve to be held with pride. One must not, however, become attached to that pride. —Meditations of an Executioner
Nightmare Executioner.evoFlair_: One who is attached to death will become entranced with death. If the sublime is defiled, you will become a living nightmare. —Meditations of an Executioner

Caterpillar of Riddles.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all other allied Neutral followers +1/+1. Deal 2 damage to all other allied Shadowcraft followers.
Caterpillar of Riddles.baseFlair_: Scratch the surface and you'll find another world. Which is true, and which is the lie? I ask you, young lady—which world do you prefer?
Caterpillar of Riddles.evoFlair_: If you prefer that world, you'll grow closer to this one. It's because destinations are never reached that life is interesting.

Mighty Arm Skeleton.baseEffect_: If you have at least 8 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Giant Skull or Hell Lord Skeleton.
Mighty Arm Skeleton.baseFlair_: Even after turning to bones, it clings to the sword, a remnant from its days of knightly service. Its twisted, swollen arm serves as a mark of the monstrosity it has become.
Mighty Arm Skeleton.evoFlair_: It hungered for strength. For strength, it barked, it would pay any price. The necromancer scoffed, responding that he would provide it with limitless strength.

Stygian Warden.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Destroy a random enemy follower.
Stygian Warden.baseFlair_: I am merely another demon who serves under Charon. Her brightness and fervor are notoriously unrivaled, but I'm surprised to see that she's become quite gentle lately.
Stygian Warden.evoFlair_: I am merely another demon who serves under Charon. I'm thankful for my boss's newfound soft demeanor, yet somewhere in my heart I still long for her punishment.

Orthrus, Junior Hellhound.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (3) - Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Orthrus, Junior Hellhound.baseFlair_: I smell challengers! Leave this to me, Cerberus! I'll raze them to the ground with the second most powerful flames in the underworld!
Orthrus, Junior Hellhound.evoFlair_:
Cerberus: I wish she'd settle down a bit.
Charon: She's very dependable, though.

Wight King.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Gain +1/+1, Ward and Bane.
Wight King.baseFlair_: The ruler of the Land of the Dead, a king with countless underlings. He has raised an army of undead warriors to protect the dead from the arrogant meddlings of the living—all in the name of having respect for death.
Wight King.evoFlair_: Some believe life is sacred. Others prefer death. The wight king seeks to squash the arrogant living to defend those who would live while dead. His ambition is to fill the world with the dead, and he will not stop until he is done.

Phantom Dragon.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain Ambush.
Phantom Dragon.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain Ambush.
Phantom Dragon.baseFlair_: This ghostly dragon dwells in a canyon. Long ago in life, it reigned over the region. And now in death continues to protect its domain.
Phantom Dragon.evoFlair_: To drive away the survivors among those who dared to enter its canyon, the dragon covered its kingdom in a dark cloud. Ever since, the land has been a cursed realm of constant lightning strikes.

Ceres of the Night.baseEffect_:
Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Ceres of the Night.evoEffect_:
Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Ceres of the Night.baseFlair_: The sweet nothings you whisper are a red rose—passionate and direct. But I am a blue rose, and we are simply much too different. If you're still after me anyway, then I beg you to please love all of me.
Ceres of the Night.evoFlair_: Blue is the color of the cold night, and red is the color of warm flesh. Haha—surely you'll allow me a nibble. After all, the night has only begun. You will love all of me, won't you?

Apostle of Silence.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with Ward.
Apostle of Silence.baseFlair_: Silence yourself. When the world finally holds its tongue, stillness will prevail. And in that stillness, we will have everlasting equality.
Apostle of Silence.evoFlair_:
The Third Record: Seek Stillness
Silence begets stillness, and stillness begets everlasting equality. Seek the stillness by living in quiescence.
—Teachings of the Silent Ones

Hellfire Hound.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Hellfire Hound.evoEffect_: Evolve: Necromancy (6) - Gain the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 4 times.
Hellfire Hound.baseFlair_: A watchdog belonging to, well, the watchdog of the underworld. The alpha makes frequent trips to the surface, so she needed a beta to stand guard on her behalf.
Hellfire Hound.evoFlair_:
"Woof! It's keeping watch."
"Woof! It's looking at us."
"Well, not like it'd be able to stop me!"
—Cerberus, Hound of Hades

Shuten-Doji.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Necromancy (8) - Recover 1 evolution point.
Shuten-Doji.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower with an original attack or defense of 1, give it Storm. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Shuten-Doji.baseFlair_:
As the people writhed, wreathed in flame, a demon slipped among them and cut them down one after another. His cruelty shook the very foundations of hell.
—Demonic Procession, Rearguard Demon
Shuten-Doji.evoFlair_:
He washes his blade in sake, not to honor the dead but in preparation to add to their ranks. You'd have to be a monster yourself to summon a thing like that.
—Demonic Procession, Shuten-Doji in Oral Tradition

Spellplate Cavalier.baseFlair_: My charming knight. You'd be perfect if you just stopped talking. —Fickle Resurrector
Spellplate Cavalier.evoFlair_: My charming knight. You're mine now. —Fickle Resurrector

Bone Cavalier.baseFlair_: My charming knight. You'd be perfect if you just weren't human. —Fickle Resurrector
Bone Cavalier.evoFlair_: My charming knight. You're mine forever. —Fickle Resurrector

Corpselord of Woe.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
At the start of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Evolve this follower.
Corpselord of Woe.evoEffect_:
(Can attack.)
Last Words: Summon an unevolved Corpselord of Woe.
Corpselord of Woe.baseFlair_: An undead king sealed within an altar. When the flames of life burn within him again, he will bring woe to all the world.
Corpselord of Woe.evoFlair_: An undead king who has risen from the earth in which he was sealed. Flames of resentment grant him insuperable power. The hour of retribution is nigh.

Twilight Queen.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - The next time an allied follower's Last Words effects activate, repeat those effects. (This effect is not stackable.)
Twilight Queen.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - The next time an allied follower's Last Words effects activate, repeat those effects. (This effect is not stackable.)
Twilight Queen.baseFlair_: Dusk. It is the day's end and the night's beginning. Welcome to my borderland, where life and death mingle. Now you are living, and now you are dying.
Twilight Queen.evoFlair_: Both life and death are transient. Who decided that this rule should be unbendable? In my world, all is indistinct—you shall die, and you shall live.

Osiris.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give another allied follower Last Words - Draw a card.
Strike: Gain 2 shadows.
Osiris.evoEffect_:
Strike: Gain 2 shadows.
Last Words: If an allied follower that originally costs 3 play points or less has been destroyed this match, perform Necromancy (5) - Reanimate (3) and Reanimate (1).
Osiris.baseFlair_: Destruction and regeneration. Enlightenment and earthly desire. His scales weigh all of creation, and with his crook, he renders judgment. He rules over Aaru, the heavenly fields which only worthy souls can attain. Though he was rent to pieces, death could not keep him.
Osiris.evoFlair_: Glory and downfall. Justice and atrocity. Sins which cannot be exorcised by his crook and flail will fall before his sword. He was the first mummy and remains the final judge, handing down verdicts absolute. Sooner or later, all will stand before him.

Zebet, Lady of the Flies.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Randomly summon 1 of the following.
-Velocious Beetle
-Virulent Hornet
-Vicious Scorpion
-Vengeful Mantis
-Veiled Shudderfly
Enhance (10): Summon 2 more.
Zebet, Lady of the Flies.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Randomly summon 1 of the following.
-Velocious Beetle
-Virulent Hornet
-Vicious Scorpion
-Vengeful Mantis
-Veiled Shudderfly
Zebet, Lady of the Flies.baseFlair_: The lady of a proud house, her domain reduced to a mountain of corpses. Devouring those who mocked her downfall, she was reborn. Now her name is spoken only in reverence. Drawn by her captivating perfume, beetles swarm over her flawless skin.
Zebet, Lady of the Flies.evoFlair_: Her lips part to utter curses and beetles swarm forth. Lovely as her outer shell may be, infection teems within. Can you hear the thousand skittering legs? The voices of Hell clamoring beneath her skin? A multitude of tiny wings come bearing the world's undoing.

Aenea, Amethyst Rebel.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there are no allied Roly-Poly Mk Is in play, summon 1. Otherwise, put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
At the end of your turn, activate the above effect.
Aenea, Amethyst Rebel.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, if there are no allied Roly-Poly Mk Is in play, summon 1. Otherwise, put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
Aenea, Amethyst Rebel.baseFlair_: Rebelling against the world... That's scary. What can I do? I'm just junk. But, but... I guess I'm not alone.
Aenea, Amethyst Rebel.evoFlair_: I'll fight. For the future. If my sisters are with me, I can do it. I might only be useless junk, but I'll fight with all my heart!

Aisha, Underworld Sovereign.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 16 shadows, invoke this card, then lose 8 shadows.
When another allied follower attacks and deals damage to the enemy leader, if this follower hasn't attacked this turn, perform Necromancy (8): Evolve this follower.
Aisha, Underworld Sovereign.baseFlair_: As the sovereign, I must prepare the successor—his regimen must be severe, for his strength must be unparalleled. Upon ascension, none would dare to deny him his rightful place on the throne.
Aisha, Underworld Sovereign.evoFlair_:
"You've so much kindness and love to share—it's just all pent up inside of you..."
—Tithi, Smiling
"I just don't understand... What kindness? What love?"
—Khawy, Shaken

Lara, Soul Taker.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a copy of an allied follower (excluding Lara, Soul Taker) that was destroyed during this turn into your hand. Change its cost to 0 and give it the following effect: Destroy this follower at the end of your turn.
Lara, Soul Taker.baseFlair_: Their lingering regrets are what keep them so ripe! Fresh picked souls really are the best... Just look at them wriggle—they're so desperate to return to this world!
Lara, Soul Taker.evoFlair_: Maybe I'll even get seconds! A cornucopia of flavorful souls, ripe for the picking! With this many choices, I've gotta try 'em all at least once!

Shinobu, Mausoleum Medium.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower. Then, if the selected follower had 4 defense or less before damage was dealt, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Shinobu, Mausoleum Medium.baseFlair_: There are a lot more spirits around than people think. Look, there's one now. Haha, don't be scared. All the spirits are smiling at you.
Shinobu, Mausoleum Medium.evoFlair_: A medium's work is not much fun. Still, I want to save as many spirits as I can. That's always the first thing on my mind when I meet one.

Velocious Beetle.baseFlair_: A speedy fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. It constantly hungers for the taste of souls.
Velocious Beetle.evoFlair_: A high-velocity fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings. Its fangs constantly glisten with fresh blood.

Virulent Hornet.baseFlair_: A virulent fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. The poison in its stinger melts flesh and bone alike.
Virulent Hornet.evoFlair_: A lethal fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings. The poison in its stinger can melt even the purest soul.

Vicious Scorpion.baseFlair_: An armored fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. Its chitinous shell deflects the wishes of the living.
Vicious Scorpion.evoFlair_: An impervious fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings. Its chitinous shell deflects the hopes of the living.

Vengeful Mantis.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
Vengeful Mantis.baseFlair_: A vengeful fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. Its sickle-like appendages are capable of cleaving even the hopes of the living.
Vengeful Mantis.evoFlair_: A slaying fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings.It sharpens its sickle-like appendages on the despair of the dead.

Veiled Shudderfly.baseFlair_: A veiled fiend summoned by the warped buzz of wings. Not even the gods can see past its camouflage.
Veiled Shudderfly.evoFlair_: An intangible fiend summoned by the crazed buzz of wings. Its camouflage drives any unfortunate onlookers into madness.

Roly-Poly Mk I.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
Roly-Poly Mk I.baseFlair_: Fighting Is Real Scary... All I'm Good At Is Having A Hard Head. But, Aenea! It'll Be A-Okay! I'll Be Here For Ya, No Matter What!
Roly-Poly Mk I.evoFlair_: You always make me laugh... And when I cry, you always make me feel better. You're the best, Roly. —Aenea

Call of the Void.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower.
Necromancy (4): Summon a Lich.
Call of the Void.baseFlair_: And now to a place deeper than any darkness you've ever known.

Curse of Rebirth.baseEffect_: Give +2/+0 to an allied follower. That follower gains Last Words: Summon a Zombie.

Fatal Order.baseEffect_:
Reanimate (10).
Give that follower Rush and the following effect: Banish this follower at the start of your next turn.

Phantom Howl.baseEffect_:
Necromancy (1): Summon a Ghost.
Repeat for remaining shadows or until your area is full. (An area can hold 5 cards.)
Phantom Howl.baseFlair_: The seductive calls of the ghosts tear apart the night and rend the living.

Skull Ring.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Summon 2 Skeletons.
Last Words: Reanimate (2)
Skull Ring.baseFlair_: The ring sat still, cold as death. Yet, I reached out to touch it—anything to bring back my family.

Fatal Fields.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, destroy a random allied follower and a random enemy follower.

Death's Ledger.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put a random Shadowcraft follower that costs less than your total number of play point orbs from your deck into play. Then destroy that follower.
Death's Ledger.baseFlair_: The fates of the living are ultimately decided by the words inscribed by Death.

Gravewaker.baseFlair_: You intend to bury me? Forget it. The markings carved into my flesh grant me eternal life.
Gravewaker.evoFlair_: Scorch my flesh and break my bones—still you cannot stop me. Isn't that wonderful?

Soul Eater.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Soul Eater.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Soul Eater.baseFlair_: Virtuous souls and evil souls. They are both equally sweet to one who has no soul at all.
Soul Eater.evoFlair_: The souls which float above battlefields are eaten up one by one. Once this demon consumes them, all traces of life are lost forever.

Commander of Destruction.baseFlair_: A faceless apparition that commands the twilight. It feasts on death to gain strength.
Commander of Destruction.evoFlair_: A savage phantom that commands the twilight. It reaps souls with its cruel scythe to increase the stores of the underworld.

Dark Bladefiend.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (2): Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Dark Bladefiend.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (2): Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Dark Bladefiend.baseFlair_: Living's so bitter, so I'll kill you. I'll do it again and again, until you get bored of it. But don't worry—I don't bore so easily.
Dark Bladefiend.evoFlair_: Living's so painful, so I'll kill you. I'll do it as many times as you want. Just say when you don't want to be killed anymore, okay? Although I guess you can't really talk when you're dead.

Death the Nyctophile.baseFlair_: The clatter of the scythe is a lonely god of death / The clatter of the scythe is the lonely god's behest —Provincial verse
Death the Nyctophile.evoFlair_: The lonely god of death sweeps his scythe / The lonely god of death has a new friend tonight —Provincial verse

Melancholic Medium.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Ghost.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Ghost.
Melancholic Medium.baseFlair_: A life doesn't end at death. Prepare to be born again when your soul is finally liberated from this body.
Melancholic Medium.evoFlair_: Control the spirits? Absolutely preposterous. I too, will be reborn one day... I don't know about you, but I plan to enjoy my second life.

Netherworld Horseman.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Netherworld Horseman.baseFlair_: Somewhere in the abyss of the underworld, he resides in a kingdom of fire. Clad in a flame capable of burning souls, he is well acquainted with the blaze that feasts on mortal life.
Netherworld Horseman.evoFlair_:
"This guy's flames burn the hottest... After Cerberus and me, of course!"
—Orthrus

Marian the Mummy.baseEffect_:
Can only attack the enemy leader.
Ignore Ward.
Marian the Mummy.evoEffect_:
Storm.
(Can attack any enemy.)
Ignore Ward.
Marian the Mummy.baseFlair_:
Mrr-mm-mrph? Mm... mrr-mphr-mph?
(Where am I? A sarcophagus?
It's so cramped in here... I can't breathe...)
Marian the Mummy.evoFlair_: Oh my god, thank you! I can't believe I totally spaced on my mission to protect the country! You're a lifesaver! Without you I'd never have remembered! Or gotten out of that cramped little tomb! Hehe! Meeting you was total kismet!

Lonesome Specter.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your opponent's turn summon 2 Ghosts, then remove this effect.
Lonesome Specter.baseFlair_: Just before they died, the twins swore to each other they would do their best to remain together, even in the afterlife. That wish was granted in the most twisted way. But indeed, there is no space for anyone to come betwixt these two souls again.
Lonesome Specter.evoFlair_:
Upon waking, the spirit, sensing the presence of her other half, sets out in pursuit. From dawn till dusk, she searches, crying, "Where can my older sister be?"
From dusk till dawn, almost the same voice cries, "Where has my younger sister gone?"

Whole-Spirited Necromancer.baseFlair_: Why, good morning! How are you feeling? Oh, how rude of me. I haven't introduced myself. I'm your murderer. And also your savior. And guess what? We're going to be buds from now on. Come on—let's shake on it!
Whole-Spirited Necromancer.evoFlair_: Stop sulking. Listen, you were sick anyway. Hanging to life by a thin thread. And if I hadn't been the one to kill you, I wouldn't have been able to revive you. Hey. I promise, everything's going to be fine. Being undead's not bad. Why? Well, because I'm around!

Soul Box.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any allied amulets in play, evolve this follower.
Soul Box.baseFlair_: A treasure chest is like a door to the future. All that glitters within its confines will afford you a happier tomorrow, yet death can just as easily slam the lid closed. But who decides that outcome: the gods or something worse? —An Adventurer's Musings
Soul Box.evoFlair_:
It's not a box, per se, but a gateway: one that opens up to Amenta itself, and, once it slams shut behind you, will never let you leave. Don't bother trying to force the door open either; you'll know if it wants you to go through.
—An Adventurer's Musings

Soul Glutton.baseFlair_: Mmm... Delicious! There's nothing tastier than a soul that's been marinated in darkness. Once you've tasted one, nothing else can satisfy!
Soul Glutton.evoFlair_: This soul's pretty tasty too, but it's lacking a certain... richness. Maybe I didn't inflict enough pain on its owner? Heh-heh-heh!

Soulhungry Wraith.baseFlair_: It's so... cold... It hurts... Please give me some warmth... Give me your soul... Your toasty, fresh dead soul...
Soulhungry Wraith.evoFlair_: Ahhh... Warm souls... The cracks of my broken heart, filled... The warmth is spreading... Yes... Yes! It is time to seek more souls!

Dullahan.baseFlair_: A ghost of a knight who continues to charge across the battlefield despite having lost his life long ago. Night after night his trusty steed neighs as he raises his blade, ready for another assault.
Dullahan.evoFlair_: Consumed by an envy of all those who've retained their heads, the ghostly knight continues his frenzy of decapitation. Bringing terror wherever he goes, it is little wonder he is known as the harbinger of doom.

Charon.baseFlair_: Only the dead can cross the River Styx. You can't go any further.
Charon.evoFlair_: You really want to cross, don't you? Since you're so eager, I suppose I'll help you die.

Dolorblade Warrior.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and gain +2/+2.
Dolorblade Warrior.baseFlair_: This one feeds on souls to grow, so fear not. You'll serve as my nourishment in death.
Dolorblade Warrior.evoFlair_: Not enough... Not nearly enough. No offering so meager could ever satisfy me, so hand over your soul.

Hresvelgr.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, draw a card.
Hresvelgr.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, draw a card.
Hresvelgr.baseFlair_: A carrion bird that feeds on souls. It dives into the underworld and relishes the taste of wandering spirits.
Hresvelgr.evoFlair_: A carrion bird that swoops down on the battlefield to feed on souls. It favors the sweet taste of souls formed in riotous chaos.

Robozombie.baseFlair_: It began as a cadaver that was damaged to the point of being useless, but when we combined it with a machine it suddenly started to move. Thanks to this discovery, we will have countless more tools at our disposal. —Necromancer's Report, Part 2
Robozombie.evoFlair_: I cannot stop laughing. Technology can be used to supplement countless numbers of souls. I'd like to see just how many cadavers I can command with the power of that strange machine. —Necromancer's Account, Part 2

Ceridwen.baseFlair_: Life and death, beauty and ugliness... I control them all. They all belong to me!
Ceridwen.evoFlair_: I'm the only one who matters. All others are nothing more than my thralls... And you'll soon be just one more of my playthings.

Ded Moroz.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy all other allied Shadowcraft followers. Restore X defense to your leader. X equals the number of other allied Shadowcraft followers.
Ded Moroz.baseFlair_: Lost young lady, I'd be happy to help. Let me show you warmth in the frigid night. Reach out your hand and take mine.
Ded Moroz.evoFlair_: Poor young lady, your loyalty to wishes and illusions is admirable. You've answered my questions well, so I'll return you home by the light.

Crow, Regent of Darkness.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put an Infernal Crown or Descent into Madness into your hand.
Crow, Regent of Darkness.baseFlair_:
The crow's domain is death and darkness. Drop by drop, the bright serum of life pools in its crown. That gleaming ichor can make dead men dance or drive the living to madness.
—Chapter 3, Encyclopedia of Demonic Harbingers
Crow, Regent of Darkness.evoFlair_:
Life's bright ichor drips from the crown. Caught in the empty vessel of a dead man, it fills the void and makes him dance. But caught in the vessel of a living man, it floods the soul and drives him mad.
—Chapter 4, Encyclopedia of Demonic Harbingers

Immortal Elephant.baseEffect_:
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Last Words: Give a random allied Naterran Great Tree Last Words - Summon an Immortal Elephant.
Immortal Elephant.baseFlair_: The ground shakes. The massive, immortal elephant trumpets its battle cry. "Today's giant elephant vs human battle was another smashing success. The spectral beast circus has a devoted following. Rebirth can mean finding a whole new way of life."
Immortal Elephant.evoFlair_:
The immortal elephant rises no matter how often it is struck down, to the thunderous applause of the audience.
"That elephant—Paono—is a real pro. So intelligent! And there's plenty of things he can do that the living couldn't. Being reborn can really expand a performer's repertoire!"

Cerberus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put Coco and Mimi into your hand.
Cerberus.baseFlair_: "Woof! You can never enter the underworld!" "Woof! I won't let you through this gate!" "Sorry, but we can't let you go any further! Come back when you're dead!"
Cerberus.evoFlair_: "Woof! Are you going to the surface?" "Woof! Are you going to take us with you?" "You certainly are pushy, but I guess we can follow you for a little bit!"

Underworld Ruler Aisha.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Necromancy (10) - Evolve this follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Gain Storm.
Underworld Ruler Aisha.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Underworld Ruler Aisha.baseFlair_: As long as my reign is true, you shall face death—a fitting fate for any trespasser of my domain. Repent to that person and beg for forgiveness.
Underworld Ruler Aisha.evoFlair_: For tainting our pride, don't think for an instant you'll be able to make it out of here alive. Wander for eternity with that person.

Cerberus, Hound of Hades.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound and a Coco, Left Paw Hellhound.
Cerberus, Hound of Hades.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give all other allied followers Last Words - Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Cerberus, Hound of Hades.baseFlair_:
"Woof! You're a funny lookin' playmate!"
"Woof! Just right, if you ask me!"
"You ready? 'Cuz we're just itchin' to go at it with ya!"
Cerberus, Hound of Hades.evoFlair_:
Charon: Heh... How cute. I wouldn't get so cocky if I were you.
Orthrus: You're in for it now—my sister's flames are the fiercest in the underworld!

Ceres, Eternal Bride.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put an Eternal Vow into your hand.
Clash: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Ceres, Eternal Bride.evoEffect_:
Clash: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Ceres, Eternal Bride.baseFlair_: This is far from the first time, but... if you're willing to pledge your eternity to me, I will gladly embrace you. So close your eyes. Only for a moment though; we will be together forever soon enough.
Ceres, Eternal Bride.evoFlair_: Till death do us part? Don't expect me to be satisfied by such a trite turn of phrase. Swear to me. Swear that you'll love me forever, even after death...

Lubelle, Necrofamily.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. Summon a Necrofauna.
Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree is destroyed, summon a Necrofauna.
Lubelle, Necrofamily.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Naterran Great Tree is destroyed, summon a Necrofauna.
Lubelle, Necrofamily.baseFlair_:
Animal spirits gather round to hear her tales.
"There's so much to see and do in this world—who could be satisfied with a single lifespan? But you can keep on going if you want. That's the miracle of rebirth."
Lubelle, Necrofamily.evoFlair_:
A kind voice beckons. Animal spirits flock to its owner.
"The world is so vast, many souls get lost after returning. Will you all come with me to find them? We need to let them know what a miraculous gift their rebirth is."

Nightmare Devourer.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Summon a Nightmare Devourer. Repeat for remaining shadows or until your area is full.
Last Words: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Restore 2 defense to your leader.
-Gain 2 shadows.
Nightmare Devourer.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Restore 2 defense to your leader.
-Gain 2 shadows.
Nightmare Devourer.baseFlair_: Why come back from the dead? To once again taste the sweetness of sleep. So is the nature of the spectral baku. It wanders in an eternal dream—dragging in those from the outside that would try to disturb it, leaving halcyon silence in its wake.
Nightmare Devourer.evoFlair_:
Hey, beast. Sorry, but I can't accept these terms. You want to know my policy? It's this: I'll sleep when I'm alive. Keeps the soul burning. Don't get it? Here, let me play you a number: "Midday Death Napper."
—He Who Once Rocked

VI. Milteo, The Lovers.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Burial Rite (2) - Reanimate (X) and Reanimate (Y). X and Y equal 6 split randomly.
(To perform Burial Rite (2), there must be at least 2 open spaces in your area after this follower comes into play.)
Enhance (9): Do not perform Burial Rite. Evolve this follower instead.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
Last Words: Draw 2 cards.
VI. Milteo, The Lovers.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, destroy 6 other random followers. Then, if the enemy leader has 7 defense or more, deal damage to them until their defense drops to 6.
VI. Milteo, The Lovers.baseFlair_:
Holy vows is what we wanted. Right, darling?
We are The Lovers, enjoying mutual affection.
It's always in our heart to stay together till the end.
Embrace me, darling. You won't have to go it alone.
VI. Milteo, The Lovers.evoFlair_:
Matrimony is what we desired. True, my dear.
We are The Lovers, enjoying lustful temptation.
But should we split, we'll share love with many others.
Speak to me, dear. What kind of love do you desire?

Bone Blast.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Skeletons.
Deal damage to an enemy follower equal to the number of allied Skeletons in play.
Bone Blast.baseFlair_: The delusions of the departed—a perfect weapon for the living.

Sow Death, Reap Life.baseEffect_:
Reanimate (X)
X equals your current turn number.
Sow Death, Reap Life.baseFlair_: Inflated with souls, one day the cyclone will consume its final soul upon reaching nirvana, and all will become one.

Friends Forever.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Luna's Game or Aenea's Friendship.
Necromancy (4): Instead Reanimate (4), Reanimate (2), Reanimate (1), restore 4 defense to your leader, and put a Fleeting Joy into your hand.
Friends Forever.baseFlair_: A chance encounter brought together two souls. Friendship gave life to courage, and courage blossomed into hope. Maybe the meeting wasn't accidental; maybe it was fated all long. "I can fight. I'm not alone anymore, and that makes me strong!"

Forbidden Art.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
Necromancy (20): Deal 10 damage instead.
Forbidden Art.baseFlair_:
Cycle as does life; bite as does the serpent.
Reversal of providence, the bonds' inner workings.
Not am I now but the miracle's reversal.

Eternal Potion.baseFlair_: Use my knowledge to live for an eternity. —Ceridwen, Eternity Hunter

Profane Resurrection.baseEffect_:
When an allied follower is destroyed, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon a Lich and a Zombie.
Profane Resurrection.baseFlair_: One does not cling to life without first grasping fear.

Fabled Treasure.baseEffect_:
When an allied follower is destroyed, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Draw 2 cards. Restore 2 defense to your leader. Gain 2 shadows.
Fabled Treasure.baseFlair_: If you really want the gold, you musn't be afraid to be a little reckless.

Ghostly Rider.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Give Ward to a random allied follower.
Ghostly Rider.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Give Ward to a random allied follower.
Ghostly Rider.baseFlair_: Once upon a time, a knight fell in love. He sacrificed everything to protect the object of his affections: money, status, reputation—even his own life.
Ghostly Rider.evoFlair_: Night after night the pitiable cavalier who fell in love with a fairy prowls the forest. But the object of his affections is no more. She does not even exist in his memory.

Ebon Reaper.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Give Bane to a random allied follower.
Ebon Reaper.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Give Bane to a random allied follower.
Ebon Reaper.baseFlair_: If you want to take lives, you have to be the ebon itself. You need to embrace the darkness in your heart and sharpen the barbs of your every murderous impulse.
Ebon Reaper.evoFlair_: A truly ebon heart is free of any corrupting influences, and it drinks even the blood that spurts out of victims. So be ever-diligent in your quest to extinguish lives.

Necropolis Queen.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, draw a card.
Necropolis Queen.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, draw a card.
Necropolis Queen.baseFlair_: Do not fear death. Your souls are my lifeblood. They will live on forever within me.
Necropolis Queen.evoFlair_: Death is calling you—inviting you towards eternity. Come, give yourself to it. Allow me to drink deeply of your soul.

Cloistered Sacristan.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (4)
Whenever you perform Burial Rite, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon a Cloistered Sacristan.
----------
Ward.
Cloistered Sacristan.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Burial Rite - Randomly destroy 1 of the enemy followers with the highest attack in play and restore 3 defense to your leader.
Cloistered Sacristan.baseFlair_: Heed the Three of Wands, guideposts of empathy. May their sympathies help you overcome the stalemate of purgatory. Walk forward with confidence; the wands mark the way.
Cloistered Sacristan.evoFlair_: I oversee the dead; my pact is with this cemetery. Our bonds can't be severed even in death—much is learned from a pile of corpses. Death is a part of us, and we are part of death. Neither is more important than the other.

Deathly Tyrant.baseFlair_: By the time you notice the rotten smell, it is too late. You are already inside the dead dragon's stomach.
Deathly Tyrant.evoFlair_: The dragon never stops eating, and yet its hunger refuses to be sated. The meat it devours slips out of the gaps between its bones and falls upon the ground. The dragon thereupon slurps it up once more and emits a howl of greed.

Balor.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
Balor.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.
Balor.baseFlair_: I am Balor. To behold my eyes is to face calamity most dire!
Balor.evoFlair_: With these eyes I'll transform this battlefield into a hell on earth! Those who face me will shed tears of blood until they perish!

Odile, Black Swan.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon an enemy Odette, White Swan. Then evolve this follower.
Odile, Black Swan.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Odile, Black Swan.baseFlair_: Only you can alter my fate—only you, dear. Please save me from this world of darkness; please kiss me.
Odile, Black Swan.evoFlair_: Is white the same as goodness? No, white is the color of the void—of utter meaninglessness. Please choose me. I promise to embrace your love and let it infuse me.

Skeleton Prince.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Skeleton Knight.
Last Words: Summon a Skeleton.
Skeleton Prince.baseFlair_: Don't you know who my father is? Get on the ground and show some respect!
Skeleton Prince.evoFlair_: The life of a prince is dreadfully boring sometimes. You came just in time, I was looking for a distraction... You'll be begging for mercy when I'm done with you!

Charon, Stygian Ferrywoman.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random 5-play point Shadowcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
Charon, Stygian Ferrywoman.evoEffect_: Evolve: Necromancy (5) - Subtract 5 from the cost of a Shadowcraft follower in your hand until the end of the turn.
Charon, Stygian Ferrywoman.baseFlair_: I don't enjoy fighting, but guiding lost souls is my duty. So allow me to guide you, lost one... to the fiery depths of the underworld.
Charon, Stygian Ferrywoman.evoFlair_:
Cerberus: Ooh... I just got a chill down my spine.
Orthrus: Charon is terrifying when she's angry!

Ceridwen, Eternity Hunter.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put an Eternal Potion or Instant Potion into your hand.
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
Ceridwen, Eternity Hunter.baseFlair_: Moment after moment makes an eternity. Insight upon insight makes omniscience. Not yet but some day, I'll surpass every living soul and become my true self.
Ceridwen, Eternity Hunter.evoFlair_: You'd be more useful as my pawn than as a fool. So, listen, fool. Your life's already mine!

Death's Breath.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Zombies.
Necromancy (6): Give +0/+1 and Ward to allied Zombies.
Death's Breath.baseFlair_: Look, there's your mother on the right, then your father, and then your little brother on the left. Wait, or was it the other way around?

Eternal Vow.baseEffect_: Subtract 2 from the cost of all Shadowcraft cards in your hand.
Eternal Vow.baseFlair_:
A fleeting moment of intimacy.
Or perhaps the bitter start of eternity.
Regardless of the outcome, you will share it with her.

Infernal Crown.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, if this card's Countdown is at 3, Reanimate (8). If it's at 2, Reanimate (10). If it's at 1, Reanimate (12).
Infernal Crown.baseFlair_:
The dead are but empty vessels.
Crude, earthen cups drained by the god of death.
Pour, then! Fill the vessel and make it dance.

Cursed Soldier.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
Cursed Soldier.baseFlair_: Those who are dead and who envy the living, imbue my scythe with your resentment! Let us hunt together!
Cursed Soldier.evoFlair_: Do you suffer? Do you hate? Are you filled with bitterness? Then follow me! Let us stain the moon red with blood!

Orcus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Orcus.baseFlair_: What is death? Death is nourishment. It is our nourishment as a god of death.
Orcus.evoFlair_: If we move our fingers to weave their fate, the weak become our prey in a matter of moments. Heh-heh, consider yourself lucky that I'm full right now.

Mad Hatter.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower is in play, destroy that follower and summon a Tin Soldier.
Mad Hatter.baseFlair_: Do you have business with a mad hatter? I brought one man's hat right with me, but nothing for young ladies unfortunately.
Mad Hatter.evoFlair_: Days like these are the best, miss. That's doubly true for the world you're from! Just give it some thought. You don't want to make any regrets.

Undead King.baseFlair_: Kingdoms fall, palaces crumble, entire populations perish. And yet true royalty always prevails.
Undead King.evoFlair_: Your king has returned and must be praised! We have cheated death, achieved immortality, and returned to the world of the living! Now come, my subjects! It is time to rebuild our kingdom!

Underworld Watchman Khawy.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play and then restore X defense to your leader. X equals that follower's attack.
Underworld Watchman Khawy.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play and then restore X defense to your leader. X equals that follower's attack.
Underworld Watchman Khawy.baseFlair_: We are guardians of the dead in the service of Nephthys, goddess of Amenta. We bring death to those who disturb the sleep of the departed, and send them to the underworld.
