Underworld Watchman Khawy.evoFlair_: Vile grave-robbers, you've blasphemed against the dead, so your fates are sealed! Prepare to be judged by the goddess of Amenta!

Anubis.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Burial Rite - Randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
Anubis.baseFlair_: These scales dictate the fate of souls by measuring the weight of their sins. Will you put yours to the test?
Anubis.evoFlair_: The guardian of the scales dons the mask of a beast, never erring in judgment. Today, the scale shifts the feather of truth towards the heavens once again.

Tithi, Underworld Shaman.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Put a random 3-play point follower and a random 1-play point follower from your deck into play.
Tithi, Underworld Shaman.baseFlair_:
As a shaman, her duties include relieving successors to the throne of pain and stress—with her sweet, sweet embraces and coddling.
"Just let me heal you with all my love! Huff... Puff..."
Tithi, Underworld Shaman.evoFlair_:
"Behave yourself... Not in front of everyone."
—Aisha

"Ngh... Such strength... I... Urk!"
—Khawy

Fickle Resurrector.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 6 shadows, Necromancy (6) - Choose: Summon a Spellplate Cavalier or Bone Cavalier.
Fickle Resurrector.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve all allied Spellplate Cavaliers and Bone Cavaliers.
Fickle Resurrector.baseFlair_: If you insist, then fine—I'll bring your boyfriend back to life. A brave knight of few words? Hahaha, he must have been so charming.
Fickle Resurrector.evoFlair_: Oh, I'm sorry. He was just so charming that I had to make him my own. But see! Don't you think he looks better with me?

Gluttonous Empress.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put a Shadowcraft follower (excluding Gluttonous Empress) that costs X play points or less from your deck into play, then destroy that follower. X equals your total number of play point orbs.
Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Gluttonous Empress.evoEffect_: Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Gluttonous Empress.baseFlair_: Excuse me, is this the banquet hall? I heard there was going to be a feast. Oh, please. Don't go to any trouble on my account. All you have to do is stay reeeal still for me...
Gluttonous Empress.evoFlair_: To me, the best part of the feast isn't the souls. It's the flesh of my plump and succulent fellow demons... The bones of my wretched compatriots. That's what makes me salivate. I don't have an invitation... but I know I can depend on your hospitality.

Lord of the Flies.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly summon 1 of the following - Velocious Beetle, Virulent Hornet, or Vicious Scorpion.
At the start of your turn, randomly summon 1 of the following: Velocious Beetle, Virulent Hornet, or Vicious Scorpion.
Lord of the Flies.evoEffect_: At the start of your turn, randomly summon 1 of the following: Velocious Beetle, Virulent Hornet, or Vicious Scorpion.
Lord of the Flies.baseFlair_: A noble lord of the underworld, served by grotesque vermin that devour any who would harm their master.
Lord of the Flies.evoFlair_: Seated upon a mountain of skulls, the lord calmly partakes of his meal. There's no hurry. After all, the souls of the underworld are countless.

Demonlord Eachtar.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Necromancy (3) - Summon a Zombie. Repeat for remaining shadows or until your area is full.
Fanfare: Give all other allied followers +2/+0 and Rush until the end of the turn.
Demonlord Eachtar.baseFlair_: The sun rose and set a hundred times before we finally managed to take that fiend's head. It looked like the nightmare had finally ended—until the god of the underworld aided our nemesis. —Chapter 4, Notes on Gods and Demons
Demonlord Eachtar.evoFlair_: The nethergod returned him to life as a headless horseman, and he sped away into the dark. So it falls upon us to prepare for the next war, when he will surely haunt us again. —Chapter 19, Notes on Gods and Demons

Dark Alice.baseEffect_: Last Words: Banish all allied Shadowcraft cards in play and summon a Dark Alice. At the start of your next turn, banish all Shadowcraft cards in your hand and your deck.
Dark Alice.evoEffect_: Last Words: Banish all allied Shadowcraft cards in play and summon an unevolved Dark Alice. At the start of your next turn, banish all Shadowcraft cards in your hand and your deck.
Dark Alice.baseFlair_: Lands of wonders, lands of marvels! Anything you wish for will come true! I was born because that's what you wished for, Alice.
Dark Alice.evoFlair_: If the world changes, I'll have to change too. Isn't that scary to think about? I don't want the world to change, and I don't want to change either. So I'm going to stay an illusion.

Mail of Obliteration.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add X to this follower's attack. X equals the number of allied followers destroyed during this match.
Mail of Obliteration.baseFlair_: A cage of life or perhaps a literal living hell, this undying armor harbors tens of thousands of souls. It is a supernatural being that extends its life by feeding on death. —Demonic Recollections, Chapter 6
Mail of Obliteration.evoFlair_: It shines with animus; it radiates malice. Behind its breastplate, indignation melds with despair as souls swirl in a stygian eddy that surpasses the pits of hell. —Demonic Recollections, Chapter 7

Hinterland Ghoul.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 10 Skeletons into your hand.
At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to all enemies if you have at least 30 shadows.
Hinterland Ghoul.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage to all enemies if you have at least 30 shadows.
Hinterland Ghoul.baseFlair_: Beyond the land's end. Beyond the world's end. Beyond the netherworld's end. It lurks outside all perception. One need only to wait patiently for it.
Hinterland Ghoul.evoFlair_: Shrouded away in a mist of souls, it cannot be seen. Is it only one? Are there two or more? When it finally springs into action, the world may well end.

Arcus, Ghostly Manager.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever you play a follower that originally costs 3 play points or less, destroy that follower and summon X Ghosts. X equals the original cost of that follower. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Arcus, Ghostly Manager.baseFlair_: Ah, welcome, and thank you for coming! Our theater is exquisitely stimulating. Life dances here, and death sings. The curtain's about to rise on a tale to surpass your imagination.
Arcus, Ghostly Manager.evoFlair_: Is this a comedy of hatred, or a tragedy of anomie? That's for you to decide. Now please sit back, relax, and enjoy the show.

Colossal Skull Lord.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if any other allied Machina followers are in play, deal 4 damage to all enemy followers. Otherwise, deal 4 damage to all other followers.
Colossal Skull Lord.baseFlair_: The corpses wriggled and moved, fusing together and growing in size. The consumed became one with its gruesome form as bitter tears streamed down their faces. The mountainous mass of bone and machinery roared as it wreaked its havoc. —Necromancer's Report, Part 3
Colossal Skull Lord.evoFlair_: That was fascinating. I never dreamed it was possible to control so many bones at once. It feels as though machines were made to be used by necromancers. Now then... There's not a soul left in this town, so I suppose it's time to find a new audience to feed my magic.

Hades, Father of Purgatory.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (6): Deal 3 damage to all followers. Summon a Path to Purgatory. Put a 7-play point Hades, Father of Purgatory (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Last Words: Summon a Path to Purgatory. Gain 6 shadows.
Hades, Father of Purgatory.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Path to Purgatory. Gain 6 shadows.
Hades, Father of Purgatory.baseFlair_: In the grip of his hands is the great equalizer of purgatory—the blade demands veneration from all who would behold the manifestation of darkness itself.
Hades, Father of Purgatory.evoFlair_: The bringer of death incarnate usurps the light from all creation. No lightning shall ever be permitted to strike before him. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.

Arcus, Soulful Manager.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (3): Countdown (10)
Can't be destroyed or banished by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by Countdown.)
Whenever an allied follower evolves, summon a Ghost and subtract 2 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon an Arcus, Soulful Manager.
----------
Can't be destroyed or banished by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
At the end of your turn, change this follower's attack and defense to X/X. X equals your current turn number.
Arcus, Soulful Manager.baseFlair_: A symphony of screams—a performance to curdle the blood and stand each hair on end! No need to be shy! Come right up to the stage! This play was written especially for you—I'm certain you'll enjoy it!
Arcus, Soulful Manager.evoFlair_: Why, whatever is the matter? You've gone quite pale. The actors look familiar, you say? Well, of course they do. They're all the people you've killed. A comeuppance makes for a satisfying ending, don't you agree? Now! Time for the climax!

Mist of Extinction.baseEffect_: Destroy all enemy followers with 4 defense or less.
Mist of Extinction.baseFlair_: Cold, heavy, oppressive. The mist and death are rather alike. —Death's Dirge, Chapter 5

Spectral Cascade.baseEffect_:
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of this turn, summon Zombies until your area is full.
Enhance (9): Randomly put different Shadowcraft followers from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those followers.
Spectral Cascade.baseFlair_:
"Shorthanded? Perhaps I could be of assistance."
—Arcus, Ghostly Manager

Path to Perdition.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Burial Rite - Reanimate (7).
During your turn, whenever an allied follower is summoned using Reanimate, perform Necromancy (4): Give it Storm.
Path to Perdition.baseFlair_:
"Hey, quit shovin', pup!"
"Get in line, or I'll ruff you up!"
"If you can't follow the rules, you won't get into Hades!"
—Cerberus, Hound of Hades

Plagued City.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Transform all followers in play into Zombies.
Whenever a follower (excluding Zombies) comes into play, transform it into a Zombie.
Plagued City.baseFlair_: A miracle, it's a miracle! My bedridden mother, she's walking! In fact, she's doing so well that she's even biting! —Optimistic Young Man

Soul Grinder.baseFlair_: Okay, hand it over. No, not your money! That stuff tastes awful. It's your soul I'm hungry for.
Soul Grinder.evoFlair_: No matter how many souls I eat, I never get full. I've got to find someone with a bigger soul. You might be a good start.

Lute, Leonard Necromancer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 3 Skeletons.
At the end of your turn, give a random enemy follower -4/-0 until the end of the opponent's turn if there are at least 4 allied followers in play.
Lute, Leonard Necromancer.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, give a random enemy follower -4/-0 until the end of the opponent's turn if there are at least 4 allied followers in play.
Lute, Leonard Necromancer.baseFlair_: Toying with life and trampling over the dignity of death. It is such a unique merit of the art that I could just cry—hey now, don't move a muscle unless you want to end up like these little ones.
Lute, Leonard Necromancer.evoFlair_: Unable to rest and bound for eternity—these little ones must resent me. But it's something you come to expect. Great necromancers live alongside resentment, after all.

Death's Mistress.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Draw a card.
Burial Rite: Draw 2 cards instead.
----------
Ambush.
Death's Mistress.baseFlair_: Its touch is ineluctable, yet indiscernible. Death is always by your side—always watching, always caressing.
Death's Mistress.evoFlair_: Notice it. Flee from it. You will always find death by your side—surely following you with a smile.

Guilt, Existential Blader.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Destroy an allied follower. Draw 2 cards.
----------
Rush.
Guilt, Existential Blader.baseFlair_: Smear my name if you wish. Hate me all you want. Who cares how heavy my soul weighs in the balance? That voice in my head keeps chanting, "Fight. Win. Mow them down." If you want to stop me, be ready to wager your soul on the venture.
Guilt, Existential Blader.evoFlair_: I'm perfectly satisfied with what I have now. I don't need peace in the afterlife. What possible interest would there be in existing as a spirit bereft of flesh? I only feel alive when I'm swinging this blade anyhow.

Giant Skull.baseFlair_: Seeking after power, hunting after power, the giant offers up its reason and howls madly. In its eyes no trace of a mind can be found. In its hands no trace of mercy can be seen.
Giant Skull.evoFlair_: Once the giant abandoned its humanity, nothing was left but a path of carnage. Unable to reflect on its actions or even shed tears of regret, it can only writhe. It can only howl.

Hell Lord Skeleton.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Hell Lord Skeleton.baseFlair_: Seeking after power, hunting after power, the skeleton vows to the past and screams. In its eyes the old light is gone, but in its hands a trace of the old light remains.
Hell Lord Skeleton.evoFlair_: Once the skeleton abandoned its humanity, nothing was left but readiness for annihilation. Separated from its dear ideals and any resemblance of its former appearance, it clings to a sword that shimmers meaninglessly.

Mordecai the Duelist.baseEffect_: Last Words: Summon a Mordecai the Duelist.
Mordecai the Duelist.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an unevolved Mordecai the Duelist.
Mordecai the Duelist.baseFlair_: He seeks a never-ending duel to make his bloodless body burn with passion again.
Mordecai the Duelist.evoFlair_: He trains for an eternal duel to satisfy the cravings of his fleshless body.

Immortal Thane.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Wights.
Last Words: Put a Wight King into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Immortal Thane.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Wight King into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Immortal Thane.baseFlair_: We are a cortege of corpses, and we will reign eternal. Even if my bones turn to dust, a new thane will follow.
Immortal Thane.evoFlair_: I envy the living for their warmth, and I covet their pulse, but I shall not ask you to give these things to me. I only ask that you relinquish them and join us.

Death Dragon Caller.baseFlair_: I never wished for such a power. I never wished to see this one reduced to bones. But alas, I was born a necromancer—that's what I do.
Death Dragon Caller.evoFlair_: To reduce this dragon to bones, and wrest it from slumber... It's much too tragic. But alas, I am a necromancer—that's my destiny.

Baleful Necromancer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Necromancy (12): Reanimate (X), Reanimate (Y), and Reanimate (Z).
X, Y, and Z equal 12 split randomly.
Baleful Necromancer.baseFlair_: Mere cadavers fetch a small price. Vessels without contents only last around five minutes after all.
Baleful Necromancer.evoFlair_: It doesn't matter if the vessel still has its organs. There are things more important than flesh, you see.

Pluto.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower. Add its attack and defense to this follower's attack and defense.
Pluto.baseFlair_: A death god from the underworld who acquired the dead body of a demon king. She has offered countless souls to revive him as her loyal retainer.
Pluto.evoFlair_: The underworld death god hunted the souls of the living and offered them to her demon king. At last she has revived him as her puppet.

Nephthys.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put followers of different costs (excluding Nephthys) from your deck into play until your area is full. Then destroy those followers.
Nephthys.baseFlair_: A goddess sits upon her throne near the entrance to Amenta, considering how to judge those who enter. She is feared by the living as the face of their demise but worshipped by the dead as the guardian of their souls.
Nephthys.evoFlair_: Do not fear me, living one, for I mean you no harm. I only wish to give you the supreme gift, that of sweet oblivion. Let me wash away your melancholy and free your spirit from the agony of life.

Abyss Straddler.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Gain +3/+0.
Strike: If this follower has at least 10 attack, destroy this follower.
Last Words: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
Abyss Straddler.evoEffect_:
At the end of your turn, perform Necromancy (4): Gain +3/+0.
Strike: If this follower has at least 10 attack, destroy this follower.
Last Words: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals this follower's attack.
Abyss Straddler.baseFlair_: I have death in the grip of my hand. With a trace of magic, the pieces will be in place. Manmade immortality... Man will play god on this day! Finally, my wish will... —A Sorcerer's Journal
Abyss Straddler.evoFlair_:
Why are they such fools? Humans trying to play god—death cannot be controlled, for in the end...
—Chasing Immortality, Chapter 3

Conquering Dreadlord.baseEffect_:
Invocation: When you perform Burial Rite, if it is your fifth, seventh, or ninth time this match, invoke this card, then return it to your hand.
----------
When this follower leaves play, or at the end of your turn, summon a Lich. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
Conquering Dreadlord.baseFlair_:
Do not call to him. Do not glorify him. Do not follow him. The spirits that flock in his wake do so well enough. He is a lord with no vassals, charging into battle to hold service for the departed.
—Chronicle of the Dreadlord, Preface
Conquering Dreadlord.evoFlair_:
The dead worship at his feet while the living cower in fear. Never have I seen such a well-preserved corpse. O lord of release, your rage has brought us sweet salvation.
—Scribbles Found in Chronicle of the Dreadlord

Lurker in the Dark.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Reanimate (X)
X equals the number of shadows you have.
Lurker in the Dark.baseFlair_: A horror birthed from the blackest abyss. It devours any who are foolish enough to venture into its lair, claiming his or her words, memories, and appearance for itself.
Lurker in the Dark.evoFlair_: It returns to the human world donning the appearance and personality of those it's devoured, attempting to assimilate its victim's former life. This mimicry is its primary method of catching new prey.

Vile Torrent.baseEffect_:
Summon 3 Skeletons. Give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Necromancy (4): Give +2/+2 to all allied followers instead.
Vile Torrent.baseFlair_: Malice penetrates the marrow. Even when flesh rots away, animosity remains forever trapped in bone.

Andras.baseFlair_: Andras is an embodiment of silence. When he appears in our world, drawn by screams, he brings death to those unlucky enough to be caught in his path.
Andras.evoFlair_: Andras is a harbinger of the icy darkness. All touched by his blade of frost are doomed to spend eternity as statues.

Deathbringer.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (3)
Fanfare and Last Words: Transform a random enemy follower into a Skeleton.
----------
At the end of your turn, destroy 2 random enemy followers and restore 5 defense to your leader.
Deathbringer.baseFlair_: Here comes Death, riding in to compel transition. Passing on becomes easier after realizing the uncertain nature of life. With a swing of his scythe, all shall submit to the law of change.
Deathbringer.evoFlair_: Death is inevitable. Death does not discriminate. Death is inescapable. All who stand before his hooves receive the same fate.

Lord Atomy.baseEffect_:
If 4 allied cards are in play, this follower costs 9 less play points.
----------
Fanfare: If 4 other allied cards are in play, destroy all other allied cards.
Lord Atomy.baseFlair_: When the gate to the Dead World is opened, the lost lord will be reborn. Humanity and heaven will bear the cost.
Lord Atomy.evoFlair_: The lord's flesh has been smeared with the unclean blood of corpses from the underworld, but his sword continues to gleam as it has for millennia, ready to be wielded against the ranks of the living.

Corpsewyrm Fafnir.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Necromancy (X) - Deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the defense of the enemy follower with the highest defense in play.
Corpsewyrm Fafnir.baseFlair_: The hero slew the wyrm, but not its obsession. Its malice was stronger than death. Though its heart rotted away, venomous avarice still pumped through its veins, dragging the wyrm back to tortured consciousness.
Corpsewyrm Fafnir.evoFlair_: Oozing resentment. Awash in greed. Poison billows from between its rotting jaws as its tongue lolls out in mindless lust for Hreidmar's gold. The hero who pierced its heart is no more. Wallowing in its own evil, the wyrm raises a gurgling, impotent roar.

Ginsetsu, Great Fox.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon a One-Tailed Fox.
Accelerate (5): Summon 3 One-Tailed Foxes.
----------
Fanfare: Summon 4 One-Tailed Foxes.
Whenever an allied One-Tailed Fox comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Drain.
Ginsetsu, Great Fox.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied One-Tailed Fox comes into play, give it +1/+0 and Drain.
Ginsetsu, Great Fox.baseFlair_: Ahh, the sound of the clamoring crowd is sweet. What's a play without an audience? Is it any wonder how much we demons all love humans? To the end of the procession and beyond.
Ginsetsu, Great Fox.evoFlair_: We live within a strange story. Life is fleeting, mortals the flickering figures in a shadow play. Is it not odd? Cast your dice or dance your fill, but do so before dawn. To the end of the procession and beyond.

He Who Once Rocked.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Summon 3 Assembly Droids and put a 9-play point He Who Once Rocked (without Accelerate) into your deck.
----------
Storm.
Ward.
Last Words: Reanimate (8).
He Who Once Rocked.baseFlair_: Once I slept below the turf. Now I rock out on stage. Lucky I spent my time in the bowels of hades though, 'cause now my riffs are metal as hell. Rise, my dead heads. Get out of your dirt beds. 'Cause I've got a banging new song for you: "Undead Riot."
He Who Once Rocked.evoFlair_: The baku crawls into the space between life and death, snuffling for dreams to eat. It hears a soul-rousing note—the song of the dead, pulsing with life. The creature squeezes its eyes shut and laments, "Back to sleeep." Thus the struggle between silence and sound begins.

Mordecai, Eternal Duelist.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Necromancy (6) - Evolve this follower.
Evolve this follower if it was summoned using Reanimate.
Mordecai, Eternal Duelist.evoEffect_: Last Words: Summon an unevolved Mordecai, Eternal Duelist.
Mordecai, Eternal Duelist.baseFlair_: The oath and flames were once separated by death. No tears to douse the flame, no method to deliver the oath. A wandering blade teaches for eternity, seeking an immortal enemy. Once again, his duel begins.
Mordecai, Eternal Duelist.evoFlair_: If this were a story, it would have already reached the ending. If this were a song, the performance would have finished. However, this is his life—a reality that continues without end. And once again, his duel begins.

Tartarus, the Tormentor.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Summon a Tartarus, the Tormentor. Then destroy it and put a Lurker in the Dark into your hand.
----------
Ambush.
Strike: If Ambush is active for this follower, destroy all enemy followers with 5 or less defense.
Tartarus, the Tormentor.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: If Ambush is active for this follower, destroy all enemy followers with 5 or less defense.
Tartarus, the Tormentor.baseFlair_: "Even heroes can starve..." "Shall I sing you a lullaby?" "Pray, fool! And repent under the lash!" "You're hilarious!" "Hey... Why are you so sad?" "What's your name?" "If you wanna be friends, you gotta act like it!"
Tartarus, the Tormentor.evoFlair_: "What strange weather we've been having." "Whaddya wanna do tomorrow?" "There's... this one person I can't stop thinking about." "Did you just bite me!" "The world must face judgment." "Ahh, I'm so booored..." "I just want a little bit. Do you mind?"

Puppet.baseEffect_:
Rush.
At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this follower.
Puppet.evoEffect_:
Rush.
At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this follower.
Puppet.baseFlair_: What makes one human? In pursuit of the answer, it was crafted.
Puppet.evoFlair_: What completes a human? The answer was never found. Regardless, they continued to multiply.

Vesha, Herald of Ravage.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard your hand and give your leader the following effect - At the end of this turn, change the enemy leader's maximum defense to 2.
Vesha, Herald of Ravage.baseFlair_: Born as a human, converted to evil, and summoned as a god. She sets out in pursuit of global destruction to restore all things to their primordial state, fully aware that it is an exercise in futility.
Vesha, Herald of Ravage.evoFlair_: Unparalleled destruction lays waste to the world. Her bloodcurdling war cries mask her screams, while her sweeping claws conceal her longing for a loving embrace. No amount of destruction can appease her, nor would all the compassion in the world get through to her.

Izalue, Herald of Death.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have 4 cards or more in your deck, banish all cards in your deck until only 3 cards remain. Then banish all other followers and amulets.
Izalue, Herald of Death.baseFlair_: Deathly slaughter is her charge, her fate, her very being. True to her namesake, she paints the skies and earth a crimson red.
Izalue, Herald of Death.evoFlair_: Her deathly fate consumes the world. When both her eyes open to reflect all of creation, every living thing is torn asunder, tinting the world in a crimson hue.

Jotet, Herald of Despair.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Lose 8 play point orbs.
Reduce damage to this follower to 0. Can't be affected by spells and effects except for those that change this card's attack or defense.
Jotet, Herald of Despair.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Reduce damage to this follower to 0. Can't be affected by spells and effects except for those that change this card's attack or defense.
Jotet, Herald of Despair.baseFlair_: Hexes and omens are her fixations, while confusion is her cadence. She intoxicates all with the melody of despair. Those who hear her siren call fall prey to her fatal charms.
Jotet, Herald of Despair.evoFlair_: The curtain of despair rises without warning. What comes to pass next is too merciless and cruel to speak of. Finality will be the tune played without surcease until the end of the world.

Focus.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. If you have at least 3 play points, draw 2 instead and restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
Focus.baseFlair_:
One. Be silent and thoughtful. Awareness of your entire body is essential. Two. Until you are capable of coming to a complete halt, you should not so much as move a muscle.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist, Preface

Mechanization.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 2 copies of 2 of the following cards into your deck.
-Analyzing Artifact
-Ancient Artifact
-Mystic Artifact
-Radiant Artifact

Artifact Scan.baseEffect_: Put copies of 2 random allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match into your hand. Then, if more than 6 allied Artifact cards with different names have been destroyed this match, change their costs to 0.
Artifact Scan.baseFlair_:
Chief sent us a missive about the most common workplace accidents. We all had a good laugh at how absurd they were, especially number twenty. Then Chief said, "Go dig up the bodies and ask them yourselves."
—Artifact Researcher

Biofabrication.baseEffect_:
Subtract 1 from the cost of an Artifact card in your hand.
Put 3 copies of that Artifact card into your deck.
Biofabrication.baseFlair_: If evolution is the incentive, progression is the objective.

Yuwan's Fury.baseEffect_: Summon a Mystic Artifact and Ancient Artifact.
Yuwan's Fury.baseFlair_: I will fight. I will take down every tyrant, every reaver of worlds, every pillager of dreams. I do not forgive or forget. It's time we put an end to this.

Belphomet's Crackdown.baseEffect_:
Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Tisiphone, the Malignant
-Alecto, the Dissonant
-Megaera, the Indignant
Belphomet's Crackdown.baseFlair_: Yeah, sure, fight, do whatever. You're angry, then you're crying, and now you're like, "My emotions give me power." Oh, scary. Well, you've forgotten something important. I'm the one that stirred that resentment. So I'm still the one pulling the strings! Now get lost!

Gullian Howl.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to an allied follower. Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
Gullian Howl.baseFlair_: The roar of the silverbeast lord reverberates even in the stomachs of machines with much courage.

Sure-Sighted Lancer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower whose attack or defense has been raised.
Sure-Sighted Lancer.baseFlair_: Heh... You seem awfully proud of that expensive armor and weaponry. But my lance here will ferret out your weaknesses and pierce right through them!
Sure-Sighted Lancer.evoFlair_: Strength is weakness and fortes are flaws. Any advantage has drawbacks, is what I'm saying. Get ready, evildoers—my lance is one sharp analyst.

Robotic Engineer.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
Robotic Engineer.baseFlair_: Don't ask me what to do. I was born without a shred of creativity. Just give me the schematics, and I'll follow them to a T. That's all I'm good for anyway...
Robotic Engineer.evoFlair_:
That guy's knack for reproducing designs is nuts. It's like he literally pulls the finished product out of the blueprints, down to the last bolt. I'm not even joking.
—A Fellow Engineer

Ancient Artifact.baseFlair_: It was created to destroy. Even if its very form is replaced, the inevitable march towards the future cannot be stopped.
Ancient Artifact.evoFlair_: It was created to push forward. Even if its very form destroyed, the inevitable march towards the future cannot be stopped.

Analyzing Artifact.baseFlair_: Scrutinize and analyze, to fulfill the purpose of its creation. Discover meaning from naught, for it is none other than yourself.
Analyzing Artifact.evoFlair_: Scrutinize and analyze, to fulfill the purpose of its creation. Before you, a purpose is born from naught.

Inspired Inventor.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Miraculous Invention or Hazardous Invention into your hand.
Inspired Inventor.baseFlair_: It came to me in a flash! Not just one idea, but two! Only problem is, I can't decide which one to build. Aahh, it's so hard to choose!
Inspired Inventor.evoFlair_:
Combat really isn't my area of expertise... but I'm one heck of an inventor!
What? I'm a great fighter, too? Aww, c'mon, now! Don't make me blush!

Mechagun Wielder.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (8): Put 2 random Artifact cards into your hand instead, and recover 7 play points.
Mechagun Wielder.baseFlair_: The first change led to discovery. Everyone saw that if you could somehow use these machines, then you would hold the power to change the world within the palm of your hand. —Robot Research Log, Part 2
Mechagun Wielder.evoFlair_: The possibilities of machines are limitless. They can immediately manifest the wishes of their users. I wonder how the ambitions of mankind will change the machines in turn. —Researcher's Reflections, Part 2

Barrage Brawler.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. If you have at least 3 play points, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader instead.
Barrage Brawler.baseFlair_:
One. Training the body was once thought the only path. Know now: that path leads nowhere. Two. Temper though you might, flesh is not steel. For armor, turn to the forge.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Body
Barrage Brawler.evoFlair_:
Three. Training the body is a fruitless pursuit of strength. It is not the true Way of the Fist. Four. Prepare yourself by donning steel. Only then will you find the true path.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Body

Technomancer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied Artifact follower and put a copy of it into your hand.
Technomancer.baseFlair_: Start small—it's most efficient. Go too big, and you invite careless mistakes. Remember, don't lose the machines for the factory.
Technomancer.evoFlair_: If you can accomplish great things by starting small, you're clever. But if you start big and end up with something small, you're an idiot. Listen, everything's made up of atoms—that's the beauty of the world.

Spinaria's Artifact.baseEffect_: Last Words: If it is your turn, then put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
Spinaria's Artifact.evoEffect_: Last Words: If it is your turn, then put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
Spinaria's Artifact.baseFlair_: This here is mine. I suppose I could break you with it if I wanted it to. —Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas
Spinaria's Artifact.evoFlair_: Go ahead and break it, if you wish. Just so you know though, it'll break you with it. —Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas

Marionette//Uno.baseFlair_: Anger. First the girl learned anger when she saw the folly and pride of men. "How come people only think of themselves?"
Marionette//Uno.evoFlair_: Anger. The girl was incensed to learn of human greed and superficiality. "These people will never learn."

Joy of Destruction.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
Joy of Destruction.baseFlair_: Say, if you had to pick between me or the world, which would you choose? I mean, do I even need to ask?

Doll Operation.baseEffect_:
Give a random Puppet in your hand +4/+0.
Enhance (7): Put 2 Puppets into your hand. Then give 2 random Puppets in your hand +4/+0 instead.
Doll Operation.baseFlair_: For all that dolls began as human simulacrums, they seem to become more advanced the further their appearance deviates from those origins.

Syntonization.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Analyzing Artifact
-Bifurcating Artifact
-Radiant Artifact
-Paradigm Shift
Syntonization.baseFlair_: They converse through the resonance of steel. Metallic sounds ring out and connect distant places, travelling much farther than organic voices.

Metaproduction.baseEffect_:
Put an Analyzing Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Metaproduction.baseFlair_: If I were a god, I would have never created humans. I'd prefer something much simpler, much more obedient—a servant.

Metadivision.baseEffect_:
Put a Radiant Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Metadivision.baseFlair_:
One could say these blueprints are like a letter from an era gone by. The author's fervor is palpable from the design alone.
—Studious Engineer

Enigmatic Aether.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, put a Radiant Artifact into your hand.
Enigmatic Aether.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the scientists discovered her kindness during their research, they saw an advanced, marvelous aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who test the boundaries of civilization.

Augmentation Bestowal.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect until the end of this turn: Whenever an allied Artifact card comes into play, recover 1 play point and draw a card.
Augmentation Bestowal.baseFlair_: Lighting lamps and consulting maps, humans are guided through this world by their tools. It is for this reason that technology is, in fact, a form of divinity worthy of worship.

Blade of Light.baseFlair_: Go on now: swear to the light. —Demon of the Gaps

Blade of Dark.baseEffect_: Give a follower +2/+0. Then remove all effects from that follower except changes to its attack or defense.
Blade of Dark.baseFlair_: Go on now: wander through the dark. —Demon of the Gaps

Acceleratium.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Whenever you play an Artifact card, recover 1 play point.
Acceleratium.baseFlair_: Wings? I'd prefer something with a little more sophistication. —Geno, Machine Artisan

Ancient Apparatus.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 1 play point and Resonance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as an Artifact Squadron or Artifact's Glow.
----------
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact, Prime Artifact.
Ancient Apparatus.baseFlair_: Occasionally the contraptions of antiquity become the innovations of posterity.

Artifact Squadron.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the start of your turn, put a random Artifact card that costs at least 3 play points from your deck into your hand.
Artifact Squadron.baseFlair_: Warriors roused from antiquity shall take up arms once again.

Artifact's Glow.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Whenever you play an Artifact card, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Artifact's Glow.baseFlair_: Radiance roused from antiquity shall illuminate the day once again.

Ancient Amplifier.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
Ancient Amplifier.baseFlair_: Absorbing traces of magical power, it amplifies and supplies it, as if a maternal provider to those who are willing to come take it.

Hazardous Invention.baseEffect_:
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects.
At the end of your turn, if the enemy leader has 10 defense or less, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader, then banish this amulet.
Hazardous Invention.baseFlair_: I call this one the Too-Hot-to-Handle!

Nilpotent Entity.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and add 2 to this amulet's Countdown.
Until this amulet leaves play, your leader can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Nilpotent Entity.baseFlair_: The path to omnipotence exists within the beyond.

Orb of Desecration.baseEffect_:
Countdown (25)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Subtract 15 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 2 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon an Avatar of Desecration.
Orb of Desecration.baseFlair_:
"Drink in defilement!"
"Purify it!"
They flirted with forbidden knowledge, a sinister gambol with blasphemy and corruption, and created something inhuman—something to transcend humanity.

Puppeteer.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give a random Puppet in your hand Bane.
Puppeteer.baseFlair_: Behold, and see! My beloved puppet dances with delight, almost as if it lives!
Puppeteer.evoFlair_: Oh, my beloved puppet... it seems that I've not bestowed upon you enough life. Hmm... Yes, of course—let's simply take theirs!

Mechanized Servant.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Mechanized Servant.baseFlair_: Do you know my master? I see. In that case, say goodnight!
Mechanized Servant.evoFlair_: Where is my master? Is it you? Hm. Maybe. Prove it to me!

Magisteel Lion.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Analyzing Artifacts into your deck.
Magisteel Lion.baseFlair_: Grr... Roar! (Beat it, kid! My master has no interest in punks like you!)
Magisteel Lion.evoFlair_: Rra... Rawrgh ! (You still here? You're not worth a second of my master's time! Worthless! Worthless, I say!)

Bear Puppeteer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain +1/+1. Put a Puppet into your hand.
Bear Puppeteer.baseFlair_: I'm looking for a soul, for science. If I give one to teddy, surely he'll talk, right?
Bear Puppeteer.evoFlair_: I'm gonna give your soul to teddy, see? This way, I'll never be alone.

Hamelin.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select a follower in your hand (excluding Hamelin) that originally costs 3 play points or less. Put a copy of that follower into your hand.
Hamelin.baseFlair_: Dear listeners, join me on a musical journey! Just follow the tune of my magical melodies—the sound of my pipe compels you!
Hamelin.evoFlair_: It's the march that never ends—nowhere and forever! Hey, where do you think you're going? Just follow me!

Mech Wing Swordsman.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
Mech Wing Swordsman.baseFlair_: I don't believe it—I'm actually flying! That lady's a genius!
Mech Wing Swordsman.evoFlair_: It's like a dream! Soaring through the skies, I'll be unstoppable—even dragons won't stand a chance!

Demon's Epitaph.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and gain Rush and Bane.
Demon's Epitaph.baseFlair_: It was just supposed to be a ledger of sorts—I didn't think it'd actually come to life. —Master Puppeteer
Demon's Epitaph.evoFlair_: My laboratory, reduced to ashes—how am I supposed to take notes now? —Banished Puppeteer

Knower of History.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Prime Artifact into your deck.
Knower of History.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Knower of History.baseFlair_: Artifacts aren't just objects. They're living witnesses to history. But everyone's forgotten them. That's why these girls are so lonely.
Knower of History.evoFlair_: Artifacts aren't just objects. Their bodies are filled with history. Try to remember... remember what the world used to look like.

Ancient War Machine.baseEffect_: When an allied Artifact follower comes into play, this follower gains Ward.
Ancient War Machine.baseFlair_: Sometimes I can getcha up and running and sometimes ya won't even turn on. I think I'll call ya... The "I dunno if you'll work this time" machine! —An Inventor
Ancient War Machine.evoFlair_: So ya work better when your buddies are around, eh? Then I'll call ya the "Looks scary but actually just lookin' fer friends" machine! —An Inventor

Hydro Alchemist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put either a Guardform Golem or a Strikeform Golem into your deck. If Resonance is active for you, put both a Guardform Golem and a Strikeform Golem into your deck instead.
Hydro Alchemist.baseFlair_: Haha, I might be a genius! If something has no fixed form, that just means it can be shaped into anything! All right, my cute little golems! Let's try some more exciting looks!
Hydro Alchemist.evoFlair_:
"Huh... For imitations, these aren't half bad."
—Paracelsus

Mia, Angelic Doll.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and put 2 Puppets into your hand.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, put a Puppet into your hand.
Mia, Angelic Doll.evoEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, put a Puppet into your hand.
Mia, Angelic Doll.baseFlair_: Excuse me... Can you help me? I know I look like a doll, but actually an evil man trapped my soul inside this puppet! Will you please help me look for my original body?
Mia, Angelic Doll.evoFlair_: Thank you! It's hard to move this doll's joints, the clothes are too cute and fluffy, and I just feel completely helpless. If I had tear ducts, I would've already cried my eyes out. But now that I'm with you, I have a good feeling I'll finally relocate my body!

Prototype Warrior.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Bifurcating Artifacts into your deck.
Prototype Warrior.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a variety of phenomena. When the orb was unearthed, it brought forth wide-reaching change; the machines had come. —Robot Research Log, Part 1
Prototype Warrior.evoFlair_: The existence of this core will advance both human and machinekind. It's given us plenty to hypothesize about, so now all that's left is proper experimentation. I wonder how the world will change from our discoveries. —Researcher's Reflections, Part 1

Cat Gunner.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
Cat Gunner.baseFlair_:
Cat Cannoneer?
I don't appreciate being lumped together with her, ya meow! Her cannon's totally lacking on paw-er, see what I mean? This is a brand-new original creation, the Paw-Cannon!
Cat Gunner.evoFlair_:
"Hey! Your Paw-Cannon's totally ripping off mine!"
"It's not a rip-off, it's, uh, an homage!"
—Cat Cannoneer and Cat Gunner

Doll Meister.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Put a Puppet into your hand and give it Bane.
Doll Meister.baseFlair_: As the current head of a long line of puppet masters, I've grown fond of making puppets geared toward children. Yet the customers don't come by my shop anymore. I wonder why...
Doll Meister.evoFlair_: I see now where I had erred. I was too obsessed with tradition, and as such the masses find my work to be out-of-date. So I've decided to keep up with the times. Behold my latest creation—dearest Julie!

Drill Hedgehog.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Drill Hedgehog.baseFlair_:
Concept: Enforce with both weaponry and armor.
Subjects: Small, weak animals.
Mission: Preserve endangered species.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team A
Drill Hedgehog.evoFlair_: We've succeeded with part one of the plan. Though the change in ecology resulting from expansion of their habitat came unexpectedly. Nonetheless, we'll continue to observe their ongoing war against bladed hedgehogs. For the good of all of us.

Begoggled Mole.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
Begoggled Mole.baseFlair_:
Concept: Reinforcement of weak points.
Subjects: Animals with substandard senses.
Mission: Research wild animals' potential.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team D
Begoggled Mole.evoFlair_: Above is a mole we've seen often of late. Reclaiming its species' lost visual acuity has given it a whole new way of life. We must continue to observe this artificially-induced evolution. For the good of all of us.

Android Artisan.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
Android Artisan.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis brought about new technology. We no longer need extensive equipment or advanced facilities to tinker with machinery. As a result, devices have grown lighter and inventing more efficient. —Tech Research and Development, Report 1
Android Artisan.evoFlair_:
Technology, and therefore machinery, exists for its own sake. As such, inventors believe that one day machines will surpass humanity. The world toddles towards a completely mechanized future, free of human influence.
—Boon of Technology, Part 1

Marionette Expert.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Marionette Expert.baseFlair_: Witness the Two of Cups, flowing in unison. Bound as they are, the two souls steal gazes at each other when the master isn't looking. Though this affair may be fleeting, their lovestruck hearts yearn for an encore.
Marionette Expert.evoFlair_: Greetings from the puppet master, tugger of heartstrings. See, people bemoan the rifts that drive them apart. But I warp space so they may come together... So what if the joy I bring is manufactured? It's real to them, and that's all that matters.

Magisteel Puppet.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Magisteel Puppet.baseFlair_: To unravel the secrets of life, it is only logical to dismantle all lives. That is what master has requested—what master wishes for.
Magisteel Puppet.evoFlair_: This body of steel simply seeks the essence of life—to fulfill master's order, and to one day create a life for master.

Rosa, Mech Wing Maiden.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Ward.
Rosa, Mech Wing Maiden.baseFlair_: The sky is my domain to explore! They aren't real, but with these wings I can fly anywhere!
Rosa, Mech Wing Maiden.evoFlair_: To protect my beloved, I'll do anything—my feelings are pure! Even if it pains me, I want to be with the one I truly love.

Flower Doll.baseEffect_: Last Words: If you have at least 4 cards in your hand, put a Puppet into your hand. If you have 3 cards or less in your hand, put a Puppet and a Flower Doll into your hand.
Flower Doll.evoEffect_: Last Words: If you have at least 4 cards in your hand, put a Puppet into your hand. If you have 3 cards or less in your hand, put a Puppet and a Flower Doll into your hand.
Flower Doll.baseFlair_: This is the garden of eternity. Even after my master withers away, I'll stand over and guard this grave until the end of time.
Flower Doll.evoFlair_: This is the garden of eternity. My master loved me for the white flower I was, and for eternity I will bloom forever, here in the master's stead.

Icarus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
Icarus.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Icarus.baseFlair_: Hey, check out these wings! Pretty brilliant, huh? I guess you could call me a genius of sorts, I invented 'em myself!
Icarus.evoFlair_: Maybe someday there'll be wings for everyone! If we all could be so free, we could even fly all the way to the sun!

Machine Artisan, Geno.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and give your leader the following effect - Subtract 3 from the next source of damage your leader takes.
Machine Artisan, Geno.baseFlair_: Yeah, I can fix it for ya—for a price, of course. Hm? What do I take for payment? I'm but a simple man, what do you think? Pay up!
Machine Artisan, Geno.evoFlair_: Listen here, buddy—I ain't running a charity. Man's gotta make a living somehow. Nothing personal, it's just business!

Miriam, Synthetic Being.baseEffect_: If you have at least 2 play points and Resonance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a L'Ange Miriam or La Diablotine Miriam.
Miriam, Synthetic Being.baseFlair_: My life is synthetic, and so is my body. But my heart doesn't come from anyone else. I want to battle together with you. I really do!
Miriam, Synthetic Being.evoFlair_: Other people made my life and my body. But my heart is mine and mine alone. I can be strong if we're together. I really believe I can!

Disciple of Destruction.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then draw 2 cards.
Disciple of Destruction.baseFlair_: Destroy, destroy, destroy. If it exists, it deserves to be destroyed. There is no future without destruction—dress for the apocalypse, dance to the damage!
Disciple of Destruction.evoFlair_:
The Second Order: Abide No Rule
Order is the enemy of the masses. Every desire to rebel should be carried to its fullest expression. Smash and trample everything.
—The Teachings of Team Destruction

Marionette Lad.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Marionette Lad.baseFlair_: My little sister's real sick, so she's stuck in bed. But it's okay, 'cause I met a man who promised to make her live forever!
Marionette Lad.evoFlair_:
Why... How... What's happened. To me?
My sister and. Me. We're puppets... Now.
This is wrong... This is all wrong!

Licht, the Gearturner.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Licht, the Gearturner.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Licht, the Gearturner.baseFlair_: All creations have their own purposes—those which must be fulfilled... And I too, shall play my part. Zahnrad, the grace of your wings shall make life dance.
Licht, the Gearturner.evoFlair_: No matter how many times it breaks, no matter how many times it rusts, I will always repair it. After all, there is nothing sadder than a purpose unfulfilled. Now, my gears, serve your purpose.

Cat Tuner.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put a copy of a random allied follower destroyed this match that costs X play points into your hand. X equals your remaining play points.
Cat Tuner.baseFlair_: Hark, the herald of Judgement, bringer of rejuvenation! Mender of broken bodies, lifter of spirits, and petter of four-legged friends. She'll be there to help you when no one else can.
Cat Tuner.evoFlair_: A tuner like me restores things to their original state. Waiting around for help is so dull and dumb. You can't expect it to fall into your lap. You gotta put in some effort and seek it.

L'Ange Miriam.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Radiant Artifact and a Prime Artifact into your deck.
L'Ange Miriam.baseFlair_: My life is synthetic, and so is my body. But this gentle heart of mine is real! I want to give you peace. I really do!
L'Ange Miriam.evoFlair_: Other people made my life and my body. But these gentle feelings are all my own. I can be a home for you. I really believe I can!

La Diablotine Miriam.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
La Diablotine Miriam.baseFlair_: My life is synthetic, and so is my body. But this wild heart of mine is real! I want to be your power. I really do!
La Diablotine Miriam.evoFlair_: Other people made my life and my body. But these wild feelings are all my own! I can be strong if it's for you. I really think I can!

Paracelsus.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Guardform Golem or Strikeform Golem into your hand.
Paracelsus.baseFlair_: If the automatons we build outshine man on the battlefield, humanity's future has no glory. Mankind should flourish; anything less would be unromantic. However... there are those who have no potential. It will be amusing weeding them out.
Paracelsus.evoFlair_: Humanity will forge its own future. That much is absolute fact, just as history tells us. However, there is no history devoid of sacrifice. As such, I shall activate them for the people who inhabit this world.

Rukina of the Resistance.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied Portalcraft followers the following effect - Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Rukina of the Resistance.baseFlair_: There must be more to life than victory. I truly believe that, which is why I want to put people's safety first. Even if that is a philosophy unbefitting a commander...
Rukina of the Resistance.evoFlair_: I am no hero. I am truly nothing close. I think I'm only hiding from my own failings... as a commander and as a person. Silently hoping someone will notice... and give me the push I need to change.

Shin, Lawful Light.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Put a Chaos Awakens into your hand.
Shin, Lawful Light.baseFlair_: I've been waiting so long for the day I would meet you. I'll remember this moment forever... Now, come. We'll bring new order to this world.
Shin, Lawful Light.evoFlair_: We have to save absolutely everyone. How? Haha. You can leave that to me. Seriously, it'll be all right—I can embrace whatever I please... Now, come. It's time for the world to remember chaos.

Vier, Doll Slayer.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, if you have at least 2 play points, use 2 play points to transform it into a Doll Slayer.
Last Words: Transform a random allied Doll Slayer into a Vier, Doll Slayer.
Vier, Doll Slayer.baseFlair_:
Well, aren't you good? Yes, very nice! Fine and great! Just excellent, yes!
I am Vier! We are ALTERNATIVE! Now show us, show us! Show us your strength, your resolve... your very worth!
Vier, Doll Slayer.evoFlair_:
Come on, show me! And the next me! And the next me, and the next me!
I am Vier! We are Vier! And we are one! Allow us to thank you right away by taking your life!

Mugnier, Purifying Light.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Remove all effects on all other followers except changes to their attack or defense.
Mugnier, Purifying Light.baseFlair_: Yahoo! The impossibly cute Mugnier with a smile of gold, at your service! Now let's get out there and purge this world of filth!
Mugnier, Purifying Light.evoFlair_: Yeah, lotsa people tell me I'm weird or messed up. But it doesn't bother me in the slightest! As long as I get to purge the filth that's all around us, everything's right as rain! Tee-hee!

Phantom Blade Wielder.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, put a Puppet into your hand. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, give it +4/+0.
Phantom Blade Wielder.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Recover 1 play point.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, put a Puppet into your hand. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, give it +4/+0.
Phantom Blade Wielder.baseFlair_: One. The heart is the one essential component of the fist. Body? Technique? These things are trivial. Two. Be silent and reflect. Know yourself as you have come to be. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Heart
Phantom Blade Wielder.evoFlair_: Three. Look at yourself. Look inside. All of Creation resides within you. Four. Only when you know your place within the cosmos, and its place within you, will you attain true mastery. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Heart

Ameth, Dream Emissary.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower Ward. Then, if it's evolved, give it +1/+1, draw a card, and recover 1 play point.
Ameth, Dream Emissary.baseFlair_: Well done today. I'm sure you've forgotten me, so I'll introduce myself again. My name is Ameth. I'm on your side.
Ameth, Dream Emissary.evoFlair_: It must be rough getting dragged into so many different messes, but don't forget you have your own story—make sure you're living it to the fullest. If you find yourself lost, I'll get you back on track.

Guardform Golem.baseFlair_:
"Now, awaken. You will sacrifice your body to protect humanity, lest we never find glory."
—Paracelsus
Guardform Golem.evoFlair_:
"Automatons don't have minds of their own. But they do have my orders. Protect humanity, for we spill the beautiful blood and steel that will spread throughout this land."
—Paracelsus

Strikeform Golem.baseFlair_:
"Now, awaken. You will weed out the dregs of humanity with your hands, lest they be allowed to continue in mediocrity."
—Paracelsus
Strikeform Golem.evoFlair_:
"Automatons don't have minds of their own. But they do have my orders. Weed them out—those dregs who dare to defy my will."
—Paracelsus

Camieux, Gunpowder Gal.baseEffect_: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy. Do this 3 times.
Camieux, Gunpowder Gal.baseFlair_: Loud noises and voices and stuff scare me... But I gotta be a stronger girl so Mom and Dad don't worry about me so much. Sigh... But how do you learn not to be a scaredy cat?
Camieux, Gunpowder Gal.evoFlair_: Eeek! You scared me half to death! B-but I won't let anybody bother my friends! I'm gonna make you pay, you big meanie!

Doll Slayer.baseFlair_: What is the heart? What is its color, its shape, its taste? A man sought the answers to these questions maniacally, nay, pathologically. He created a doll with a heart—a human without a heart.
Doll Slayer.evoFlair_: Power comes from the heart—even a synthetic being could wield its potential. But ask yourself—are those without hearts without power? Let's find out together! Those with hearts, with strength, we'll hunt the dolls and see for ourselves! —ALTERNATIVE Voice File

Lococo, Little Puppeteer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Transform an enemy follower into a Lococo's Teddy Bear.
Lococo, Little Puppeteer.baseFlair_: People, animals, everybody's always looking at me. Their eyes are scary, I don't like them... Aren't button eyes cuter? Say, won't you become my puppet? Then you won't be scary anymore!
Lococo, Little Puppeteer.evoFlair_: Why is everyone so scary? Cute things are better! You know what, I'll make you into my puppet. That way you'll be cute... Cute forever and ever!

Ralmia, Sonic Racer.baseEffect_:
Rush.
When an allied Artifact card comes into play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Ralmia, Sonic Racer.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Evolve: If you have at least 6 play points, use 6 play points and gain Storm and +X/+X. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match.
Ralmia, Sonic Racer.baseFlair_:
Thanks to the quick progress of technology, we were able to develop her cybernetic systems. She is swifter than sound and rivals light, far surpassing the limits of flesh and blood. Nothing, not one thing, can touch her.
—Abandoned Lab Note
Ralmia, Sonic Racer.evoFlair_: See how the engine springs forth with a roar; watch how claws of energy leap into being. The master of this device is the most powerful life-form of all. She doesn't hesitate; she downs pulseless metal with a single blow. The struggle between speed and strength has begun.

Lococo's Teddy Bear.baseEffect_: At the start of your turn, put a Puppet into your opponent's hand.
Lococo's Teddy Bear.baseFlair_: Dragons are scary, but I'm not scared! Because I have friends... You're all my friends now! —Lococo, Little Puppeteer
Lococo's Teddy Bear.evoFlair_: Dragons are scary, but button eyes are cute! That's why my friends... We're friends forever. —Lococo, Little Puppeteer

Dimension Cut.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If Resonance is active for you, deal 5 damage instead.

Rocket Knuckles.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and deal 6 damage instead.
Rocket Knuckles.baseFlair_: Whooooa there! Enough tinkering with stuff that don't need tinkering! —Mechanical Soldier

Windup.baseEffect_:
Put a Puppet into your hand.
If Resonance is active for you, put 2 into your hand instead.
Windup.baseFlair_: Someday there might be a puppet who can wind up another puppet. Then they won't need people no more. —Young Artisan

Artifact Call.baseEffect_: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 Artifact cards instead.
Artifact Call.baseFlair_: Command me, and I shall carry out the order. I make no distinction between feasible and infeasible.

Awakened Ragna.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
Enhance (9): Choose - Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Vesha, Herald of Ravage
-Izalue, Herald of Death
-Jotet, Herald of Despair
Awakened Ragna.baseFlair_:
Three divine beings created to destroy, kill, and eradicate. The innocence so evident in their sleeping faces seems to mock the world's fragility. Or perhaps it is a mercy granted to them.
—Beings of Antiquity, in faded writing in the margins

Miraculous Invention.baseEffect_:
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects.
At the end of your turn, if your leader has 10 defense or less, restore 3 defense to your leader and banish this amulet.
Miraculous Invention.baseFlair_: I call it the Bright-Skies-and-No-Clouds-In-Sight Bot!

Toy Soldier.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Toy Soldier.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, give it +1/+0.
Toy Soldier.baseFlair_: Welcome to the city of hopes and dreams—where dolls and humans live in harmony! I just love it when they smile. Enjoy to your heart's content!
Toy Soldier.evoFlair_: Welcome to the city of nightmares and despair—where time for humans has run out! I just love it when they scream. Let me enjoy it to my heart's content!

Automaton Knight.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Automaton Knight.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Automaton Knight.baseFlair_: Whoa there! Hey, tough guy! Just wait 'til my comrades get here—I bet you won't be feelin' so tough then, will ya?
Automaton Knight.evoFlair_: A tenacious one, aren't ya? You've left me no choice—I'm going in alone! My comrades will be here in no time to finish you off. Chaaarge!

Cat Cannoneer.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
Cat Cannoneer.evoFlair_: Meow-ow-ow! Ready to blast 'em off, right meow!

Steel Demolitionist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. If there are no enemy followers in play, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader instead.
Steel Demolitionist.baseFlair_: This fella right here ain't much of a looker, but it'll smash ya real good!
Steel Demolitionist.evoFlair_: Seriously, this fella can't be stopped! Well, maybe it can—who knows? For now though, I'll smash everything to bits while I can!

Iron Staff Mechanic.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put 2 Mystic Artifacts into your deck.
Iron Staff Mechanic.baseFlair_: Even without Mysteria's blessing, I can still fight—as long as I have this!
Iron Staff Mechanic.evoFlair_: Who needs magic when you have technology? Come on—don't break on me now!

Cursed Stone.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't attack.
Evolve: If Resonance is active for you, remove all effects on this follower except changes to this card's attack or defense.
Cursed Stone.baseFlair_: I'd say the fellas making these artifacts and whatnot are pretty strange, but whoever made this one was truly mad as a hatter. —A Mercenary
Cursed Stone.evoFlair_: I mean, staying cooped up by yourself for so long can't be good for you, right? Explains why they're not all there, at least. It wouldn't hurt to ask for some help, would it? —A Mercenary

Junk.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Junk.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Junk.baseFlair_: What is the heart? What is its color, its shape, its taste? A man sought the answers to these questions maniacally, nay, pathologically. This is what he created.
Junk.evoFlair_: It has no heart and no reason, which garnered it the name of Junk. Junk crawls through the night, led on by the plaintive laughter.

Jessica, Cheerful Cannoneer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied Portalcraft follower. If that follower can be targeted by enemy spells or effects, your opponent can only target that follower.
Jessica, Cheerful Cannoneer.baseFlair_: Excuse me. Do you know where my little brother might have gone? His name is Ayer.
Jessica, Cheerful Cannoneer.evoFlair_: He was kidnapped by a primal beast several years ago. But I believe he's out there somewhere, alive and well!

Servant of Destruction.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
Servant of Destruction.baseFlair_: Destroy, destroy, destroy. Doesn't matter if it exists or not, burn it until not even the concept remains. Destruction is evidence of freedom—burn to the rhythm, dance to the damage!
Servant of Destruction.evoFlair_:
The First Order: Suffer No Chains
Prohibit nothing. Admonish no one. Know how useless you are to this world.
—The Teachings of Team Destruction

Viola, Duchess of Dolls.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, give it +0/+2.
Viola, Duchess of Dolls.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, give it +0/+2.
Viola, Duchess of Dolls.baseFlair_: Welcome to the city of hopes and dreams! This is a place where humans and puppets can live together in harmony. Hope you enjoy your stay here. We'll do anything to make you more comfortable.
Viola, Duchess of Dolls.evoFlair_: I'm a mother to all these puppets. How dare you try to bring harm to them—looks like we'll need to teach you some manners. Stephanie! Chew on 'em!

Creeping Slime.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Evolve this follower.
Creeping Slime.baseFlair_: Eh, that little pile of pudding isn't nearly as menacing as other monsters—just look how stupid its tiny face is. That's why I haven't bothered to fight it. And besides, I don't want to get any of its juice on me. —Interview with a Warrior
Creeping Slime.evoFlair_: This particular monster has proven quite beneficial for the research community. Neither the finest warriors nor monsters try to come near its goo. It defends against enemies while being completely harmless itself. How astonishing. —Overheard from a Researcher

Gravity Grappler.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, summon an Analyzing Artifact. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, summon a Mystic Artifact.
Gravity Grappler.baseFlair_: One. The fist's form has its foundation in the body. The body is the root from which the fist grows. Two. One must cultivate the body to hone the fist. Devote yourself to its training. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist, Body
Gravity Grappler.evoFlair_: Three. Venture to the brink of your body's capabilities and gaze into the abyss. Do not hesitate. Four. Build sinew. Wreathe yourself in scar tissue. Know your training will never be complete. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist, Body

Magic Gunsmith.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Summon an Analyzing Artifact or Ancient Artifact.
Magic Gunsmith.baseFlair_: Some folks ain't good with magic. Don't have enough mana in them or whatever. So I make these here magic weapons for them. Take a look at this beaut. She's a magic gun—a real sweetheart, plays nice with anyone.
Magic Gunsmith.evoFlair_: So magic and magic weapons are kinda similar—can't use either if you don't have the guts. Look, if you're not sure about what you're doing with a gun, that's gonna tell on your aim.

Ironclad Armadillo.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put an Assembly Droid and Repair Mode into your hand.
Ironclad Armadillo.baseFlair_:
Concept: Unification of shell and steel
Subjects: All organisms who make heavy use of shells
Mission: Development of an impenetrable substance
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team Y
Ironclad Armadillo.evoFlair_:
Beasts were used as test subjects and made into steel amalgamations. Detractors claimed the researchers were exploiting the animals. But that could not be further from the truth. The beasts were exploiting the tech.
—In Defense of Machines, Part 1

Steelslash Tiger.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match.
Steelslash Tiger.baseFlair_:
Today we finally head into the ruins! They call it a tiger's den, but hey! Nothing ventured, nothing gained! Just gotta be careful not to step on its tail.
—A Recovered Research Log
Steelslash Tiger.evoFlair_:
We weren't walking into a tiger's den; it was the tiger's maw itself. What we discovered wasn't a relic; it was the tiger's tail.
—A Half-Shredded Research Log

Mystic Artifact.baseFlair_: It was created to protect—the motherly master, the fatherly apparatus, producers of life.
Mystic Artifact.evoFlair_: It was created to protect until the very end. For mother and father—it risks peril in the name of duty.

Bifurcating Artifact.baseFlair_: It was created to multiply—the burgeoning master, the subservient self, it becomes its own liege.
Bifurcating Artifact.evoFlair_: It was created to multiply until the very end. Masterless it flourishes, covering the world in its image in due course.

Fervent Machine Soldier.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Fervent Machine Soldier.baseFlair_: Weapons? I've got 'em in all shapes and sizes. How about this one? My finest apprentice made it—you've never seen a blade this sharp! Not interested? Wait, there's more!
Fervent Machine Soldier.evoFlair_: They just don't get it, do they? Well, no matter. I'll just have to convince 'em myself... Who's ready for a demonstration—up close and personal?

Angel of the Iron Steed.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Analyzing Artifact and an Ancient Artifact into your deck.
Angel of the Iron Steed.baseFlair_: Vroooom, skrrrrt! As long as I have this sweet ride, I can fly anywhere in the world—and learn all of its secrets. Yours are no exception of course.
Angel of the Iron Steed.evoFlair_: Vr-vr-vroooooom! Ah, I love this ride. Faster than a pegasus and far easier to control. Just don't tell the gods I took it, okay? They wouldn't be very happy if they found out!

Ines, Maiden of Clouds.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.
Whenever Resonance becomes active for you, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
Ines, Maiden of Clouds.baseFlair_: I'm defective... I can't go out in the sun, so I can't let go of my umbrella. Ah, how nice it'd be to see more of the world someday...
Ines, Maiden of Clouds.evoFlair_: Is it my fault I'm defective? That's just who I am. How I wish I could show my gratitude to everyone who's ever believed in me. Ah, look at how beautiful the sun is. I never knew...

Boost Kicker.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal X damage to all enemy followers, then remove this effect. X equals your remaining play points.
Boost Kicker.baseFlair_:
One. Technique is also a trap. Use the entire body, as its structure indicates. Two. Body. Technique. Training, changing, shifting. This is not the true nature of the fist.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Technique
Boost Kicker.evoFlair_:
Three. Do techniques performed clothed in steel render the naked fist obsolete? No. Four. The heart is the most difficult organ to understand. The greatest wall to surmount resides within you.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Technique

Devil of the Gaps.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Blade of Light or Blade of Dark into your hand.
Devil of the Gaps.baseFlair_: I am there in the gaps. The one who wanders between white and black. Now that you have arrived, you must choose. Which color will it be? Your decision will change the world.
Devil of the Gaps.evoFlair_: I see. A very fine decision. Go forth and be proud of your choice. I bless your travel path from somewhere in the middle of the colors.

Cucouroux, Green Gunsmith.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Camieux, Gunpowder Gal.
Follower Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Cucouroux, Green Gunsmith.evoEffect_: Follower Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Cucouroux, Green Gunsmith.baseFlair_: I'm sure we met for some reason or another. So just let ol' Cucouroux here give your firearm the overhaul it deserves!
Cucouroux, Green Gunsmith.evoFlair_: Whenever you're sad, you can cry on ol' Cucouroux's shoulder! But, um, I think I know what you're thinking—my sisters, Silva and Camieux, would be much more comfortable to lean on. That makes me wanna cry too!

Maisha, Hero of Purgation.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
Maisha, Hero of Purgation.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Purgation's Blade into your hand.
(Can attack the enemy leader.)
Maisha, Hero of Purgation.baseFlair_: Countersolari and Isunia are both trifling matters. I merely wish to be chosen by her. It's what I planned for, what I've realized to be important. Oh, to finally become a hero.
Maisha, Hero of Purgation.evoFlair_: My world betrayed me. It was unsalvageable. Contaminated. That's why I was happy to see it fall to Purgation. And that's why I want to be chosen by her once more. I'll see Isunia burn for her attention.

Puppet Troupemaster.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Puppet Troupemaster.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put 30 Puppets into your deck. Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, draw a card. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Puppet Troupemaster.baseFlair_: If the world were a giant puppet show, oh how perfect it would be. Puppets, you see, they know their roles. You there, care to find out your role?
Puppet Troupemaster.evoFlair_: If the world is a stage, then the plays it hosts shouldn't be limited to human experience. I will be the director for this new theater, and I won't stand for any criticism from the audience. You there, ready yourself—for the real show is about to begin!

Victoria.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Victoria.baseFlair_: A rhapsody plays. Following the tune of their maestro's fingers, the puppets dance and scoff at the world.
Victoria.evoFlair_: Break, rend, kill! Following their maestro's orders, the puppets squeak into action and rob the world.

Malocchio.baseEffect_:
Whenever Resonance becomes active for you, gain +2/+2.
Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies if this follower has at least 10 attack.
Malocchio.baseFlair_: We fled in droves, as it burned everything within sight. Let it all die, eye of destruction. The transgressions of man are burned forever in its sight. Eradicate it all, eye of destruction.
Malocchio.evoFlair_: Eyesores. Burn them all, eye of destruction. Persecution for persecution, an eye for an eye. Transgression for transgression, by the full force of the all-seeing iconoclast.

Karula, Arts Master.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+2 and the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, gain +1/+1. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, destroy a random enemy follower.
Karula, Arts Master.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Recover 2 play points.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, gain +1/+1. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, destroy a random enemy follower.
Karula, Arts Master.baseFlair_: Once I was but meat and bone, imperfect. I traded flesh for armor plating. Training built my bones. Old and new were united by the will to fight, and in that moment I saw the world contained within me. I am, therefore, the best of all possible worlds.
Karula, Arts Master.evoFlair_: Life and death. Joy and sorrow. So many opposing pairs to be weighed on the scales. Once perfected, linked with the world, I understood. Order and balance have been achieved, and the world is as it should be. I am, therefore the best of all possible worlds.

X. Slaus, Wheel of Fortune.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, summon an enemy Wheel of Misfortune and banish this follower.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if Resonance is active for you, gain +1/+1 and destroy a random enemy follower.
X. Slaus, Wheel of Fortune.evoEffect_: At the start of your opponent's turn, if Resonance is active for you, gain +1/+1 and destroy a random enemy follower.
X. Slaus, Wheel of Fortune.baseFlair_: Go on, give me your best shot, O lord. I'm the Wheel of Fortune, mascot of good luck. I bet I can wow you with something cool. First tell me your wish, and presto!
X. Slaus, Wheel of Fortune.evoFlair_: Got it? When luck's on your side, only great things are in store! At least, that's what I think. Um, you see, I still have to figure out what'll truly make you happy. So step on up, spin the wheel, and tell me what you want again and again...

Lloyd the Android.baseEffect_:
Ward.
If this follower can be targeted by enemy spells and effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Lloyd the Android.baseFlair_: A nocturne plays. Following their maestro's fingers, the puppets dance and defend the world.
