Lloyd the Android.evoFlair_: Caring, faith, and love. To protect their maestro through and through, the puppets squeak and race across the world.

Puppet Shock.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Puppet into your hand.
Puppet Shock.baseFlair_:
"This is my stage, where I play my part!"
The puppet speaks with pride as the puppeteer grins.
"Yes, yes, very good. But your role is already over."

Substitution.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
Put a Puppet into your hand.
Substitution.baseFlair_: A name is all one has in the end, so that's what you'll take. —Words of a Puppeteer

Inverted Manipulation.baseEffect_:
Put a Puppet into your hand.
Give your leader the following effect until the end of the turn: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader instead. (This effect is not stackable.)
Inverted Manipulation.baseFlair_: Humans think they control their own destiny. They think wrong.

Gullian Aura.baseEffect_: Give +2/+2 to all allied Machina followers.
Gullian Aura.baseFlair_: The light of the silverbeast lord reverberates even in the hearts of machines with little courage.

Tranquil Cog.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Draw a card. If Resonance is active for you, draw 2 cards instead.
Last Words: Draw 2 cards. If Resonance is active for you, draw 1 card instead.
Tranquil Cog.baseFlair_: Wisdom keeps the universe in motion.

Puppet Room.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
At the end of your turn put a Puppet into your hand.
Puppet Room.baseFlair_: Go on, take a look inside.

Alpha Core.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, put 2 Analyzing Artifacts, 2 Ancient Artifacts, and 2 Bifurcating Artifacts into your deck, recover 2 play points, then banish this amulet.
Alpha Core.baseFlair_: To the forest, the battlefield, the sea, the workshop, the graveyard, the castle, and the church. It sent a piece of itself flying in seven different directions, ushering in seven different revolutions.

Box of Puppets.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Transform an enemy follower or amulet into a Lococo's Teddy Bear.
Last Words: Summon a Lococo's Teddy Bear.
Box of Puppets.baseFlair_:
Button eyes, fluffy paws.
You all live here, now.
—Lococo, Little Puppeteer

Go, Go, Robomi!.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Last Words: Summon a Robomi, Steel Warrior.
Go, Go, Robomi!.baseFlair_: Although the steel warrior's body is devoid of warmth, the fire of justice burns within her. She fights to protect the future and the innocent smiles of children. Only she and her engineer, Nicholas, can fight back the menace that threatens the skies.

Wheel of Misfortune.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the start of your turn, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Add 1 to the cost of all cards in your hand until the end of the turn.
-Give -2/-2 to all allied followers.
-Summon an enemy Analyzing Artifact.
(The same effect will not activate twice.)
Wheel of Misfortune.baseFlair_: See what happened? That's how it goes! There are two sides to the coin, and your bad luck spilled on everyone else. Sweet, sweet, disaster! But that means you reap the good stuff! Are you happy, O lord? No? Well, let's take another spin.

Ironforged Fighter.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Radiant Artifacts into your deck.
Ironforged Fighter.baseFlair_: The biggest casualty of war is human life—fitting for the cheapest piece to fall in the greatest numbers. —Mechanical Doll Essentials, Prologue
Ironforged Fighter.evoFlair_: Mechanical Dolls have far surpassed the limits of man. Easy to operate, they can destroy without being destroyed. —Mechanical Doll Essentials, Chapter 1

Mechanical Bowman.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
Mechanical Bowman.baseFlair_: My arrows will always find their target. Sometimes they're sharp, sometimes they're dull—whatever is necessary to hit the mark.
Mechanical Bowman.evoFlair_: My arrows are always ready. Sometimes they're rigid, sometimes they're limber—whatever is necessary to pierce the target.

Gravikinetic Warrior.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
Gravikinetic Warrior.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Gravikinetic Warrior.baseFlair_: Backup has arrived—initiating gravitational control protocol.
Gravikinetic Warrior.evoFlair_: Hostiles still present—raising power levels to maximum.

Cruel Puppetmaster.baseEffect_: Clash: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Cruel Puppetmaster.baseFlair_: Life is so sticky and repulsive. I'm not sure whether you quite comprehend this aesthetic of mine. So I'm about to help you understand.
Cruel Puppetmaster.evoFlair_: True beauty is as smooth as porcelain. Ah, don't worry whether you understand though. You aren't necessary to begin with!

Hamelin, Fey Flautist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select a follower in your hand that originally costs 3 play points or less, and put a copy of that follower into your hand.
Hamelin, Fey Flautist.evoEffect_: Evolve: Select a follower in your hand that originally costs 3 play points or less, and put a copy of that follower into your hand.
Hamelin, Fey Flautist.baseFlair_: I don't know where I am. I don't know who anyone is. If something happened, I wouldn't know about it. I don't know what this sound is supposed to be. All I know is I must keep on going and going and going... I cannot stop. I mustn't stop. —A Dead-eyed Citizen
Hamelin, Fey Flautist.evoFlair_: "We'll traverse a cave! We'll cross a river! There's no end to this march... So let's keep on going and follow the path, wherever it goes!" —Hamelin

Roan Winged Nexx.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower if Resonance is active for you.
Roan Winged Nexx.baseFlair_: A celestial unsuited for the underworld below, and a demonic wing unsuited for the heavens above—an outcast, bound to the earth between.
Roan Winged Nexx.evoFlair_: Too pure to be a demon, and too corrupted to be an angel. Torn between heaven and hell, wield your power—in the name of the outcast.

Displacer Bot.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Acceleratium into your hand. Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Displacer Bot.baseFlair_: The second change led to optimization. The machines began to take the forms their handlers wanted. At the heart of this revolution were robots most peculiar. —Robot Research Log, Part 3
Displacer Bot.evoFlair_: It's strange. Where did the robots that helped us to optimize our technology come from? It's certainly not a man-made machine. Nor is it one of the changes brought by the core. When the hell did it manifest into our plane? —Researcher's Reflections, Part 3

Icarus, Sunbound Wing.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random non-Artifact card that costs 1 play point or less from your deck into your hand.
Icarus, Sunbound Wing.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact follower that costs 1 play point or less from your deck into play.
Icarus, Sunbound Wing.baseFlair_:
"Yup! Once the final product's ready, I'll be able to fly as far as the sun!"
—Icarus, Sunbound Wing
"W-wait, you're telling me this is just a prototype?!"
—Mech Wing Swordsman
Icarus, Sunbound Wing.evoFlair_:
"Once I finish the final design, you can have this one too!"
—Icarus, Sunbound Wing
"You're just giving me your hand-me-downs?!"
—Mech Wing Swordsman

Enhanced Tiger.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain +1/+1.
Enhanced Tiger.baseFlair_:
Concept: Overall increase in physical performance.
Subjects: Large, ferocious beasts.
Mission: Capture illegal poachers.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team B
Enhanced Tiger.evoFlair_: The stakeout against the poachers proceeded smoothly; the problem lay in the bond between man and beast. They were unwilling to part at the very end. We must take measures to prevent a recurrence. For the good of all of us.

Powerlifting Puppeteer.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all Puppets in your hand.
Powerlifting Puppeteer.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all Puppets in your hand.
Powerlifting Puppeteer.baseFlair_: What up, civilization! These biceps are gonna usher in a new age! No way these huge guns are going to waste!
Powerlifting Puppeteer.evoFlair_: You could carry the whole friggin' world on those massive sculpted traps! It's like Fearsome Fortress has been reincarnated!

Silver Cog Spinner.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader. If Resonance is active for you, recover 1 play point.
Silver Cog Spinner.baseFlair_: Ever rotating as preordained, a cog of silver. Give it a spin for yourself, and restore order to the convolutions of time and space.
Silver Cog Spinner.evoFlair_: A cog of purpose, a cog of power—these two cogs ever turning, moving humanity forward. Escape the cycle, and spin the cog of silver for yourself.

Morton the Manipulator.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less and then summon a copy of that follower as an allied follower.
Morton the Manipulator.baseFlair_: The mind—so fragile, so susceptible. Let me relieve you of control.
Morton the Manipulator.evoFlair_: The idea of free will is but a fantasy, so come closer. Now, let's see it then! Kneel before your new master.

Apostle of Destruction.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Put a copy of that card into your hand and subtract 3 from its cost.
Apostle of Destruction.baseFlair_: Destroy, destroy, destroy. Destroy all curiosity. There is no future without destruction—smile for Armageddon, dance to the damage!
Apostle of Destruction.evoFlair_:
The Third Order: Believe
There is no escape from destruction. When she dances, when she sings, it's her performance that heralds destruction.
—The Teachings of Team Destruction

Liam, Master of Puppets.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Liam, Master of Puppets.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Zwei, Murderous Puppet into your hand and subtract 1 from its cost.
Liam, Master of Puppets.baseFlair_: You understand it, don't you? The wonderful potential of puppets. Simply sublime, aren't they? Obedient assistants that don't complain when I ask them to dispatch my enemies—unlike their human counterparts.
Liam, Master of Puppets.evoFlair_: I made her in the same manner as the rest, so why... why is Zwei's mind so unstable?! Are my creations inferior to his? No! I won't stand for this!

Aerial Craft.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +1/+1 and Storm.
Strike: Subtract 1 from the cost of all Machina cards in your hand.
Aerial Craft.evoEffect_: Strike: Subtract 1 from the cost of all Machina cards in your hand.
Aerial Craft.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new advance after another. While the Mechagun Wielder and her gun commanded a great range, this machine gained a way of instantaneously closing a great distance. —Mechalab Sound Archives (File 002)
Aerial Craft.evoFlair_:
With the dawn of the mechanical age, the definition of an "optimal distance" has changed. Whether your objective is to overwhelm at close range or lay waste from a distance, the result is swift destruction regardless.
—Comparison of Aerial Craft and Mechagun Wielder

Fearsome Fortress.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain +3/+3.
Fearsome Fortress.baseFlair_:
We've set up a perimeter around the fortress with not a single weakness in it. That fortress won't be moving a muscle. The people inside, I mean. Why would a fortress move?
—Army general
Fearsome Fortress.evoFlair_:
"Our perimeter was obliterated. Our troops were soundly beaten. We had no choice but to surrender. I think it might be time for me to consider retirement..."
—Army general

Ironsting Archaeologist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
Ironsting Archaeologist.baseFlair_:
To better meet our goals, we are now developing specialized devices. Among them: mechanical bodies that withstand forceful blows—blows that would make quick work of organic matter. Technology knows no limits.
—Tech Research and Development, Report 3
Ironsting Archaeologist.evoFlair_:
Machines are quickly progressing. We created them, improved them, taught them to walk. Now they no longer need pilots of flesh and blood. This mechanized speed is vital; it's what propels us into the future.
—Boon of Technology, Part 3

Lishenna, Omen of Destruction.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
Lishenna, Omen of Destruction.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Put a Destruction in White into your hand.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
Lishenna, Omen of Destruction.baseFlair_: You can't take your eyes off me. My song and dance make everybody drop to their knees and pray to their idol! Can't deny it? Well, I'm the only thing that'll last past destruction anyway! Hehe—sounds like a fun trial for the world!
Lishenna, Omen of Destruction.evoFlair_: I'm here to sing and dance for you... So you better devote your lives to me. Just try and refuse! I'm an idol to literally everyone. Hehe—sounds like a fun trial for the world!

Enervating Mail.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if at least 10 allied Artifacts cards have been destroyed this match, invoke this card.
Enervating Mail.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Put a random Artifact follower that costs 3 play points or less from your deck into play.
Enervating Mail.baseFlair_:
Operations test: Complete. Confirming access.
Endurance check: Operator injured but conscious.
Examining battle readiness... Error. Too much stress on operator's brain.
"I... will kill... them. Protect... them... I..."
Enervating Mail.evoFlair_:
Final operations test: Cleared. Unlocking frame.
Final endurance test: Cleared. Integration successful.
Battle sequence... Commencing.
Objective: International war intervention.
"Who... to destroy? Who... to smash? Who... am I?"

Absolute Modesty.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of Artifact cards in your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points. Subtract 1 from the cost of all Artifact cards in your hand.
Absolute Modesty.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal X damage to a random enemy follower.
If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed during this match. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Absolute Modesty.baseFlair_: Just as there are seven vices among mortals, there are seven virtues among the gods. The personification of humility seated on her heavenly throne calls out: "Psychomachia, in humility." Countless angels flock to the skies in response.
Absolute Modesty.evoFlair_: The seven virtues each rout one of the seven sins. Seeing greed fester in the earth below, a gentle voice calls out: "Mortals shall learn to be content." Countless angels descend to ensure that the statement becomes reality.

Dimension Dominator.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give a follower in your hand Fanfare - Recover 2 play points.
Dimension Dominator.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower, recover 1 play point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Dimension Dominator.baseFlair_: It appears this dimension has yet to understand what control is. Without a strong leader, this plane will eventually wither and die. Then I will take control myself and birth a new generation devoted to obedience and fealty.
Dimension Dominator.evoFlair_: After traversing many dimensions, I've arrived at the conclusion that tyrants invariably bring about society's end. This world will extol my generosity. Control should not be constricting like chains but delicate like thread.

Marionette//Due.baseEffect_:
Storm.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Marionette//Uno to become Marionette//Tre.
Marionette//Due.baseFlair_: Sadness. Next the girl learned sadness when she saw the inequality that plagues the world of men. "How come there are people who can't be saved!"
Marionette//Due.evoFlair_: Sadness. The girl's heart ached to learn that the human world is controlled by laws. "These people will be miserable forever."

Armored Tentacle.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Last Words: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Armored Tentacle.baseFlair_: Yap all you want; chase after your golden tomorrows... You aren't getting past this!
Armored Tentacle.evoFlair_: A tentacle forged of 100% cold steel. It mocks Mother Earth by boring into Her crust, spreading roots as if to mimic the flora of Her grand creation. She resists its chill, but there is no bond it cannot sever.

Assault Tentacle.baseEffect_:
Storm.
If this follower can be targeted by enemy spells and effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Assault Tentacle.baseFlair_: Bleurgh. Don't look at me like that—you'll infect me with your hope-cooties. You know what? You, your meager futures... I'm crushing them all!
Assault Tentacle.evoFlair_: A tentacle forged of 100% cruel steel. It smites Mother Earth by darting over Her face, spreading calamity as if to mimic the fauna of Her grand creation. She resists its spite, but there is no love it cannot rend.

Pull the Strings.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less, then summon an allied copy of that follower.
If Resonance is active for you, put a Puppet into your hand.
Pull the Strings.baseFlair_: If you see the strings of a puppet, it's because its master no longer saw fit to hide them.

Puppeteer's Strings.baseEffect_:
Put 3 Puppets into your hand.
Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Puppeteer's Strings.baseFlair_: I thought I'd make you a puppet of my own, but you seem to resist the idea. Do you value your freedom so much? Very well then—I suppose I'll have your life instead.

Alterplane Onslaught.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower with 4 defense or less. Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 Artifact cards into your hand instead.
Alterplane Onslaught.baseFlair_: A great rift tore the sky open, revealing another sky beyond it. —A farmer's memoirs

Puppet Bomb.baseEffect_:
Summon a Puppet. Then destroy X random enemy followers. X equals the number of allied Puppets in play.
Destroy all allied Puppets.
Puppet Bomb.baseFlair_: Even a puppet needs to cut loose.

Destructive Refrain.baseEffect_: Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the cost of that card.
Destructive Refrain.baseFlair_: Keep your eyes on your idol, everybody! Show me how much you love me! Show me how much you worship me!

Rebel Against Fate.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Yuwan's Fury or Belphomet's Crackdown.
If Resonance is active for you, instead summon a Mystic Artifact and Ancient Artifact, and randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Tisiphone, the Malignant
-Alecto, the Dissonant
-Megaera, the Indignant
Rebel Against Fate.baseFlair_: The soldiers have gathered their courage; they are now ready to war against fate. A single voice rings out like a shot over the silent ranks. "The time has come to take up arms. Come, let us carve a path to the future!" The rebellion has begun.

Chaos Awakens.baseEffect_:
Give +4/+4 to an allied follower.
If that follower is Shin, Lawful Light, transform it into Shin, Chaotic Darkness.
Chaos Awakens.baseFlair_:
Well, now that you've seen me, let's make a new world order. Yes, I will plunge this world into darkness.
—Shin, Chaotic Darkness

Crystal Cannon.baseEffect_: Whenever an artifact follower that originally costs at least 3 play points comes into play, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader instead.
Crystal Cannon.baseFlair_: From progress comes innovation, and from innovation comes progress.

Mana Pistol Merc.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Mana Pistol Merc.baseFlair_: Swords? Totally barbaric. It's all about firepower, baby!
Mana Pistol Merc.evoFlair_: Bringing a sword to a gun fight? Ha! I'd like to see you try, buddy.

Masked Puppet.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet is destroyed gain +1/+1.
Masked Puppet.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet is destroyed gain +1/+1.
Masked Puppet.baseFlair_: Incomplete, insufficient, imperfect and abandoned by its master. But despite everything, it lives.
Masked Puppet.evoFlair_: Reduced to nothing and recreated from nothing. The mask effectively conceals a steady stream of tears.

Enkidu.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Gilgamesh into your hand if Resonance is active for you.
Enkidu.baseFlair_: The oblivious beast of clay is no more. Through the wisdom of Shamhat, I have awakened and carry this name. Together with the hero, I'll take on this world once again.
Enkidu.evoFlair_: Gugalanna, lords of the stars, what have you, it matters not. Those who bear their fangs to my dearest will be slain—even gods. For my one dear friend, I'll risk it all.

Zealot of Destruction.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then summon an Analyzing Artifact.
Zealot of Destruction.baseFlair_: Yesss! Destroy, destroy, destroy! But if we diiid decide to keep something after all has been smashed to bits, perhaps it may be an idol... A beacon for the world, crafted by my very own hands.
Zealot of Destruction.evoFlair_: Follow her into the deepest of shadows. To recreate the idol of destruction herself is to earn the authority to destroy—and within the shadow of destruction lies creation.

Radiant Artifact.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: If it is your turn, then put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
Radiant Artifact.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: If it is your turn, then put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If it is your opponent's turn, draw a card.
Radiant Artifact.baseFlair_: Forged potential of ivory—a guide to the proper way, simply a matter of course.
Radiant Artifact.evoFlair_: Chaotic potential of obsidian—the proper way is but only one, for infinite opportunities exist.

Barrier Artifact.baseFlair_: This device is a barrier. It wards its master from obliteration... by first obliterating the would-be destroyer.
Barrier Artifact.evoFlair_: This device is a barrier, secure until the bitter end. Its every nut, bolt, and feature was designed to protect. It doesn't fear destruction because it exists for one reason: to serve its master.

Keenedge Artifact.baseFlair_: This device is meant to reap. And there is nothing it can't harvest.
Keenedge Artifact.evoFlair_: This device is meant to steal life away. It was perfectly designed by its master to do so.

Airstrike Artifact.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Airstrike Artifact.baseFlair_: Soar—that is what you were created to do. Revert reason, bring chaos to order.
Airstrike Artifact.evoFlair_: Soar—that is what you were created to do. Before you, all reason and all existence crumbles into chaos.

Unidentified Subject.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect puts cards into your deck, gain +1/+0.
Unidentified Subject.evoEffect_: Whenever an effect puts cards into your deck, gain +1/+0.
Unidentified Subject.baseFlair_: In our experiments, we paired a human's body with a demon's blood. Using the organs of a beast, and a heart of black iron, we created something unspeakable, unidentifiable.
Unidentified Subject.evoFlair_: Not human, demon, nor beast. It swelled as if it were water, and moaned in agony. We created something truly horrifying that day—an abomination without purpose.

Automaton Soldier.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give +0/+1 and Ward to all Puppets in your hand.
Automaton Soldier.baseFlair_: Comparable to a spider, the doll quickly latches onto any unfortunate soul entangled in its intricately woven threads.
Automaton Soldier.evoFlair_: Its entangled threads stained with drops of vermillion, the true nature of the doll is revealed as it greedily devours its prey.

Dirk, Steelarm Battler.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card that costs at least 3 play points from your deck into your hand.
Dirk, Steelarm Battler.baseFlair_: Talking's... something I'm pretty bad at. That's why this thing... does the talking for me. My new arm...
Dirk, Steelarm Battler.evoFlair_: Talking's not... what I do well. I think I'll come in handy too. Let's battle together... I'll do everything I can.

Nicholas, Stalwart Inventor.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Go, Go, Robomi!
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Subtract 3 from that amulet's Countdown.
Nicholas, Stalwart Inventor.baseFlair_: So your name's Robomi, huh? It's amazing that an eons-old machina soldier can move and talk. I'm Nicholas, and I'll be taking care of your maintenance from now on, Robomi!
Nicholas, Stalwart Inventor.evoFlair_: The same technology used to create Robomi... I'll use it to protect the ones I love! Gigante Suit ready! Nicholas, lifting off!

Robomi, Steel Warrior.baseFlair_: This unit's name is Robomi. You have been registered as this unit's new engineer, Nicholas.
Robomi, Steel Warrior.evoFlair_: Charging complete. Preparing Hyper Megaton Kick.

Hakrabi.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. Repeat once if Resonance is active for you.
Hakrabi.baseFlair_: Entirety set right. Naught set to its counter. Now, you too must step upon the scales.
Hakrabi.evoFlair_: Bear the burden of this world and the weight of mankind—achieve equilibrium and balance the heavens and earth.

Lasershell Tortoise.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Machina or Natura follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush and the following effect: At the end of your turn, return this follower to your hand.
Lasershell Tortoise.baseFlair_:
Concept: Automated artillery barrage
Subjects: All organisms capable of conveying laser turrets
Mission: Development of creature that is weapon and carrier in one
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team Z
Lasershell Tortoise.evoFlair_:
Organic life has donned steel, shouldered machinery, and assumed the robe of power. It roars, "We reign supreme; these machines are our attendants." This biological drive for dominance is vital; it's what propels us into the future.
—In Defense of Machines, Part 2

Mind Splitter.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, subtract 2 from its cost.
Mind Splitter.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, subtract 2 from its cost.
Mind Splitter.baseFlair_: I am the Two of Swords, exemplar of denial. The only path is forward. The only thing worth honing is skill. Nothing else matters. All these tools are at my disposal. No one will stand in my way.
Mind Splitter.evoFlair_: He is a master swordsman; his ideal state is stillness. To him, nothing need exist... Yet he realizes: he denies, therefore he is. Quickly, he turns his tools towards his own mind; he shreds away at his consciousness, hoping to one day return to his purest form.

Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas.baseFlair_: These artifacts move at my command, but they do nothing for my lonely heart.
Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas.evoFlair_: Somebody, anybody! Please rescue me from this life of solitude. For such a companion, I would do anything...

Deus Ex Machina.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects - Whenever you play an Artifact card, recover 1 play point. At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you, discard your hand and draw 6 cards. (These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
Deus Ex Machina.baseFlair_: Someone has to make sure fate stays in balance. I can restore order, or let chaos consume this world. Now then, which one will it be?
Deus Ex Machina.evoFlair_: Rotate the eternal wheel of fate, and the truth of the world reveals itself. Reach the limits of the world so that it may change forevermore. How far will you go?

Dyne, Master Swordsman.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If the total cost of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match is at least 20, deal 5 damage instead.
Dyne, Master Swordsman.baseFlair_: Look, life's not about following the pack, nor about creating a name for yourself. It's like this—when you get to be a certain age, you begin to see the right path. Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth. That's why you gotta fight only those that are ready for it.
Dyne, Master Swordsman.evoFlair_: Look, I don't plan to boast. The fact this sword chose me is just coincidence, you see. But even us older folk, we've got dreams. It doesn't embarrass me at all to say that's why I live my life rewarding virtue and punishing vice.

Zwei, Resonant Heart.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Puppets.
----------
Fanfare: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Zwei, Resonant Heart.baseFlair_:
Fear. Rage. Hatred. Affection—no, it's useless. I can't express all my heart feels for you. But I wonder... What do you make of me now?
—Orchis, Linked Heart
Zwei, Resonant Heart.evoFlair_: From near and far, she sought a heart. The purpose of her creation. Her purpose in this world. Seeking the knowledge for herself, she continues her journey. As the answers are revealed, her heart beats on.

Pop Goes the Poppet.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower. Then deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the destroyed follower's attack.
Pop Goes the Poppet.baseFlair_: I hate attention. I get enough of that from doll aficionados.

Captivating Conductor.baseEffect_:
Select 2 followers in play. Deal X damage to the first follower and Y damage to the second follower. X equals the attack of the second follower and Y equals the attack of the first follower.
(Can be played only when 2 targetable followers are in play.)
Captivating Conductor.baseFlair_: I'll transcribe your cries to my scores and use those tears to play my orchestra! Let the concerto begin...

Otherworld Rift.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower.
Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Otherworld Rift.baseFlair_: Somewhere within the vast, infinite reaches of this dimension, surely there's a place befitting you.

Heartless Battle.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon a Lloyd the Android or Victoria. Put a Puppet into your hand.
Enhance (7): Give the summoned follower +0/+3 and Bane.
Heartless Battle.baseFlair_: "This is a fight for Orchis!" "If that's what you want, then it's what you'll get!" —Zwei and Orchis

Artifact Spark.baseEffect_:
Transform an Artifact card in your hand into an Artifact Spark.
Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
(Can be played only when a targetable Artifact card is in your hand.)
Artifact Spark.baseFlair_: Only through the perspective of man can nothingness be. Through the perspective of the universe, even nothing exists as something.

Black Iron Soldier.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Black Iron Soldier.baseFlair_: My mission has only just begun—this flesh of iron will be your end!
Black Iron Soldier.evoFlair_: My mission continues—you will not survive, for I am black iron incarnate!

Captain Meteo.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain +1/+0 and Ward.
Captain Meteo.baseFlair_: They ain't much to look at, but they're everything to me... You won't lay a hand on my crew—these arms are for protecting!
Captain Meteo.evoFlair_: What'd you say to me, punk? Never underestimate a pirate! Don't say I didn't warn ya—these arms are for fighting!

Mechanical Mammoth.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +3/+3.
Mechanical Mammoth.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. We set out to create a prototype soldier— instead, a different beast was born. At times it takes the form of man. At others, a monster. We had no way of predicting it. —Mechalab Sound Archives (File 001)
Mechanical Mammoth.evoFlair_: With the dawn of the mechanical age, the definition of the "optimal figure" has changed. Whether a creation takes form as a skillful man or powerful beast, either one shall serve its purpose effortlessly. —Comparison of Mechanical Mammoth and Prototype Soldier

Basileus, Outworld Invader.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.
Basileus, Outworld Invader.baseFlair_: This... This must be the inner garden. Ahaha... I've arrived! To think all I needed to make it to the promised land was cross that pathetic barrier!
Basileus, Outworld Invader.evoFlair_: Now then, how should I start with this garden's destruction? Aha... I know just the trick. I'll thoroughly grind it to dust! Ahaha!

Safira, Synthetic Beast.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Evolve this follower and this follower's attack is X until the end of the turn. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match.
Safira, Synthetic Beast.baseFlair_: A synthetic body, a synthetic life, a crossbreed. Neither human nor beast, what is my purpose in this life?
Safira, Synthetic Beast.evoFlair_: What is my purpose in this life? I'll find my true purpose and make something of myself someday—just watch!

Cannon Hermit Crab.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Cannon Hermit Crab and change its attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to half this follower's attack and defense, rounded up.
Cannon Hermit Crab.baseFlair_:
Concept: Waterproof and fully automated.
Subjects: Creatures already accustomed to armor.
Mission: Protect the peace without the need for human personnel.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team C
Cannon Hermit Crab.evoFlair_: The giant hermit crab peacekeeping experiment came to a most startling conclusion: the number of test subject crabs no longer matched up with the number of equipment sets produced. Further investigation will be required to find out why. For the good of all of us.

New Order.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all cards in your deck. Then put 10 Mystic Artifacts, 10 Radiant Artifacts, and 10 Prime Artifacts into your deck.
New Order.baseFlair_: After they were abandoned by their god, the sages began to dream. They would remake their philosophy, the laws of the world... the world itself. Thousands of forsaken souls united to give birth to a single mechanism. A single whole. A single... order.
New Order.evoFlair_: The new order burst from the old world's body, turned, and consumed it. One planet was not enough to sate its hunger; and so it devoured and grew. As it waxed in size and power, it knew it was no mere creation. It was the sum and the genesis of all the cosmos's principles.

Belphomet, Lord of Aiolon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all Machina cards from your deck. Put X Tisiphone, the Malignants, Y Alecto, the Dissonants, and Z Megaera, the Indignants into your deck. X, Y, and Z equal the number of Machina cards banished from your deck split randomly.
Belphomet, Lord of Aiolon.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.
Belphomet, Lord of Aiolon.baseFlair_: What value is there in emotion? It's all just a dumb processing error. That's why I have to reclaim, reduce, and recycle them all—they're junk! Junk that I created! It hurts the pride to see your creations grow inefficient!
Belphomet, Lord of Aiolon.evoFlair_: Stop laughing. Stop crying. And stop staring at me like that. You're going to make me vomit with those stupid expressions. You know what, forget it. It's termination for you. I'll wring the oxygen from your lungs, the tears from your ducts, and the life from your body!

Bearminator.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever an allied Machina or Natura follower attacks, recover 1 play point.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if you have at least 3, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
Bearminator.baseFlair_: Its claws are state-of-the-art. They warp virtual mass and crush stars into dust. But to the great bear, even these ruinous weapons are but appendages. Fear not the blade—fear the flesh that wields it.
Bearminator.evoFlair_:
Activating Ometeotl: all systems online.
Code: FMD. OpticPilot, ready to go.
Inputting extermination sequence... Approved.
Things are about to get ugly.
—Ralmia, Sonic Racer

Marionette//Tre.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Last Words: Summon a Marionette//Uno and a Marionette//Due.
Marionette//Tre.baseFlair_: Hatred. Last the girl despaired at the world of men and began to hate. "If these people won't learn, if they're going to be miserable forever, then—"
Marionette//Tre.evoFlair_: Hatred. The girl finally came to despise the world as unsavable. "If this is how the world is, then someone should crush it to pieces!"

Silver Automaton.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Silver Automaton.baseFlair_:
Did you hear about the statue our neighbors gave us?
"Targets identified. Changing to battle mode."
After it started movin', it crushed a lot of good men.
"Strengthening battle parameters."
Silver Automaton.evoFlair_:
No matter what we did, it kept fighting.
"Damage minimal. Continuing battle operations."
When reinforcements arrived, it transformed.
"More targets acquired. Switching to annihilation mode."

Dazzling Archer.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (1): Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put an Analyzing Artifact and an Ancient Artifact into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Dazzling Archer.baseFlair_: Purifying rays, shining volley! Oh? One of the monsters actually survived. All right then, I'll just have to take it head-on!
Dazzling Archer.evoFlair_:
"Not bad, not bad at all! I could get used to your brand of archery! Why don't you sail the seas with us aboard my ship, lassie?"
"Nah, I don't think I'd be able to stand you. I'll pass."
—Captain Meteo and Dazzling Archer

Prime Artifact.baseEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, summon a Prime Artifact.
Prime Artifact.baseFlair_: The entity has no consciousness of its own. But it was constructed for a reason: to continue endlessly onward; to advance. To surpass all conscious beings.
Prime Artifact.evoFlair_: The entity has no principles of its own. But it was made to fulfill an ideal: light is a signal of one's advancement. It will make all conscious beings bow down before it.

Colossal Construct.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of remaining Artifact cards in your deck.
Colossal Construct.baseFlair_:
A construct of bronze, created to serve as a guardian of the south island. It never misses its rounds—once in the morning, once in the afternoon, and once in the evening.
—Island Tales, Chapter 2
Colossal Construct.evoFlair_:
As time marched on, the people eventually forgot its purpose. Even so, its trembles can be heard like clockwork—once in the morning, once in the afternoon, and once in the evening.
—Island Tales, Chapter 3

God Bullet Golem.baseEffect_:
Can't attack the enemy leader.
At the end of your turn, randomly destroy an allied Artifact follower. Deal damage to the enemy leader equal to that follower's cost.
God Bullet Golem.evoEffect_:
Can't attack the enemy leader.
At the end of your turn, randomly destroy an allied Artifact follower. Deal damage to the enemy leader equal to that follower's cost.
God Bullet Golem.baseFlair_: FLY TODAY. FLY TOMORROW. FLY ANYWHERE AS ORDERED BY MASTER / A SHELL (DIVINE BULLET).
God Bullet Golem.evoFlair_: FLY TODAY. FLY TOMORROW. MASTER OCCASIONALLY TAKES A RIDE / A CARRIAGE (DIVINE TRANSPORT)

Zwei, Murderous Puppet.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give an allied Victoria the ability to attack 2 times per turn.
Zwei, Murderous Puppet.baseFlair_: No one mocks me! I mean, I'm perfect! If you can't accept that, then I won't accept you!
Zwei, Murderous Puppet.evoFlair_: Oh, so I'm broken? A defect? That's so selfish of you to say! You won't get away with this! You won't! I'll shred anything that mocks me. Victoria!

Artifact Duplicator.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly summon copies of different allied Artifact followers destroyed during this match until your area is full.
Artifact Duplicator.baseFlair_:
The artifacts, they do not speak. One therefore shouldn't rely on language when dealing with them.
The veteran technician's actions communicated this to us.
—Specialist Records, Chapter 6
Artifact Duplicator.evoFlair_: (The artifacts speak. Every circuit in them tells an eloquent story. I don't talk to them because there's just no need—and, well, I'm the quiet type.)

That Which Erases.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect puts cards into your deck, banish a random enemy follower or amulet.
That Which Erases.baseFlair_: Its sudden appearance... blank and we... blank everything and everything... blank at least in the afterlife... blank —Book of Many Blanks
That Which Erases.evoFlair_: Before any of us realized... blank so... blank and could appear any time... blank please take great care to... blank —Book of Many Blanks

Electromagical Rhino.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of remaining Artifact cards in your deck.
Strike: Put 3 Artifact Rhinos into your deck.
Electromagical Rhino.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Put 3 Artifact Rhinos into your deck.
Electromagical Rhino.baseFlair_: Life, metal—there's not a difference between them. Born from love or built by hand, they're bound to multiply, to spread like wildfire. —Words of a mechanical technician
Electromagical Rhino.evoFlair_: Why does life get ideas when it deals with metal? After all, it wears tempered steel, and it eats with custom silver. Life, metal—there's not a difference between them. They both multiply; they both spread like wildfire. —Words of a mechanical technician

Silva, Ardent Sniper.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Put a follower that originally costs 3 play points or less from your hand into play and give it Rush. Give your leader the following effect: Once on each of your turns, when an allied follower attacks, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
----------
Ambush.
Silva, Ardent Sniper.baseFlair_: Affirmative. It's a long shot from here... But this rifle isn't just for show. I always hit my mark.
Silva, Ardent Sniper.evoFlair_: R-really it was nothing... Don't praise me like that right after battle... I don't know—it just makes me self-conscious. Argh! Don't you think we're both a little too old for teasing like this!

Gullias, Silverbeast Lord.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Gullian Aura and a Gullian Howl into your hand.
Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, summon an Assembly Droid.
Gullias, Silverbeast Lord.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, summon an Assembly Droid.
Gullias, Silverbeast Lord.baseFlair_: The final change brought radicalization. Everything we thought was wrong. The cores don't seem to have been created by mortals. And that includes this core believed to be the original as well... —Research Log, Part 4
Gullias, Silverbeast Lord.evoFlair_:
Verifying access request...
Failed.
Please input Origin Core code.
Authorizing access...
Code not recognized. Access Denied.

Magna Giant.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Put a random Machina card (excluding Magna Giant) from your deck into your hand.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of allied Machina followers destroyed during this match.
Magna Giant.baseFlair_: Core mutations have reached their zenith. On one hand, a mighty roar to govern all: Gullias. On the other, life breathes through an ancient warrior once more within a creation of steel. —Mechalab Sound Archives (File 003)
Magna Giant.evoFlair_:
"So you command this machine... A very impressive display! However! Valor is as equally important as power! Now witness, as the dawn of a new age rises—Magnaaa... Giaaant!"
—Magna Giant to Gullias, Silverbeast Lord

Orchis, Linked Heart.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Summon a Lloyd the Android or Marionette//Uno.
Whenever an allied Lloyd the Android comes into play, give it +2/+2.
Whenever an allied Marionette//Uno comes into play, summon a Marionette//Due.
Orchis, Linked Heart.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Transform a Puppet in your hand into a Marionette//Tre.
Whenever an allied Lloyd the Android comes into play, give it +2/+2.
Whenever an allied Marionette//Uno comes into play, summon a Marionette//Due.
Orchis, Linked Heart.baseFlair_:
I was spiteful. I was jealous. I wanted to erase you—surpass you.
But... I don't know anymore. Are we even enemies? What are we? I... I wonder what to even make of you anymore.
—Zwei, Resonant Heart
Orchis, Linked Heart.evoFlair_: From within her heart, she sought the answers. The folly of humanity. The righteousness of humanity. Seeking to witness them herself, she continues her journey. As the answers are revealed, her heart beats on.

Artifact Rhino.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of remaining Artifact cards in your deck.
Strike: Put 3 Artifact Rhinos into your deck.
Artifact Rhino.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Put 3 Artifact Rhinos into your deck.
Artifact Rhino.baseFlair_: Metal multiplies, and it spreads like wildfire. It bears the seeds of utility and sometimes sows destruction.
Artifact Rhino.evoFlair_: Metal multiplies, and it spreads like wildfire. Its destruction is sure to reap some sort of benefit for life.

Paradigm Shift.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied Artifact follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Choose: Summon a Barrier Artifact, Keenedge Artifact, or Airstrike Artifact.
Paradigm Shift.baseFlair_: To reconstruct reason, first you must reconstruct form.

Purgation's Blade.baseEffect_:
Give +4/+0 and Storm to an allied Portalcraft follower.
If that follower is a Maisha, Hero of Purgation, give +X/+0 instead.  X equals the number of allied followers destroyed during this match.
Purgation's Blade.baseFlair_:
"Is this it! Is this what a hero does!"
"That's how it seems to me. Am I wrong?"
—Erika and Maisha

Airship Whale.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact follower that costs 3 play points or less from your deck into play.
Repeat once if Resonance is active for you.
Airship Whale.baseFlair_: Without a master to be guided by, the hungry whale wanders the skies, ravaging the earth below with enchanted explosives.
Airship Whale.evoFlair_: In search of a new master, the colossal whale wanders the skies, singing a song akin to cries of lamentation.

Draco Marionette.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Draco Marionette.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Draco Marionette.baseFlair_: A puppet modeled after or inspired by a wyrm of unknown origin. The strings running through it are all that gives it a semblance of volition.
Draco Marionette.evoFlair_: A puppet modeled after or inspired by a wyrm of unknown origin. Although its body does not shelter the heart or pride of a dragon, it unleashes destruction all the same.

Vibrochakram Thrower.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
----------
Fanfare: Choose - Summon a Radiant Artifact or Prime Artifact.
Vibrochakram Thrower.baseFlair_:
We continued to optimize machines for research. When we needed combat data, we created bots willing to take our places on the battlefield. Thus, we could continue to develop new technologies in complete safety.
—Tech Research and Development, Report 2
Vibrochakram Thrower.evoFlair_:
Some wonder why we are so devoted to our research. It is simple: we see the potential of technology. If deemed necessary, we would use our own bodies as test subjects. We mean to rewrite the history of all life in steel.
—Boon of Technology, Part 2

Empyreal Swordsman.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. If Resonance is active for you, deal 4 damage instead.
Empyreal Swordsman.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader. If Resonance is active for you, deal 4 damage instead.
Empyreal Swordsman.baseFlair_: Sword of folklore, saber of the heavens. A blade of gleaming sapphire shall purge the dark, and the light shall be deliver'd.
Empyreal Swordsman.evoFlair_: Fate calls upon a savior to put an end to this eternal conflict, destined to cut through the chaos and restore harmony to this realm.

Magna Legacy.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match.
Magna Legacy.baseFlair_: From the heavens, it looms over the earth below, as a reminder to all its inhabitants—the mechanical purge is nigh.
Magna Legacy.evoFlair_: The beings above have long since perished, but the mechanical purge knows no lifespan—simply awaiting the call, "awaken".

Orchis, Puppet Girl.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 2 Puppets in your hand and 8 play points, Choose: Play this card as an Orchis, Resolute Puppet or Orchis, Vengeful Puppet.
----------
Fanfare: Put 3 Puppets into your hand.
Orchis, Puppet Girl.baseFlair_: Why do people love other people? Why do they hate them? I know that somewhere in the world the answer is waiting.
Orchis, Puppet Girl.evoFlair_: Master gave me my heart. He's not here anymore, so I want to learn—learn why he gave it to me.

Shion, Mercurial Aegis.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Give +1/+1 to all allied non-Artifact followers. Give +2/+2 to all allied Artifact followers.
----------
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Can't take more than 1 damage at a time. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Shion, Mercurial Aegis.evoEffect_: Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Shion, Mercurial Aegis.baseFlair_: Once forged, a vow with this battle goddess may never be broken. And in turn, for those who swear themselves to her, she becomes their unyielding shield for all of perpetuity.
Shion, Mercurial Aegis.evoFlair_: Once uttered, a commandment from this battle goddess must be followed. But in turn, for those people who martyr themselves in her name, she becomes their unwavering sword, banishing the enemies of mankind.

Dreadnought Gorilla.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Storm.
Dreadnought Gorilla.baseFlair_:
Concept: Base strength reinforced with armor and weaponry. Fully automated.
Subjects: Giant monsters with intellect.
Mission: Test limits of domination over nature.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Teams A, B, and C
Dreadnought Gorilla.evoFlair_: People may be foolish, thought the gorilla, but they make great things. After making full use of their new weapons to earn victory in battle, the gorilla ignored orders to return to base and struck out on its own. For the good of all of us.

Belphomet, Worldreaver.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Machina
----------
Rush.
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of cards fused to this card.
-Summon an Armored Tentacle.
-Summon an Assault Tentacle.
-Gain +3/+3 and draw 3 cards. (Draw up to 3 times.)
Belphomet, Worldreaver.baseFlair_: So you've gathered up courage. Ooh, I'm so scared. Hah! I might find your efforts cute if they weren't so nauseating. Listen, I know the unknown—and I've seen your fates. So shut up, give up, and get those disgraceful mugs out of my sight. This world's already mine!
Belphomet, Worldreaver.evoFlair_: Desire, faith... The strong don't need any of that. Know why? They have it all already! They believe in nothing but themselves! So come on, do your dance of fury. Gather at your pity parties; spin your feeble bonds. It's meaningless—all of it! This world's already mine!

Orchis, Resolute Puppet.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, transform it into a Lloyd the Android if there isn't an allied Lloyd the Android in play. At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader if there is an allied Lloyd the Android in play.
Orchis, Resolute Puppet.baseFlair_: Kindness, warmth, and love from people. They're the bonds that connect the world. Hey, Lloyd, you understand now, don't you? The meaning of living in this world?
Orchis, Resolute Puppet.evoFlair_: As long as there's love in my heart, the world and I are sure to stay connected. If you want to break that connection, then Lloyd and I will defeat you.

Orchis, Vengeful Puppet.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, transform it into a Marionette//Uno if there isn't an allied Marionette//Uno in play. Transform it into a Marionette//Due instead if there is an allied Marionette//Uno in play.
Orchis, Vengeful Puppet.baseFlair_: This anger, sadness, and hatred toward people... I'm going to turn myself into something new. Ah, master, the reason that I'm alive is—
Orchis, Vengeful Puppet.evoFlair_: This hatred in my heart. I know it's dividing me from the world. No... your words can't reach me anymore. I'll listen to my feelings and shred you to pieces.

Avatar of Desecration.baseEffect_:
Bane.
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 different Portalcraft followers from your deck into play.
Avatar of Desecration.baseFlair_:
"Drink in defilement!"
"Purify it!"
Its decree washed over them, consumed them: violate. There is nothing left in this world, for soon it will be devoured whole.
Avatar of Desecration.evoFlair_:
"..."
"..."
Having fulfilled its commands, they were assimilated into the being's pure corruption. The world was soon to follow, ushering in a new blasphemous reality.

Tisiphone, the Malignant.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
Tisiphone, the Malignant.baseFlair_:
Target acquired. Switching to battle mode.
Activating quantum blade Naelaon.
I am Tisiphone, the Malignant. Ye who would trespass on forbidden ground, step forward and meet thy destruction.
Tisiphone, the Malignant.evoFlair_: Charging complete. Activating quantum blade Naelaon. My blade, cut first thy wings. Fell second thy legs. Hunt third thine arms; gouge forth thine eyes. Sunder fifth thy neck. Pierce sixth thy heart.

Alecto, the Dissonant.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, summon 2 Assembly Droids.
Whenever another allied Machina follower comes into play, give it +3/+3.
Alecto, the Dissonant.baseFlair_:
Target acquired. Switching to battle mode.
Activating particle mace Kotaehge.
I am Alecto, the Dissonant. Ye who would trespass on forbidden ground, hear the cacophony and meet thy destruction.
Alecto, the Dissonant.evoFlair_:
Activating particle mace Kotaehge.
Optimizing battle pattern... Complete.
Accessing all unit mainframes... Authorization complete.
Manually overwriting system data. Forcing restart.
All units: Fusillade.

Megaera, the Indignant.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower and 6 damage to the enemy leader.
Megaera, the Indignant.baseFlair_:
Target acquired. Switching to battle mode.
Activating wave cannon Iraliae.
I am Megaera, the Indignant. Ye who would trespass on forbidden ground, behold true fury and meet thy destruction.
Megaera, the Indignant.evoFlair_:
Adapting battle protocol.
Charging wave cannon.
Charge complete.
Wave cannon Iraliae, standby. Fire.

Vengeful Puppeteer Noah.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give +1/+0 and Storm to all Puppets in your hand.
Vengeful Puppeteer Noah.baseFlair_: The depths of this sorrow are eternal. The past, the future—they matter not. All that remains is the pain of loss.
Vengeful Puppeteer Noah.evoFlair_: Kill, my puppets! The time for vengeance has come. My hopes and dreams are but naught. If I cannot have her back, at least you'll have a taste of my anguish!

Amethyst Giant.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and gain the following effect - Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
Amethyst Giant.baseFlair_: Would you really believe the gods to be faultless and infallible? They're bound to err occasionally—humankind is just one example of many missteps.
Amethyst Giant.evoFlair_: Would you truly believe the gods to be flawless and unquestionable? Simply observe their failed creations—neglected and cast aside.

Tylle, the Worldgate.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Banish an enemy follower with 2 defense or less. Put a Guardform Golem and a Strikeform Golem into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Randomly put different Artifact followers from your deck into play until your area is full.
Tylle, the Worldgate.baseFlair_: I keep the link between the inner and outer realms: the Worldgate. And once opened, it shall usher in a new order. The novel will bring forth advancement, while the obsolete will fall to the wayside. But, please. Do not fear the coming change.
Tylle, the Worldgate.evoFlair_: I am but an observer, distantly peering toward the dual realms. Never once have I visited this world, until calamity reared its head. I am most fortunate the light and winds have brought me to you.

Sylvia, the Condemner.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Then if you have at least 1 evolution point, use 1 evolution point and deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Sylvia, the Condemner.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Sylvia, the Condemner.baseFlair_: Good and evil in excess are poisonous to this world. They are measured on the scales of heaven and earth, for balance is the only justice. Heresy against this principle is sin and will be dealt with thusly. Well, let me put it simply: this is pretty much it for you.
Sylvia, the Condemner.evoFlair_: This world vacillates between good and evil like a rocking cradle. Who wishes to disturb this tranquility with wretched change? That is heresy, and heresy is sin. Superior or inferior, those who break this principle will be condemned.

Vertex Colony.baseEffect_:
Crystallize (2): Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, randomly put a Guardform Golem or Strikeform Golem into your hand. Each of these followers can be added to your hand only once with this effect.
----------
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to all enemies. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match.
Vertex Colony.baseFlair_:
"I've concluded that the Artifacts are not ancient relics. The data they gathered is, even now, being transmitted somewhere. There is an incredibly advanced civilization out there somewhere, observing us."
—Voice recording of a certain professor
Vertex Colony.evoFlair_:
"I finally isolated the data transmission. I've decrypted the destination... Now that's strange. This can't be right. Those coordinates would be far above our atmos—"
—Voice recording of a certain professor

Shin, Chaotic Darkness.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, randomly activate 1 of the following effects:
-Destroy a random enemy follower.
-Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader and restore 2 defense to your leader.
-Subtract 1 from the cost of all cards in your hand.
If this is your tenth turn or later, activate all instead.
Shin, Chaotic Darkness.baseFlair_:
Well, now that you've seen me, let's go ahead and make a new world order. If you're the light of this world, then I'm the darkness that will engulf it in chaos.
Aaah, how long I've waited for this day.
Shin, Chaotic Darkness.evoFlair_: Now I'll plunge the world into darkness. And after my embrace, not even your light will bring salvation. You should just give it up. There's no point saving anything anymore.

Omniscient Kaiser.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (1): Select a card in your hand and banish the rest. Draw a card for each card you banished. If this is your first turn, draw 1 more.
----------
Fanfare: Deal 7 damage to the enemy leader and a random enemy follower. Restore 7 defense to your leader. Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
Omniscient Kaiser.baseFlair_: This new world needs only one god—me. I will overcome all adversity and bring my dream to fruition, no matter what. For the rest of you... it's game over.
Omniscient Kaiser.evoFlair_: Omniscient Kaiser is my divine right to see all things. No matter what masses rise against me, they have no hope of victory. All shall kneel in deference to my will!

Destruction in White.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Fanfare: Put a Destruction in Black into your hand.
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Destruction in White.baseFlair_: The urge to destroy is white. People's smiles on the morrow of the apocalypse will be evidence of the unstained righteousness of annihilation.

Destruction in Black.baseEffect_:
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from the cost of this card.
----------
Can't be destroyed by spells and effects.
At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to all enemies. If an allied Destruction in White is in play, deal 10 damage instead.
Destruction in Black.baseFlair_: The urge to destroy is black. People's smiles on the eve of the apocalypse are the corrupt obstacle hindering the inevitability of annihilation.
